ref: And Allah loves the good-doers.
draft: And Allah loves those who do good.
hil: And God loves those who do good.
compare: And Allah loves those who do good.

src: Er sagte: "Ja, und dann werdet ihr zu unseren Nächsten gehören."
ref: "Yes," he replied. "You 'will be among the honoured."
draft: He said, "Yes, and then you will belong to our neighbors."
hil: He said, "Yes, and then you will belong to our neighbors."
compare: He said, "Yes, and then you will belong to our neighbors."

src: Und die ihnen keine Unterstützung gewähren, noch sich selbst helfen können?
ref: Who can neither help them, nor help themselves?
draft: And those who cannot provide them with support nor help themselves?
hil: And those who do not grant them any support, nor can help themselves?
compare: And those who do not grant them any support, nor can help themselves?

src: Oder (gewahrtest du etwa nicht) denjenigen, der an einer Ortschaft vorbeiging, während die Stützen ihrer (Häuser) dem Erdboden gleichgemacht wurden?!
ref: Or take the man who passed by a town which lay destroyed upside down.
draft: Or (did you not notice), the one who passed by a town while its (houses) were leveled to the ground?!
hil: Or (did you not see) he who passed by a town as its pillars were brought down? He said, 'How can God give it life again, once it has died?'
compare: Or (did you not see) he who passed by a town as its pillars were brought down? He said, 'How can God give it life again, once it has died?'

src: Dann entfernten sie sich.
ref: Then they turn away.
draft: Then they moved away.
hil: Then they withdrew.
compare: Then they withdrew.

src: Aber er blieb nicht lange aus. Er sagte: "Ich habe (an Wissen) erfaßt, was du nicht erfaßt hast.
ref: But he was not long in coming, and reported: "I have been around where you have not been.
draft: But he didn't stay away for long. He said, "I have grasped knowledge that you have not grasped."
hil: But he didn't stay away for long. He said, 'I have grasped knowledge that you have not grasped.'
compare: But he didn't stay away for long. He said, "I have grasped knowledge that you have not grasped."

src: Es wird für sie keine Speise geben außer aus trockenen Dornen,
ref: They will have no food except bitter thorn,
draft: There will be no food for them except from dry thorns.
hil: There will be no food for them except from dry thorns.
compare: There will be no food for them except from dry thorns.

src: Und wenn ihr (es) nicht vermögt, also gewiß, ALLAH ist allvergebend, allgnädig.
ref: If you do not have the means, then surely God is forgiving and kind.
draft: And if you are not able to, be certain, Allah is all-forgiving, all-merciful.
hil: And if you are unable [to do so], then most certainly Allah is All-Forgiving, All-Merciful.
compare: And if you are not able to, be certain, Allah is all-forgiving, all-merciful.

src: Aber nein, die meisten von ihnen wissen nicht Bescheid.
ref: Nay, but the most of them have no knowledge.
draft: But no, most of them don't know.
hil: But no, most of them don't know.
compare: But no, most of them don't know.

src: Und die ihre Scham bewahren,
ref: Who guard their sex
draft: And those who preserve their shame.
hil: And those who guard their private parts,
compare: And those who guard their private parts,

src: Ibrahim!
ref: "O Ibrahim (Abraham)!
draft: Ibrahim!
hil: Abraham!
compare: Ibrahim!

src: Gehen sie jedoch weg, so ist es kein Vergehen für euch, wenn sie zu ihrem Besten über sich selbst verfügen.
ref: But if they leave (of their own accord), you will not be blamed for what they do with themselves in their own rights.
draft: However, if they leave, it is not a wrongdoing for you if they dispose of themselves for their own good.
hil: "However, if they leave, it is no offense for you if they dispose of themselves for their own benefit."
compare: "However, if they leave, it is no offense for you if they dispose of themselves for their own benefit."

src: Was hinderte dich daran, nachdem du gesehen hattest, daß sie irregingen,
ref: What stopped you when you saw them going astray;
draft: What prevented you after you saw that they were walking irregularly.
hil: What prevented you, after you had seen that they erred?
compare: What prevented you, after you had seen that they erred?

src: Und (erinnere daran), als WIR dir sagten: "Gewiß, dein HERR wird die Menschen zugrunde richten!" Und WIR machten das Traumgesicht, dasWIR dich sehen ließen, nur als Fitna für die Menschen, so auch den verfluchten Baum im Quran.
ref: When We said to you: "Verily your Lord circumscribes mankind," and showed you the vision and the accursed tree of the Qur'an, it was as a bone of contention for men.
draft: And (remember), when WE told you: "Surely, your Lord will destroy the people!" And WE showed you the vision, which WE made you see, only as a trial for the people, as well as the cursed tree in the Quran.
hil: And remember when we told you, 'Surely, your Lord will destroy the people.' And we made the vision we showed you only as a temptation for men, as well as the accursed tree in the Quran.
compare: And (remember), when WE told you: "Surely, your Lord will destroy the people!" And WE showed you the vision, which WE made you see, only as a trial for the people, as well as the cursed tree in the Quran.

src: Also was ist mit denjenigen, die Kufr betrieben haben, sie kommen zu dir eilend
ref: What is the matter with unbelievers that they stare at you with fixed gazes and hasten towards you
draft: So what about those who committed disbelief, they come to you eagerly.
hil: So what about those who have committed disbelief, they come to you eagerly.
compare: So what about those who committed disbelief, they come to you eagerly.

src: Hast du etwa nicht diejenigen gesehen, denen ein Teil der Schrift gegeben wurde, sie erkaufen sich das Irregehen und wollen, daß auch ihr irregeht?!
ref: Have you not seen the people who were given a share of the Book, but who purchased only error, and wish that you also go astray?
draft: Did you not see those to whom a portion of the Scripture was given, who buy into error and desire that you should be led away from the Path?
hil: Do you not see those to whom a portion of the Scripture was given, who purchase error and want you to go astray as well?!
compare: Do you not see those to whom a portion of the Scripture was given, who purchase error and want you to go astray as well?!

src: Und wenn dann unsere Boten zu ihnen kommen, um sie abzuberufen, sagen sie: «Wo sind diejenigen, die ihr anstelle Gottes anzurufen pflegtet?»
ref: Until, when Our envoys come to them, to take their souls away, they will say, “Where are they whom you used to pray to besides God?”
draft: And when our messengers come to them to gather them, they say, "Where are those you used to call upon besides Allah?"
hil: And when Our messengers come to them to take them away, they will say, 'Where is what you used to invoke besides Allah?'
compare: And when our messengers come to them to gather them, they say, "Where are those you used to call upon besides Allah?"

src: Bist du denn gegen meinen Befehl ungehorsam gewesen?»
ref: Did you not disobey my command?" (And Moses pulled him by the hair).
draft: Are you disobedient against my order then?
hil: Have you been disobedient to my command then?
compare: Have you been disobedient to my command then?

src: Es läßt nichts aus, ob klein oder groß, sondern hält alles aufgezeichnet."
ref: They will find in it whatsoever they had done.
draft: It leaves nothing out, whether small or large, but keeps everything recorded.
hil: It does not omit anything, small or large, but records everything.
compare: It leaves nothing out, whether small or large, but keeps everything recorded.

src: Sie sagten: "Wenn er stiehlt, so stahl bereits sein Bruder vor ihm." Yusuf behielt es jedoch bei sich und offenbarte es ihnen nicht, er sagte (bei sich): "Ihr seid sicherlich niedriger in der Stellung.
ref: They [(Yusuf's (Joseph) brothers] said: "If he steals, there was a brother of his [Yusuf (Joseph)] who did steal before (him)." But these things did Yusuf (Joseph) keep in himself, revealing not the secrets to them.
draft: They said: "If he steals, then his brother has already stolen before him." However, Yusuf kept it to himself and did not reveal it to them, he said (to himself): "You are certainly lower in status."
hil: They said, 'If he steals, then his brother has already stolen before him.' But Joseph kept it to himself and did not reveal the truth to them. He said to himself: 'You are certainly an evil lot.'
compare: They said: "If he steals, then his brother has already stolen before him." However, Yusuf kept it to himself and did not reveal it to them, he said (to himself): "You are certainly lower in status."

src: Hat nicht Derjenige, Der die Himmel und die Erde erschaffen hat, (auch) die Macht, ihresgleichen zu erschaffen? Ja doch! Und Er ist der Allerschaffer und Allwissende.
ref: "Is not He Who created the heavens and the earth able to create the like thereof?" - Yea, indeed! for He is the Creator Supreme, of skill and knowledge (infinite)!
draft: Does not He, who created the heavens and the earth, have the power to create their likes? Yes indeed! And He is the All-Creator and All-Knower.
hil: Do they not see that Allah, who created the heavens and the earth, has the power to create people similar to them? Yes indeed! And He is the All-Creator and All-Knower.
compare: Do they not see that Allah, who created the heavens and the earth, has the power to create people similar to them? Yes indeed! And He is the All-Creator and All-Knower.

src: Sie sagen: «Unser Herr, unser Unglück hat uns besiegt, und wir waren abgeirrte Leute.
ref: They will say: "O Lord, our misery overwhelmed us, so we remained a people astray.
draft: They say: "Our Lord, our misfortune has defeated us, and we were misguided people."
hil: "They say: 'Our Lord, our misfortune has overcome us, and we were misguided people.'"
compare: They say: "Our Lord, our misfortune has defeated us, and we were misguided people."

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Greift ALLAH und Seinem Gesandten nicht vor, und handelt Taqwa gemäß ALLAH gegenüber!
ref: O YOU WHO believe, do not forestall the judgements of God and His Apostle, and have fear of God.
draft: You who have internalized the Imam! Do not precede Allah and His Messenger, and act with Taqwa towards Allah!
hil: Those of you who have internalized the faith! Do not advance ahead of Allah and His noble Messenger, and fear Allah. Be just; that is nearer to piety, and act in accordance with piety towards Allah. Indeed, Allah is all hearing, all knowing of your deeds.
compare: You who have internalized the Imam! Do not precede Allah and His Messenger, and act with Taqwa towards Allah!

src: Darum wende dich von ihnen ab und sprich: "Frieden!" Und bald werden sie es wissen.
ref: Therefore excuse them and proclaim, “Peace”; for they will soon come to know.
draft: Therefore, turn away from them and say: "Peace!" And soon they will know it.
hil: So turn away from them and say, 'Peace!' Soon they will learn it.
compare: So turn away from them and say, 'Peace!' Soon they will learn it.

src: ER sagte: "Fürchtet euch beide nicht! Gewiß, ICH bin mit euch beiden, ICH höre und sehe.
ref: He said, “Do not fear – I am with you, All Hearing and All Seeing.”
draft: He said: "Do not be afraid, both of you! Certainly, I am with both of you, I hear and see."
hil: He said: 'Verily, I am with you both, I hear and see.'
compare: He said: 'Verily, I am with you both, I hear and see.'

src: Sag: "Soll ich euch in Kenntnis setzen über schlimmere Vergeltung als für dies, (was ihr uns verübelt), bei ALLAH?: Es ist (die Vergeltung für) denjenigen, wen ALLAH verflucht, über den ER zürnt und aus denen ER Affen, Schweine und Taghut-Anbeter machte." Diese haben die niedrigere Stellung und sind vom rechten Weg noch mehr verirrt.
ref: Say, “Shall I tell you of those who are in a worse position than this, in Allah’s sight? It is those whom Allah has cursed and has wreaked His wrath upon and turned some of them into apes and swine, and worshippers of the devil; theirs is a worse destination and they have wandered further astray from the Straight Path.”
draft: Say, "Should I inform you about a worse retribution than this, for those whom Allah has cursed and upon whom He has wrath, and of whom He has made apes and swine and worshippers of Taghut?" These are in a worse position and further astray from the sound way.
hil: Say, 'Should I inform you about a worse retribution than this, for those whom Allah has cursed and upon whom He has wrath, and of whom He has made apes and swine and worshippers of Taghut?' These are in a worse position and further astray from the sound way.
compare: Say, "Should I inform you about a worse retribution than this, for those whom Allah has cursed and upon whom He has wrath, and of whom He has made apes and swine and worshippers of Taghut?" These are in a worse position and further astray from the sound way.

src: Nun belohnt sie Gott für das, was sie gesagt haben mit Gärten, unter denen Bäche fließen; darin werden sie ewig weilen.
ref: God will reward them for saying so with gardens where streams flow by, where they will live for ever.
draft: Now God rewards them for what they have said with gardens beneath which rivers flow; therein they will dwell forever.
hil: Now, Allah rewards them for what they have said with gardens beneath which rivers flow; wherein they will abide eternally.
compare: Now, Allah rewards them for what they have said with gardens beneath which rivers flow; wherein they will abide eternally.

src: Und das Jenseits ist wahrlich besser für dich als das Diesseits.
ref: What is to come is better for you than what has gone before;
draft: And the Hereafter is certainly better for you than the world.
hil: The Hereafter is truly better for you than this life.
compare: The Hereafter is truly better for you than this life.

src: Sei nun geduldig. Das Versprechen Gottes ist wahr.
ref: So have thou patience; verily the promise of Allah is true.
draft: Be patient now. God's promise is true.
hil: Be patient now. The promise of God is true.
compare: Be patient now. God's promise is true.

src: Dann wird Er euch eure Sünden vergeben und euch eingehen lassen in Gärten, unter denen Bäche fließen, und in angenehme Wohnungen in den Gärten von Eden.
ref: He will forgive you your sins and admit you to gardens with rivers flowing by, and excellent mansions in the garden of Eden.
draft: Then He will forgive you your sins and let you enter gardens beneath which rivers flow and into pleasant dwellings in the gardens of Eden.
hil: "Then He will forgive you your sins and admit you to gardens beneath which rivers flow, and to pleasant dwellings in the gardens of Eden."
compare: "Then He will forgive you your sins and admit you to gardens beneath which rivers flow, and to pleasant dwellings in the gardens of Eden."

src: Da zogen sie beide weiter, bis, als sie dann einen Jungen trafen, er ihn tötete.
ref: The two went on till they came to a boy, whom he killed.
draft: Then they both moved on until, when they met a boy, he killed him.
hil: Then they both continued until they encountered a boy, and he killed him.
compare: Then they both continued until they encountered a boy, and he killed him.

src: Und sooft eine Sura herabgesandt wird, schauen sie einander an (und sagen): "Sieht euch jemand?" Dann wenden sie sich ab. Allah hat ihre Herzen abgewendet, weil sie Leute sind, die es nicht begreifen.
ref: And whenever a chapter is sent down, one of them looks at the other; “Is there someone watching you?” – and then they turn away; Allah has inverted their hearts because they are a people who do not understand.
draft: And as often as a Surah is sent down, they look at each other (and say), "Does anyone see you?" Then they turn away. Allah has turned their hearts away because they are people who do not understand.
hil: Whenever a Surah is revealed, some of them remark, "Do any of you see?" then they turn away. Allah has turned their hearts away because they are people who do not understand.
compare: Whenever a Surah is revealed, some of them remark, "Do any of you see?" then they turn away. Allah has turned their hearts away because they are people who do not understand.

src: Ob Wir dich einen Teil dessen, was Wir ihnen androhen, sehen lassen oder dich abberufen, zu Uns wird ihre Rückkehr sein. Dann ist Gott Zeuge über das, was sie tun.
ref: Whether We show you some of the promise (of punishment in wait) for them, or take you to Ourself, their returning is to Us in the end; and God is a witness to all they do.
draft: Whether We let you see a part of what We threaten them with or recall you, unto Us shall they be returned. Then God is witness over that which they do.
hil: "Whether We let you see a part of what We threaten them with or recall you, unto Us shall they be returned. Then God is witness over that which they do."
compare: Whether We let you see a part of what We threaten them with or recall you, unto Us shall they be returned. Then God is witness over that which they do.

src: Und er beerbt sie, wenn sie kein Kind hat.
ref: And he inherits from her if she leaves no children.
draft: And he inherits from her if she has no children.
hil: And he inherits from her if she has no children.
compare: And he inherits from her if she has no children.

src: Denken sie nicht über den Quran nach?!
ref: Do they not ponder on what the Qur'an says?
draft: Do not contemplate the Quran?!
hil: Do they not ponder on what the Quran says? Or have their hearts been sealed with locks?
compare: Do they not ponder on what the Quran says? Or have their hearts been sealed with locks?

src: Und wenn sie das Sinnlose hören, wenden sie sich davon ab und sagen: "Uns gehören unsere Handlungen und euch gehören eure Handlungen, Salam sei mit euch!
ref: When they hear idle talk they turn aside and say: "To us our actions, to you yours.
draft: And when they hear the senseless, they turn away from it and say: "Our actions belong to us and your actions belong to you, peace be with you!
hil: And when they hear the senseless, they turn away from it and say: "Our actions belong to us and your actions belong to you, peace be with you!"
compare: And when they hear the senseless, they turn away from it and say: "Our actions belong to us and your actions belong to you, peace be with you!"

src: Dennoch wollen sie dir mit denjenigen, die es außer Ihm geben soll, Furcht einflößen. Und wen Allah in die Irre gehen läßt, der hat niemanden, der ihn rechtleitet.
ref: They frighten you with others apart from Him, although he whom Allah lets go astray, none can guide him to the Right Way.
draft: Still, they want to scare you with those who are besides Him, whom they believe exist. And whoever Allah allows to be led astray will have no one to guide them.
hil: Yet they want to instill fear in you with those who they claim exist besides Him. And whoever Allah leads astray, will find no one to guide them.
compare: Yet they want to instill fear in you with those who they claim exist besides Him. And whoever Allah leads astray, will find no one to guide them.

src: Auch die Sterne sind durch seinen Befehl dienstbar gemacht worden.
ref: The stars are subjected by His Command.
draft: Also the stars have been made obedient by his command.
hil: Also the stars have been made obedient by His command.
compare: Also the stars have been made obedient by his command.

src: ICH werde euch Meine Ayat zeigen, so fordert keine Eile von Mir.
ref: We will show you Our signs, then you will not desire to hasten (the punishment).
draft: I will show you my signs, so do not ask me to hurry.
hil: I will show you my signs, so do not demand haste from me.
compare: I will show you my signs, so do not demand haste from me.

src: Und zu Ihm werdet ihr zurückgebracht.
ref: And to Him will you be brought back in the end.
draft: And unto Him you shall be returned.
hil: And to Him you shall be returned.
compare: And unto Him you shall be returned.

src: Sag: "Es wird mir nur alsWahy zuteil, daß euer Gott nur ein einziger Gott ist.
ref: Say: "This is what has been revealed to me: 'Your God is one and only God.'
draft: Say: "It is only revealed to me by Wahy that your God is only one God."
hil: Say, 'I do not bear witness to it. He is the only One God, and I do not have any relation with whatever you ascribe as partners (to Him).'
compare: Say: "It is only revealed to me by Wahy that your God is only one God."

src: ER sagte: "Adam! Teile ihnen deren Namen mit!" Und nachdem er ihnen deren Namen mitgeteilt hatte, sagte ER: "Sagte ICH euch etwa nicht, daß ICH das Verborgene der Himmel und der Erde kenne, und daß ICH das kenne, was ihr offenlegt und was ihr zu verheimlichen pflegtet?!"
ref: He said, ‘O Adam, inform them of their names,’ and when he had informed them of their names, He said, ‘Did I not tell you that I know the Unseen of the heavens and the earth, and that I know whatever you disclose and whatever you conceal?’
draft: He said: "Adam! Tell them their names!" And after he had told them their names, he said: "Did I not tell you that I know the unseen [aspects] of the heavens and the earth? And I know what you reveal and what you have concealed!"
hil: He said: "Adam! Tell them their names!" And after he had told them their names, he said: "Did I not tell you that I know the hidden aspects of the heavens and the earth? And I know what you disclose and what you have concealed!"
compare: He said: "Adam! Tell them their names!" And after he had told them their names, he said: "Did I not tell you that I know the unseen [aspects] of the heavens and the earth? And I know what you reveal and what you have concealed!"

src: Und wenn ihr eure Riten beendet habt, dann gedenket Gottes, wie ihr eurer Väter (früher) gedacht habt oder mit noch innigerem Gedenken. Unter den Menschen gibt es welche, die sagen: «Unser Herr, beschenke uns im Diesseits.»
ref: So when you have completed your Hajj rites, remember Allah as you used to remember your forefathers, in fact more than that; and among the people are some that say, “Our Lord!
draft: And when you have finished your rituals, then remember God as you have remembered your fathers (before) or with even more intimate remembrance. Among the people, there are those who say: "Our Lord, bestow upon us in this world."
hil: And when you have completed your rituals, remember God as you remembered your fathers (before) or with an even more intimate remembrance. Among mankind are those who say: 'Our Lord, grant us good in this world!'
compare: And when you have finished your rituals, then remember God as you have remembered your fathers (before) or with even more intimate remembrance. Among the people, there are those who say: "Our Lord, bestow upon us in this world."

src: So vergelten Wir den Übeltätern.
ref: That is how We requite the transgressors:
draft: So we repay the perpetrators.
hil: Thus do We punish the evildoers.
compare: Thus do We punish the evildoers.

src: Darum fürchtet Allah, ihr Verständigen, auf daß ihr erfolgreich sein möget.
ref: So fear God, O men of wisdom; you may haply find success.
draft: Therefore, fear Allah, O you who have understanding, that you may be successful.
hil: Therefore fear Allah, O you of understanding, that you may be successful.
compare: Therefore, fear Allah, O you who have understanding, that you may be successful.

src: Friede sei auf euch!
ref: Peace be to you.
draft: Peace be upon you!
hil: Peace be upon you!
compare: Peace be upon you!

src: Sag: Allah hat die Wahrheit gesprochen. So folgt dem Glaubensbekenntnis Ibrahims, (als) Anhänger des rechten Glaubens, und er gehörte nicht zu den Götzendienern.
ref: Say (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), “Allah is truthful; so follow the religion of Ibrahim, who was free from all falsehood; and he was not of the polytheists.”
draft: Say: Allah has spoken the truth. So follow the creed of Abraham, (as) a follower of the true faith, and he was not one of the idolaters.
hil: Say: Allah has spoken the truth. So follow the creed of Abraham, (as) a follower of the true faith, and he was not one of the idolaters.
compare: Say: Allah has spoken the truth. So follow the creed of Abraham, (as) a follower of the true faith, and he was not one of the idolaters.

src: Sag: "Ihr Menschen! Bereits kam die Wahrheit zu euch von eurem HERRN. Wer also der Rechtleitung folgt, der folgt der Rechtleitung nur für seinen eigenen Nutzen. Wer jedoch irregeht, der geht nur irre zu seinem eigenen Schaden. Und ich bin kein Wakil über euch."
ref: Say: "O men, the truth has come to you from your Lord, so he who follows the right path does so for himself, and he who goes astray errs against himself, and I am not a guardian over you.
draft: Say, "O mankind, the truth has come to you from your Lord. So whoever is guided is only guided for [the benefit of] his soul, and whoever goes astray only goes astray [in violation] against it. And I am not over you a manager [i.e., dictator]."
hil: Tell them: "O mankind, now truth has come to you from your Lord. Truth follows (i.e. the Quran and Prophet Muhammad SAW) is only for your benefit. Whoever goes astray only goes astray in violation against it, and to his own disadvantage. And I am not a dictator over you."
compare: Say, "O mankind, the truth has come to you from your Lord. So whoever is guided is only guided for [the benefit of] his soul, and whoever goes astray only goes astray [in violation] against it. And I am not over you a manager [i.e., dictator]."

src: Hierauf rufe sie. Sie werden eilends zu dir kommen.
ref: Then [after slaughtering them] put on each hill a portion of them; then call them - they will come [flying] to you in haste.
draft: Then she cries out. They will come to you in haste.
hil: "Then she calls, and they will swiftly come to you."
compare: "Then she calls, and they will swiftly come to you."

src: Haben denn die Gläubigen nicht den Versuch (, daran zu zweifeln,) aufgegeben, daß, wenn Allah gewollt hätte, Er sicher der ganzen Menschheit hätte den Weg weisen können?
ref: Have the believers not learnt that if God had so willed He could have guided all mankind?
draft: Have not the believers given up the attempt (to doubt) that if Allah had willed, He could have surely guided all of humanity?
hil: Have not the believers given up the attempt (to doubt) that if Allah had willed, He could have surely guided all of humanity?
compare: Have not the believers given up the attempt (to doubt) that if Allah had willed, He could have surely guided all of humanity?

src: Und (damit) Er die Heuchler und Heuchlerinnen und die Götzendiener und Götzendienerinnen strafe, die von Allah die böse Erwartung hegen.
ref: And that He may chastise the hypocritical men and the hypocritical women and the associaters and the associatresses, the thinkers of evil thought concerning Allah.
draft: And (thus) He punishes the hypocrites, both men and women, and the idolaters, both men and women, who entertain evil thoughts about Allah.
hil: And so that He may punish the hypocrites, both men and women, and the idolaters, both men and women, who entertain evil thoughts about Allah.
compare: And (thus) He punishes the hypocrites, both men and women, and the idolaters, both men and women, who entertain evil thoughts about Allah.

src: Dann rief er in den Finsternissen: "Es gibt keinen Gott außer Dir!
ref: Glory be to Thee!
draft: Then he called out in the darkness: "There is no God but You!"
hil: Then he called out in the darkness: 'There is no God but You!'
compare: Then he called out in the darkness: "There is no God but You!"

src: Ihr haltet sie (beide Zeugen) nach dem rituellen Gebet auf, dann schwören sie bei ALLAH - falls ihr Zweifel hegen solltet -: "Wir erkaufen uns damit nichts Geringfügiges, selbst dann nicht, wenn derjenige, (für den wir Zeugnis ablegen), ein Verwandter ist, und wir verbergen nicht das von ALLAH gebotene Zeugnis, sonst gehören wir doch zu den Verfehlenden."
ref: Detain them after the service of prayer, and if you doubt their word make them swear by God that: "We shall not take a bribe even though it be offered by a near relative, nor hide the testimony of God, for then we shall surely be sinful."
draft: You detain them (both witnesses) after the ritual prayer, then they swear by ALLAH - in case you might doubt -: "We are not buying something insignificant with that, not even if that person (for whom we bear witness) is a relative, and we are not concealing the testimony that ALLAH has commanded, otherwise we would be among the sinners."
hil: You detain them (both witnesses) after the ritual prayer, then they swear by Allah - in case you might doubt -: "We are not buying something insignificant with that, not even if that person (for whom we bear witness) is a relative, and we are not concealing the testimony that Allah has commanded, otherwise we would be among the sinners."
compare: You detain them (both witnesses) after the ritual prayer, then they swear by ALLAH - in case you might doubt -: "We are not buying something insignificant with that, not even if that person (for whom we bear witness) is a relative, and we are not concealing the testimony that ALLAH has commanded, otherwise we would be among the sinners."

src: Dann sagten sie: "Etwa einem einzigen Menschen von uns folgen wir?
ref: And said: "Should we follow only one man among us?
draft: Then they said, "Are we following only one person among us?"
hil: Then they said, 'Are we following only one person among us?'
compare: Then they said, "Are we following only one person among us?"

src: Und gedenke deines HERRN viel und lobpreise Ihn zu Sonnenuntergang und zu Sonnenaufgang!"
ref: And mention thy Lord oft, and give glory at evening and dawn.'
draft: "Remember your Lord much and praise Him at sunset and at sunrise!"
hil: Remember your Lord much and praise Him at sunset and sunrise!
compare: "Remember your Lord much and praise Him at sunset and at sunrise!"

src: Wenn ihn Gutes trifft, so ist er damit zufrieden; trifft ihn aber eine Prüfung, dann kehrt er zu seinem (früheren) Weg zurück.
ref: When something good comes his way, he is content with it. But when an ordeal strikes him, he makes a turnaround.
draft: If something good happens to him, he is satisfied with it; but if he is tested, he returns to his (former) path.
hil: If something good happens to him, he is satisfied with it; but if he is tested, he returns to his (former) path.
compare: If something good happens to him, he is satisfied with it; but if he is tested, he returns to his (former) path.

src: Dann ängstigte sich insgeheim, Musa.
ref: And Moses felt afraid within himself.
draft: Then Musa secretly became anxious.
hil: Then Moses secretly became anxious.
compare: Then Moses secretly became anxious.

src: Hast Du nicht gesehen, daß Allah Wasser vom Himmel niedersendet und es als Quellen in die Erde dringen läßt und dadurch Gewächs hervorbringt, das mannigfaltig an Farben ist?
ref: Beholdest thou not that Allah sendeth down water from the heaven, and causeth it to enter springs in the earth, and thereafter produceth thereby corn various coloured.
draft: Did you not see that Allah sends water down from the sky and allows it to penetrate into the earth as springs, thereby producing growth that is manifold in color?
hil: Did you not see that Allah sent down water from the sky and allows it to penetrate into the earth as springs, thereby producing growth that is manifold in color?
compare: Did you not see that Allah sent down water from the sky and allows it to penetrate into the earth as springs, thereby producing growth that is manifold in color?

src: Laß uns herausbringen, damit wir gottgefällig Gutes tun, anderes als das, das wir zu tun pflegten." Haben WIR euch etwa nicht ein langes Lebensalter gewährt, während dessen derjenige sich erinnern konnte, der sich erinnern wollte?!
ref: Extricate us, so that we may do good deeds, the opposite of what we used to do”; (It will be said to them) “And did We not give you an age long enough, in which anyone who wants to understand would have understood?
draft: Let's find out so that we can do good that is pleasing to God, other than what we used to do." Have we not granted you a long life during which the one who wanted to remember could remember?!
hil: Let us find out so that we can do good deeds that are pleasing to God, other than those we used to do. Have we not granted you a long life during which the one who wanted to remember could remember?
compare: Let us find out so that we can do good deeds that are pleasing to God, other than those we used to do. Have we not granted you a long life during which the one who wanted to remember could remember?

src: O die ihr glaubt, wer von euch sich von seiner Religion abkehrt -, so wird Allah Leute bringen, die Er liebt und die Ihn lieben, bescheiden gegenüber den Gläubigen, mächtig (auftretend) gegenüber den Ungläubigen, und die sich auf Allahs Weg abmühen und nicht den Tadel des Tadlers fürchten. Das ist Allahs Huld, die Er gewährt, wem Er will. Allah ist Allumfassend und Allwissend.
ref: O you who believe! whoever from among you turns back from his religion, then Allah will bring a people, He shall love them and they shall love Him, lowly before the believers, mighty against the unbelievers, they shall strive hard in Allah's way and shall not fear the censure of any censurer; this is Allah's Face, He gives it to whom He pleases, and Allah is Ample-giving, Knowing.
draft: O you who believe, whoever of you should turn away from his religion - Allah will bring a people whom He loves and who love Him, humble toward the believers, powerful against the disbelievers; they strive in the cause of Allah and do not fear the blame of a critic. That is the favor of Allah; He bestows it upon whom He wills. And Allah is all-Encompassing and Knowing.
hil: O you who believe, whoever of you turns away from his religion - Allah will bring people whom He loves and who love Him, humble towards the believers, powerful against the disbelievers, and those who strive in the cause of Allah and do not fear the blame of a critic. That is Allah's grace; He bestows it upon whom He wills. Allah is all-encompassing and all-knowing.
compare: O you who believe, whoever of you should turn away from his religion - Allah will bring a people whom He loves and who love Him, humble toward the believers, powerful against the disbelievers; they strive in the cause of Allah and do not fear the blame of a critic. That is the favor of Allah; He bestows it upon whom He wills. And Allah is all-Encompassing and Knowing.

src: Und wenn Wellen wie überschattende Hüllen sie überdecken, rufen sie zu Gott, wobei sie Ihm gegenüber aufrichtig in der Religion sind. Wenn Er sie ans Land errettet, zeigen nur einige von ihnen einen maßvollen Wandel.
ref: And when the waves cover them like shadows they call upon God, making their religion sincerely His; but when He has delivered them to the land, some of them are lukewarm.
draft: And when waves cover them like engulfing shadows, they call to God, while they are sincere to Him in religion. When He saves them to land, only some of them show a moderate behavior.
hil: And when waves cover them like engulfing shadows, they call to God being sincere to Him in the religion of submitting to His will. When He saves them to land, only a few among them would keep their conduct within limits.
compare: And when waves cover them like engulfing shadows, they call to God being sincere to Him in the religion of submitting to His will. When He saves them to land, only a few among them would keep their conduct within limits.

src: Wäre dies ein demnächst verfügbarer Profit mit einer Reise von mittlerer Entfernung gewesen, wären sie dir gewiß gefolgt.
ref: Were it a gain at hand or a short journey, they would have surely followed you, but the distance seemed too far to them.
draft: If this had been a soon available profit with a trip of medium distance, they would certainly have followed you.
hil: If this had been a profit soon to be available with a journey of moderate distance, they would certainly have followed you.
compare: If this had been a profit soon to be available with a journey of moderate distance, they would certainly have followed you.

src: Von Zaqqum-Bäumen essen
ref: Will eat of the tree of Zaqqum,
draft: "Eating from Zaqqum trees"
hil: Eating from Zaqqum trees
compare: "Eating from Zaqqum trees"

src: Allah aber ist der Schutzherr der Gottesfürchtigen.
ref: And Allah is the Friend of the God-fearing.
draft: Allah however is the protector of the God-fearing.
hil: But Allah is the protector of the righteous.
compare: But Allah is the protector of the righteous.

src: Folge dem, was dir an Wahy von deinem HERRN zuteil wurde.
ref: Follow what was revealed to you from your Lord.
draft: Follow what has been revealed to you from your LORD.
hil: Follow what has been revealed to you from your LORD.
compare: Follow what has been revealed to you from your LORD.

src: (Ist es) etwa einer, der im Glanz aufgezogen wird und nicht beredt im Wortstreit ist?
ref: Can one who has been raised on ornaments and cannot present her case coolly in a dispute (be associated with God?)
draft: Is it one who is raised in brilliance and is not eloquent in verbal dispute?
hil: Is it one who is raised in brilliance and is not eloquent in verbal dispute?
compare: Is it one who is raised in brilliance and is not eloquent in verbal dispute?

src: Keiner außer Allah kann sie abwenden.
ref: There is no one to unveil it apart from God.
draft: No one except Allah can turn them away.
hil: No one can turn them away except Allah.
compare: No one except Allah can turn them away.

src: Wenn sie sich abkehren, so befinden sie sich in Widerstreit.
ref: But if they turn away, then they are in schism.
draft: If they turn away, they are in conflict.
hil: But if they turn away, then they are in schism, and Allah will suffice thee against them.
compare: But if they turn away, then they are in schism, and Allah will suffice thee against them.

src: Er ist es, Der euch erschaffen hat.
ref: It is He who created you.
draft: He is the one who has created you.
hil: He is the one who has created you.
compare: He is the one who has created you.

src: Und wisset, daß Allah dessen gewahr ist, was in euren Seelen ist.
ref: Know that God knows what is in your hearts.
draft: And know that Allah is aware of what is in your souls.
hil: And know that Allah is aware of what is in your souls.
compare: And know that Allah is aware of what is in your souls.

src: Das Feuer darin ist mit Brennstoff,
ref: Full of fire fed by faggots,
draft: The fire inside is fueled,
hil: The fire in it is fueled,
compare: The fire in it is fueled,

src: Doch wenn sie sich abkehren, so liebt Allah die Ungläubigen nicht.
ref: But if they turn their backs, God loves not the unbelievers.
draft: But if they turn away, Allah does not love the unbelievers.
hil: If they turn away, then Allah does not love the unbelievers.
compare: If they turn away, then Allah does not love the unbelievers.

src: Sag (in Meinem Namen): "Meine Diener, die den Iman verinnerlicht haben, handelt Taqwa gemäß ALLAH gegenüber!"
ref: Tell them: "O my creatures who have come to belief, have fear of displeasing your Lord.
draft: Say (in My name): "My servants who have internalized faith, act with Taqwa towards Allah!"
hil: Say (in My name): "O believers, those who have internalized faith, act with Taqwa towards Allah!"
compare: Say (in My name): "O believers, those who have internalized faith, act with Taqwa towards Allah!"

src: Doch die, denen Kenntnis und Glauben verliehen wurden, sagen: "lhr habt wahrlich gemäß dem Buche Allahs bis zum Tage der Auferstehung (im Grabe) geweilt.
ref: But those endowed with knowledge and faith will say, “You remained in God’s Book until the Day of Resurrection.
draft: But those to whom knowledge and faith have been given say: "Indeed, you have stayed until the Day of Resurrection in accordance with the Book of Allah.
hil: "But those to whom knowledge and faith have been given say, 'Verily, you have indeed remained in accordance with the Book of Allah until the Day of Resurrection (in the grave).'"
compare: "But those to whom knowledge and faith have been given say, 'Verily, you have indeed remained in accordance with the Book of Allah until the Day of Resurrection (in the grave).'"

src: Was dich an Gutem traf, dies ist von ALLAH. Und was dich an Unglück traf, dies ist aufgrund eigener (Verfehlungen). Und wir entsandten dich für die Menschen als Gesandten. Und ALLAH genügt als Bezeugender.
ref: Whatever good reaches you, O listeners, is from Allah, and whatever ill reaches you is from yourselves; and We have sent you (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) as a Noble Messenger towards all mankind; and Allah is Sufficient, as a Witness.
draft: "What struck you as good is from Allah and what struck you as bad is from your own doing. And we have sent you to the people as a messenger. And Allah is sufficient as witness."
hil: Whatever good befalls you is from Allah and whatever ill befalls you is from your own doing. And We have sent you as a messenger unto mankind. And Allah suffices as witness.
compare: "What struck you as good is from Allah and what struck you as bad is from your own doing. And we have sent you to the people as a messenger. And Allah is sufficient as witness."

src: Greift ALLAH und Seinem Gesandten nicht vor, und handelt Taqwa gemäß ALLAH gegenüber!
ref: Do not put (yourselves) forward before Allah and His Messenger (SAW), and fear Allah.
draft: Do not precede Allah and His messenger, and act according to Taqwa towards Allah!
hil: Do not advance ahead of Allah and His Noble Messenger, fear Allah. Indeed Allah is All-Hearing, All-Knowing.
compare: Do not precede Allah and His messenger, and act according to Taqwa towards Allah!

src: Doch Allah gehört die Macht, und auch Seinem Gesandten und den Gläubigen.
ref: In truth, all honour belongs to Allah, and to His Messenger, and to the believers.
draft: But power belongs to Allah, and also to His messenger and the believers.
hil: But power belongs to Allah, and also to His messenger and the believers.
compare: But power belongs to Allah, and also to His messenger and the believers.

src: Laßt sie auf Allahs Erde weiden und fügt ihr nichts Böses zu, sonst überkommt euch eine baldige Strafe."
ref: So leave her alone to graze on God's earth, and do not molest her, otherwise the swiftest punishment would befall you."
draft: "Let them graze on Allah's earth and do not harm them, or you will be punished soon."
hil: "Let them graze on Allah's land and do not do any harm to them, otherwise a swift punishment will overtake you."
compare: "Let them graze on Allah's land and do not do any harm to them, otherwise a swift punishment will overtake you."

src: Sind es aber zwei (Schwestern), dann erhalten sie zwei Drittel von seiner Erbschaft.
ref: In ease he has two sisters then they will get two-thirds of the heritage.
draft: But if they are two (sisters), then they receive two thirds of his inheritance.
hil: But if they are two (sisters), then they shall receive two-thirds of his inheritance.
compare: But if they are two (sisters), then they shall receive two-thirds of his inheritance.

src: Vergib uns unsere Verfehlungen und unsere Übertretungen in unseren Angelegenheiten, mache uns standhaft und stehe uns bei gegen die kufr-betreibenden Leute!"
ref: Forgive us our sins and the excesses committed during our efforts, and keep our feet steady, and bestow us help over the disbelievers.”
draft: Please forgive us our misconduct and our violations in our affairs, make us steadfast and stand with us against the disbelieving people!
hil: Forgive us our shortcomings and our transgressions in our affairs, make us steadfast and stand by us against the disbelievers!
compare: Forgive us our shortcomings and our transgressions in our affairs, make us steadfast and stand by us against the disbelievers!

src: Sag: Wenn Allah wollte, würde ich ihn euch nicht verlesen, und Er würde euch nicht davon Kenntnis geben. Ich habe doch vordem ein Leben lang unter euch verweilt.
ref: Say, ‘Had Allah [so] wished, I would not have recited it to you, nor would He have made it known to you, for I have dwelled among you for a lifetime before it.
draft: Say: If Allah had willed, I would not have recited it to you, nor would He have made it known to you, for I had lived among you a lifetime before.
hil: Say: If Allah had willed, I would not have recited it to you, nor would He have made it known to you, for I had lived among you a lifetime before.
compare: Say: If Allah had willed, I would not have recited it to you, nor would He have made it known to you, for I had lived among you a lifetime before.

src: Und gehe auf der Erde nicht freudenerregt! Gewiß, ALLAH liebt keinen stolzen Eingebildeten.
ref: Do not walk around puffed-up with pride; God does not love arrogant and boastful people.
draft: And do not walk on the earth exultantly. Indeed, Allah does not like everyone self-deluded and boastful.
hil: And do not walk on the earth exultantly. Surely, Allah does not love the proud and conceited.
compare: And do not walk on the earth exultantly. Indeed, Allah does not like everyone self-deluded and boastful.

src: Daß ihr (sogar) die Gräber besucht.
ref: Till you reach the grave.
draft: That you (even) visit the graves.
hil: That you (even) visit the graves.
compare: That you (even) visit the graves.

src: ALLAH leitet nicht diejenigen Menschen recht, die Unrecht begehen.
ref: And Allah guides not those people who are the Zalimun (polytheists and wrong-doers).
draft: ALLAH does not guide those people who commit injustice.
hil: Allah does not guide those people who commit injustice.
compare: ALLAH does not guide those people who commit injustice.

src: Er sagte: "Bringt ihr mir die frohe Kunde ungeachtet dessen, daß ich vom Alter getroffen bin?
ref: "You bring me the good news now," he said, "when old age has come upon me.
draft: He said: "Will you bring me the good news despite the fact that I've been hit by age?"
hil: He said, "Will you bring me the good news despite the fact that I've been hit by age?"
compare: He said: "Will you bring me the good news despite the fact that I've been hit by age?"

src: Und warne die Menschen vor dem Tag, an dem die Strafe über sie kommen wird.
ref: Warn the people of that Day when the punishment would be inflicted upon them.
draft: And warn people of the day when the punishment will come upon them.
hil: And warn mankind of the day when the punishment will come upon them.
compare: And warn mankind of the day when the punishment will come upon them.

src: Tauscht er dann aber nach der bösen Tat etwas Gutes ein, dann bin Ich voller Vergebung und barmherzig.
ref: But if he substitutes good in place of evil, I am Most Forgiving, Most Compassionate.
draft: If he then exchanges something good after the evil deed, then I am full of forgiveness and mercy.
hil: Upon fulfilling a good deed after committing an evil act, I am full of forgiveness and mercy.
compare: Upon fulfilling a good deed after committing an evil act, I am full of forgiveness and mercy.

src: ER sagte: "Gewiß, ICH weiß, was ihr nicht wißt."
ref: And God said: "I know what you do not know."
draft: He said, "Certainly, I know what you do not know."
hil: He said, 'Certainly, I know what you do not know.'
compare: He said, "Certainly, I know what you do not know."

src: Aber Allah läßt im richtigen Maß herabkommen, was Er will.
ref: So He gives according to measure as He will.
draft: But Allah sends down in the right measure what He wills.
hil: But Allah sends down what He wills in the right measure.
compare: But Allah sends down in the right measure what He wills.

src: O Yusuf, wende dich ab von dieser Sache, und du (, o Frau), bitte um Vergebung für deine Sünde.
ref: “O Yusuf! Disregard this – and O woman!
draft: O Yusuf, turn away from this matter, and you (, O woman), ask for forgiveness for your sin.
hil: "O Yusuf, turn away from this matter, and you (, O woman), ask for forgiveness for your sin."
compare: O Yusuf, turn away from this matter, and you (, O woman), ask for forgiveness for your sin.

src: ALLAH ist Derjenige, Der die Schrift wahrheitsgemäß hinabsandte sowie Almizan. Und was läßt dich wissen?! Vielleicht liegt die Stunde doch nahe.
ref: It is Allah Who has sent down the Book with the truth, and the Scales of Justice; and what do you know – possibly the Last Day could really be near!
draft: ALLAH is the One who sent down the scripture truthfully as well as Almizan. And what makes you know?! Perhaps the Hour is near.
hil: "God is the one who sent down the scripture truthfully as well as Almizan. And what makes you know?! Perhaps the Hour is near."
compare: "God is the one who sent down the scripture truthfully as well as Almizan. And what makes you know?! Perhaps the Hour is near."

src: Das ist - sie sollen es kosten - heißes Wasser und stinkender Eiter
ref: There will be boiling water for them and cold, clammy, fetid drink to taste,
draft: This is - they should try it - hot water and stinking pus.
hil: This is - they should try it - hot water and stinky pus.
compare: This is - they should try it - hot water and stinky pus.

src: Dies, weil ihre Gesandten immer wieder zu ihnen mit den klaren Beweisen kamen, sie aber sagten: "Sollen (etwa) menschliche Wesen uns rechtleiten?" So wurden sie ungläubig und kehrten sich ab.
ref: That is because, when their Messengers came to them with clear proofs they said: 'Shall humans be our guides' They disbelieved and turned away, but Allah was not in need (of them).
draft: This is because their messengers came to them repeatedly with clear proofs, but they said, "Should human beings guide us?" So they became disbelievers and turned away.
hil: This is because their messengers came to them repeatedly with clear proofs, but they said, 'Should human beings guide us?' So they became disbelievers and turned away.
compare: This is because their messengers came to them repeatedly with clear proofs, but they said, "Should human beings guide us?" So they became disbelievers and turned away.

src: Vielleicht werdet ihr (Allah) fürchten.
ref: It is expected that this will produce piety in you.
draft: Maybe you (Allah) will be feared.
hil: Perhaps you will fear (Allah).
compare: Perhaps you will fear (Allah).

src: Gewiß, wer ALLAH gegenüber Schirk betreibt, dem hat ALLAH bereits die Dschanna für haram erklärt und sein Aufenthaltsort ist das Feuer." Und für die Unrecht-Begehenden gibt es keine Helfer.
ref: Whosoever associates a compeer with God, will have Paradise denied to him by God, and his abode shall be Hell; and the sinners will have none to help them.
draft: Certainly, whoever commits Shirk against Allah, Allah has already declared Paradise as haram for him and his abode is the Fire. And for the wrongdoers, there are no helpers.
hil: Those who associate others with Allah, Allah has already declared Paradise as haram for them, and their abode is the Fire. And there are no helpers for the wrongdoers.
compare: Certainly, whoever commits Shirk against Allah, Allah has already declared Paradise as haram for him and his abode is the Fire. And for the wrongdoers, there are no helpers.

src: Diejenigen, die Enthaltsamkeit von ihren Frauen beschwören, sollen vier Monate warten.
ref: Those who vow abstinence from their wives must wait for four months.
draft: Those who invoke abstinence from their wives should wait for four months.
hil: Those who call for abstinence from their wives should wait for four months.
compare: Those who invoke abstinence from their wives should wait for four months.

src: Doch vergebt und seid nachsichtig, bis Allah Seine Entscheidung ergehen läßt. Wahrlich, Allah hat zu allem die Macht.
ref: But you forbear and overlook till God fulfil His plan; and God has power over all things.
draft: But forgive and be patient until Allah issues His judgment. Verily, Allah has power over all things.
hil: But forgive and overlook until Allah brings His Command. Verily, Allah has power over all things.
compare: But forgive and overlook until Allah brings His Command. Verily, Allah has power over all things.

src: An jenem Tag habt ihr keinen Zufluchtsort und keine Möglichkeit, (irgend etwas) abzustreiten.
ref: You will have no place of refuge then nor time for denying.
draft: On that day, you will have no refuge and no possibility to deny anything.
hil: "On that day, you will have no refuge and no possibility to deny anything."
compare: On that day, you will have no refuge and no possibility to deny anything.

src: Diejenigen, die sie anrufen, trachten nach einem Mittel zu ihrem Herrn (und wetteifern), wer von ihnen (Ihm) am nächsten sei, und hoffen auf Seine Barmherzigkeit und fürchten Seine Strafe.
ref: Those they invoke themselves seek the way to their Lord, (striving) which one of them shall be nearest (to Him); and hope for His grace, and dread His punishment.
draft: Those who call upon them are seeking a means to their Lord (and competing) as to who of them is closest to Him, and they hope for His mercy and fear His punishment.
hil: Those who call upon Him strive for a means of access to their Lord, [striving] which of them would be closest to Him. And they hope for His mercy and fear His punishment. Indeed, the punishment of your Lord is to be feared.
compare: Those who call upon Him strive for a means of access to their Lord, [striving] which of them would be closest to Him. And they hope for His mercy and fear His punishment. Indeed, the punishment of your Lord is to be feared.

src: Dein Herr ist wahrlich voll Huld gegen die Menschen. Aber die meisten von ihnen sind nicht dankbar.
ref: Verily your Lord is gracious to men, though most men are ungrateful.
draft: Your Lord is truly full of grace towards people. But most of them are not grateful.
hil: Your Lord is truly full of grace towards people. But most of them are not grateful.
compare: Your Lord is truly full of grace towards people. But most of them are not grateful.

src: Und diese sind die Weggenossen des Feuers. Darin bleiben sie ewig.
ref: They are the inmates of Hell, where they will abide for ever.
draft: And these are the companions of fire. They remain therein forever.
hil: And those are the companions of the Fire. They will abide therein forever.
compare: And these are the companions of fire. They remain therein forever.

src: Gewiß, mit denjenigen, die ihre Religion spalteten und zu Lagern geworden sind, hast du nichts gemein.
ref: As for those who have created schisms in their order, and formed different sects, you have no concern with them.
draft: Surely, you have nothing in common with those who divided their religion and became factions.
hil: Leave alone those who have divided their religion into factions and become parties; you have nothing to do with them.
compare: Leave alone those who have divided their religion into factions and become parties; you have nothing to do with them.

src: Für diejenigen, die Kufr betrieben haben, wurde dann Kleidung aus Feuer gefertigt.
ref: But they who disbelieve will be fitted out with garments of flames.
draft: For those who have committed kufr, clothing made of fire was then made.
hil: For those who have committed disbelief, clothing made of fire was then made.
compare: For those who have committed disbelief, clothing made of fire was then made.

src: Also werden jene, die gläubig sind und gute Werke tun, in den Gärten der Wonne sein.
ref: Then those who had come to believe and done the right will be in gardens of delight.
draft: Therefore, those who believe and do good deeds will be in the gardens of delight.
hil: God will surely admit those who believe and do the right to gardens with rivers running by, where they will be decked in bracelets of gold and of pearls; and of silk will be their garments.
compare: Therefore, those who believe and do good deeds will be in the gardens of delight.

src: Bereits kam zu euch Unser Gesandter, um euch vieles von dem zu enthüllen, was ihr von der Schrift verborgen habt, und vieles unenthüllt zu lassen. Bereits kam doch zu euch von ALLAH Licht und deutliche Schrift!
ref: Indeed this Noble Messenger (Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) of Ours has come to you, revealing to you a lot of the things which you had hidden in the Book, and forgiving a lot of them; indeed towards you has come a light* from Allah, and a clear Book. (* The Holy Prophet is a light from Allah).
draft: Already Our Messenger came to you to reveal much of what you have concealed from the Scripture, and to overlook much. Already to you has come a light from Allah and a clear Book.
hil: O people of the Book, Our Apostle has come to you, announcing many things of the Scriptures that you have suppressed, passing over some others. Already for you have come clear light and a book from Allah!
compare: O people of the Book, Our Apostle has come to you, announcing many things of the Scriptures that you have suppressed, passing over some others. Already for you have come clear light and a book from Allah!

src: Und dem Zeugen und dem, was bezeugt ist!
ref: And the witness and the witnessed,
draft: And the witness and what is witnessed!
hil: And to the witness and what is witnessed!
compare: And to the witness and what is witnessed!

src: Und wenn Allah es gewollt hätte, hätte Er euch in Bedrängnis gebracht. Wahrlich, Allah ist Allmächtig, Allweise.
ref: And had Allah so willed, He could have harassed you; verily Allah is Mighty, Wise.
draft: And if Allah had willed, He could have put you in distress. Indeed, Allah is Almighty, Wise.
hil: And had he willed, He would have brought you into distress. Indeed, He is Almighty, All-wise.
compare: And if Allah had willed, He could have put you in distress. Indeed, Allah is Almighty, Wise.

src: Eine Rechtleitung und Barmherzigkeit für die Rechtschaffenen,
ref: And a guidance and grace for those who do good,
draft: One guidance and mercy for the righteous.
hil: Guidance and mercy for the righteous.
compare: Guidance and mercy for the righteous.

src: Und sprich zu den gläubigen Frauen, daß sie ihre Blicke zu Boden schlagen und ihre Keuschheit wahren und ihren Schmuck nicht zur Schau tragen sollen - bis auf das, was davon sichtbar sein darf, und daß sie ihren Schal um ihre Kleidungsausschnitte schlagen und ihren Schmuck vor niemand (anderem) enthüllen sollen als vor ihren Gatten oder Vätern oder den Vätern ihrer Gatten oder ihren Söhnen oder den Söhnen ihrer Gatten oder ihren Brüdern oder den Söhnen ihrer Brüder oder Söhnen ihrer Schwestern oder ihren Frauen oder denen, die sie von Rechts wegen besitzen, oder solchen von ihren männlichen Dienern, die keinen Geschlechtstrieb mehr haben, und den Kindern, die der Blöße der Frauen keine Beachtung schenken. Und sie sollen ihre Füße nicht so (auf den Boden) stampfen, daß bekannt wird, was sie von ihrem Schmuck verbergen.
ref: And command the Muslim women to keep their gaze low and to protect their chastity, and not to reveal their adornment except what is apparent, and to keep the cover wrapped over their bosoms; and not to reveal their adornment except to their own husbands or fathers or husbands’ fathers, or their sons or their husbands’ sons, or their brothers or their brothers’ sons or sisters’ sons, or women of their religion, or the bondwomen they possess, or male servants provided they do not have manliness, or such children who do not know of women’s nakedness, and not to stamp their feet on the ground in order that their hidden adornment be known; and O Muslims, all of you turn in repentance together towards Allah, in the hope of attaining success.
draft: And say to the believing women that they should lower their gaze and guard their modesty, and not display their adornment except what appears thereof, and that they should draw their veils over their bosoms, and not display their adornment except to their husbands, or their fathers, or their husbands' fathers, or their sons, or their husbands' sons, or their brothers, or their brothers' sons, or their sisters' sons, or their women, or those who their right hands possess, or to those male servants who don't have sexual desires or children who are not yet aware of women's private aspects. And let them not stamp their feet to make known what they conceal of their adornment.
hil: And tell the believing women to lower their gaze and guard their modesty, and not display their adornment except what appears thereof, and that they should draw their veils over their bosoms, and not display their adornment except to their husbands, their fathers, their husbands' fathers, their sons, their husbands' sons, their brothers, their brothers' sons, their sisters' sons, their women, that which their right hands possess, or those male servants who don't have sexual desires or children who are not yet aware of women's private aspects. And let them not stamp their feet to make known what they conceal of their adornment.
compare: And say to the believing women that they should lower their gaze and guard their modesty, and not display their adornment except what appears thereof, and that they should draw their veils over their bosoms, and not display their adornment except to their husbands, or their fathers, or their husbands' fathers, or their sons, or their husbands' sons, or their brothers, or their brothers' sons, or their sisters' sons, or their women, or those who their right hands possess, or to those male servants who don't have sexual desires or children who are not yet aware of women's private aspects. And let them not stamp their feet to make known what they conceal of their adornment.

src: Sie empfinden insgeheim Reue, wenn sie die Pein sehen. Und zwischen ihnen wird in Gerechtigkeit entschieden, und ihnen wird nicht Unrecht getan.
ref: And they shall conceal remorse when they behold the torment, and the matter will be decreed between them in equity, and they shall not be wronged.
draft: They secretly feel regret when they see the pain. And justice is decided between them, and they are not wronged.
hil: They secretly feel remorse when they see the punishment. And it will be decided among them with fairness, and they will not be wronged.
compare: They secretly feel remorse when they see the punishment. And it will be decided among them with fairness, and they will not be wronged.

src: Und keiner begeht mehr Unrecht als derjenige, der im Namen ALLAHs Lügen erdichtet oder das Wahre ableugnet, nachdem es zu ihm gekommen war! Gibt es etwa nicht in Dschahannam eine Bleibe für die Kafir?!
ref: And who is a greater wrong-doer than he who fabricateth a lie against Allah or belieth the truth when it cometh unto him Will there not be in the Hell an abiding-place for the infidels?
draft: And no one commits more wrongdoing than the one who fabricates lies in the name of ALLAH or denies the truth after it has come to him! Is there not a place in Jahannam for the Kafir?!
hil: And there is no one more unjust than the one who fabricates lies in the name of Allah, or denies the truth after it has come to him! Is there not a dwelling place in Jahannam for the Kafir?
compare: And there is no one more unjust than the one who fabricates lies in the name of Allah, or denies the truth after it has come to him! Is there not a dwelling place in Jahannam for the Kafir?

src: Du warst nicht auf der westlichen Seite', als Wir Musa die Angelegenheit auftrugen, und du warst nicht zugegen.
ref: You were not there on the western side (of Mount Sinai) when We gave the commandments to Moses, nor were you witness (to the event).
draft: "You were not on the western side when we entrusted Moses with the matter, and you were not present."
hil: "You were not on the western side when We entrusted Moses with the matter, and you were not present."
compare: "You were not on the western side when we entrusted Moses with the matter, and you were not present."

src: Und werdet ihr nun Muslime werden?!
ref: (And say:) "Will you now submit?"
draft: And will you now become Muslims?!
hil: And will you now become Muslims?
compare: And will you now become Muslims?!

src: Bäche werden unter ihnen in den Gärten der Wonne fließen.
ref: At their feet shall flow streams of running water in gardens of delight.
draft: Streams will flow among them in the gardens of bliss.
hil: Streams will flow among them in the gardens of bliss.
compare: Streams will flow among them in the gardens of bliss.

src: Und ihr pflegtet euch nicht so zu verdecken, daß nicht euer Gehör, eure Augen und eure Häute Zeugnis wegen euch ablegten. Aber ihr meintet, daß Gott nicht viel wisse von dem, was ihr tut.
ref: Not so did you cover yourselves, that your hearing, your eyes and your skins should not bear witness against you; but you thought that God would never know much of the things that you were working.
draft: And you did not cover yourself up so much that your hearing, your eyes, and your skins would not testify on your behalf. But you thought that God did not know much about what you do.
hil: You used to not cover yourself in a way that your hearing, your eyes, and your skin did not testify on your behalf. But you thought that God did not know much about what you do.
compare: And you did not cover yourself up so much that your hearing, your eyes, and your skins would not testify on your behalf. But you thought that God did not know much about what you do.

src: Diejenigen von den Leuten des Buches und von den Polytheisten, die nicht glauben, mögen es nicht gern, daß auf euch etwas Gutes von eurem Herrn herabgesandt wird.
ref: Those without faith among the people of the Book, and those who worship idols, do not wish that good should come to you from your Lord.
draft: Those of the people of the Book and the polytheists who disbelieve do not like that any good should be sent down to you from your Lord.
hil: Those without faith among the people of the Book and those who worship idols don't like good to come to you from your Lord. But God chooses whom He wills for His grace; and the bounty of God is infinite.
compare: Those of the people of the Book and the polytheists who disbelieve do not like that any good should be sent down to you from your Lord.

src: Damit beleben Wir eine abgestorbene Ortschaft. Auf diese Weise werdet auch ihr hervorgebracht werden.
ref: Then We revive a dead land therewith, and even so you will be brought forth (from the dead),
draft: We revive a dead village with this. In this way, you also will be brought forth.
hil: Thus we revive a dead locality. In this way, you too will be brought forth.
compare: We revive a dead village with this. In this way, you also will be brought forth.

src: Hierauf wird eure Rückkehr zu eurem Herrn sein.
ref: No one shall bear another's burden.
draft: "Then will be your return to your Lord."
hil: "Then your return will be to your Lord, when He will tell you about the things you disputed."
compare: "Then your return will be to your Lord, when He will tell you about the things you disputed."

src: Jede Gemeinschaft hat einen Gesandten. Wenn nun ihr Gesandter kommt, wird zwischen ihnen in Gerechtigkeit entschieden, und es wird ihnen kein Unrecht zugefügt.
ref: For every people there is an apostle; and when their apostle is come the matter is decided between them equitably, and no one is wronged.
draft: Every community has a messenger. So when their messenger comes, judgment will be made between them fairly, and they will not be wronged.
hil: "Every community has a messenger. So if their messenger comes, judgment will be made among them with justice, and no injustice will be done to them."
compare: "Every community has a messenger. So if their messenger comes, judgment will be made among them with justice, and no injustice will be done to them."

src: Und ihm dann die Herzader durchschnitten,
ref: Then cut off his aorta,
draft: And then they cut his heart vein.
hil: And then they cut his heart vein.
compare: And then they cut his heart vein.

src: Sie waren beide in der Höhle, und er sagte zu seinem Gefährten: «Sei nicht traurig. Gott ist mit uns.»
ref: When both of them were in the cave, he said to his companion: "Do not grieve, for God is with us."
draft: They were both in the cave, and he said to his companion, "Don't be sad. God is with us."
hil: They both were in the cave, and he said to his companion, 'Don't be sad. God is with us.'
compare: They were both in the cave, and he said to his companion, "Don't be sad. God is with us."

src: Allah wird aber keine Seele zurückstellen, wenn ihre Frist kommt. Und Allah ist Kundig dessen, was ihr tut.
ref: And Allah will never give respite to any soul when its promise arrives; and Allah is Aware of your deeds.
draft: Allah, however, will not defer any soul when its time has come. And Allah is aware of what you do.
hil: But Allah will not defer any soul when its term comes. And Allah is aware of what you do.
compare: Allah, however, will not defer any soul when its time has come. And Allah is aware of what you do.

src: Dann sagte ich: "Bittet euren HERRN um Vergebung! Gewiß, ER ist immer allvergebend,
ref: “I therefore told them, ‘Seek forgiveness from your Lord; He is indeed Most Forgiving.’
draft: Then I said: "Ask your LORD for forgiveness! Surely, HE is always forgiving".
hil: Then I said: 'Ask your Lord for forgiveness! Surely, HE is always forgiving.'
compare: Then I said: "Ask your LORD for forgiveness! Surely, HE is always forgiving".

src: Aber Allah hat (euch) bewahrt. Gewiß, Er weiß über das Innerste der Brüste Bescheid.
ref: But God spared you this, for He surely knows what is in the hearts of men.
draft: But Allah has preserved you. Certainly, He knows what is in the innermost parts of the chests.
hil: But Allah has preserved you. Whether you keep your words secret or express them openly, He knows the innermost secrets of your hearts.
compare: But Allah has preserved you. Whether you keep your words secret or express them openly, He knows the innermost secrets of your hearts.

src: Und gedenke deines Herrn in deinem Herzen in Demut und Furcht, ohne laut vernehmbare Worte am Morgen und am Abend; und sei nicht einer der Unachtsamen.
ref: Meditate on your Lord inwardly with humility and trepidation, reciting His Book softly, morning and evening, and be not negligent.
draft: And remember your Lord within yourself in humility and fear, without audible words in the morning and in the evening; and be not of the heedless.
hil: And remember your Lord within your heart in humility and fear, without audible words in the morning and evening; and be not of the heedless.
compare: And remember your Lord within yourself in humility and fear, without audible words in the morning and in the evening; and be not of the heedless.

src: Und von wo du auch herkommst, wende dein Gesicht in Richtung der heiligen Moschee.
ref: And wherever you come from, turn your face towards the Sacred Mosque.
draft: And wherever you come from, turn your face towards the holy mosque.
hil: Wherever you come from, turn towards the Holy Mosque; this is in truth from your Lord.
compare: And wherever you come from, turn your face towards the holy mosque.

src: Darin sollen sie verweilen auf ewig und immerdar.
ref: He has prepared for them Gardens under which rivers flow (Paradise), to dwell therein forever.
draft: They should dwell therein forever and ever.
hil: They shall abide therein forever and ever.
compare: They should dwell therein forever and ever.

src: ALLAH ist Derjenige, Der euch die Nacht machte, damit ihr euch darin ausruht, sowie den Tag hell. Gewiß, ALLAH hat bestimmt den Menschen Gunst erwiesen. Doch die meisten Menschen erweisen sich nicht dankbar.
ref: It is Allah Who created night for you so that you may gain rest in it, and the day giving sight; indeed Allah is Most Munificent towards mankind, but most people do not give thanks.
draft: ALLAH is the One who made for you the night, so that you may rest therein, and the day light. Verily, ALLAH is full of bounty to mankind, but most of mankind are not grateful.
hil: ALLAH is The One Who created the night for you to rest therein, and the day with light. Verily, ALLAH has bestowed favors upon mankind. But most of mankind are not grateful.
compare: ALLAH is The One Who created the night for you to rest therein, and the day with light. Verily, ALLAH has bestowed favors upon mankind. But most of mankind are not grateful.

src: Gleich wohlverwahrten Perlen.
ref: Like pearls within their shells,
draft: "Just well-kept pearls."
hil: "Like well-kept pearls."
compare: "Like well-kept pearls."

src: Das sind die, von denen Gott weiß, was in ihrem Herzen ist.
ref: The secrets of the hearts of these people are well known to God.
draft: These are the ones whom God knows what is in their hearts.
hil: These are the ones whom God knows what is in their hearts.
compare: These are the ones whom God knows what is in their hearts.

src: Darin erfaßt sie keine Mühsal, und sie werden nicht daraus vertrieben.
ref: No weariness will come upon them, nor will they be sent away from there.
draft: Therein they feel no hardship, and they will not be driven out.
hil: Therein they feel no hardship, and they will not be driven out.
compare: Therein they feel no hardship, and they will not be driven out.

src: Er ist ja der Allvergebende und Barmherzige.
ref: He is all-forgiving and all-merciful.
draft: He is indeed the All-Forgiving and Merciful.
hil: Verily, He is the Forgiver, the Merciful.
compare: He is indeed the All-Forgiving and Merciful.

src: Und sag: "Ich hoffe, daß mein HERR mich zu einer besseren Führung als dieses rechtleitet.
ref: Say, "I hope that my Lord will provide me better guidance."
draft: And say: "I hope that my LORD will guide me to a better guidance than this."
hil: And say, "I hope that my Lord guides me to a better guidance than this."
compare: And say: "I hope that my LORD will guide me to a better guidance than this."

src: Allah aber verspricht euch Vergebung von Sich aus und Huld. Allah ist Allumfassend und Allwissend.
ref: But God promises His pardon and grace, for God is bounteous and all-knowing.
draft: Allah, however, promises you forgiveness from Himself and grace. Allah is all-encompassing and all-knowing.
hil: But Allah promises you forgiveness and favor from Himself. Allah is all-encompassing and all-knowing.
compare: But Allah promises you forgiveness and favor from Himself. Allah is all-encompassing and all-knowing.

src: Als Lebensunterhalt für die Diener. Und Wir haben damit abgestorbene Ortschaften wieder belebt. So erfolgt auch das Herauskommen.
ref: As sustenance for the bondmen; and with it We revived a dead city; this is how you will be raised.
draft: As a livelihood for the servants. And we have revived dead villages with it. That's how the emergence also takes place.
hil: As a means of subsistence for the servants, and with it, we have revived desolate towns. Thus, the exit also happens.
compare: As a livelihood for the servants. And we have revived dead villages with it. That's how the emergence also takes place.

src: Was gibt es denn anstelle der Wahrheit außer dem Irregehen?!
ref: What then is there after the truth but error?
draft: What is there instead of the truth but going astray?!
hil: What is there besides going astray, instead of the truth?!
compare: What is there instead of the truth but going astray?!

src: Und verfertige das Schiff vor Unseren Augen und nach Unserer Eingebung. Und sprich Mich nicht an zugunsten derer, die Unrecht getan haben; sie werden ertränkt werden."
ref: “And build the ship in front of Us, and by Our command, and do not speak to Me regarding the unjust; they will surely be drowned.”
draft: "And build the ship before Our eyes and according to Our revelation. And do not address Me concerning those who have wronged, indeed, they are [to be] drowned."
hil: Construct the ship under Our eyes and under Our Revelation (guidance). And do not speak to Me on behalf of those who have done wrong; they will be drowned.
compare: Construct the ship under Our eyes and under Our Revelation (guidance). And do not speak to Me on behalf of those who have done wrong; they will be drowned.

src: Diejenigen aber, die sie an seiner Stelle anrufen, entscheiden ohne jede Grundlage.
ref: But those they call apart from Him can not adjudge in the least.
draft: Those, however, who call them in his place decide without any basis.
hil: But those who call upon them in his place, they decide without any basis.
compare: But those who call upon them in his place, they decide without any basis.

src: Da sagte er zu seinem Gefährten, während er mit ihm einen Wortwechsel führte: "Ich habe mehr Besitz als du und auch eine mächtigere Schar."
ref: Arguing one day with his friend he said: "I have more wealth than you and more powerful kinsmen."
draft: He said to his companion while having a conversation with him: "I have more possessions than you and a more powerful entourage too."
hil: He said to his companion during a conversation with him, 'I have more possessions and a more powerful entourage than you.'
compare: He said to his companion during a conversation with him, 'I have more possessions and a more powerful entourage than you.'

src: Aber Allah hebt auf, was der Satan dazwischenwirft. Hierauf legt Allah Seine Zeichen eindeutig fest.
ref: But God nullifies what Satan interjects, and God affirms His revelations.
draft: But Allah removes whatever the Satan throws in between. Afterwards, Allah clearly establishes His signs.
hil: But Allah lifts what Satan throws in between. Then Allah clearly establishes His signs.
compare: But Allah lifts what Satan throws in between. Then Allah clearly establishes His signs.

src: Er sagte: "O mein Volk, was meint ihr, wenn ich mich auf einen klaren Beweis von meinem Herrn stütze und Er mir eine Barmherzigkeit von Sich hat zukommen lassen, die aber eurem Blick entzogen wurde, sollen wir sie euch da aufzwingen, wo sie euch zuwider ist?
ref: He said: "O my people, think. If I have a clear proof from my Lord, and He has bestowed on me His grace, though unknown to you, can we force it upon you when you are averse?
draft: He said: "O my people, what do you think if I rely on a clear proof from my Lord and He has granted me a mercy from Him, but it has been hidden from your view, should we then force it upon you, when you are averse to it?
hil: He said, "O my people, what do you think if I rely on a clear proof from my Lord and He has granted me a mercy from Him, but it has been hidden from your view, should we then force it upon you, when you are averse to it?"
compare: He said: "O my people, what do you think if I rely on a clear proof from my Lord and He has granted me a mercy from Him, but it has been hidden from your view, should we then force it upon you, when you are averse to it?

src: Er sagte: "Allah bewahre mich davor, einer der Unwissenden zu sein."
ref: And he said: "God forbid that I be of the ignorant."
draft: He said, "God save me from being one of the ignorant."
hil: He said, "God save me from being one of the ignorant."
compare: He said, "God save me from being one of the ignorant."

src: Ich bin doch nur ein Ermahner und ein Überbringer froher Botschaft für Leute, die den Iman verinnerlichen."
ref: I am only a bearer of warnings and bringer of happy news for those who believe."
