draft: Already a confirmation from your Lord has come to you. And We have sent down to you a clear light.
hil: Indeed, to you a confirmation from your Lord has already come. And We have sent down to you a clear light.
compare: Already a confirmation from your Lord has come to you. And We have sent down to you a clear light.

src: Und wenn ihr zum Gebet ruft, treiben sie damit ihren Spott und Scherz. Dies (ist so), weil sie Leute sind, die es nicht begreifen.
ref: (Nor make friends with) those who, when you call (the faithful) to prayer, make mock of it and jest, because they do not understand.
draft: And when you call to prayer, they make it a mockery and a joke. This is because they are people who do not understand.
hil: And when you call to prayer, they make mockery and jest of it. That is because they are people who do not comprehend.
compare: And when you call to prayer, they make mockery and jest of it. That is because they are people who do not comprehend.

src: Nein, ihre Herzen befinden sich davor in abgründiger Achtlosigkeit.
ref: But their hearts are heedless of this.
draft: No, their hearts are before that in profound carelessness.
hil: No, their hearts are in profound carelessness before that.
compare: No, their hearts are in profound carelessness before that.

src: Dann lege auf jeden Berg ein Stück von ihnen, und dann rufe sie.
ref: Scatter them over the mountain-tops, then call them back.
draft: Then place a piece of them on each mountain, and then call them.
hil: Then place a piece of them on each mountain and call them
compare: Then place a piece of them on each mountain, and then call them.

src: Und wenn sie (die Mumin-Dienerinnen) verheiratet sind und dann Unzucht begehen, dann ist ihnen die Hälfte des Strafmaßes auferlegt, das für freie Frauen vorgesehen ist.
ref: But if they are married and guilty of adultery, inflict on them half the punishment (enjoined) for gentlewomen.
draft: And if they (the Moomin servants) are married and then commit fornication, then half the penalty is imposed on them that is intended for free women.
hil: And if they (the Moomin servants) are married and commit fornication, they are then subject to half the punishment prescribed for free women.
compare: And if they (the Moomin servants) are married and commit fornication, they are then subject to half the punishment prescribed for free women.

src: Aber Allah ist Erhaben über das, was sie (Ihm) beigesellen.
ref: But God is above what they ascribe to Him.
draft: But Allah is exalted above what they associate with Him.
hil: But Allah is exalted above what they associate with Him.
compare: But Allah is exalted above what they associate with Him.

src: Darum übe Vergebung in schöner Weise.
ref: So turn away (from them) with a grace.
draft: Therefore practice forgiveness in a beautiful way.
hil: "Therefore, practice forgiveness in a beautiful way."
compare: "Therefore, practice forgiveness in a beautiful way."

src: Und betört hat euch in bezug auf Gott der Betörer.
ref: And the chief deceiver (Satan) deceived you in respect of Allah."
draft: And the deceiver has beguiled you with respect to God.
hil: And the deceiver has deceived you in respect to God.
compare: And the deceiver has deceived you in respect to God.

src: Bereits kam zu euch Unser Gesandter, um euch nach einer (langen) Zeit, in der Gesandte ausgeblieben sind, (die Schrift) zu erklären, damit ihr nicht sagt: "Zu uns kam weder ein Überbringer froher Botschaft, noch ein Ermahner." So kam zu euch bereits sowohl ein Überbringer froher Botschaft als auch ein Ermahner.
ref: Indeed this Noble Messenger (Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) of Ours has come to you, revealing to you Our commands, after the Noble Messengers had stopped arriving for ages, for you might claim, “Never did any Harbinger of Glad Tidings or Herald of Warning come to us” – so this Harbinger of Glad Tidings and Herald of Warning has come to you; and Allah is Able to do all things.
draft: Our envoy came to you to explain the scripture after a long time in which envoys were absent, so that you would not say, "No bearer of good tidings came to us, nor any warner." So, already a bearer of glad tidings and a warner has come to you.
hil: Our messenger has already come to you, after a long period during which messengers were absent, to explain the scripture to you so that you would not say, 'No bearer of glad tidings came to us, nor any warner.' Already a bearer of glad tidings and a warner has come to you.
compare: Our envoy came to you to explain the scripture after a long time in which envoys were absent, so that you would not say, "No bearer of good tidings came to us, nor any warner." So, already a bearer of glad tidings and a warner has come to you.

src: Und ich erkläre mich nicht selbst für unschuldig.
ref: "And I free not myself (from the blame).
draft: And I do not declare myself innocent.
hil: And I do not declare myself innocent.
compare: And I do not declare myself innocent.

src: (O Du) Erschaffer der Himmel und der Erde, Du bist mein Schutzherr im Diesseits und Jenseits. Berufe mich als (Dir) ergeben ab und nimm mich unter die Rechtschaffenen auf."
ref: You are my Wali (Protector, Helper, Supporter, Guardian, etc.) in this world and in the Hereafter, cause me to die as a Muslim (the one submitting to Your Will), and join me with the righteous."
draft: "(O you) Creator of the heavens and the earth, you are my protector in this world and the hereafter. Call me to you and admit me among the righteous."
hil: "(O you) Creator of the heavens and the earth, you are my protector in this world and the hereafter. Call me to you and admit me among the righteous."
compare: "(O you) Creator of the heavens and the earth, you are my protector in this world and the hereafter. Call me to you and admit me among the righteous."

src: Weshalb haltet ihr diejenigen, die den Iman verinnerlicht haben, von dem Gebotenen von ALLAH ab, im Streben danach, es zu verfälschen, während ihr wißt?"
ref: Why do you stop those who have believed, from the Path of Allah, seeking to make it seem crooked, while you (yourselves) are witnesses [to Muhammad SAW as a Messenger of Allah and Islam (Allah's Religion, i.e. to worship none but Him Alone)]?
draft: "Why do you prevent those who have internalized the faith from obeying Allah's command, striving to distort it, while you know?"
hil: "Why do you prevent those who have internalized the faith from obeying Allah's command, striving to distort it, while you know?"
compare: "Why do you prevent those who have internalized the faith from obeying Allah's command, striving to distort it, while you know?"

src: Ein solcher (Gott) kann wahrlich (auch) die Toten wieder lebendig machen. Und Er hat Macht zu allen Dingen.
ref: Verily. He is the Quickener of the dead, and He is over every-thing potent.
draft: Such (God) can truly (also) resurrect the dead. And He has power over all things.
hil: Such (God) can truly (also) resurrect the dead. And He has power over all things.
compare: Such (God) can truly (also) resurrect the dead. And He has power over all things.

src: Allah liebt nicht, wer eingebildet und prahlerisch ist,
ref: God does not surely love those who are arrogant and boastful,
draft: "Allah does not love those who are arrogant and boastful."
hil: Allah does not love those who are arrogant and boastful.
compare: "Allah does not love those who are arrogant and boastful."

src: Fast hätten sie dich verführt (und) von dem (abgebracht), was Wir dir offenbart haben, damit du gegen Uns etwas anderes erdichtest.
ref: They almost lured you away from what We have revealed to you, so that you would invent something else in Our name.
draft: Almost they would have tempted you (and) diverted you from what We have revealed to you, so you would invent something else against Us.
hil: We almost let them seduce you and divert you from what We have revealed to you, so that you would invent something else against Us.
compare: We almost let them seduce you and divert you from what We have revealed to you, so that you would invent something else against Us.

src: Und kommt dem Besitz der Waise nicht nahe, es sei denn zu ihrem Besten, bis sie ihre Volljährigkeit erreicht hat.
ref: And that you approach not the property of the orphan, save in the fairer manner, until he is of age.
draft: And do not approach the property of the orphan, except in a way that is best, until she has reached maturity.
hil: Do not approach the property of an orphan, unless it is for their benefit and until they reach their age of majority.
compare: And do not approach the property of the orphan, except in a way that is best, until she has reached maturity.

src: Sollten sie über euch die Oberhand gewinnen, werden sie euch steinigen oder euch in ihre Gemeinschaft umkehren lassen.
ref: For, if they appear in front of you, they will stone you to death or restore you to their religion.
draft: If they gain the upper hand over you, they will stone you or convert you into their community.
hil: If they gain the upper hand over you, they will stone you or turn you into their community.
compare: If they gain the upper hand over you, they will stone you or turn you into their community.

src: Diejenigen von den Kindern Israils, die Kufr betrieben haben, wurden aus dem Munde von Dawud und von 'Isa Ibnu-Maryam verflucht. Dies war wegen dem, was sie sich widersetzt haben, und dem, was sie zu übertreten pflegten.
ref: Cursed were disbelievers among the children of Israel by David and Jesus, son of Mary, because they rebelled and transgressed the bounds.
draft: Those among the Children of Israel who committed disbelief were cursed by the mouths of David and Jesus son of Mary. This was because of what they had rebelled against and what they used to transgress.
hil: Those among the Children of Israel who committed disbelief were cursed by the mouths of David and Jesus son of Mary. This was because of what they had rebelled against and what they used to transgress.
compare: Those among the Children of Israel who committed disbelief were cursed by the mouths of David and Jesus son of Mary. This was because of what they had rebelled against and what they used to transgress.

src: Und ALLAH macht gewiß kenntlich diejenigen, die den Iman verinnerlicht haben, und ER macht gewiß kenntlich die Munafiq.
ref: God will surely know the believers and know the hypocrites.
draft: And ALLAH indeed makes known those who have internalized Iman (faith), and HE indeed makes known the hypocrites.
hil: Verily, ALLAH makes known those who have internalized Iman (faith), and HE surely makes known the hypocrites.
compare: And ALLAH indeed makes known those who have internalized Iman (faith), and HE indeed makes known the hypocrites.

src: Aber wir werden dir ganz gewiß Zauberei gleicher Art bringen. So setze zwischen uns und dir eine Verabredung(szeit) fest, die weder wir noch du verfehlen werden, an einem Ort, der (uns allen) gleichermaßen recht ist."
ref: “So we will also produce before you a similar magic, therefore set up an agreed time between us and you, from which neither we nor you shall turn away, at a level place.”
draft: But we will certainly bring you magic of the same kind. So set a time and place for us to meet that neither we nor you will miss, at a location that is equally convenient for all of us.
hil: "We will certainly bring you magic of the same kind. Therefore, let us set a time and place for us to meet that none of us will miss, at a location that is equally suitable for all of us."
compare: "We will certainly bring you magic of the same kind. Therefore, let us set a time and place for us to meet that none of us will miss, at a location that is equally suitable for all of us."

src: Bitte für uns um die Vergebung unserer Verfehlungen, denn wir waren gewiß Verfehlende."
ref: Seek forgiveness for our sins, for we were indeed guilty.”
draft: Please pray for our forgiveness of our transgressions, for we were certainly transgressors.
hil: Please pray for the forgiveness of our transgressions, for we were certainly transgressors.
compare: Please pray for our forgiveness of our transgressions, for we were certainly transgressors.

src: Dann werden sie bereuen, was sie in ihren Herzen verbargen.
ref: Then will they be repentant of what they had concealed in their hearts.
draft: Then they will regret what they hid in their hearts.
hil: Then they will regret what they concealed in their hearts.
compare: Then they will regret what they hid in their hearts.

src: Emporgehoben und rein gehalten,
ref: Exalted and holy,
draft: Upraised and held in place.
hil: "Upraised and held pure".
compare: Upraised and held in place.

src: ER verhilft zum Sieg, wem ER will.
ref: He supports whomever He wills.
draft: He helps win whomever he wants.
hil: He helps whom He will, for He has power over everything.
compare: He helps whom He will, for He has power over everything.

src: Unser HERR! Ich ließ von meiner Nachkommenschaft in einem unfruchtbaren Tal nieder - bei Deinem Muharram-Haus, unser HERR! - damit sie das rituelle Gebet ordnungsgemäß verrichten.
ref: I have settled some of my children, O Lord, in a barren valley near Your sacred House, so that, O our Lord, they may be constant in devotion.
draft: Our LORD! I settled some of my descendants in a barren valley near Your Sacred House, our LORD, so that they may perform the prayer properly.
hil: Our Lord, I made some of my offspring settle in a barren valley near Your holy house, our Lord, so that they may perform the prayer properly.
compare: Our LORD! I settled some of my descendants in a barren valley near Your Sacred House, our LORD, so that they may perform the prayer properly.

src: Und WIR gaben 'Isa Ibnu-Maryam, die Wunderzeichen und unterstützten ihn mit Ruhhul-qudus.
ref: And We gave 'Iesa (Jesus), the son of Maryam (Mary), clear signs and supported him with Ruh-ul-Qudus [Jibrael (Gabriel)].
draft: And WE gave Isa Ibnu-Maryam the miracles and supported him with Ruhhul-qudus.
hil: And WE gave Jesus, son of Mary, the miracles and supported him with Ruhhul-qudus.
compare: And WE gave Isa Ibnu-Maryam the miracles and supported him with Ruhhul-qudus.

src: Sie haben doch das, was darin steht, erforscht.
ref: And they have read this in it.
draft: You have researched what is stated therein.
hil: You have researched what is stated therein.
compare: You have researched what is stated therein.

src: Als ihr es mit euren Zungen übernahmt und ihr mit eurem Mund das ausspracht, wovon ihr keine Kenntnis hattet, da hieltet ihr es für eine geringe Sache, während es vor Allah eine große war.
ref: When you talked about it and said what you did not know, and took it lightly -- though in the sight of God it was serious --
draft: When you took it on with your tongues and said with your mouths what you had no knowledge of, you thought it was a little thing, while before Allah it was a great one.
hil: When you took it on with your tongues and said with your mouths what you had no knowledge of, you thought it was a small matter, while before Allah it was a great one.
compare: When you took it on with your tongues and said with your mouths what you had no knowledge of, you thought it was a small matter, while before Allah it was a great one.

src: Sie durch andere zu ersetzen, die besser sind als sie. Und niemand kann Uns voraus sein.
ref: To bring better people than they in their place; and they will not be able to thwart Us.
draft: Replacing themselves with others who are better than them. And no one can be ahead of Us.
hil: To replace themselves with others who are better than them. And no one can be ahead of Us.
compare: Replacing themselves with others who are better than them. And no one can be ahead of Us.

src: Am Tage, wenn die Heuchler und die Heuchlerinnen zu den Gläubigen sagen werden: "Wartet auf uns!
ref: On the Day when the hypocrites men and women will say to the believers: "Wait for us!
draft: On the day when the male and female hypocrites will say to the believers: "Wait for us!
hil: On the day when the hypocritical men and women will say to the believers: 'Wait for us,'
compare: On the day when the hypocritical men and women will say to the believers: 'Wait for us,'

src: (Es wird ihnen) wie den Leuten Pharaos und denen (ergehen), die vor ihnen waren: Sie hielten die Zeichen ihres Herrn für eine Lüge, darum ließen Wir sie zugrunde gehen um ihrer Sünden willen, und Wir ertränkten die Leute Pharaos; sie alle waren Frevler.
ref: This was the case with the people of Pharaoh and those before them, who rejected the signs of their Lord and were destroyed for their sins, and We drowned the people of Pharaoh as they were oppressors.
draft: "They will suffer the fate of the people of Pharaoh and those before them: They rejected the signs of their Lord, so We destroyed them for their sins and drowned the people of Pharaoh - all of them were wrongdoers."
hil: "They will suffer the fate of the people of Pharaoh and those before them: They considered the signs of their Lord a lie, so We destroyed them for their sins and drowned the people of Pharaoh - all of them were wrongdoers."
compare: "They will suffer the fate of the people of Pharaoh and those before them: They rejected the signs of their Lord, so We destroyed them for their sins and drowned the people of Pharaoh - all of them were wrongdoers."

src: Und sie freuen sich dabei über das, was Gott ihnen von seiner Huld zukommen ließ.
ref: Exulting in that which Allah hath vouchsafed them of His grace.
draft: And they rejoice in what God has bestowed upon them of his grace.
hil: And they rejoice in what God has sent down to them from His grace.
compare: And they rejoice in what God has bestowed upon them of his grace.

src: Sag: "Meine Leute! Handelt euren Standpunkten entsprechend, ich handle auch.
ref: Tell them: "O my people, go on acting on your part, I am acting on mine.
draft: Say: "My people! Act according to your positions, I do the same.
hil: Say, 'O people! Act according to your positions and so will I.
compare: Say, 'O people! Act according to your positions and so will I.

src: Genügt es ihnen denn nicht, daß Wir das Buch auf dich hinabgesandt haben, das ihnen verlesen wird?
ref: Is it not sufficient for them that We have revealed the Book to you which is read out to them?
draft: Does it not suffice for them that We have sent down to you the Book which is recited to them?
hil: Does it not suffice for them that We have sent down upon you the Book which is being recited to them?
compare: Does it not suffice for them that We have sent down to you the Book which is recited to them?

src: Und hätte ALLAH ihnen die Deportation nicht bestimmt, hätte ER sie doch im Diesseits gepeinigt.
ref: Had God not decreed exile for them, He would have punished them in this life.
draft: And if ALLAH had not determined deportation for them, HE would have still inflicted them with torment in this world.
hil: And had God not decreed their deportation, He would have surely tormented them in this life.
compare: And had God not decreed their deportation, He would have surely tormented them in this life.

src: Ihm gehören die Schönsten Namen.
ref: His are all the names beautiful.
draft: His are the most beautiful names.
hil: To him belong the most excellent names.
compare: To him belong the most excellent names.

src: Und es gibt nichts, was kleiner ist als dies oder größer, das nicht in einem deutlichen Buch stünde.
ref: Not what is less than that or what is greater than that but is (written) in a Clear Record. (Tafsir At-Tabari.
draft: And there is nothing that is smaller or larger than this that would not be written in a clear book.
hil: And there is nothing that is smaller or larger than this that would not be written in a clear book.
compare: And there is nothing that is smaller or larger than this that would not be written in a clear book.

src: Wer aber jetzt horcht, der findet, daß eine Sternschnuppe auf ihn lauert.
ref: But he who listeneth now findeth a flame in wait for him;
draft: But whoever listens now, will find that a shooting star is lurking for him.
hil: But whoever listens now will find a shooting star lurking for him.
compare: But whoever listens now will find a shooting star lurking for him.

src: Dann wird ihre Heimstätte die Hölle sein - welch schlimme Lagerstätte!
ref: What a miserable resort.
draft: Then their home will be hell - what a terrible storage place!
hil: Their abode will be Hell, and what an evil storage place!
compare: Their abode will be Hell, and what an evil storage place!

src: Einem jeden von ihnen wird zuteil, was er an Schuld erworben hat.
ref: Each person among them bears his share in the sin.
draft: Each of them will be allotted what he has earned in guilt.
hil: Each of them will be allotted what he has earned in guilt.
compare: Each of them will be allotted what he has earned in guilt.

src: "Am Tag, wenn sie im Feuer der Fitna unterzogen werden."
ref: The day they will be burnt in the Fire,
draft: "On the day when they are subjected to the fire of fitna."
hil: On the day when they are subjected to the fire of fitna.
compare: "On the day when they are subjected to the fire of fitna."

src: Und dem Berg Sinai,
ref: The Mount Sinai,
draft: And Mount Sinai,
hil: And to Mount Sinai,
compare: And Mount Sinai,

src: Sprich: "Allah weiß am besten wie lange sie verweilten." Ihm gehören das Verborgene der Himmel und der Erde. Wie sehend ist Er! Und wie hörend! Sie haben keinen Helfer außer Ihm, und Er teilt Seine Befehlsgewalt mit keinem.
ref: Say, “Allah well knows how long they stayed; for Him only are the hidden of the heavens and the earth; how well He sees and hears! They do not have any supporter besides Him; and He does not associate anyone in His command.”
draft: Speak: "Allah knows best how long they stayed." The concealed of the heavens and the earth belong to Him. How seeing is He! And how hearing! They have no helper except Him and He does not share His authority with anyone.
hil: "Say, \"Allah knows best how long they stayed.\" The hidden of the heavens and earth belongs to Him. How seeing is He! And how hearing! They have no helper except Him, and He does not share His authority with anyone."
compare: Speak: "Allah knows best how long they stayed." The concealed of the heavens and the earth belong to Him. How seeing is He! And how hearing! They have no helper except Him and He does not share His authority with anyone.

src: So rächten Wir uns an ihnen.
ref: So We punished them too.
draft: So we avenged ourselves on them.
hil: Thus, we avenged ourselves on them.
compare: Thus, we avenged ourselves on them.

src: "Dies ist so, weil ihr ungläubig bliebt, als Allah allein angerufen wurde; doch als Ihm Götter zur Seite gesetzt wurden, da glaubtet ihr.
ref: This has come upon you because when God alone was invoked you disbelieved; but when partners were associated with Him, you believed.
draft: "This is so because you remained unbelieving when Allah was called upon alone, but when gods were set beside Him, then you believed."
hil: This is because you remained unbelieving when Allah was invoked alone, but when gods were set beside Him, then you believed.
compare: "This is so because you remained unbelieving when Allah was called upon alone, but when gods were set beside Him, then you believed."

src: Und Wir werden euch ganz gewiß mit ein wenig Furcht und Hunger und Mangel an Besitz, Seelen und Früchten prüfen.
ref: We will certainly test you with some fear and hunger, and some loss of possessions and lives and crops.
draft: And We will certainly test you with a little fear and hunger and a shortage of possessions, lives and fruits.
hil: And We shall certainly try you with a little fear and hunger, a shortage of wealth, souls, and fruits.
compare: And We shall certainly try you with a little fear and hunger, a shortage of wealth, souls, and fruits.

src: Und zwischen uns und euch sind Feindschaft und Haß auf immer sichtbar geworden, bis ihr an Gott allein glaubt.»
ref: Enmity and hatred has surfaced between us and you, forever, until you believe in God alone.”
draft: "And between us and you, enmity and hatred have become visible forever, until you believe in God alone."
hil: Enmity and hatred has arisen between us and you, evidently that will last forever until you believe in God alone.
compare: "And between us and you, enmity and hatred have become visible forever, until you believe in God alone."

src: Und was wäre dabei, wenn sie den Iman an ALLAH und an den Jüngsten Tag verinnerlicht und vom Rizq gegeben hätten, das ALLAH ihnen gewährte?! Und ALLAH ist immer über sie allwissend.
ref: What have they (to fear) if they believe in Allah and the Last Day and spend (aright) of that which Allah hath bestowed upon them, when Allah is ever Aware of them (and all they do)?
draft: And what would it matter if they internalized the Imam to ALLAH and to the Last Day and had given from the Rizq that ALLAH granted them?! And ALLAH is always all-knowing about them.
hil: And what would it matter if they had internalized the faith in God and the Last Day and had given from the provisions that God had granted them?! And God is always All-Knowing about them.
compare: And what would it matter if they had internalized the faith in God and the Last Day and had given from the provisions that God had granted them?! And God is always All-Knowing about them.

src: ICH will von ihnen keinerlei Rizq, und ICH will nicht, daß sie Mich speisen.
ref: I want no sustenance from them nor do I want them to feed Me.
draft: I want no Rizq from them, and I do not want them to feed Me.
hil: "I want no Rizq from them, and I do not want them to feed Me."
compare: I want no Rizq from them, and I do not want them to feed Me.

src: Wahrhaftig!
ref: By your life!
draft: Truly!
hil: Truly!
compare: Truly!

src: Mein Besitz hat mir nichts genützt.
ref: Of no use was even my wealth.
draft: My possession has not benefited me.
hil: My possession has not availed me.
compare: My possession has not availed me.

src: Sie (, die anderen,) sagten: "O Musa, gewiß werden wir es niemals betreten, solange sie darin sind.
ref: They said: "O Moses, we shall never, never enter so long as they are there.
draft: They (the others) said: "O Moses, we will certainly never enter it as long as they are inside."
hil: They (the others) said, 'O Moses, we will certainly never enter it as long as they are inside.'
compare: They (the others) said: "O Moses, we will certainly never enter it as long as they are inside."

src: Und du siehst die Schiffe es durchspalten, damit ihr nach etwas von seiner Huld strebt und auf daß ihr dankbar werdet.
ref: And thou seest therein ships cleaving the water, that ye may seek of His graCe, and that haply ye may give thanks.
draft: And you see the ships splitting it, so that you may strive for something of his grace and so that you may be grateful.
hil: And you see the ships plough through it so that you may strive for some of His grace and that you may become grateful.
compare: And you see the ships splitting it, so that you may strive for something of his grace and so that you may be grateful.

src: Oder wer ist anstelle des Erbarmers derjenige, der euch eine Heerschar wäre, die euch unterstützen könnte?
ref: What other army do you have to help you apart from Ar-Rahman?
draft: Or who, instead of the Merciful, would be the one who could be a host to you and support you?
hil: Or who, instead of the Merciful, would be able to provide you with an army that could support you?
compare: Or who, instead of the Merciful, would be able to provide you with an army that could support you?

src: Und ER ist Der Allgnädige, Der Allvergebende.
ref: He is all-merciful, all-forgiving.
draft: And HE is The Merciful, The Forgiving.
hil: And He is the All-Forgiving, the Most Merciful.
compare: And He is the All-Forgiving, the Most Merciful.

src: Und WIR ließen vom Himmel Wasser in Abgewogenheit fallen, dann ließen WIR es in der Erde unterbringen. Und WIR sind, um es vergehen zu lassen, doch allmächtig.
ref: We send down water from the sky in determined measure, and store it up in the earth; and We have power to drain it away.
draft: And WE caused water to descend from the sky in due measure and lodged it in the earth, and WE have the power to carry it away [and render the earth dry] whenever WE will.
hil: We caused water to descend from the sky in due measure and lodged it in the earth, and We have the power to carry it away [and render the earth dry] whenever We will.
compare: And WE caused water to descend from the sky in due measure and lodged it in the earth, and WE have the power to carry it away [and render the earth dry] whenever WE will.

src: Und so haben wir euch in Verirrung fallen lassen, denn wir waren ja selbst in Verirrung gefallen."
ref: For we had led you astray. In fact we ourselves were astray."
draft: "And so we have let you fall into error, because we ourselves had fallen into error."
hil: Our Lord, these whom we led astray, we led them astray as we ourselves had gone astray. We dissociate ourselves from them before you. They did not deserve our worship.
compare: "And so we have let you fall into error, because we ourselves had fallen into error."

src: Und, o mein Volk, dies ist die Kamelstute Gottes, euch zum Zeichen. Laßt sie auf Gottes Erde weiden und rührt sie nicht mit etwas Bösem an. Sonst ergreift euch eine baldige Pein.»
ref: And O my people! yonder is the she-camel of Allah: a sign unto you; so let her alone, feeding in Allah's land, and touch her not with evil, lest there may overtake you a torment nigh.
draft: And, O my people, this is the she-camel of God, as a sign to you. Let her graze on God's earth and do not touch her with any harm, lest a swift punishment seize you.
hil: And, O my people, this is the she-camel of God as a sign to you. Let her graze on God's earth and do not touch her with any harm, lest a swift punishment seize you.
compare: And, O my people, this is the she-camel of God, as a sign to you. Let her graze on God's earth and do not touch her with any harm, lest a swift punishment seize you.

src: An jenem Tage werden Wir die einen von ihnen wie Wogen gegen die anderen anstürmen lassen, und es wird in den Sur gestoßen.
ref: On that Day, We will leave them surging upon one another.
draft: On that day, We will let surge against each other like waves, and the Trumpet will be blown, and We will gather them all together.
hil: On that day, We will let some of them surge against others like waves, and they will be pushed into the Sur (a barrier).
compare: On that day, We will let some of them surge against others like waves, and they will be pushed into the Sur (a barrier).

src: Allah hatte ja Wohlgefallen an den Gläubigen, als sie dir unter dem Baum den Treueid leisteten.
ref: God was pleased with the believers, when they pledged allegiance to you under the tree.
draft: Allah was pleased with the believers when they swore allegiance to you under the tree.
hil: Allah was pleased with the believers when they swore allegiance to you under the tree.
compare: Allah was pleased with the believers when they swore allegiance to you under the tree.

src: Schauen sie denn nicht zu den Kamelen, wie sie erschaffen sind
ref: Do they not then ponder how the clouds were formed;
draft: Please do not stare at the camels, how they were created.
hil: Have they not looked at the camels, how they were created?
compare: Please do not stare at the camels, how they were created.

src: Er ging daran, das Schiff zu verfertigen. Und sooft Vornehme aus seinem Volk an ihm vorbeikamen, verhöhnten sie ihn.
ref: So he built the ark; and when groups of his people passed by him, they scoffed at him.
draft: He set about creating the ship. And as often as nobles from his people passed him by, they mocked him.
hil: He began to manufacture the ship. And whenever nobles from his people passed by him, they ridiculed him.
compare: He began to manufacture the ship. And whenever nobles from his people passed by him, they ridiculed him.

src: Fürchtet ihr sie etwa?
ref: Are you afraid of them?
draft: Do you fear her perhaps?
hil: Did you fear her perhaps?
compare: Do you fear her perhaps?

src: Ihr hättet unmöglich deren Bäume wachsen lassen können.
ref: It was not in your power to make trees germinate.
draft: You could not have possibly let their trees grow.
hil: You could not have possibly let their trees grow.
compare: You could not have possibly let their trees grow.

src: Begehren sie (etwa) Macht bei ihnen (zu finden)? Gewiß, alle Macht gehört Allah.
ref: Then (know that) undoubtedly all honour is for Allah.
draft: Do they desire (perhaps) power to be found with them? Certainly, all power belongs to Allah.
hil: Do they perhaps desire power to be found with them? Indeed, all power belongs to Allah.
compare: Do they desire (perhaps) power to be found with them? Certainly, all power belongs to Allah.

src: An jenem Tag werden sie an derselben Pein teilhaben.
ref: So, they will become partners in punishment.
draft: On that day, they will share in the same agony.
hil: On that day, they will share in the same punishment.
compare: On that day, they will share in the same punishment.

src: Das Gute verweigert, Übertretungen begeht und Zweifel hegt,
ref: "Every obstructor of good, transgressor, and the sceptic,
draft: The good refuses, commits transgressions, and harbors doubt.
hil: The good denies, commits transgressions, and harbors doubt.
compare: The good refuses, commits transgressions, and harbors doubt.

src: Als ihnen aber vorgeschrieben wurde zu kämpfen, kehrten sie sich ab bis auf wenige von ihnen. Und Gott weiß Bescheid über die, die Unrecht tun.
ref: But when they were ordered to fight they turned away, except for a few; yet God knows the sinners.
draft: When they were ordered to fight, they turned away, except for a few of them. And Allah is Aware of the wrongdoers.
hil: When they were ordered to fight, they turned away, except for a few of them. And God is aware of those who do wrong.
compare: When they were ordered to fight, they turned away, except for a few of them. And Allah is Aware of the wrongdoers.

src: Das ist der Lohn der Feinde Allahs: das (Höllen)feuer, in dem sie die ewige Wohnstätte haben, als Vergeltung dafür, daß sie Unsere Zeichen zu verleugnen pflegten.
ref: This is the requital for God's enemies: Hell, where they will have their lasting home, as punishment for denying Our revelations.
draft: This is the reward of the enemies of Allah: the (hell) fire, in which they have the eternal abode, as a retribution for their denial of Our signs.
hil: This is the reward of the enemies of Allah: the fire of hell, in which they have the eternal dwelling place, as a retribution for rejecting Our signs.
compare: This is the reward of the enemies of Allah: the (hell) fire, in which they have the eternal abode, as a retribution for their denial of Our signs.

src: Und wenn ALLAH dich zu einer Gruppe von ihnen wiederkehren läßt und diese dich um Erlaubnis (zur Teilnahme) am Aufbruch bitten, dann sag: "Ihr werdet mit mir nie und nimmer aufbrechen und den bewaffneten Kampf gegen keinen Feind mit mir aufnehmen.
ref: If you come back to them by (the grace of) God, and they seek your permission to go (to fight), you should tell them: "You will never go out nor fight the enemy with me any more.
draft: And if ALLAH lets you return to a group of them and they ask you for permission (to participate) in the departure, then say: "You will never leave with me and you will not take up armed combat against any enemy with me.
hil: And if ALLAH lets you return to a group of them and they ask you for permission (to participate) in the departure, then tell them: 'You will never leave with me and you will not take up armed combat against any enemy with me.'
compare: And if ALLAH lets you return to a group of them and they ask you for permission (to participate) in the departure, then tell them: 'You will never leave with me and you will not take up armed combat against any enemy with me.'

src: Ich fürchte, daß sie mich der Lüge bezichtigen."
ref: Verily! I fear that they will belie me."
draft: "I'm afraid they'll accuse me of lying."
hil: I fear that they accuse me of lying.
compare: "I'm afraid they'll accuse me of lying."

src: Sie schmiedeten Ränke, und Wir schmiedeten Ränke, ohne daß sie es merkten.
ref: They hatched up the plot; We also planned without their knowledge.
draft: They plotted schemes, and we plotted schemes without them noticing.
hil: They plotted schemes, and we plotted schemes without them noticing.
compare: They plotted schemes, and we plotted schemes without them noticing.

src: Und wende dich nicht in Arroganz von den Leuten ab! Und gehe auf der Erde nicht freudenerregt!
ref: Do not hold men in contempt, and do not walk with hauteur on the earth.
draft: And do not turn away from people in arrogance! And do not walk joyfully on the Earth!
hil: And do not turn away from the people in arrogance! And do not walk on the earth rejoicing!
compare: And do not turn away from the people in arrogance! And do not walk on the earth rejoicing!

src: Sag: "Weder Ihr wer-det nach dem zur Rechenschaft gezogen, was wir schwer verfehlten, noch wir werden nach dem zur Rechenschaft gezogen, was ihr tut."
ref: Say: "You will not be questioned about the sins that we have committed, nor shall we be questioned about your deeds."
draft: Say: "Neither you will be held accountable for what we have gravely failed nor will we be held accountable for what you do."
hil: Say, "Neither will you be held accountable for what we gravely failed nor will we be held accountable for what you do."
compare: Say, "Neither will you be held accountable for what we gravely failed nor will we be held accountable for what you do."

src: Bis zum Tag der bestimmten Zeit.»
ref: Till the appointed day."
draft: "Until the day of the specified time."
hil: "Until the Day of Resurrection which is beyond doubt."
compare: "Until the day of the specified time."

src: Und an dem Tage, wo die Stunde herankommt, werden die Schuldigen schwören, daß sie nicht länger als eine Stunde (auf Erden) weilten - so sehr sind sie an (Selbsttäuschung gewöhnt.
ref: The day Resurrection is set the sinners will swear: "We did not tarry more than an hour (and cannot be guilty)." That is how they have always been deceived.
draft: And on the day when the hour comes, the guilty will swear that they did not reside on Earth for more than an hour - they are so accustomed to self-deception.
hil: On the day when the appointed hour will come, the guilty ones will swear that they did not live on this earth for more than an hour, (and) they are so much accustomed to (self) delusion.
compare: And on the day when the hour comes, the guilty will swear that they did not reside on Earth for more than an hour - they are so accustomed to self-deception.

src: Sie hatten eine stärkere Kraft als ihr und mehr Vermögen und Kinder.
ref: They were more powerful than you, and had more wealth and children.
draft: They had a stronger power than her and more wealth and children.
hil: They had more power and wealth and children than you.
compare: They had more power and wealth and children than you.

src: Und die Aussöhnung ist besser. Doch die Seelen sind der Habsucht zugeneigt.
ref: Reconciliation is good even though men's souls are swayed by greed.
draft: And reconciliation is better. But the souls are inclined towards greed.
hil: Reconciliation is better, but souls are inclined towards greed.
compare: And reconciliation is better. But the souls are inclined towards greed.

src: Steh auf (zum Gebet) die ganze Nacht, bis auf einen kleinen Teil,
ref: Keep watch all the night except some,
draft: Stand up (for prayer) all night, except for a small part.
hil: "Stand up (for prayer) all night, except for a small part."
compare: Stand up (for prayer) all night, except for a small part.

src: (Von ihnen) sagen wir uns vor Dir los. Nicht uns dienten sie ja."
ref: We clear ourselves before You: They never worshipped us."
draft: We say goodbye to them in front of you. They didn't serve us after all.
hil: We dissociate ourselves from them before you. They did not serve us after all.
compare: We dissociate ourselves from them before you. They did not serve us after all.

src: Der ihnen versprochene Zeitpunkt ist der Tagesanbruch. Ist nicht der Tagesanbruch schon nahe?"
ref: Their hour of doom is in the morning: Is not the morning nigh?"
draft: "The promised time to them is daybreak. Isn't daybreak already near?"
hil: The promised time to them is daybreak. Isn't daybreak already close?
compare: "The promised time to them is daybreak. Isn't daybreak already near?"

src: Und sag: Wirkt! Allah wird euer Tun sehen, und (auch) Sein Gesandter und die Gläubigen.
ref: And say, "Do [as you will], for Allah will see your deeds, and [so, will] His Messenger and the believers.
draft: And say: It works! Allah will see your actions, and (also) His Messenger and the believers.
hil: And say: It works! God will see your conduct, and so will His Apostle and the faithful. For you will in the end go back to Him, who knows the unknown and the known, who will tell you of what you were doing.
compare: And say: It works! Allah will see your actions, and (also) His Messenger and the believers.

src: (Sie treten ein in) Dschannat von 'Adn, die Der Allgnade Erweisende Seinen Dienern von der Welt des Verborgenen versprochen hat.
ref: In the gardens of Eden promised by Ar-Rahman to His creatures in the unknown (future).
draft: (You enter) the paradise of 'Adn, which The All-Merciful has promised to His servants from the world of the Unseen.
hil: They enter the paradise of 'Adn, which The All-Merciful has promised to His servants from the world of the Unseen.
compare: They enter the paradise of 'Adn, which The All-Merciful has promised to His servants from the world of the Unseen.

src: Und WIR lehrten ihn nicht das Dichten und dies gebührt ihm nicht! Er ist doch nichts anderes außer Ermahnung und ein klarer Quran,
ref: And We have not taught him (Prophet Mohammed- peace and blessings be upon him) to recite poetry, nor does it befit him; it is nothing but an advice and the bright Qur’an.
draft: And WE did not teach him (Muhammad) poetry, nor is it befitting for him. This is but a reminder and a clear Quran.
hil: We did not teach him to versify, nor is it worthy of him. He is nothing but a reminder and a clear Quran.
compare: And WE did not teach him (Muhammad) poetry, nor is it befitting for him. This is but a reminder and a clear Quran.

src: Und der Satan sagt, nachdem die Angelegenheit entschieden ist: "Gewiß, Allah hat euch ein wahres Versprechen gegeben, und ich habe euch (etwas) versprochen, es aber dann gebrochen. Und ich hatte keine Macht über euch, außer daß ich euch gerufen habe und ihr auf mich gehört habt. So tadelt mich nicht, sondern tadelt euch selbst. Ich kann euch nicht zu Hilfe kommen, und ihr könnt mir nicht zu Hilfe kommen. Ich weise es ja von mir, daß ihr mich zuvor (Allah) beigesellt habt." Gewiß, für die Ungerechten gibt es schmerzhafte Strafe.
ref: And Satan will say when the matter has been decided, “Indeed Allah had given you a true promise – and the promise I gave you, I made it untrue to you; and I had no control over you except that I called you and you obeyed me; so do not accuse me, blame only yourselves; neither can I help you, nor can you help me; I have no concern with your ascribing me as a partner (to Allah); indeed for the unjust is a painful punishment.”
draft: And Satan says, after the matter has been decided, "Indeed, Allah had given you a true promise and I had promised you, but then I betrayed you. And I had no authority over you except that I had invited you, and you had responded to me. So do not blame me; instead, blame yourselves. I cannot help you, nor can you help me. Indeed, I deny your association of me (with Allah) before. Indeed, for the wrongdoers is a painful punishment."
hil: Indeed, Allah had given you a true promise and I had promised you, but then I betrayed you. And I had no authority over you except that I had invited you, and you had responded to me. So do not blame me; instead, blame yourselves. I cannot help you, nor can you help me. Indeed, I deny your association of me (with Allah) before. Indeed, for the wrongdoers is a painful punishment.
compare: Indeed, Allah had given you a true promise and I had promised you, but then I betrayed you. And I had no authority over you except that I had invited you, and you had responded to me. So do not blame me; instead, blame yourselves. I cannot help you, nor can you help me. Indeed, I deny your association of me (with Allah) before. Indeed, for the wrongdoers is a painful punishment.

src: Allah hat auf dich das Buch und die Weisheit herabgesandt und dich gelehrt, was du (vorher) nicht wußtest.
ref: God has revealed to you the Scripture and wisdom, and has taught you what you did not know.
draft: Allah has sent down upon you the Book and wisdom and has taught you that which you did not know before.
hil: Allah has sent down to you the Book (The Quran), and Al-Hikmah (Islamic laws, knowledge of legal and illegal things i.e. the Prophet's Sunnah - legal ways), and taught you that which you knew not before.
compare: Allah has sent down to you the Book (The Quran), and Al-Hikmah (Islamic laws, knowledge of legal and illegal things i.e. the Prophet's Sunnah - legal ways), and taught you that which you knew not before.

src: Gewiß, wir werden ihn und die Seinen erretten, bis auf seine Frau, die zu denen gehört, die zurückbleiben sollen."
ref: We are to save him and his family except his wife, for she is one of those who will stay behind."
draft: "Surely, we will save him and his family, except for his wife who is among those who are to be left behind."
hil: Certainly, we will save him and his people except for his wife, who belongs to those who should remain behind.
compare: "Surely, we will save him and his family, except for his wife who is among those who are to be left behind."

src: Und sie lernten, was ihnen schadete und nicht nützte. Und sie wußten, daß derjenige, der dies erkauft, im Jenseits keinen Anteil hat.
ref: Indeed, they learned what harms them and does not profit them, yet they knew that anyone who buys it would have no share in the Everlasting Life.
draft: And they learned what harmed them and did not benefit them. And they knew that whoever buys this has no share in the hereafter.
hil: "They learned what harmed them and did not benefit them. And they knew that whoever bought it would truly have no share in the Hereafter."
compare: "They learned what harmed them and did not benefit them. And they knew that whoever bought it would truly have no share in the Hereafter."

src: Ich will, daß du die Last meiner Sünde und deiner Sünde trägst und so unter den Bewohnern des Feuers bist, und dies ist der Lohn der Frevler."
ref: I would rather you suffered the punishment for sinning against me, and for your own sin, and became an inmate of Hell. And that is the requital for the unjust."
draft: "I want you to bear the burden of my sin and your sin and thus be among the inhabitants of the Fire, and this is the reward of the wrongdoers."
hil: I want you to bear the burden of my sin and your sin and thus be among the inhabitants of the Fire, and this is the reward of the wrongdoers.
compare: I want you to bear the burden of my sin and your sin and thus be among the inhabitants of the Fire, and this is the reward of the wrongdoers.

src: Und ER machte euch die Nacht, das Tageslicht, die Sonne und den Mond gratis fügbar.
ref: He has subjected to you the night, the day, the sun and the moon.
draft: And HE made the night, the daylight, the sun and the moon freely available to you.
hil: HE made the night, the daylight, the sun and the moon freely available to you.
compare: And HE made the night, the daylight, the sun and the moon freely available to you.

src: Mein HERR! Laß mich des rituellen Gebets ordnungsgemäßer Verrichtender sein sowie von meiner Nachkommenschaft. Mein HERR! Und erfülle mein Bittgebet!
ref: My Lord! make me establisher of prayer and also from my progeny, our Lord! and accept Thou my supplication.
draft: My Lord! Let me perform the ritual prayer properly and grant it to my descendants. My Lord! And answer my prayer!
hil: My Lord! Let me perform the ritual prayer properly and grant it to my descendants. My Lord! And answer my prayer!
compare: My Lord! Let me perform the ritual prayer properly and grant it to my descendants. My Lord! And answer my prayer!

src: Und was für ein erbärmlicher Aufenthaltsort!
ref: Their dwelling place will be Hell; - and worst indeed is that place for rest.
draft: "And what a miserable place to stay!"
hil: And what a pitiable place of stay!
compare: "And what a miserable place to stay!"

src: Und Allah ist wahrlich Allverzeihend, Barmherzig.
ref: God is All-forgiving, All-compassionate.
draft: And Allah is truly All-Forgiving, Merciful.
hil: And Allah is indeed All-Forgiving, Merciful.
compare: And Allah is truly All-Forgiving, Merciful.

src: (Er ist) der Schöpfer der Himmel und der Erde in ihrer schönsten Form. Wie soll Er Kinder haben, wo Er doch keine Gefährtin hat und Er (sonst) alles erschaffen hat?
ref: Creator of the heavens and the earth from nothingness, how could He have a son when He has no mate?
draft: (He is) the creator of the heavens and the earth in their most beautiful form. How can he have children when he has no companion and has created everything else?
hil: "He is the creator of the heavens and the earth in their most beautiful form. How can he have children when he has no companion and has created everything else?"
compare: (He is) the creator of the heavens and the earth in their most beautiful form. How can he have children when he has no companion and has created everything else?

src: Heute habe Ich euch eure Religion vervollkommnet und Meine Gunst an euch vollendet, und Ich bin mit dem Islam als Religion für euch zufrieden. - Und wer sich aus Hunger in einer Zwangslage befindet, ohne zu einer Sünde hinzuneigen, so ist Allah Allvergebend und Barmherzig.
ref: This day, I have perfected your religion for you, completed My Favour upon you, and have chosen for you Islam as your religion. But as for him who is forced by severe hunger, with no inclination to sin (such can eat these above-mentioned meats), then surely, Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
draft: Today I have perfected your religion for you, completed My favor upon you, and have chosen for you Islam as your religion. And whoever is forced by severe hunger with no inclination to sin - then indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
hil: Today I have perfected for you your religion and completed My favor upon you and have chosen for you Islam as your religion. And whoever is forced by severe hunger with no inclination towards sin - then indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
compare: Today I have perfected your religion for you, completed My favor upon you, and have chosen for you Islam as your religion. And whoever is forced by severe hunger with no inclination to sin - then indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.

src: Sie sagen: "Aber nein!
ref: They will say, "No!
draft: "They say: 'But no!'"
hil: "They say, 'But no!'"
compare: "They say, 'But no!'"

src: ER sagte: "Deine Aya sei, daß du mit den Menschen drei volle Nächte nicht reden kannst."
ref: "Though sound," He answered, "you will not talk to any one for three nights running."
draft: He said: "Your Aya is that you cannot talk to people for three full nights."
hil: He said, 'Your sign shall be that you will not speak to people for three full nights.'
compare: He said: "Your Aya is that you cannot talk to people for three full nights."

src: Darum rufe du auf und verhalte dich recht, wie dir befohlen worden ist. Und folge nicht ihren Neigungen, sondern sprich: Ich glaube an das, was Gott an Büchern herabgesandt hat, und mir ist befohlen worden, unter euch Gerechtigkeit zu üben.
ref: Therefore call thou, and go straight as thou hast been commanded; do not follow their caprices.
draft: Therefore, you should call and act right, as you have been commanded. And do not follow their inclinations, but say: I believe in what God has sent down in books, and I have been commanded to practice justice among you.
hil: Therefore, call and act rightly as you have been commanded. And do not follow their inclinations. Rather, say: I believe in what God has revealed in books, and I have been commanded to practice justice among you.
compare: Therefore, call and act rightly as you have been commanded. And do not follow their inclinations. Rather, say: I believe in what God has revealed in books, and I have been commanded to practice justice among you.

src: Ich kann euch nicht retten, noch könnt ihr mich retten.
ref: Neither can I help you nor can you give me help.
draft: I can't save you, nor can you save me.
hil: I cannot save you, nor can you save me.
compare: I can't save you, nor can you save me.

src: Und gehe auf Erden nicht freudenerregt! Gewiß, dabei wirst du weder die Erde zerlöchern können, noch wirst du die Berghöhen an Höhe erreichen.
ref: And do not strut about the land with insolence: Surely you cannot cleave the earth, nor attain the height of mountains in stature.
draft: And do not walk on the earth gleefully! Surely, thereby you will neither be able to puncture the earth nor will you reach the heights of the mountains.
hil: Do not walk on earth gleefully! Indeed, in doing so, you will neither be able to puncture the earth nor will you reach the heights of the mountains.
compare: And do not walk on the earth gleefully! Surely, thereby you will neither be able to puncture the earth nor will you reach the heights of the mountains.

src: Sehen sie denn nicht, daß Allah, Der die Himmel und die Erde erschaffen hat, (auch) die Macht hat, ihresgleichen zu erschaffen? Und Er hat ihnen eine Frist gesetzt, an der es keinen Zweifel gibt, doch die Ungerechten weigern sich (und wollen nichts) außer dem Unglauben.
ref: Do they not see that Allah Who has created the heavens and the earth is Able to create people similar to them, and has set a term for them in which there is no doubt? So the unjust do not accept without being ungrateful.
draft: Can't they see that Allah, who created the heavens and the earth, also has the power to create their like? And He has appointed for them a term, about which there is no doubt. But the unjust refuse (to believe) except in disbelief.
hil: Do they not see that Allah, who created the heavens and the earth, has the power to create people similar to them, and has set a term for them in which there is no doubt? But the unjust refuse (to believe) except in disbelief.
compare: Do they not see that Allah, who created the heavens and the earth, has the power to create people similar to them, and has set a term for them in which there is no doubt? But the unjust refuse (to believe) except in disbelief.

src: Ihm gereicht zum Vorteil, was er erworben hat, und ihm gereicht zum Schaden, was er begangen hat.
ref: Each will enjoy what (good) he earns, as indeed each will suffer from (the wrong) he does.
draft: "He benefits from what he has acquired, and he suffers from what he has done wrong."
hil: He receives the benefit of what he has earned and suffers the consequences of what he has done wrong.
compare: He receives the benefit of what he has earned and suffers the consequences of what he has done wrong.

src: Ihr macht sie zu Schreibblättern, die ihr offenlegt, aber auch vieles davon verheimlicht.
ref: Some of it ye disclose and much thereof ye conceal.
draft: You turn them into writing paper that you present openly, but also conceal a lot of it.
hil: You turn them into writing paper that you present openly, but also conceal much of it.
compare: You turn them into writing paper that you present openly, but also conceal a lot of it.

src: (So war) Allahs Gesetzmäßigkeit mit denjenigen, die zuvor dahingegangen sind - und Allahs Anordnung ist ein fest gefaßter Beschluß
ref: This has been the way of God with (apostles) who have gone before you, and God's command is a determined act.
draft: (Thus was) Allah's law with those who have passed away before - and Allah's commandment is a fixed decree.
hil: (Thus was) Allah's law with those who have passed away before - and Allah's commandment is a fixed decree.
compare: (Thus was) Allah's law with those who have passed away before - and Allah's commandment is a fixed decree.

src: Und Wir ließen dem Mose das Buch zukommen.
ref: And indeed We gave Musa (Moses) the Scripture, but dispute arose therein.
draft: And We sent down the Book to Moses.
hil: "And We revealed the Book to Moses."
compare: And We sent down the Book to Moses.

src: Derjenige, Der mich erschuf.
ref: who created me.
draft: The one who created me.
hil: The One who created me.
compare: The one who created me.

src: Aber Taube hören nicht den Ruf, wenn sie gewarnt werden.
ref: But the deaf do not hear the call when they are warned.
draft: But pigeons don't hear the call when they are warned.
hil: Say, 'I warn you only with the divine revelation.' But the deaf do not hear the call when warned.
compare: But pigeons don't hear the call when they are warned.

src: Aber ihr seid ja Leute, die der Versuchung ausgesetzt sind.»
ref: In reality you are a people under trial (for your own inauspiciousness)."
draft: But you are people who are exposed to temptation.
hil: But you are people who are exposed to temptation.
compare: But you are people who are exposed to temptation.

src: Was Allah den Menschen an Barmherzigkeit gewährt, das kann keiner zurückhalten; und was Er zurückhält, das kann nach Ihm keiner freigeben; und Er ist der Allmächtige, der Allweise.
ref: There is none who can take away the favours He bestows on man; and there is none apart from Him to restore what He has withheld. He is all-mighty and all-wise.
draft: What Allah grants to mankind in terms of mercy, no one can withhold; and what He withholds, no one can release after Him; and He is the Almighty, the All-Wise.
hil: Whatever mercy Allah grants to mankind can't be withheld by anyone; and whatever He withholds can't be released by anyone after Him; and He is the Almighty, the All-Wise.
compare: What Allah grants to mankind in terms of mercy, no one can withhold; and what He withholds, no one can release after Him; and He is the Almighty, the All-Wise.

src: Ich folge ausschließlich dem, was mir als Wahy zuteil wird. Und ich bin doch nichts anderes als ein deutlicher Warner."
ref: I only follow what is revealed to me; I am only a clear warner.'
draft: I only follow what is revealed to me as Wahy. And I am nothing but a clear warner.
hil: I follow only what is revealed to me as Wahy, and yet I am nothing more than a clear Warner.
compare: I only follow what is revealed to me as Wahy. And I am nothing but a clear warner.

src: Das sind die, die Gott rechtgeleitet hat.
ref: They are those whom Allah had guided.
draft: These are those whom God has guided right.
hil: These are those whom God has guided right.
compare: These are those whom God has guided right.

src: Das sind die, die das diesseitige Leben gegen das Jenseits erkauft haben.
ref: Those are they who have bought the life of this world at the price of the Hereafter.
draft: These are the ones who have purchased this worldly life at the expense of the Hereafter.
hil: They are those who have bartered away the Hereafter for the life of this world.
compare: They are those who have bartered away the Hereafter for the life of this world.

src: Und gewähre ihnen noch eine kurze Frist.
ref: And give them respite for a little while.
draft: And give them a short additional period.
hil: "And grant them a short respite."
compare: "And grant them a short respite."

src: Sprich: Das ist mein Weg.
ref: Say: 'This is my way.
draft: Speak: This is my way.
hil: Say, 'This is my way.'
compare: Speak: This is my way.

src: Oder sagen sie: "Er hat es ersonnen"? Nein!
ref: What! They dare say that, “He has fabricated it”?
draft: Or do they say, "He has conceived it"? No!
hil: Or do they say, "He conceived it"? No!
compare: Or do they say, "He conceived it"? No!

src: Alles Lob gebührt ALLAH, Dem alles gehört, was in den Himmeln und was auf Erden ist.
ref: Praise belongs to God to whom belongs whatsoever is in the heavens and whatsoever is in the earth.
draft: All praise is due to Allah, to whom belongs everything in the heavens and on earth.
hil: All praise is due to Allah, to whom belongs everything in the heavens and on earth.
compare: All praise is due to Allah, to whom belongs everything in the heavens and on earth.

src: Gewiß, mir wurde vom Wissen das zuteil, was dir nicht zuteil wurde, so folge mir, dann leite ich dich recht auf einen geraden Weg!
ref: There has come to me of knowledge that which came not unto you. So follow me.
draft: Certainly, I was granted the knowledge that was not granted to you, so follow me and I will guide you right onto a straight path!
hil: Certainly, I was granted the knowledge that was not granted to you, so follow me and I will guide you right onto a straight path!
compare: Certainly, I was granted the knowledge that was not granted to you, so follow me and I will guide you right onto a straight path!

src: Und WIR entsandten dich nur als Überbringer froher Botschaft und als Warner.
ref: Yet We have not sent you but to give good tidings and to warn.
draft: And WE have only sent you as a bringer of good news and as a warner.
hil: "Verily, We have sent thee with the truth, as a bearer of glad tidings and as a Warner."
compare: "Verily, We have sent thee with the truth, as a bearer of glad tidings and as a Warner."

src: O ihr Menschen, ein Gleichnis ist geprägt, so hört darauf: Gewiß, jene, die ihr an Allahs Statt anruft, werden in keiner Weise vermögen, eine Fliege zu erschaffen, auch dann nicht, wenn sie sich dazu zusammentäten. Und wenn die Fliege ihnen etwas raubte, könnten sie es ihr nicht entreißen.
ref: O men, give ear to this parable: Those you worship other than God can never create as much as a fly, even if they get together to do so; and if the fly were to rob them of a thing they would not be able to snatch it away from it.
draft: O people, a parable is set forth, so listen to it: Surely those whom you call upon besides Allah cannot create [even] a fly, though they should all combine together for it; and if a fly should snatch away anything from them, they could not take it back from it.
hil: O people! A parable has been coined, so listen to it! Surely, those whom you call upon besides Allah cannot create [even] a fly, though they should all combine together for it; and if a fly should snatch away anything from them, they could not take it back from it.
compare: O people, a parable is set forth, so listen to it: Surely those whom you call upon besides Allah cannot create [even] a fly, though they should all combine together for it; and if a fly should snatch away anything from them, they could not take it back from it.

src: Aber er vergaß (sie). Und wir fanden bei ihm keine Entschlossenheit.
ref: He forgot Our commandment and We did not find in him the determination to fulfil Our commandments.
draft: But he forgot (her). And we found no determination in him.
hil: But he forgot about her. And we found no determination in him.
compare: But he forgot about her. And we found no determination in him.

src: Diejenigen aber, die ungläubig sind und Unsere Zeichen für Lüge erklären, für sie wird es schmachvolle Strafe geben.
ref: But those who did not believe and called Our revelations lies, will be given disgraceful punishment.
draft: But those who disbelieve and deny Our signs, they will be the companions of Hellfire.
hil: But those who disbelieve and reject Our signs - they are rightful Peoples of the Fire.
compare: But those who disbelieve and deny Our signs, they will be the companions of Hellfire.

src: ER sagte: "Das ist ein Mir verbindlicher, geradliniger Weg:
ref: (To which God) said: "This way is right by Me.
draft: He said, "This is a straightforward way that is binding for me."
hil: He said, 'This is a straightforward path that is binding upon me.'
compare: He said, 'This is a straightforward path that is binding upon me.'

src: "Gaben Wir euch nicht ein genügend langes Leben, so daß ein jeder, der sich besinnen wollte, sich darin hätte besinnen können?
ref: Did We not give you a long enough span of life so that he who remembered may reflect? And did not the warner come to you?
draft: Did we not give you a sufficiently long life so that anyone who wanted to reflect could have reflected on it?
hil: Did we not give you a long enough life so that anyone who wanted to reflect could have reflected on it?
compare: Did we not give you a long enough life so that anyone who wanted to reflect could have reflected on it?

src: Auch sollst du Mitteilung machen über denjenigen, der Unseren Ayat gegenüber Kufr betrieben und gesagt hat: "Ganz gewiß werden mir Vermögen und Kinder zuteil!"
ref: Have you seen him who denies Our revelations, and says: "I will certainly be given wealth and children."
draft: Also, you shall inform about the one who committed Kufr towards our Ayat and said: "Most certainly, I will be given wealth and children."
hil: Also, you should inform about the one who committed Kufr towards our Ayat and said, 'Most certainly, I will be given wealth and children.'
compare: Also, you shall inform about the one who committed Kufr towards our Ayat and said: "Most certainly, I will be given wealth and children."

src: (dies) als Ermahnung. Und nie sind Wir ungerecht.
ref: To advise; and We never oppress.
draft: (this) as a warning. And never are We unjust.
hil: As a reminder of this. And We are never unjust.
compare: As a reminder of this. And We are never unjust.

src: Sind die beiden im Gleichnis etwa gleich? Lob sei Gott!
ref: All praise belongs to Allah!
draft: Are the two in the parable about the same? Praise be to God!
hil: Are they equal in the parable? Praise be to God!
compare: Are they equal in the parable? Praise be to God!

src: Und wenn sie den bewaffneten Kampf gegen euch aufnahmen, dann tötet sie.
ref: But if they attack you, then kill them.
draft: And if they engage in armed combat against you, then kill them.
hil: And if they take up arms against you, then slay them.
compare: And if they take up arms against you, then slay them.

src: Und als ihnen gesagt wurde: "Verinnerlicht den Iman, wie die (anderen) Menschen den Iman verinnerlicht haben", sagten sie: "Sollen wir etwa den Iman verinnerlichen, wie die Beschränkten den Iman verinnerlicht haben?"
ref: When asked to believe as others do, they say: "Should we believe like fools?"
draft: And when they were told, "Internalize the faith as people have internalized it," they said, "Should we internalize the faith as the limited ones have internalized it?"
hil: And when they were told, 'Internalize the faith as people have internalized it,' they said, 'Should we internalize the faith as those with limited understanding have internalized it?'
compare: And when they were told, 'Internalize the faith as people have internalized it,' they said, 'Should we internalize the faith as those with limited understanding have internalized it?'

src: Gewiß, ALLAH macht, was ER will.
ref: Verily God does as He pleases.
draft: Certainly, Allah does whatever He wants.
hil: Indeed, Allah does what He wills.
compare: Certainly, Allah does whatever He wants.

src: Und wenn einer ungläubig ist, so ist Gott auf die Weltenbewohner nicht angewiesen.
ref: Whosoever denies, should remember that God is independent of the peoples of the world.
draft: And if one is unbelieving, God is not reliant on the inhabitants of the world.
hil: And if one is unbelieving, God is not reliant on the inhabitants of the world.
compare: And if one is unbelieving, God is not reliant on the inhabitants of the world.

src: Diejenigen, denen das Buch zugekommen ist, sind erst uneins geworden, nachdem das Wissen zu ihnen gekommen war, dies aus ungerechter Auflehnung untereinander.
ref: Those who were given the Book were not at variance except after the knowledge came to them, being insolent one to another.
draft: Those to whom the book has come have only become discordant after the knowledge has come to them, from unjust rebellion among themselves.
hil: Those to whom the book has come have only become divided after knowledge has come to them because of unjust rebellion among themselves.
compare: Those to whom the book has come have only become divided after knowledge has come to them because of unjust rebellion among themselves.

src: Und er hatte keine Schar, die ihm gegen Allah zu helfen vermöchte, und er konnte sich selbst nicht wehren.
ref: He had no body to help him other than God, nor was he able to save himself.
draft: And he had no group that could help him against Allah, and he could not defend himself.
hil: And he had no group that could assist him against Allah, and he could not defend himself.
compare: And he had no group that could help him against Allah, and he could not defend himself.

src: Über sie kommt eine Pein, die unabwendbar ist.»
ref: Verily, there will come a torment for them which cannot be turned back."
draft: "Over her comes a pain that is unavoidable."
hil: A pain comes over her that is inevitable.
compare: "Over her comes a pain that is unavoidable."

src: Also, dann sollen sie mit ihren Verbindungen hochsteigen!
ref: Then let them climb up the ladders (to the heavens).
draft: So, then they should climb up with their connections!
hil: "So, then they should climb up with their connections!"
compare: So, then they should climb up with their connections!

src: Auf solche (Sünder) wird ein böses Unheil niederfallen; und Allah ist zornig auf sie; und Er hat sie verflucht und Gahannam für sie bereitet. Und das ist eine üble Bestimmung.
ref: God is wroth with them, and has cursed them, and has prepared for them Gehenna -- an evil homecoming!
draft: On such (sinners) a bad misfortune will fall; and Allah is angry with them; and He has cursed them and prepared Gahannam for them. And this is an evil destiny.
hil: A bad misfortune will descend upon such sinners, and Allah is angry with them. He has cursed them and prepared Gahannam for them, and this is an evil destiny.
compare: On such (sinners) a bad misfortune will fall; and Allah is angry with them; and He has cursed them and prepared Gahannam for them. And this is an evil destiny.

src: Und vervollständigt die Hadsch und die 'Umra für ALLAH! Und solltet ihr daran gehindert werden, dann (opfert) das, was an Opfertieren verfügbar ist, und rasiert nicht eure Köpfe, bis das Opfertier seinen Opferplatz erreicht hat.
ref: Fulfil the Pilgrimage and the Visitation unto God; but if you are prevented, then such offering as may be feasible. And shave not your heads, till the offering reaches its place of sacrifice.
draft: And complete the Hajj and the 'Umrah for ALLAH! And should you be prevented, then sacrifice that which is available of sacrificial animals, and do not shave your heads until the sacrificial animal has reached its place of sacrifice.
hil: And complete the Hajj and the 'Umrah for ALLAH! And if you are prevented, then sacrifice that which is available of sacrificial animals, and do not shave your heads until the sacrificial animal has reached its place of sacrifice.
compare: And complete the Hajj and the 'Umrah for ALLAH! And if you are prevented, then sacrifice that which is available of sacrificial animals, and do not shave your heads until the sacrificial animal has reached its place of sacrifice.

src: Hätte es doch aus den Generationen vor euch manche gegeben, die einsichtig waren, welche Verderben auf Erden verboten!
ref: Why were there not, out of the generations that passed away before you, righteous men who would forbid others from causing corruption on the earth?
draft: If only there had been some among the generations before you who were insightful about which ruin on earth is forbidden!
hil: If only there had been some among the generations before you who were insightful about which ruin on earth is forbidden!
compare: If only there had been some among the generations before you who were insightful about which ruin on earth is forbidden!

src: (Er), der sieben Himmel in Schichten erschaffen hat.
ref: Who created the seven skies one above the other.
draft: He who created the seven heavens in layers.
hil: He who created the seven heavens in layers.
compare: He who created the seven heavens in layers.

src: Sie haben Allah nicht eingeschätzt, wie es Ihm gebührt', wo die ganze Erde am Tag der Auferstehung in Seiner Hand gehalten wird und (auch) die Himmel in Seiner Rechten zusammengefaltet sein werden. Preis sei Ihm! Erhaben ist Er über das, was sie (Ihm) beigesellen.
ref: And they did not realise the importance of Allah as was His right; and on the Day of Resurrection, He will compress the lands and the heavens will be rolled up by His power; Purity and Supremacy are to Him, from all what they ascribe as partners.
draft: They have not estimated Allah as He should be, where the whole earth will be held in His hand on the Day of Resurrection and the heavens will be folded in His right hand. Praise be to Him! Exalted is He above what they associate with Him.
hil: They have not estimated Allah as He deserves, where the whole earth will be held in His hand on the Day of Resurrection and the heavens will be folded in His right hand. Glory be to Him! Exalted is He above what they associate with Him.
compare: They have not estimated Allah as He deserves, where the whole earth will be held in His hand on the Day of Resurrection and the heavens will be folded in His right hand. Glory be to Him! Exalted is He above what they associate with Him.

src: Allah ist wahrlich Allverzeihend und Allvergebend.
ref: Verily God is forgiving and kind.
draft: Allah is truly All-Forgiving and All-Merciful.
hil: Assuredly God is forgiving and kind.
compare: Allah is truly All-Forgiving and All-Merciful.

src: Und den Himmel haben Wir mit Kraft aufgebaut.
ref: And the heaven!
draft: And We built the heaven with might.
hil: We have built the heaven with might.
compare: And We built the heaven with might.

src: Sollten sie jedoch Kinder haben, dann bekommt ihr das Viertel von dem, was sie hinterlassen haben, nach (der Vollstreckung) des Testaments, das sie hinterlegt haben, und nach (der Begleichung) der Schulden.
ref: If they had children, you get one-fourth of what they leave. After fulfilling any bequest and paying off debts.
draft: However, if you have children, you will receive one quarter of what they have left behind after the execution of the will that they have deposited and the payment of debts.
hil: "If, however, they have children, you will receive one quarter of what they have left behind after the execution of the will that they have deposited and the payment of debts."
compare: However, if you have children, you will receive one quarter of what they have left behind after the execution of the will that they have deposited and the payment of debts.

src: Mit Sicherheit ist ALLAHs Versprechen wahr, doch die meisten wissen es nicht.
ref: Remember, the promise of God is true. But most of them do not know.
draft: Surely Allah's promise is true, but most people do not know it.
hil: For sure, Allah's promise is true, but most people do not know it.
compare: Surely Allah's promise is true, but most people do not know it.

src: Dein Herr hat dich weder verlassen, noch verabscheut.
ref: Your Lord has neither left you, nor despises you.
draft: Your master has neither left you nor despised you.
hil: Your Lord has neither forsaken you nor detested you.
compare: Your Lord has neither forsaken you nor detested you.

src: Und auch manche von ihren Vätern, ihren Nachkommen und ihren Brüdern.
ref: as We did their fathers, their descendants, and their brothers.
draft: And also some of their fathers, their descendants, and their brothers.
hil: Some of their fathers, their descendants, and their brothers as well.
compare: And also some of their fathers, their descendants, and their brothers.

src: Und als er dort ankam, wurde gerufen: "Baraka wurde verliehen dem, das im Feuer ist, sowie dem um es herum. Und subhanallah, Der HERR aller Schöpfung.
ref: So when he reached it, it was proclaimed, “Blessed is he who is in the location of the fire (Moosa) and those who are close to it (the angels); and Purity is to Allah, the Lord Of The Creation.”
draft: And when he arrived there, it was called out: "Baraka has been bestowed upon those who are in the fire, as well as those around it. And subhanallah, the LORD of all creation."
hil: And when he arrived there, it was called out: 'Baraka has been bestowed upon those who are in the fire, as well as those around it. And subhanallah, the LORD of all creation.'
compare: And when he arrived there, it was called out: "Baraka has been bestowed upon those who are in the fire, as well as those around it. And subhanallah, the LORD of all creation."

src: Als er dann (die Lücke) zwischen den beiden Wallabhängen auf gleicher Höhe zuschütten ließ, sagte er: "Blast!" Als er dann es (das Eisen) erhitzte, sagte er: "Bringt mir geschmolzenes Kupfer, das ich darüber gieße!"
ref: At length, when he had filled up the space between the two steep mountain-sides, He said, "Blow (with your bellows)" Then, when he had made it (red) as fire, he said: "Bring me, that I may pour over it, molten lead."
draft: When he then had the gap between the two hill slopes filled up at the same level, he said: "Blast!" When he then heated it (the iron), he said: "Bring me molten copper that I pour over it!"
hil: "When he then had the gap between the two hill slopes filled up at the same level, he said, 'Blast!' When he then heated it (the iron), he said, 'Bring me molten copper that I pour over it!'".
compare: "When he then had the gap between the two hill slopes filled up at the same level, he said, 'Blast!' When he then heated it (the iron), he said, 'Bring me molten copper that I pour over it!'".

src: Und du hast eine Verabredung, die dir nicht gebrochen wird. Und schau auf deinen Gott, dessen Andacht du dich dauernd hingegeben hast.
ref: And thereafter a tryst awaits thee thou canst not fail to keep Behold thy god, to whom all the day thou wast cleaving!
draft: And you have an appointment that will not be broken for you. And look at your God, to whose devotion you have constantly devoted yourself.
hil: And you have an appointment that will not be broken for you. And look to your God, whose devotion you have constantly devoted yourself to.
compare: And you have an appointment that will not be broken for you. And look to your God, whose devotion you have constantly devoted yourself to.

src: Und ER erschafft, was ihr nicht kennt.
ref: He created other things too which you do not know.
draft: And HE creates what you do not know.
hil: HE creates what you do not know.
compare: HE creates what you do not know.

src: ER sagte: "Geh!
ref: (And God) said: "Away!
draft: He said, "Go!"
hil: He said, "Go!"
compare: He said, "Go!"

src: Also diejenigen, die den Iman an ihn verinnerlicht, ihn geehrt, ihm zum Sieg verholfen haben und dem Licht (Quran) gefolgt sind, das ihm hinabgesandt wurde, diese sind die wirklichen Erfolgreichen.
ref: Those who believe and honour and help him, and follow the light sent with him, are those who will attain their goal."
