draft: So those who internalize faith in him, honor him, helped him to victory and followed the light (Quran) that was sent down to him, these are the real successful ones.
hil: So those who accepted faith in Him, honored Him, helped to bring about His victory, and followed the light (Quran) that has been sent down to Him are the ones who have truly succeeded.
compare: So those who accepted faith in Him, honored Him, helped to bring about His victory, and followed the light (Quran) that has been sent down to Him are the ones who have truly succeeded.

src: Doch ich verfüge nicht über das, was ihr übereilt haben wollt.
ref: But what you wish to be hastened is not within my power.
draft: But I don't have what you want to hurry about.
hil: But I do not possess what you wanted to rush.
compare: But I do not possess what you wanted to rush.

src: Gespottet wurde schon vor dir über Gesandte. Da umschloß diejenigen, die sie verhöhnt hatten, das, worüber sie spotteten.
ref: Surely the apostles have been mocked before you; but what they had mocked rebounded on the mockers themselves.
draft: Mockery had been made of envoys even before you. Thus those who had mocked them were encompassed by that which they had derided.
hil: Mockery had been made of envoys even before you. Thus those who had mocked them were encompassed by that which they had derided.
compare: Mockery had been made of envoys even before you. Thus those who had mocked them were encompassed by that which they had derided.

src: O ihr, die ihr glaubt, fürchtet Allah; und eine jede Seele schaue nach dem, was sie für morgen vorausschickt. Und fürchtet Allah; wahrlich, Allah ist dessen wohl kundig, was ihr tut.
ref: O People who Believe! Fear Allah, and every soul must see what it has sent ahead for tomorrow; and fear Allah; indeed Allah is Aware of your deeds.
draft: O you who believe, fear Allah; and let every soul look to what it has put forth for tomorrow - and fear Allah. Indeed, Allah is acquainted with what you do.
hil: O you who believe, fear Allah; and let each soul look to what it has put forth for tomorrow - and fear Allah. Surely, Allah is Aware of what you do.
compare: O you who believe, fear Allah; and let each soul look to what it has put forth for tomorrow - and fear Allah. Surely, Allah is Aware of what you do.

src: Und für sie ist eine schmerzhafte Pein bestimmt.
ref: They will have a painful punishment.
draft: And for them, a painful agony is destined.
hil: And for them is a painful punishment intended.
compare: And for them is a painful punishment intended.

src: Und Fir'aun sagte: "O ihr führende Schar, keinen anderen Gott weiß ich für euch als mich (selbst). So entfache mir, o Haman, einen Brand auf Lehm, und mache mir einen Hochbau, auf daß ich zum Gott Musas emporsteige. Ich glaube fürwahr, daß er zu den Lügnern gehört."
ref: 'Assembly' said Pharaoh, 'I do not know that you have any god except me' 'O Haman, kindle a fire upon clay and make me a tower so that I can climb to see the God of Moses, I think that he is one of the liars'
draft: And Pharaoh said, "O you elite, I do not know of any other god for you except myself. So kindle for me, O Haman, [a fire upon] the clay and make for me a tower that I may look at the God of Moses; and indeed, I do think he is among the liars."
hil: Pharaoh said, 'O you leaders, I know no other lord for you but myself; therefore, O Haman, make for me a fire upon the clay and build me a tower that I may ascend to the God of Moses. Indeed, I think he is one of the liars.'
compare: And Pharaoh said, "O you elite, I do not know of any other god for you except myself. So kindle for me, O Haman, [a fire upon] the clay and make for me a tower that I may look at the God of Moses; and indeed, I do think he is among the liars."

src: ER ist Derjenige, Der euch Seine Ayat zeigt und euch Rizq vom Himmel nach und nach hinabsendet.
ref: It is He who shows you His signs, and sends you food from the heavens.
draft: HE is the One who shows you His signs and sends down sustenance from the sky for you, little by little.
hil: "He" should be replaced by "It". It is He who shows you His signs and sends down sustenance from the sky for you, little by little."
compare: HE is the One who shows you His signs and sends down sustenance from the sky for you, little by little.

src: Diese verinnerlichen den Iman an ihn. Und wer von Al-ahzab daran Kufr betreibt, dem ist das Feuer bestimmt.
ref: Such believe therein, and whoso disbelieveth therein of the clans, the Fire is his appointed place.
draft: These internalize faith in him. And whoever commits disbelief in him among the Al-Ahzab, for him is the fire determined.
hil: They internalize faith in him. And whoever among the Al-Ahzab commits disbelief in him, for him is the fire destined.
compare: They internalize faith in him. And whoever among the Al-Ahzab commits disbelief in him, for him is the fire destined.

src: Er sagte: "O wehe mir! War ich unfähig, zu sein wie dieser Rabe und die böse Tat an meinem Bruder zu verbergen?"
ref: He said: woe unto me was incapable of being like unto this raven so that I might cover the corpse of my brother!
draft: He said: "O woe is me! Was I unable to be like this raven and conceal the evil deed from my brother?"
hil: "He said, 'O woe is me! Was I unable to be like this raven and conceal the evil deed from my brother?'"
compare: He said: "O woe is me! Was I unable to be like this raven and conceal the evil deed from my brother?"

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Sagt nicht ra'ina, sondern sagt unzurna und hört zu! Und für die Kafir ist eine qualvolle Peinigung bestimmt.
ref: O believers, do not say, 'Observe us,' but say, 'Regard us'; and give ear; for unbelievers awaits a painful chastisement.
draft: You, who have internalized the imam! Don't say 'ra'ina', but say 'unzurna' and listen! And for the Kafir, a painful punishment is destined.
hil: Those of you who have internalized the faith! Do not say 'ra'ina', but say 'unzurna', and listen! And for the disbelievers is a painful punishment.
compare: Those of you who have internalized the faith! Do not say 'ra'ina', but say 'unzurna', and listen! And for the disbelievers is a painful punishment.

src: Der alles gut gemacht hat, was Er erschuf.
ref: who has created all things well.
draft: The one who has done everything well, which He created.
hil: He who created everything well, has done well.
compare: The one who has done everything well, which He created.

src: Gewiß, Allah vergibt die Sünden alle. Er ist ja der Allvergebende und Barmherzige.
ref: Despair not of the Mercy of Allah: for Allah forgives all sins: for He is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
draft: Surely, Allah forgives all sins. He is indeed the All-Forgiving and Merciful.
hil: Surely, Allah forgives all sins. He is indeed the All-Forgiving and Merciful.
compare: Surely, Allah forgives all sins. He is indeed the All-Forgiving and Merciful.

src: Er ist es, der die Himmel und die Erde der Wahrheit entsprechend erschaffen hat.
ref: It is He who created the heavens and the earth with a definite purpose.
draft: He is the one who created the heavens and the earth in accordance with the truth.
hil: It is It Who has created the heavens and the earth in accordance with the truth, and on the Day of Resurrection He will say: "Be!", and it shall become.
compare: He is the one who created the heavens and the earth in accordance with the truth.

src: Und zu Seinen Ayat zählt euer Schlaf während der Nacht und am Tag und euer Anstreben nach Seiner Gunst. Gewiß, darin sind doch Ayat für Leute, die hören.
ref: And among His signs is your sleeping during the night and day, and your seeking His munificence; indeed in this are signs for people who heed.
draft: And among His signs is your sleep during the night and day, and your seeking of His bounty. Verily, therein are signs for people who listen.
hil: Among His signs is your sleep during the night and day, and your endeavor to seek His favor. Surely, therein are signs for people who listen.
compare: Among His signs is your sleep during the night and day, and your endeavor to seek His favor. Surely, therein are signs for people who listen.

src: Oder dachten diejenigen, in deren Herzen Krankheit ist, daß ALLAH ihren Groll nie hervorbringen wird?!
ref: Do they whose minds are filled with doubt, think that God will not expose their malice?
draft: Or did those in whose hearts there is sickness think that Allah will never bring forth their resentment?!
hil: Or did those whose hearts are diseased think that Allah will never bring forth their anger?
compare: Or did those whose hearts are diseased think that Allah will never bring forth their anger?

src: Sag: "Wer gewährt euch Rizq von den Himmeln und der Erde?" Sag: "ALLAH!
ref: Proclaim, “Who provides you sustenance from the sky and the earth?”
draft: Say: "Who grants you Rizq from the heavens and the earth?" Say: "ALLAH!"
hil: Ask them: 'Who provides you with sustenance from the heavens and the earth?' Say: 'ALLAH!'
compare: Say: "Who grants you Rizq from the heavens and the earth?" Say: "ALLAH!"

src: Und WIR schenkten ihm Ishaq und Ya'qub, bestimmten die Prophetenschaft und die Schrift bei seiner Nachkommenschaft und ließen ihm seine Belohnung im Diesseits zuteil werden.
ref: And, We gave him (Abraham), Isaac and Jacob and appointed on his descendants the Prophethood and the Book.
draft: And we gave him Ishaq and Ya'qub, determined the prophethood and the scripture for his descendants, and granted him his reward in this world.
hil: "And We gave him Isaac and Jacob, appointed prophethood and scripture for his descendants, and granted him his reward in this world."
compare: And we gave him Ishaq and Ya'qub, determined the prophethood and the scripture for his descendants, and granted him his reward in this world.

src: Aber nein! Die Ungerechten befinden sich in deutlichem Irrtum.
ref: Nay, but the evildoers are in manifest error.
draft: But no! The unjust are clearly mistaken.
hil: No! The unjust are in clear error.
compare: But no! The unjust are clearly mistaken.

src: Diese erhoben sich jedoch in Arroganz und waren schwer verfehlende Leute.
ref: But they behaved arrogantly and were Mujrimun (disbelievers, sinners, polytheists, criminals, etc.) folk.
draft: These, however, rose in arrogance and were severely misguided people.
hil: "But they rose in arrogance and were severely misguided people."
compare: These, however, rose in arrogance and were severely misguided people.

src: Und wenn sie als Gefangene zu euch kommen, so löst ihr sie aus.
ref: Although, should they come to you as captives, you would ransom them.
draft: And when they come to you as prisoners, then you shall ransom them.
hil: And if they come to you as prisoners, then you shall ransom them.
compare: And when they come to you as prisoners, then you shall ransom them.

src: Doch kooperiert nicht bei dem Verwerflichen und bei der Übertretung! Und handelt Taqwa gemäß ALLAH gegenüber.
ref: Assist each other to virtue and piety, and assist not each other to sin and transgression, Fear Allah: verily Allah is Severe in chastising.
draft: But do not cooperate in wrongdoing and transgression! And act with Taqwa towards ALLAH.
hil: Don't cooperate in wrongdoings and transgressions! And act with Taqwa towards ALLAH.
compare: But do not cooperate in wrongdoing and transgression! And act with Taqwa towards ALLAH.

src: (Fordert) dann hernach entweder Gnade oder Lösegeld, bis der Krieg seine Lasten (von euch) wegnimmt. Das ist so.
ref: Then, either free them by grace orransom until war shall lay down its loads, in this way, it shall be.
draft: Then afterwards (he/she) demands either mercy or ransom, until the war relieves its burdens from you. That's how it is.
hil: "Afterwards, (he/she) then demands either mercy or ransom until the war relieves its burdens from you. That's the way it is."
compare: "Afterwards, (he/she) then demands either mercy or ransom until the war relieves its burdens from you. That's the way it is."

src: Davon sind diejenigen Götzendiener ausgenommen, mit denen ihr einen Vertrag eingegangen seid und die es euch an nichts haben fehlen lassen und die keine anderen gegen euch unterstützt haben.
ref: Except those idolaters with whom you have a treaty, who have not failed you in the least, nor helped anyone against you.
draft: Those idolaters are exempted from this, with whom you have entered into a contract and who have not failed you in anything and have not supported anyone against you.
hil: Those idolaters are exempted from this, with whom you have entered into a contract, and they have not failed you in anything and have not supported anyone against you.
compare: Those idolaters are exempted from this, with whom you have entered into a contract, and they have not failed you in anything and have not supported anyone against you.

src: - denn gewiß, vor der Strafe ihres Herrn (kann) sich niemand sicher glauben,
ref: Surely no one can be secure from the punishment of his Lord, --
draft: For surely, no one can consider themselves safe from the punishment of their Lord.
hil: Verily, no one can feel safe from their Lord's punishment.
compare: Verily, no one can feel safe from their Lord's punishment.

src: Am Tag, da sie auf ihren Gesichtern ins (Höllen)feuer gezerrt werden: "Kostet die Berührung der Sengenden."
ref: On that Day they will be dragged into the fire faces foremost, (and told:) "Taste the feel of Hell."
draft: On the day they are dragged into the (Hell)fire on their faces, they will be told: "Taste the touch of the Scorching."
hil: On the day they are dragged into the fire on their faces, they will be told: "Taste the touch of the Scorching."
compare: On the day they are dragged into the (Hell)fire on their faces, they will be told: "Taste the touch of the Scorching."

src: Ob der eine reich oder arm ist, so ist Allah beiden näher; darum folgt nicht der persönlichen Neigung, auf daß ihr gerecht handeln könnt. Und wenn ihr aber (die Wahrheit) verdreht oder euch von (der Wahrheit) abwendet, so ist Allah eures Tuns kundig.
ref: Whether a man be rich or poor, God is his greater well-wisher than you. So follow not the behests of lust lest you swerve from justice; and if you prevaricate or avoid (giving evidence), God is cognisant of all that you do.
draft: Whether one is rich or poor, Allah is closer to both; therefore, do not follow personal inclination, so that you may act justly. And if you distort (the truth) or turn away (from the truth), then indeed Allah is ever Acquainted with what you do.
hil: Whether one is rich or poor, Allah is closer to both; therefore, do not follow personal inclination, so that you may act justly. And if you distort (the truth) or turn away (from the truth), then indeed Allah is ever Acquainted with what you do.
compare: Whether one is rich or poor, Allah is closer to both; therefore, do not follow personal inclination, so that you may act justly. And if you distort (the truth) or turn away (from the truth), then indeed Allah is ever Acquainted with what you do.

src: Und richte deine Wünsche auf deinen Herrn aus.
ref: And turn to your Lord with all your love.
draft: And direct your desires towards your Lord.
hil: And direct your desires towards your Lord.
compare: And direct your desires towards your Lord.

src: So ruft Ihn an, (wobei ihr) Ihm gegenüber aufrichtig in der Religion (seid).
ref: Therefore pray to Him with obedience all-exclusive.
draft: So call Him, (while) being sincere to Him in religion.
hil: "So call Him, while being sincere to Him in religion."
compare: So call Him, (while) being sincere to Him in religion.

src: Aber viele von ihnen waren Frevler.
ref: But many of them are wicked.
draft: But many of them were sinners.
hil: "But many of them were sinners."
compare: But many of them were sinners.

src: Eine Gruppe von meinen Dienern pflegte zu sagen: >Unser Herr, wir glauben, so vergib uns und erbarme dich unser.
ref: There was a section among My creatures that said: 'O Lord, we believe.
draft: A group of my servants used to say: "Our Lord, we believe, so forgive us and have mercy on us."
hil: A group among my bondmen used to say: 'Our Lord! We have accepted faith, therefore forgive us, and have mercy on us. Indeed, You are the Best Among The Merciful.'
compare: A group of my servants used to say: "Our Lord, we believe, so forgive us and have mercy on us."

src: Und wenn Wir eine Stadt verderben wollen, befehlen Wir denen, die in ihr üppig leben, (zu freveln), und sie freveln in ihr.
ref: And when We decide to destroy a town (population), We (first) send a definite order (to obey Allah and be righteous) to those among them [or We (first) increase in number those of its population] who are given the good things of this life.
draft: And if We want to destroy a city, We command the affluent (people) therein, then they commit (evil) therein.
hil: And if We want to destroy a city, We command those who live luxuriously in it (to commit evil), and they commit evil in it.
compare: And if We want to destroy a city, We command the affluent (people) therein, then they commit (evil) therein.

src: Soll die Ermahnung (ausgerechnet) auf ihn aus unserer Mitte herabgesandt worden sein?"
ref: Hath Unto him the admonition been sent down from amongst us!
draft: "Should the admonition (of all people) have been sent down on him from among us?"
hil: Should the admonition have been sent down on him from among us?
compare: "Should the admonition (of all people) have been sent down on him from among us?"

src: Gewiß, wen DU ins Feuer eintreten läßt, den hast DU bereits mit Sicherheit erniedrigt.
ref: Whom Thou causest to enter the Fire: him indeed Thou hast confounded.
draft: Certainly, whom YOU let enter the fire, YOU have already humiliated for sure.
hil: Indeed, whom YOU let enter the fire, YOU have already humiliated for sure.
compare: Certainly, whom YOU let enter the fire, YOU have already humiliated for sure.

src: Und sie sagten: "Unser HERR!
ref: And they said, “Our Lord!
draft: And they said, "Our Lord!
hil: And they said, "Our Lord!
compare: And they said, "Our Lord!

src: Sie sagten: "Wir werden seinen Vater trotz seiner Zuneigung ihm gegenüber zu überreden suchen.
ref: They said, “We will solicit him from his father.
draft: They said, "We will try to convince his father despite his affection towards him."
hil: They said, 'We will try to persuade his father despite his affection towards him.'
compare: They said, 'We will try to persuade his father despite his affection towards him.'

src: Wenn WIR wollen, lassen WIR mit ihnen die Erde versinken oder lassen WIR über ihnen Bruchteile vom Himmel fallen. Gewiß, darin ist doch eine Aya für jeden umkehrenden Diener.
ref: If We will, We can bury them into the earth or cause a part of the sky to fall on them; indeed in this is a sign for every repentant bondman.
draft: If we want, we let the earth sink with them or let fractions of the heavens fall upon them. Surely, therein is a sign for every repentant servant.
hil: If We will, We can make the earth swallow them or make fragments of the sky fall upon them. Surely, therein is a sign for every repentant servant.
compare: If we want, we let the earth sink with them or let fractions of the heavens fall upon them. Surely, therein is a sign for every repentant servant.

src: O meine Kinder, geht und erkundigt euch über Yusuf und seinen Bruder. Und gebt nicht die Hoffnung auf das Erbarmen Allahs auf.
ref: O sons, go in search of Joseph and his brother, and do not despair of the mercy of God.
draft: O my children, go and inquire about Yusuf and his brother. And do not give up hope for the mercy of Allah.
hil: "O my children, go and inquire about Yusuf and his brother. And do not give up hope for the mercy of Allah."
compare: O my children, go and inquire about Yusuf and his brother. And do not give up hope for the mercy of Allah.

src: Der Ungläubige ist ein Helfer gegen seinen Herrn.
ref: The unbeliever has always been an auxiliary against his Lord.
draft: The unbeliever is a helper against his Lord.
hil: The unbeliever is a helper against his Lord.
compare: The unbeliever is a helper against his Lord.

src: Und sollten sie gegen euch den bewaffneten Kampf aufnehmen, werden sie euch den Rücken flüchtend kehren, dann wird ihnen nicht beigestanden.
ref: And if they fight you, they will turn around and flee, then they will not be helped.
draft: And should they take up armed struggle against you, they will turn and flee, then no help will be given to them.
hil: "And if they take up arms against you, they will turn their backs and flee, then no help will be given to them."
compare: "And if they take up arms against you, they will turn their backs and flee, then no help will be given to them."

src: Und was lehrt dich wissen, was At-Tariq ist?
ref: How will you comprehend what the night star is?
draft: And what teaches you to know what At-Tariq is?
hil: And what teaches you to know what At-Tariq is?
compare: And what teaches you to know what At-Tariq is?

src: Und solltest du sie um Rechtleitung bitten, hören sie bestimmt nicht.
ref: When you call upon them for guidance, they do not hear.
draft: And if you ask them for guidance, they certainly won't listen.
hil: And if you ask them for guidance, they certainly won't listen.
compare: And if you ask them for guidance, they certainly won't listen.

src: Es wird (zu ihnen) gesagt werden: "Betretet die Tore der Hölle, ewig darin zu bleiben."
ref: "Enter the gates of Hell," they will be told, "and there abide for ever."
draft: "It will be said to them: 'Enter the gates of hell, to stay therein forever.'"
hil: They will be told: 'Enter the gates of hell, to stay therein forever.'
compare: "It will be said to them: 'Enter the gates of hell, to stay therein forever.'"

src: Und WIR erhöhten die einen von ihnen über die anderen um Stellungen, damit die einen von ihnen die anderen zu Beschäftigten nehmen. Doch die Gnade deines HERRN ist besser als das, was sie anhäufen.
ref: We have distributed among them their comforts in the life of this world, and gave high status to some over others so that they mock at each other; and the mercy of your Lord is better than all what they hoard.
draft: And WE elevated one of them over the others in ranks that he might take some of them for service. But the mercy of your Lord is better than whatever they accumulate.
hil: And WE elevated one of them over the others in ranks that he might take some of them for service. But the mercy of your Lord is better than whatever they accumulate.
compare: And WE elevated one of them over the others in ranks that he might take some of them for service. But the mercy of your Lord is better than whatever they accumulate.

src: Doch nur diejenigen, die zuhören, hören auf dich, während die Toten ALLAH erweckt. Dann werden sie zu Ihm zurückgebracht.
ref: Only they will respond who can hear. As for the dead, raised they will be by God, then to Him they will be returned.
draft: But only those who listen, listen to you while the dead are awakened by Allah. Then they will be returned to Him.
hil: "But only those who listen will listen to you, while the dead will be awakened by Allah. Then they will be returned to Him."
compare: "But only those who listen will listen to you, while the dead will be awakened by Allah. Then they will be returned to Him."

src: Und wenn ihnen gesagt wird: "Folgt dem, was ALLAH hinabsandte." Sagen sie: "Nein, sondern wir folgen dem, woran wir unsere Ahnen fanden."
ref: and when it is said to them, 'Follow what God has sent down,' they say, 'No; but we will follow such things as we found our fathers doing.' What?
draft: And when they are told, "Follow what Allah has sent down," they say, "No, we will follow what we found our forefathers upon."
hil: And if it is said to them, 'Follow what Allah has sent down,' they say, 'No, we follow what we found our forefathers upon.'
compare: And when they are told, "Follow what Allah has sent down," they say, "No, we will follow what we found our forefathers upon."

src: Und es wurde den Menschen gesagt: "Wollt ihr euch nicht versammeln,
ref: And the people were also asked to assemble.
draft: And it was said to the people, "Do you not want to gather together,
hil: And it was said to the people, "Do you not want to gather together,"
compare: And it was said to the people, "Do you not want to gather together,

src: Ihr, die den Iman bekundet habt!
ref: O People who Believe!
draft: Your, who have confessed the Imam!
hil: You who have confessed the faith!
compare: You who have confessed the faith!

src: Das Bleibende (an Lohn) von Allah ist besser für euch, wenn ihr gläubig seid. Und ich bin nicht Hüter über euch."
ref: That which is left to you by God is better, if you are true believers; yet I am not a warden over you."
draft: "The lasting reward from Allah is better for you, if you are believers. And I am not a guardian over you."
hil: The lasting reward from Allah is better for you, if you are believers. And I am not a guardian over you.
compare: "The lasting reward from Allah is better for you, if you are believers. And I am not a guardian over you."

src: (Er ist) der Erschaffer der Himmel und der Erde.
ref: The Creator of the heavens and the earth.
draft: He is the creator of the heavens and the Earth.
hil: "He is the creator of the heavens and the earth."s
compare: He is the creator of the heavens and the Earth.

src: Und Frömmigkeit besteht nicht darin, daß ihr durch die Hinterseite in die Häuser geht. Frömmigkeit besteht darin, daß man gottesfürchtig ist.
ref: Piety does not lie in entering the house through the back door, for the pious man is he who follows the straight path.
draft: And piety does not consist in entering houses through the back. Piety consists in being God-fearing.
hil: Piety is not about entering houses through the back. Piety is about being God-fearing.
compare: Piety is not about entering houses through the back. Piety is about being God-fearing.

src: Sie alle haben WIR vor den Menschen ausgezeichnet,
ref: And each one of them We favoured over all mankind.
draft: They all have distinguished US in front of people.
hil: We have distinguished all of them in front of people.
compare: We have distinguished all of them in front of people.

src: Die Vornehmen seines Volkes, die nicht glaubten, sagten: "Wir sehen in dir nur einen Menschen unseresgleichen und wir sehen, daß dir keine als jene gefolgt sind, die aller äußeren Erscheinung nach die Niedrigsten unter uns sind, noch sehen wir in euch irgendeinen Vorzug vor uns; nein, wir erachten euch für Lügner."
ref: The leaders of the people who were unbelievers, replied: "We see that you are but a man like us, and see that none among us follows you but the meanest and immature of judgement, and do not see any excellence in you above us. In fact, we think you are a liar."
draft: The nobles of his people who did not believe said: "We only see in you a person like us, and we see that none have followed you except those who, by all outward appearances, are the lowest among us. We do not see any superiority in you over us; no, we consider you a liar."
hil: The nobles of his people who did not believe said, 'We only see in you a person like us, and we see that none have followed you except those who, by all outward appearances, are the lowest among us. We do not see any superiority in you over us; no, we consider you a liar.'
compare: The nobles of his people who did not believe said: "We only see in you a person like us, and we see that none have followed you except those who, by all outward appearances, are the lowest among us. We do not see any superiority in you over us; no, we consider you a liar."

src: Und das Wort wird über sie fällig werden dafür, daß sie Unrecht taten, und da werden sie nicht reden.
ref: When the sentence will have been passed upon them for their wickedness, they will not be able to say a word.
draft: And the word will be passed against them for what they have done wrong, and then they will not speak.
hil: And the word will be executed against them for doing wrong, and then they will not speak.
compare: And the word will be executed against them for doing wrong, and then they will not speak.

src: Er steht für die Gerechtigkeit ein. Es gibt keinen Gott außer Ihm, dem Mächtigen, dem Weisen.
ref: He upholds justice there is no god except He, the Mighty, the Wise.
draft: He stands for justice. There is no God but Him, the Mighty, the Wise.
hil: He stands up for justice. There is no god but He, the Mighty, the Wise.
compare: He stands up for justice. There is no god but He, the Mighty, the Wise.

src: Und WIR machten sie zu Imamen, die zum Feuer einladen. Und am Tag der Auferstehung wird ihnen nicht beigestanden.
ref: We made them the leaders of those who call to Hell; and on the Day of Judgement they will not be helped.
draft: And WE made them as Imams who invite to the Fire. And on the Day of Resurrection, they will not be helped.
hil: And WE made them into Imams who call to the Fire. And on the Day of Resurrection, no assistance will be given to them.
compare: And WE made them as Imams who invite to the Fire. And on the Day of Resurrection, they will not be helped.

src: Er sagte: «Doch. Aber mein Herz soll Ruhe finden.»
ref: Ibrahim said, “Surely yes, why not?
draft: He said: "Yes. But my heart should find peace."
hil: "He said, 'Yes. But my heart is to find peace.'"
compare: He said: "Yes. But my heart should find peace."

src: Kinder Adams! Bereits haben WIR euch Kleidung hinabgesandt, die eure Schamteile bedeckt, auch schmückende Kleidung.
ref: O sons of Adam, We have revealed to you a dress that would both hide your nakedness and be an adornment, but the raiment of piety is best.
draft: Children of Adam! We have already sent down clothing to you that covers your private parts, as well as decorative clothing.
hil: Children of Adam! Already We have sent down clothing that covers your private parts and also decorative clothing.
compare: Children of Adam! We have already sent down clothing to you that covers your private parts, as well as decorative clothing.

src: Sie werden sagen: "(All dies ist) Allahs." Sprich: "Wieso also seid ihr verblendet?"
ref: Thereupon they will say, “Such greatness is only that of Allah”; say, “Then by what magic are you deceived?”
draft: You will say: "(All this is) Allah's." Say: "Why then are you misguided?"
hil: They will say, 'God's.' Say, 'Why then are you misguided?'
compare: You will say: "(All this is) Allah's." Say: "Why then are you misguided?"

src: Vielmehr (soll er sagen): "Seid Gottesgelehrte mit dem, was ihr gelehrt habt und mit dem, was ihr studiert habt."
ref: Rather, 'Be you masters in that you know the Book, and in that you study.'
draft: Rather (he should say): "Be scholars of God with what you have taught and with what you have studied."
hil: "Rather (he should say), \"Be scholars of God with what you have taught and with what you have studied.\""
compare: "Rather (he should say), \"Be scholars of God with what you have taught and with what you have studied.\""

src: Ich folge nur dem, was mir eingegeben wird.
ref: I only follow what is sent down to me."
draft: I only follow what is given to me.
hil: I only follow what is given to me.
compare: I only follow what is given to me.

src: Er (Moses) sagte: "lch tat es damals, als ich auf dem Irrweg war.
ref: (Moses) replied: "I did do that and I was in the wrong,
draft: He (Moses) said: "I did it back then when I was astray.
hil: He (Moses) said, 'I did it back then when I was astray.'
compare: He (Moses) said, 'I did it back then when I was astray.'

src: Sie werden mit silbernen Spangen geschmückt sein. Und ihr Herr wird sie von einem reinen Trank trinken lassen.
ref: And adorned they shall be with bracelets of silver: and their Lord shall give them drink a beverage pure.
draft: They will be adorned with silver clasps. And their master will let them drink from a pure potion.
hil: They will be adorned with silver clasps. And their master will let them drink from a pure potion.
compare: They will be adorned with silver clasps. And their master will let them drink from a pure potion.

src: Die damit rechnen, daß sie ihrem Herrn begegnen und daß sie zu Ihm zurückkehren werden.
ref: Who are conscious that they have to meet their Lord, and to Him they have to return.
draft: Those who expect to meet their Lord and to return to Him.
hil: Those who expect to meet their Lord and return to Him.
compare: Those who expect to meet their Lord and to return to Him.

src: Und diese sind die Weggenossen des Feuers. Darin werden sie ewig bleiben.
ref: They are the residents of Hell where they will live for ever.
draft: And these are the companions of the fire. Therein they will abide eternally.
hil: And those are the companions of the fire. They shall abide therein forever.
compare: And these are the companions of the fire. Therein they will abide eternally.

src: Dann verdorrt es, und du siehst es gelb werden. Dann macht Er es zu zermalmtem Zeug.
ref: Thereafter it wirhereth, and thou beholdest it turn yellow; then He maketh it chaff.
draft: Then it withers, and you see it turning yellow. Then He turns it into crushed stuff.
hil: Then it withers and you see it turn yellow. Then He turns it into crushed stuff.
compare: Then it withers, and you see it turning yellow. Then He turns it into crushed stuff.

src: Aber er wandte sich der Erde zu und folgte seiner Neigung. So ist es mit ihm wie mit einem Hund: Gehst du auf ihn los, hängt er die Zunge heraus; läßt du ihn in Ruhe, hängt er auch die Zunge heraus.
ref: if it had been Our will, We could have used these signs to exalt him, but instead he clung to the earth and followed his own desires, he was like a dog that pants whether you chase it away or leave it alone.
draft: But he turned to the earth and followed his inclination. So it is with him like with a dog: if you go after him, he sticks out his tongue; if you leave him alone, he also sticks out his tongue.
hil: But he turned to the earth and followed his inclination. So it is with him like with a dog: if you go after him, he sticks out his tongue; if you leave him alone, he also sticks out his tongue.
compare: But he turned to the earth and followed his inclination. So it is with him like with a dog: if you go after him, he sticks out his tongue; if you leave him alone, he also sticks out his tongue.

src: Und erwähne den Bruder von 'Aad, als er seine Leute in Al-ahqaf warnte, und bereits vergingen die Warner vor ihm und hinter ihm: "Dient nichts anderes als ALLAH!
ref: And remember (Hud) the brother of 'Ad, when he warned his people in Al-Ahqaf (the curved sand-hills in the southern part of Arabian Peninsula).
draft: And mention the brother of 'Aad, when he warned his people in Al-Ahqaf, and warners had already passed on before him and behind him, "Serve none but Allah!
hil: And mention the brother of 'Aad, when he warned his people in Al-Ahqaf, and the warners had already gone ahead of him and behind him, saying: 'Serve none but Allah!'
compare: And mention the brother of 'Aad, when he warned his people in Al-Ahqaf, and the warners had already gone ahead of him and behind him, saying: 'Serve none but Allah!'

src: Aber was für ihre Teilhaber ist, das erreicht Allah nicht, während das, was für Allah ist, ihre Teilhaber erreicht.
ref: So what is for their associates reaches not God; and what is for God reaches their associates.
draft: But what is for their partners, Allah does not reach, while what is for Allah, reaches their partners.
hil: "But what is for their partners, Allah does not reach, while what is for Allah, reaches their partners."
compare: But what is for their partners, Allah does not reach, while what is for Allah, reaches their partners.

src: Sag: Wenn ich ihn ersonnen haben sollte, so vermögt ihr für mich nichts gegen Allah (auszurichten). Er weiß sehr wohl, worüber ihr euch (ausgiebig) auslaßt.
ref: Say (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), “If I have fabricated it, then (I know that) you have no power to support me against Allah; He well knows the matters you are involved in; He is Sufficient as a Witness between me and you; and He only is the Oft Forgiving, the Most Merciful.”
draft: Say: "If I had invented it, you would not be able to help me against Allah. He knows best what you say about it.
hil: Say: If I should have invented it, you will not be able to do anything for me against Allah. He knows well what you are talking about.
compare: Say: If I should have invented it, you will not be able to do anything for me against Allah. He knows well what you are talking about.

src: Und Nuh rief Uns ja bereits zu - welch trefflicher Erhörer sind Wir fürwahr!
ref: Noah had verily called to Us. And how gracious was He who answered (him).
draft: And indeed, Nuh already called out to Us - what an excellent listener We truly are!
hil: And Nuh called out to Us already - how excellent a listener We truly are!
compare: And Nuh called out to Us already - how excellent a listener We truly are!

src: Und gib denen frohe Botschaft, die Gutes tun.
ref: So give glad tidings to those who are doers of good.
draft: And give glad tidings to those who do good.
hil: Give glad tidings to those who do good.
compare: And give glad tidings to those who do good.

src: ALLAH wird ihnen gewiß vergelten Besseres als das, wie sie handelten, und wird ihnen noch mehr von Seiner Gunst geben. Und ALLAH gewährt Rizq, wem ER will, ohne Berechnung.
ref: That God may reward them for the best of their deeds, and bestow more on them of His bounty, for God gives whom He please without measure.
draft: "ALLAH will certainly reward them with better than what they did, and will grant them even more of His favor. And ALLAH provides Rizq (sustenance) to whoever He wills, without limit."
hil: Verily, ALLAH shall reward them with better than what they deserve, according to their deeds, and shall grant them even more of His grace and favour. And ALLAH provides sustenance to whomever He wills, without limit.
compare: "ALLAH will certainly reward them with better than what they did, and will grant them even more of His favor. And ALLAH provides Rizq (sustenance) to whoever He wills, without limit."

src: Er macht sie deutlich für Leute, die Bescheid wissen.
ref: He manifesteth them for people who have knowledge.
draft: He makes it clear for people who know.
hil: He makes them clear to people who know.
compare: He makes them clear to people who know.

src: Dann vertauschten es diejenigen, die Unrecht taten, mit einem Ausspruch, der anders war als das, was ihnen gesagt worden war. Da sandten Wir über diejenigen, die Unrecht taten, ein Zorngericht vom Himmel herab dafür, daß sie frevelten.
ref: But the wicked changed and perverted the word We had spoken to a word distorted, and We sent from heaven retribution on the wicked, for they disobeyed.
draft: Then those who did wrong exchanged it for a statement other than that which had been told to them. So We sent down upon those who wronged a punishment from the sky because they were defiantly disobeying.
hil: Then those who did wrong exchanged it for a statement other than that which had been told to them. So We sent down upon those who wronged a punishment from the sky because they were defiantly disobeying.
compare: Then those who did wrong exchanged it for a statement other than that which had been told to them. So We sent down upon those who wronged a punishment from the sky because they were defiantly disobeying.

src: Und wen ALLAH abirren läßt, für den gibt es keinen Weg (zur Rechtleitung).
ref: He whom God allows to go astray has no way.
draft: And whoever Allah leads astray, for him there is no way (to guidance).
hil: And whom Allah leads astray, there is no way for him (to Guidance).
compare: And whoever Allah leads astray, for him there is no way (to guidance).

src: Sie gebieten das Rechte und verbieten das Verwerfliche, verrichten das Gebet und entrichten die Abgabe und gehorchen Allah und Seinem Gesandten.
ref: They advocate virtue, forbid evil, perform the prayers, practice charity, and obey God and His Messenger.
draft: They enjoin what is right and forbid what is reprehensible, perform prayer and pay alms, and obey Allah and His Messenger.
hil: They enjoin what is reputable and prohibit what is disreputable, perform prayer and pay alms, and obey Allah and His Messenger.
compare: They enjoin what is right and forbid what is reprehensible, perform prayer and pay alms, and obey Allah and His Messenger.

src: Die Bewohner von Medina und die arabischen Beduinen in ihrer Umgebung dürfen nicht hinter dem Gesandten Gottes zurückbleiben und sich selbst ihm vorziehen. Dies, weil sie weder auf dem Weg Gottes Durst oder Mühsal oder Hunger erleiden noch einen Schritt unternehmen, der die Ungläubigen in Groll versetzt, noch einem Feind etwas zufügen, ohne daß dadurch ein gutes Werk für sie aufgezeichnet würde.
ref: It was not worthy of the people of Madina, and the Arabs of the desert around them, to abandon the Prophet of God, and to care more for themselves than for him; for there is no hardship or thirst or hunger that they know in the service of God, and no place they walk on where walking provokes the unbelievers, and no harm they receive from the enemy, but is put down as a good deed in their favour.
draft: The residents of Medina and the Arab Bedouins in their surroundings should not lag behind the Messenger of God and prefer themselves over him. This is because they suffer neither thirst, nor hardship, nor hunger in the way of God, nor take a step that would provoke the unbelievers to anger, nor inflict harm on an enemy without it being recorded as a good deed for them.
hil: The people of Medinah and the villages around them should not stay behind the Messenger of Allah and consider their lives dearer than his; this is because they do not suffer thirst, pain, or hunger in Allah's cause, nor take a step that angers the disbelievers, nor harm an enemy without a good deed being recorded for them in lieu of all of these. Indeed, Allah does not waste the wages of the virtuous.
compare: The residents of Medina and the Arab Bedouins in their surroundings should not lag behind the Messenger of God and prefer themselves over him. This is because they suffer neither thirst, nor hardship, nor hunger in the way of God, nor take a step that would provoke the unbelievers to anger, nor inflict harm on an enemy without it being recorded as a good deed for them.

src: Gewiß, ALLAH ist allkräftig, allwürdig.
ref: Verily God is all-powerful and all-mighty.
draft: Certainly, ALLAH is almighty, worthy of all honor.
hil: Indeed, ALLAH is almighty, worthy of all honor.
compare: Certainly, ALLAH is almighty, worthy of all honor.

src: Doch selbst dann, wenn sie sich mit ihrer Kleidung verhüllen, ER kennt alles, was sie verheimlichen und was sie offenlegen.
ref: But when they cover themselves up with their garments, He knows what they hide and what they expose.
draft: But even then, when they conceal themselves with their clothing, HE knows everything they hide and everything they reveal.
hil: But behold, even when they cover themselves with their garments, He knows what they secrete and what they publish; surely He knows all the thoughts within the breasts.
compare: But behold, even when they cover themselves with their garments, He knows what they secrete and what they publish; surely He knows all the thoughts within the breasts.

src: Und das Schiff kam auf dem Güdyy zur Rast.
ref: The Ark came to rest on Mount Judi.
draft: And the ship came to rest on the Güdyy.
hil: And the ship came to rest on the Güdyy.
compare: And the ship came to rest on the Güdyy.

src: Und rufe neben Allah keinen anderen Gott an. Es gibt keinen Gott außer Ihm.
ref: And call not upon another god with God; there is no god but He.
draft: And call upon no other god beside Allah. There is no god but Him.
hil: And call upon no god beside Allah. There is no god but Him.
compare: And call upon no other god beside Allah. There is no god but Him.

src: Sag: "Diejenigen in den Himmeln und auf Erden kennen das Verborgene nicht, nur ALLAH (kennt es)!" Und sie merken nicht, wann sie erweckt werden.
ref: Say: "No one in the heavens and the earth has knowledge of the unknown except God, nor can they know when they will be raised again.
draft: Say: "Those in the heavens and on earth do not know the unseen, except Allah (knows it)!" And they do not perceive when they will be resurrected.
hil: Say: 'Those in the heavens and on earth do not know the unseen, except Allah (knows it)!' And they do not know when they will be resurrected.
compare: Say: "Those in the heavens and on earth do not know the unseen, except Allah (knows it)!" And they do not perceive when they will be resurrected.

src: Oder sagen sie etwa: "Er hat ihn sich selbst ausgedacht'"? Nein!
ref: What! They say, “He has invented the Qur'an”?
draft: Or do they say: "He made it up himself"? No!
hil: "Or do they say, \"He made it up himself?\" No!"
compare: "Or do they say, \"He made it up himself?\" No!"

src: Gewiß, ALLAH ändert nichts von dem worin Menschen sind, bis sie das ändern, was sie in sich tragen. Und wenn ALLAH für Menschen Übel bestimmt, so kann es nicht aufgehalten werden.
ref: Lo! Allah changeth not the condition of a folk until they (first) change that which is in their hearts; and if Allah willeth misfortune for a folk there is none that can repel it, nor have they a defender beside Him.
draft: Certainly, Allah does not change anything in what people are in, until they change what they carry within themselves. And if Allah determines evil for people, it cannot be stopped.
hil: Certainly, Allah does not change anything in what people are in, until they change what they carry within themselves. And if Allah determines evil for people, it cannot be stopped.
compare: Certainly, Allah does not change anything in what people are in, until they change what they carry within themselves. And if Allah determines evil for people, it cannot be stopped.

src: Und unter ihnen ist eine Gruppe, die mit ihren Zungen die Schrift verdrehen, damit ihr denkt, dies gehöre zur Schrift, obwohl es nicht zur Schrift gehört, noch dazu sagen sie: "Es sei von ALLAH", doch es ist nicht von ALLAH. Und sie verbreiten Lügen im Namen ALLAHs, während sie es wissen.
ref: Among them is a section which distorts in reading the Scripture in a way that though it sounds like the Scripture, in fact it is not; yet they say it is from God, when they know it is not; and they lie about God, and knowingly.
draft: And among them is a group that distorts the scripture with their tongues so you may think it is from the scripture, but it is not from the scripture. And they say, "It is from Allah," but it is not from Allah. And they speak untruth about Allah while they know.
hil: And among them is a group that twists the scripture with their tongues so that you may think it belongs to the scripture, but it does not belong to the scripture. Moreover, they say, 'It is from Allah,' but it is not from Allah. And they spread lies in the name of Allah, while they know it.
compare: And among them is a group that distorts the scripture with their tongues so you may think it is from the scripture, but it is not from the scripture. And they say, "It is from Allah," but it is not from Allah. And they speak untruth about Allah while they know.

src: Und haltet sie an; denn sie sollen befragt werden."
ref: And detain them, for they will be questioned."
draft: "And stop them, for they are to be questioned."
hil: And detain them, for they are to be questioned.
compare: And detain them, for they are to be questioned.

src: Und ER ist mit euch, wo ihr seid.
ref: And He is with you (by His Knowledge) wheresoever you may be.
draft: And HE is with you, wherever you are.
hil: And it is with you, wherever you are.
compare: And HE is with you, wherever you are.

src: Vielmehr ist Allah euer Schutzherr; und Er ist der beste Helfer.
ref: Allah is your Patron and He is the best of the helpers.
draft: Rather, Allah is your protector; and He is the best helper.
hil: Rather, Allah is your protector; and He is the best helper.
compare: Rather, Allah is your protector; and He is the best helper.

src: Fürwahr, ungläubig sind diejenigen, die sagen: "Gewiß, Allah ist einer von dreien."
ref: They are unbelievers who say, 'God is the Third of Three.
draft: Truly, those who say, "Verily, Allah is one of three (in a Trinity)" are unbelievers.
hil: Indeed, those who say, 'Verily, Allah is one of three (in a Trinity)' are unbelievers.
compare: Truly, those who say, "Verily, Allah is one of three (in a Trinity)" are unbelievers.

src: Und (Wir sandten) zu Madyan ihren Bruder Shuayb. Er sagte: «O mein Volk, dienet Gott. Ihr habt keinen Gott außer Ihm. Ein deutliches Zeichen ist von eurem Herrn zu euch gekommen, so gebt volles Maß und Gewicht und zieht den Menschen nichts ab, was ihnen gehört, und stiftet nicht Unheil auf der Erde, nachdem sie in Ordnung gebracht worden ist. Das ist bestimmt besser für euch, so ihr gläubig seid.
ref: And We sent Shuaib to Madyan from their community; he said, “O my people! Worship Allah – you do not have any God except Him; indeed a clear proof has come to you from your Lord, so measure and weigh in full and do not give the people their goods diminished, and do not spread turmoil in the earth after it is organised; this is for your good, if you believe.”
draft: And (We sent) to Midian their brother Shuayb. He said: "O my people, worship God. You have no god but Him. A clear sign has come to you from your Lord, so give full measure and weight and do not withhold from people what is rightfully theirs, and do not spread corruption on earth after it has been put right. This is better for you, if you believe.
hil: And to Madyan We sent their brother Shuayb. He said: 'O my people, worship God. You have no god but Him. A clear sign has come to you from your Lord, so give full measure and weight and do not withhold from people what is rightfully theirs, and do not spread corruption on earth after it has been put right. This is certainly better for you, if you have faith.'
compare: And (We sent) to Midian their brother Shuayb. He said: "O my people, worship God. You have no god but Him. A clear sign has come to you from your Lord, so give full measure and weight and do not withhold from people what is rightfully theirs, and do not spread corruption on earth after it has been put right. This is better for you, if you believe.

src: Seine Blütenstände sind so, als wären sie Köpfe der Satane.
ref: Its spathes are like the prickly pear.
draft: His inflorescences are like the heads of Satan.
hil: His inflorescences are like the heads of Satan.
compare: His inflorescences are like the heads of Satan.

src: (Geht also) mit unseren Zeichen. Ihr und diejenigen, die euch folgen, werden die Sieger sein.»
ref: By virtue of Our signs, you and those who follow you will be the triumphant.”
draft: "So it goes" with our signs. You and those who follow you will be the winners.»
hil: So (go) with our signs. You and those who follow you shall be the victors.
compare: So (go) with our signs. You and those who follow you shall be the victors.

src: Und Sulaiman beerbte Dawud.
ref: And Sulaiman (Solomon) inherited (the knowledge of) Dawud (David).
draft: And Sulaiman succeeded Dawud.
hil: And Sulaiman succeeded David.
compare: And Sulaiman succeeded David.

src: Kein Anderer als der Allerbarmer hält sie zurück.
ref: Nothing holds them aloft but God.
draft: No one but the Most Merciful holds them back.
hil: No one but the Most Merciful holds them back.
compare: No one but the Most Merciful holds them back.

src: So vergelten Wir den Ungerechten.
ref: That is how We requite the iniquitous.
draft: So we repay the unjust.
hil: "Thus do We recompense the wrongdoers."
compare: "Thus do We recompense the wrongdoers."

src: Und Mein Fluch soll auf dir bis zum Tage des Gerichts lasten."
ref: Upon you will be My damnation till the Day of Doom."
draft: "And my curse shall rest upon you until the day of judgment."
hil: And my curse shall rest upon you until the Day of Judgment.
compare: "And my curse shall rest upon you until the day of judgment."

src: Entsinnt euch Meiner Gaben, die ICH euch gewährt habe, und daß ICH euch den Menschen gegenüber auszeichnete.
ref: Remember the favour of Mine, which I bestowed upon you and gave you superiority over others of your time. (by sending the Noble Messengers to your nation)
draft: Remember my gifts that I have granted to you, and that I have distinguished you from other humans.
hil: Remember my gifts that I have granted to you, and that I have distinguished you from other humans.
compare: Remember my gifts that I have granted to you, and that I have distinguished you from other humans.

src: Sprich: "Er ist es, Der euch ins Dasein rief und Der euch Ohren und Augen und Herzen gab; (aber) gering ist es, was ihr an Dank wißt!"
ref: Say: "It is He who raised you and gave you ears and eyes and hearts. How little are the thanks you offer!"
draft: Say: "It is He who called you into being and gave you ears, eyes, and hearts; yet, little do you give thanks."
hil: Say, 'It is He who called you into being and gave you ears, eyes, and hearts; yet, little do you give thanks.'
compare: Say: "It is He who called you into being and gave you ears, eyes, and hearts; yet, little do you give thanks."

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Wenn ihr zum rituellen Gebet aufstehen wollt, dann wascht (vorher) eure Gesichter, eure Hände und Arme bis zu den Ellenbogen, benetzt eure Köpfe und (wascht) eure Füße bis zu den Knöcheln.
ref: O believers, when you stand up for the service of prayer wash your faces and hands up to elbows, and also wipe your heads, and wash your feet up to the ankles.
draft: You, who have internalized the imam! If you want to stand up for ritual prayer, then wash your faces, your hands, and arms up to the elbows beforehand, wet your heads, and wash your feet up to the ankles.
hil: You who have internalized the imam! If you wish to stand up for prayer, wash your faces, hands and arms up to the elbows beforehand, wipe over your heads and wash your feet up to the ankles.
compare: You, who have internalized the imam! If you want to stand up for ritual prayer, then wash your faces, your hands, and arms up to the elbows beforehand, wet your heads, and wash your feet up to the ankles.

src: Dies (geschieht), weil sie dem folgten, was Allah erzürnte, und das haßten, was ihm wohlgefällig war. So macht Er ihre Werke zunichte.
ref: This is because they followed the matter which displeases Allah, and they disliked what pleases Him – He therefore squandered away all their deeds.
draft: This happens because they followed what angered Allah and hated what was pleasing to Him. Thus, He destroys their deeds.
hil: This occurs because they follow what angers Allah and hate what pleases Him. Thus, He nullifies their deeds.
compare: This happens because they followed what angered Allah and hated what was pleasing to Him. Thus, He destroys their deeds.

src: Und sag: "Die Wahrheit ist von eurem HERRN. Wer will, der soll den Iman verinnerlichen, und wer will, der soll Kufr betreiben."
ref: Say: "The truth is from your Lord: So believe if you like, or do not believe if you will."
draft: And say: "The truth is from your Lord. Whoever wants to internalize faith may do so, and whoever wants to commit unbelief may do so."
hil: And say, 'The truth is from your Lord.' Whoever wants to internalize faith may do so, and whoever wants to commit unbelief may do so.
compare: And say: "The truth is from your Lord. Whoever wants to internalize faith may do so, and whoever wants to commit unbelief may do so."

src: ALLAH gehört, was in den Himmeln und auf Erden ist. Gewiß, ALLAH ist Der absolut Autarke, Der Alllobenswürdige.
ref: To Allah only belongs whatsoever is in the heavens and in the earth; indeed Allah only is the Absolute, the Most Praiseworthy.
draft: ALLAH owns everything that is in the heavens and on earth. Surely, ALLAH is the absolutely self-sufficient, the Praised.
hil: Allah owns everything in the heavens and on earth. Indeed, Allah is the absolutely self-sufficient, the Praised.
compare: ALLAH owns everything that is in the heavens and on earth. Surely, ALLAH is the absolutely self-sufficient, the Praised.

src: Und WIR ließen darin einen Fluß entspringen.
ref: And We made a river flow through them.
draft: And therein WE let a river spring forth.
hil: And WE made a river spring forth therein.
compare: And WE made a river spring forth therein.

src: Das, was Gott für euch an Lebensunterhalt herabgesandt hat und was ihr in Verbotenes und Erlaubtes eingeteilt habt, - sprich: Hat Gott es euch erlaubt, oder erdichtet ihr etwas gegen Gott?
ref: And you have made of it lawful and unlawful." Say (O Muhammad SAW): "Has Allah permitted you (to do so), or do you invent a lie against Allah?"
draft: What God has sent down to you as a livelihood and what you have divided into forbidden and permissible - say: Has God allowed it to you or are you inventing something against God?
hil: That which God has sent down to you as livelihood and which you have divided into forbidden and permissible - say: Has God given you permission, or are you inventing something against God?
compare: That which God has sent down to you as livelihood and which you have divided into forbidden and permissible - say: Has God given you permission, or are you inventing something against God?

src: Und jeder Seele wird in vollem Maß zukommen, was sie getan hat. Er weiß sehr wohl Bescheid über das, was sie tun.
ref: And every soul will be repaid for its deeds in full, and He knows very well what they used to do.
draft: And every soul will receive in full measure what it has done. He is well aware of what they do.
hil: And each soul will be fully recompensed for what it has done, He is well informed of what they do.
compare: And every soul will receive in full measure what it has done. He is well aware of what they do.

src: Diejenigen nun, die gottergeben sind, bemühen sich um den rechten Wandel.
ref: Those who have submitted have taken the right course;
draft: Those who are devoted to God strive for the right way of life.
hil: Those who are devoted to God strive for the right way of life.
compare: Those who are devoted to God strive for the right way of life.

src: Und viel Beute, die sie nehmen würden.
ref: And the many spoils that they were to take.
draft: And a lot of loot they would take.
hil: And a lot of loot they would take.
compare: And a lot of loot they would take.

src: ALLAH richtet zwischen euch am Tag der Auferstehung in dem, worüber ihr uneins zu sein pflegtet."
ref: God will judge between you on the Day of Judgement in what you are at variance."
draft: "ALLAH will judge between you on the Day of Resurrection concerning that over which you used to differ."
hil: "ALLAH will judge between you on the Day of Resurrection concerning that over which you used to differ."
compare: "ALLAH will judge between you on the Day of Resurrection concerning that over which you used to differ."

src: Nein! Vielmehr ist die Stunde (des Gerichts) der ihnen versprochene Zeitpunkt. Und die Stunde ist noch schrecklicher und bitterer.
ref: Surely the Hour will be the moment of their promise, and that moment will be calamitous and distressing.
draft: No! Rather, the hour (of judgement) is the promised time for them. And the hour is even more terrible and bitter.
hil: Rather, the Hour is their encounter. And the Hour is even more terrible and bitter.
compare: No! Rather, the hour (of judgement) is the promised time for them. And the hour is even more terrible and bitter.

src: angelehnt darin auf Liegen.
ref: [They will be] reclining therein on adorned couches.
draft: Based on that, lying on loungers.
hil: adorned with gold bracelets and arrayed in silk, and brocade, reclining therein on couches.
compare: Based on that, lying on loungers.

src: Für diejenigen, die Gutes tun, gibt es hier im Diesseits Gutes.
ref: For those who do good in this world, is goodness.
draft: For those who do good, there is good in this world.
hil: There is good in this world for those who do good.
compare: For those who do good, there is good in this world.

src: Dann sprachen Wir: "Geht beide zum Volk, das Unsere Zeichen verworfen hat": dann zerstörten Wir sie alle vollständig.
ref: Then We told them: "Go to the people who have rejected Our signs." Then We annihilated them completely.
draft: Then we said: "Go both to the people who have rejected Our signs": then We destroyed all of them completely.
hil: Then We said, "Go both to the people who have rejected Our signs," then We destroyed all of them completely.
compare: Then we said: "Go both to the people who have rejected Our signs": then We destroyed all of them completely.

src: Doch wenn ihr in Furcht seid, dann betet zu Fuß oder im Reiten. Und wenn ihr in Sicherheit seid, gedenkt Allahs, wie Er euch das gelehrt hat, was ihr nicht wußtet.
ref: If you fear (war or danger), pray while standing or on horseback; but when you have safety again remember God, for He taught you what you did not know.
draft: But if you are afraid, then pray on foot or while riding. And when you are secure, remember Allah as He taught you that which you did not know.
hil: If you are afraid, then pray on foot or while riding. And if you are in safety, remember Allah as He has taught you what you did not know.
compare: If you are afraid, then pray on foot or while riding. And if you are in safety, remember Allah as He has taught you what you did not know.

src: Acht Paare: zwei von den Schafen und zwei von den Ziegen.
ref: There are eight pairs, two of the species of sheep and two of goats.
draft: Eight pairs: two from the sheep and two from the goats.
hil: Eight pairs: two from the sheep and two from the goats.
compare: Eight pairs: two from the sheep and two from the goats.

src: Und Wir haben Mose das Buch zukommen lassen.
ref: And indeed We gave Musa (Moses) the Scripture [the Taurat (Torah)].
draft: And We have sent the book to Moses.
hil: "And We have indeed sent the book to Moses."
compare: "And We have indeed sent the book to Moses."

src: Und es werden sie dort ewig junge Knaben bedienen. Wenn du sie siehst, hältst du sie für verstreute Perlen.
ref: Immortal youths shall surround them, waiting upon them; when you see them, you would think they are scattered pearls.
draft: And there will be forever young boys serving them there. When you see them, you think they are scattered pearls.
hil: And boys of everlasting youth will go about attending them there. Looking at them you would think that they were pearls dispersed.
compare: And there will be forever young boys serving them there. When you see them, you think they are scattered pearls.

src: Doch, mit Sicherheit! Gewiß, sein HERR war über ihn allsehend.
ref: Yes indeed; his Lord had sight of him.
draft: Yes, definitely! Indeed, his LORD was all-seeing over him.
hil: "For sure! Indeed, his LORD was all-seeing over him."
compare: Yes, definitely! Indeed, his LORD was all-seeing over him.

src: Und WIR ließen diejenigen Leute, die unterdrückt wurden, erben das Östliche und das Westliche des Landes, das WIR mit Baraka erfüllt haben. Und das gute Versprechen deines HERRN für die Kinder Israils wurde vollständig eingelöst als Belohnung für die Geduld, die sie aufbrachten. Und WIR vernichteten das, was Pharao und seine Leute bewerkstelligten, und das, was sie an Bauten errichteten.
ref: And We made the people who were oppressed, the inheritors of the eastern and western parts of the land in which We placed blessings; and the good promise of your Lord was fulfilled for the Descendants of Israel – the reward of their patience; and We destroyed whatever Firaun and his people built and whatever they had contrived.
draft: And WE caused those people who were oppressed to inherit the Eastern and Western parts of the land which WE have blessed with goodness. And the good promise of your LORD to the Children of Israel was fulfilled because of their patience. And WE destroyed all that Pharaoh and his people had built and created.
hil: And We made those people who were oppressed inherit the eastern and western parts of the land which We have blessed with barakah. And the good promise of your Lord to the Children of Israel was completely fulfilled as a reward for the patience they showed. And We destroyed the achievements of Pharaoh and his people, and what they erected of buildings.
compare: And WE caused those people who were oppressed to inherit the Eastern and Western parts of the land which WE have blessed with goodness. And the good promise of your LORD to the Children of Israel was fulfilled because of their patience. And WE destroyed all that Pharaoh and his people had built and created.

src: Auch haben sie eine Schuldklage gegen mich erhoben, deshalb fürchte ich, daß sie mich umbringen."
ref: And they have a charge (of murder) against me. So I fear that they will kill me."
draft: Also, they have filed a lawsuit against me, so I fear that they will kill me.
hil: They have also raised a charge of guilt against me, so I fear that they will kill me.
compare: They have also raised a charge of guilt against me, so I fear that they will kill me.

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Nehmt diejenigen, die euren Din zum Spott und zur Belustigung mißbrauchen von denjenigen, denen die Schrift vor euch zuteil wurde, und von den Kafir, nicht als Wali!
ref: O ye who believe! take not as friends those who make a mockery and fun of your religion from among those who have been vouchsafed the Book before you and other infidels.
draft: You, who have internalized the Imam! Do not take those who misuse your Din with mockery and amusement from those to whom the scripture was bestowed before you and from the unbelievers, not as Wali!
hil: You who have internalized the iman! Do not take those who make a mockery of your faith from those to whom the scripture was bestowed before you, and from the unbelievers, not as protectors!
compare: You who have internalized the iman! Do not take those who make a mockery of your faith from those to whom the scripture was bestowed before you, and from the unbelievers, not as protectors!

src: Nimm Almosen von ihrem Besitz, auf daß du sie dadurch reinigen und läutern mögest.
ref: Accept the offerings they make from their wealth in order to cleanse and purify them for progress, and invoke blessings upon them.
draft: Take alms from their possessions, so that you may purify and cleanse them.
hil: Take alms from their possessions, so that you may thereby purify and sanctify them.
compare: Take alms from their possessions, so that you may thereby purify and sanctify them.

src: So gewähre den Ungläubigen noch eine Frist.
ref: So give a respite to the disbelievers.
draft: So grant the unbelievers a respite.
hil: Grant the unbelievers a respite.
compare: So grant the unbelievers a respite.

src: Sie folgen einem bloßen Wahn und ihren persönlichen Neigungen, obwohl doch die Weisung ihres Herrn zu ihnen kam.
ref: They only follow conjecture and wish-fulfilment, even though guidance had come to them already from their Lord.
draft: They are following a mere delusion and their personal inclinations, even though the instruction of their Lord has come to them.
hil: They follow a mere delusion and their personal inclinations, even though the instruction of their Lord has come to them.
compare: They are following a mere delusion and their personal inclinations, even though the instruction of their Lord has come to them.

src: ER sagte: "Das von Mir Versprochene umfaßt nicht die Unrecht-Begehenden."
ref: He said 'My covenant shall not reach the evildoers.'
draft: He said: "What I promised does not include those who commit wrongdoing."
hil: He said, 'What I promised does not include those who commit wrongdoing.'
compare: He said: "What I promised does not include those who commit wrongdoing."

src: Das Wasser nahm ab, und die Angelegenheit war entschieden. Es hielt auf dem Djudi an.
ref: And the water was diminished (made to subside) and the Decree (of Allah) was fulfilled (i.e. the destruction of the people of Nuh (Noah).
draft: The water receded, and the matter was decided. It stopped at the Djudi.
hil: The water receded, and the matter was decided. It stopped at the Djudi.
compare: The water receded, and the matter was decided. It stopped at the Djudi.

src: Doch WIR sehen mit euch nicht eure Fürbittenden, die ihr unter euch als Partner (für ALLAH) angenommen habt. Gewiß, bereits ist (die Bindung) zwischen euch unterbrochen und euch ist das abhanden gekommen, was ihr angenommen habt.
ref: We do not see with you your intercessors, those you asserted to be associates in you; the bond between you is now broken; that which you ever asserted has now gone astray from you.
draft: But we do not see with you your intermediaries, that you have accepted among yourselves as partners (for Allah). Indeed, the bond between you has already been broken and what you have accepted has been lost to you.
hil: We do not see with you those whom you have taken among yourselves as partners (for Allah) as your intercessors. Indeed, the connection between you has already been interrupted and what you have accepted has been lost to you.
compare: We do not see with you those whom you have taken among yourselves as partners (for Allah) as your intercessors. Indeed, the connection between you has already been interrupted and what you have accepted has been lost to you.

src: Und hätten WIR ihnen geboten: "ihr sollt euch selbst töten oder eure Wohnstätten verlassen, würden dies nur wenige von ihnen tun." Und hätten sie doch das getan, womit sie ermahnt werden, wäre es besser für sie und würde sie noch mehr (im Iman) bestärken.
ref: If We had commanded them to lay down their lives and to go forth from their homes, only a few would have obeyed; though had they followed what they had been commanded it would surely have been good for them and the strengthening of their faith.
draft: "And if we had commanded them, "kill yourselves" or "leave your homes," only a few of them would have done it. And if they had done what they were advised, it would have been better for them and would have strengthened them in faith."
hil: "And if we had commanded them, "kill yourselves" or "leave your homes," only a few of them would have done it. And if they had done what they were advised, it would have been better for them and would have strengthened them in faith."
compare: "And if we had commanded them, "kill yourselves" or "leave your homes," only a few of them would have done it. And if they had done what they were advised, it would have been better for them and would have strengthened them in faith."

src: Und (denke daran,) wenn sie (dereinst) im (Höllen)feuer miteinander streiten, dann sagen die Schwachen zu denjenigen, die sich hochmütig verhielten: "Wir waren doch eure Gefolgsleute; könnt ihr uns nun einen Teil des (Höllen)feuers abnehmen?"
ref: As they will noisily argue in the Fire, the weaker ones will say to the arrogant: "We were your followers, so will you take over some of our share of the fire?"
draft: And (remember,) when they are (eventually) disputing with each other in the (hell)fire, then the weak ones say to those who behaved arrogantly: "We were your followers, can you take off a part of the (hell)fire from us now?"
hil: And (remember,) when they are (eventually) disputing with each other in the (Hell)fire, then the weak ones say to those who behaved arrogantly: "We were your followers, can you take off a part of the (Hell)fire from us now?"
compare: And (remember,) when they are (eventually) disputing with each other in the (Hell)fire, then the weak ones say to those who behaved arrogantly: "We were your followers, can you take off a part of the (Hell)fire from us now?"

src: Wenn ihr ALLAH (Seiner Sache) eine Hasan-Anleihe gebt, wird ER euch vervielfachen und euch vergeben.
ref: If you lend a goodly loan to God, He will double it for you, and forgive you.
draft: If you give Allah (His Cause) a Hasan loan, He will multiply you and forgive you.
hil: If you give Allah a good loan, He will multiply you and forgive you.
compare: If you give Allah a good loan, He will multiply you and forgive you.

src: Und erwähne in der Schrift Isma'il!
ref: Commemorate Ishmael in the Book.
draft: And mention Ishmael in the scripture!
hil: And mention Ishmael in the scripture!
compare: And mention Ishmael in the scripture!

src: Da wandte Er sich euch wieder gnädig zu.
ref: Then He accepted your repentance.
draft: He turned to you again with grace.
hil: At that time He turned to you with grace.
compare: He turned to you again with grace.

src: Erhaben ist Allah, der König, der Wahre!
ref: So high exalted be God, the true King!
draft: Exalted is Allah, the King, the True!
hil: "Exalted is God; there is no god but Him. He is the King, the Real."
compare: Exalted is Allah, the King, the True!

src: Er (Fir'aun) sagte: "Ihr glaubt an ihn, bevor ich es euch erlaube?
ref: (The Pharaoh) said: "You have come to believe without my dispensation.
draft: He (Pharaoh) said: "You believe in him (Moses) before I allow you?
hil: He (Pharaoh) said, 'You believe in him (Moses) before I allow you?'
compare: He (Pharaoh) said: "You believe in him (Moses) before I allow you?

src: Dann warf Moses seinen Stock hin, und siehe, er verschlang (all) das, was sie vorgetäuscht hatten.
ref: Then Moses threw down his staff, and lo, it swallowed up their conjurations.
draft: Then Moses threw his staff and behold, it devoured all that which they had falsely conjured.
hil: Then Moses threw his staff and behold, it devoured all that which they had falsely conjured.
compare: Then Moses threw his staff and behold, it devoured all that which they had falsely conjured.

src: Und sie haben Gott Teilhaber gegeben: die Djinn, wo Er sie doch erschaffen hat. Und sie haben Ihm Söhne und Töchter angedichtet, ohne (richtiges) Wissen.
ref: Yet they ascribe to jinns a partnership with God, although He created them; and they ascribe to Him sons and daughters, without possessing any knowledge.
draft: And they have made Allah a partner to the jinn, while He created them, and they have falsely attributed to Him sons and daughters, without knowledge.
hil: And they have made Allah a partner to the jinn, while He created them, and they have even dared, in their ignorance, to invent sons and daughters for Him without any knowledge.
compare: And they have made Allah a partner to the jinn, while He created them, and they have even dared, in their ignorance, to invent sons and daughters for Him without any knowledge.

src: Sag: "ALLAH genügt als Zeuge zwischen mir und euch!
ref: Say: "Sufficient is Allah for a witness between me and you.
draft: Say: "Allah suffices as a witness between me and you!"
hil: "Say: Allah suffices as a witness between me and you!"
compare: Say: "Allah suffices as a witness between me and you!"

src: Sondern nur, wenn einer mit einem gesunden Herzen zu Gott kommt.»
ref: But to him who comes to God with a tranquil heart."
draft: But only if one comes to God with a healthy heart.
hil: "But only if one comes to God with a healthy heart."
compare: But only if one comes to God with a healthy heart.

src: Sie sagten: "Wir vermissen den Kelch des Königs.
ref: "We cannot find the master's goblet.
draft: They said, "We miss the King's chalice."
hil: They said, "We miss the King's chalice."
compare: They said, "We miss the King's chalice."

src: Für alle sind Rangstufen bestimmt für das, was sie getan haben, und dies, damit Er ihnen ihre Taten voll erstatte. Und ihnen wird nicht Unrecht getan.
ref: Each will have a position in accordance with his deeds; and no wrong will be done to them.
draft: For everyone, there are ranks determined for what they have done, and this so that He may fully compensate them for their actions. And they do not suffer injustice.
hil: For every one there are ranks according to his deeds, so that He may fully compensate them. They will not be wronged.
compare: For everyone, there are ranks determined for what they have done, and this so that He may fully compensate them for their actions. And they do not suffer injustice.

src: Und Wir machen damit (manch) totes Land wieder lebendig; so wird auch das Herauskommen (erfolgen).
ref: And We give life therewith to a dead land. Thus will be the resurrection (of the dead).
draft: And we make (some) dead land come back to life with it; thus the coming out (will happen) as well.
hil: And if We will it, we can bring some dead land back to life, thus the coming out (will happen) as well.
compare: And if We will it, we can bring some dead land back to life, thus the coming out (will happen) as well.

src: (Es sind) diejenigen, wenn WIR sie im Lande festigen, dann verrichten sie ordnungsgemäß das rituelle Gebet, entrichten die Zakat, rufen zum Gebilligten auf und raten vomMißbilligten ab. Und ALLAH gehört das Anschließende von den Angelegenheiten.
ref: The people who, if We give them control in the land, would keep the prayer established and pay charity and enjoin virtue and forbid from evil; and for Allah only is the result of all works.
draft: (These are) those, when WE establish them in the land, they perform the ritual prayer properly, pay the Zakat, enjoin the Good and forbid the Evil. And Allah is the end of all things.
hil: Those are the ones when WE establish them in the land, they perform the prayer, pay the Zakat, enjoin the right, and forbid the wrong. And Allah is the end of all things.
compare: Those are the ones when WE establish them in the land, they perform the prayer, pay the Zakat, enjoin the right, and forbid the wrong. And Allah is the end of all things.

src: ER ist Derjenige, Der euch aus Erde erschuf, dann aus Nutfa, dann aus 'Alaqa, dann bringt ER euch als Kind heraus, dann damit ihr reif werdet, dann damit ihr Alte werdet - und von euch gibt es manche, deren (Seelen) vorher eingezogen werden - und damit ihr eine festgelegte Frist erreicht. Und damit ihr begreift.
ref: It is He who created you from dust, then a drop of semen, then the embryo; afterwards He brings you forth as a child; then you attain the age of manhood, and then reach old age. But some of you die before you reach the appointed term that you may haply understand.
draft: HE is the One who created you from the earth, then from a sperm-drop, then from a clinging clot, then He brings you out as a child; then [He develops you] that you reach your [time of] maturity, then [He lets you continue] to reach your thirties. That is when you also get gray hair. And some of you may pass away early, while others may reach their appointed term, so that you may [better] understand.
hil: HE is the One who created you from the earth, then from a sperm-drop, then from a clinging clot, then He brings you out as a child; then [He develops you] that you reach your [time of] maturity, then [He lets you continue] to become old – and among you are those whose souls are taken beforehand – and [He does all this] so that you may reach an appointed time. And [He did all this] so that you may understand.
compare: HE is the One who created you from the earth, then from a sperm-drop, then from a clinging clot, then He brings you out as a child; then [He develops you] that you reach your [time of] maturity, then [He lets you continue] to reach your thirties.
