hil: You have done well, so enter it; therein shall you dwell forever.
compare: You have done well, so enter it; therein shall you dwell forever.

src: O ihr, die ihr glaubt, fürchtet Allah; und eine jede Seele schaue nach dem, was sie für morgen vorausschickt.
ref: O you who believe, be fearful of God. Let each soul consider what it has sent (of good deeds) in advance for the morrow, and fear God.
draft: O you who believe, fear Allah; and let every soul look to what it has put forth for tomorrow.
hil: O you who believe, fear Allah; and let each soul look to what it has put forth for tomorrow.
compare: O you who believe, fear Allah; and let every soul look to what it has put forth for tomorrow.

src: Von Pharao. Er hatte hohe Gewalt und war einer der Maßlosen.
ref: From Firaun; he was indeed proud, among the transgressors.
draft: From Pharaoh. He had great power and was one of the immoderate ones.
hil: From Pharaoh. He had great power and was one of the immoderate ones.
compare: From Pharaoh. He had great power and was one of the immoderate ones.

src: ALLAH erwählt aus den Engeln Gesandte und aus den Menschen. Gewiß, ALLAH ist allhörend, allsehend.
ref: Allah chooses the Noble Messengers from the angels, and from men; indeed Allah is All Hearing, All Seeing.
draft: ALLAH chooses messengers from the angels and from the people. Indeed, ALLAH is all-hearing, all-seeing.
hil: ALLAH chooses messengers from the angels and from the people. Indeed, Allah is all-hearing, all-seeing.
compare: ALLAH chooses messengers from the angels and from the people. Indeed, ALLAH is all-hearing, all-seeing.

src: Beide versorgen WIR, diese und diese mit den Gaben deines HERRN.
ref: To each these as well as those We bestow from the Bounties of your Lord.
draft: Both of us provide these and these with the gifts of your LORD.
hil: Both of Us provide, these and these, with the gifts of your Lord.
compare: Both of Us provide, these and these, with the gifts of your Lord.

src: Und am Morgen war (der Garten) bereits verwüstet.
ref: So by the morning it seemed as though picked clean.
draft: And in the morning, the garden was already devastated.
hil: "And in the morning, the garden was already devastated."
compare: And in the morning, the garden was already devastated.

src: Es gibt keine Gottheit außer Ihm, so richtet an Ihn Bittgebete als Aufrichtiger im Din Ihm gegenüber.
ref: There is no god but He. Therefore pray to Him with obedience all-exclusive.
draft: There is no deity except Him, so direct supplication to Him as a sincere believer in His religion.
hil: "There is no god but Him, so direct supplication to Him as a sincere believer in His religion."
compare: "There is no god but Him, so direct supplication to Him as a sincere believer in His religion."

src: Er sagte: "Mein Vater! Tu, was dir geboten wurde.
ref: Do what you are commanded!
draft: He said, "My father! Do what you have been commanded."
hil: He said, 'My father! Do what you have been commanded.'
compare: He said, "My father! Do what you have been commanded."

src: Gewiß, darin sind doch Ayat für Leute, die hören.
ref: Verily there are signs in this for those who pay heed.
draft: Certainly, there are Ayat for people who listen.
hil: Surely, in these there are signs for those who listen.
compare: Surely, in these there are signs for those who listen.

src: Die Gänge der Himmel, daß ich zum Gott des Mose emporsteige. Ich halte ihn ja für einen Lügner.» So wurde dem Pharao sein böses Tun verlockend gemacht, und er wurde vom (rechten) Weg abgewiesen. Die List Pharaos ist dem Verderben erlegen.
ref: “The routes of the heavens, in order to glance at the God of Moosa – and indeed I think he is a liar”; this is how the evil deeds of Firaun were made seeming good to him, and he was stopped from the path; and the evil scheme of Firaun was destined to be ruined.
draft: The passages of the heavens so that I ascend to the God of Moses. I consider him to be a liar. "Thus, Pharaoh's evil deeds were made alluring to him, and he was led astray from the (right) path. Pharaoh's cunning has succumbed to destruction.
hil: The passages of heaven so that I may ascend to the God of Moses, I consider him to be a liar. So, Pharaoh's evil deeds were made alluring to him, and he was led astray from the path. Pharaoh's cunning has succumbed to destruction.
compare: The passages of heaven so that I may ascend to the God of Moses, I consider him to be a liar. So, Pharaoh's evil deeds were made alluring to him, and he was led astray from the path. Pharaoh's cunning has succumbed to destruction.

src: Diejenigen, über die das Urteil gefällt wird, sagen: "Unser Herr, dies sind jene, die wir irreführten.
ref: Those about whom the Word will have come true (to be punished) will say: "Our Lord! These are they whom we led astray.
draft: Those over whom the judgment is passed say, "Our Lord, these are those whom we misled."
hil: Those over whom the judgement is passed say, 'Our Lord, these are those whom we misled.'
compare: Those over whom the judgment is passed say, "Our Lord, these are those whom we misled."

src: Sie fragen dich um Belehrung. Sag: "Allah belehrt euch über den Erbanteil seitlicher Verwandtschaft. Wenn ein Mann umkommt, der keine Kinder hat, aber eine Schwester, dann steht ihr die Hälfte dessen zu, was er hinterläßt. Und er beerbt sie, wenn sie keine Kinder hat. Und wenn es zwei (Schwestern) sind, stehen ihnen (beiden) zwei Drittel dessen zu, was er hinterläßt. Und wenn es Geschwister sind, Männer und Frauen, dann kommt einem männlichen Geschlechts ebensoviel zu wie der Anteil von zwei weiblichen Geschlechts. Allah gibt euch Klarheit, damit ihr (nicht) in die Irre geht. Allah weiß über alles Bescheid.
ref: O dear Prophet (Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), they ask you for a decree; say, “Allah decrees you concerning the solitary person (without parents or children); if a man dies childless and has a sister, for her is half the inheritance; and the man is his sister’s heir if the sister dies childless; and if there are two sisters, for them is two-thirds of the inheritance; so if there are brothers and sisters, both men and women, the male’s share is equal to that of two females; and Allah explains clearly to you, so that you do not go astray; and Allah knows all things.”
draft: They ask you for instruction. Say: "Allah instructs you about the share of inheritance for lateral relations. If a man dies and leaves no child but a sister, then she shall have half of what he leaves behind. And he inherits from her if she has no child. But if there are two [sisters or more], they shall have two-thirds of what he leaves. If there are brothers and sisters, the male shall have the share of two females. Allah makes things clear to you, lest you err. Allah has knowledge of all things."
hil: They ask you for instruction. Say: 'Allah instructs you about the share of inheritance for lateral relations. If a man dies and leaves no child but a sister, then she shall have half of what he leaves behind. And he inherits from her if she has no child. But if there are two [sisters or more], they shall have two-thirds of what he leaves. If there are brothers and sisters, the male shall have the share of two females. Allah makes things clear to you, lest you err. Allah has knowledge of all things.'
compare: They ask you for instruction. Say: "Allah instructs you about the share of inheritance for lateral relations. If a man dies and leaves no child but a sister, then she shall have half of what he leaves behind. And he inherits from her if she has no child. But if there are two [sisters or more], they shall have two-thirds of what he leaves. If there are brothers and sisters, the male shall have the share of two females. Allah makes things clear to you, lest you err. Allah has knowledge of all things."

src: O Prophet, wenn ihr euch von Frauen scheidet, dann scheidet euch von ihnen auf ihre Wartezeit hin, und berechnet die Wartezeit.
ref: O PROPHET WHEN you divorce women, divorce them at their appointed period, and calculate that period, and fear God, your Lord. Do not expel them from their houses, nor should they go away themselves, unless they are openly guilty of adultery.
draft: O Prophet, if you divorce women, divorce them for their waiting period, and calculate the waiting period.
hil: O Prophet, if you divorce women, divorce them for their waiting period, and calculate the waiting period.
compare: O Prophet, if you divorce women, divorce them for their waiting period, and calculate the waiting period.

src: Und wer von euch es sich nicht leisten kann, freie Mumin-Frauen zu heiraten, dann (heiratet er) von den Mumin-Dienerinnen, die euch gehören. Und ALLAH kennt euren Iman besser - die einen von euch sind wie die anderen.
ref: Any one of you who has not the affluence to be able to marry believing freewomen in wedlock, let him take believing handmaids that your right hands own; God knows very well your faith; the one of you is as the other.
draft: And whoever among you cannot afford to marry free Moomin women, then (let him marry) from the Mumin servant girls whom you possess. And Allah knows your faith better - some of you are like others.
hil: And whoever among you cannot afford to marry free Mumin women, then (let him marry) from the Mumin servant girls whom you possess. And God knows your faith better - some of you are like others.
compare: And whoever among you cannot afford to marry free Mumin women, then (let him marry) from the Mumin servant girls whom you possess. And God knows your faith better - some of you are like others.

src: So komme ich zu euch mit einem Zeichen von eurem Herrn.
ref: I have brought you a miracle from your Lord.
draft: So I come to you with a sign from your Lord.
hil: So I come to you with a sign from your Lord.
compare: So I come to you with a sign from your Lord.

src: Diese eilen zu den guten Dingen um die Wette und werden darin die Allerersten sein.
ref: Are the ones who hasten to goodness and outpace the others.
draft: These rush to the good things in a race and will be the very first in it.
hil: Some of them rush to the good things in a race, and by God’s leave, are in the foremost in virtues.
compare: Some of them rush to the good things in a race, and by God’s leave, are in the foremost in virtues.

src: Sag: "Habt ihr irgendein Wissen darüber, das ihr uns offenlegt?" Doch ihr folgt nur dem Spekulieren, und ihr lügt ja nur.
ref: You follow only assumptions and only make guesses.”
draft: Say: "Do you have any knowledge that you disclose to us?" But you only follow speculation, and you lie, indeed.
hil: "Say to those: 'Do you have any knowledge that you disclose to us?' But you only follow speculation, and you indeed lie."
compare: "Say to those: 'Do you have any knowledge that you disclose to us?' But you only follow speculation, and you indeed lie."

src: Und bittet ALLAH um etwas von Seiner Gunst!
ref: Ask God for His favours.
draft: And ask ALLAH for some of His favor!
hil: And ask Allah for some of His grace, verily Allah is of everything Knower.
compare: And ask Allah for some of His grace, verily Allah is of everything Knower.

src: Und aus den Bergen hauet ihr euch Wohnungen geschickt aus.
ref: And dwellings hewed out of mountains ingeniously?
draft: And from the mountains you skillfully hew yourselves dwellings.
hil: And from the mountains you skillfully hew yourselves dwellings.
compare: And from the mountains you skillfully hew yourselves dwellings.

src: Und die Entscheidungsträger von ihnen gingen los: "Geht weiter so, und seid duldsam in eurer Gottheiten Sache! Gewiß, dies ist eine Sache, die doch erstrebt wird.
ref: The chiefs among them departed saying: go, and persevere in your gods; verily this is a thing designed.
draft: And their decision-makers went on: "Carry on and be tolerant in your gods' cause! Surely, this is a cause that is sought after."
hil: "Those in charge among them said: "Go on like this and be tolerant in the cause of your deities! Surely, this is a cause that is sought after."
compare: "Those in charge among them said: "Go on like this and be tolerant in the cause of your deities! Surely, this is a cause that is sought after."

src: So gibt es von euch keinen, der es von ihm zurückhält.
ref: And not one of you would have been able to stop (Us).
draft: So there is none of you who withholds it from him.
hil: So there is no one among you who withholds it from him.
compare: So there is no one among you who withholds it from him.

src: Diejenigen, gegen die der Spruch zu Recht fällig geworden ist, sagen: «Unser Herr, diese, die wir haben abirren lassen, haben wir abirren lassen, wie wir selbst abgeirrt waren. (Von ihnen) sagen wir uns vor Dir los.
ref: Those against whom the Word will have proved true will say, “Our Lord! These are they whom we led astray; we led them astray the way we ourselves went astray; we are unconcerned with them and we incline towards You – they never worshipped us!”
draft: Those against whom the verdict is justly due say: "Our Lord, these whom we have led astray, we have led astray, as we ourselves have gone astray. We disassociate ourselves from them before you.
hil: Those against whom the sentence is rightly confirmed, say: 'Our Lord, we led these astray as we ourselves had gone astray. We disassociate ourselves from them before You.
compare: Those against whom the verdict is justly due say: "Our Lord, these whom we have led astray, we have led astray, as we ourselves have gone astray. We disassociate ourselves from them before you.

src: ER sagte: "Verlasse es als ein Verachteter, Verfluchter.
ref: "Begone," said (God), "contemptible and rejected!
draft: He said, "Leave it as a despised, cursed one."
hil: He said, 'Leave it as a despised, cursed one.'
compare: He said, "Leave it as a despised, cursed one."

src: Hätte Gott bei ihnen etwas Gutes festgestellt, hätte Er sie hören lassen. Und wenn Er sie hätte hören lassen, so hätten sie sich (dennoch) abgekehrt und abgewandt.
ref: And had Allah found any goodness in them, He would have made them hear; and had He made them hear they would, in the end, have turned away and gone back.
draft: If God had seen something good in them, He would have made them hear it. And if He had made them hear it, they (still) would have turned away and refused.
hil: If God found something good in them, He would have let them hear it. And even if He had let them hear it, they would have still turned away.
compare: If God found something good in them, He would have let them hear it. And even if He had let them hear it, they would have still turned away.

src: Doch nur die verständigen Menschen besinnen sich.
ref: They alone take warning who are wise,
draft: But only the sensible people reflect.
hil: But only the wise reflect.
compare: But only the wise reflect.

src: Als sie dann vor Yusuf traten, nahm er seine Eltern bei sich auf und sprach: "Zieht in Ägypten in Sicherheit ein, wie Allah es will."
ref: When they went back to Joseph he gave his father and mother a place of honour, and said: "Enter Egypt in peace by the will of God."
draft: When they then appeared before Yusuf, he took his parents to him and said, "Enter into safety in Egypt, as Allah wills."
hil: "When they appeared before Yusuf, he took his parents to him and said, \"Enter into safety in Egypt, as Allah wills it.\""
compare: When they then appeared before Yusuf, he took his parents to him and said, "Enter into safety in Egypt, as Allah wills."

src: ER läßt die Nacht den Tag überdecken.
ref: He brings the night as a cover over the day.
draft: He lets the night cover the day.
hil: He turns night into day, and turns day into night.
compare: He lets the night cover the day.

src: Und haltet nicht die Kafir-Ehepartner!
ref: Do not retain your (marriage) ties with unbelieving women.
draft: And do not hold onto the infidel spouses!
hil: And do not hold infidel spouses!
compare: And do not hold infidel spouses!

src: Dienet Ihm.
ref: So worship Him.
draft: Serve Him.
hil: Serve Him.
compare: Serve Him.

src: 'Isa, der Sohn Maryams, sagte: "O Allah, unser Herr, sende zu uns einen Tisch (mit Speisen) vom Himmel herab, der für uns, für den ersten von uns und den letzten von uns, ein Fest sein soll und ein Zeichen von Dir. Und versorge uns.
ref: Eisa, the son of Maryam, said, “O Allah, O our Lord! Send down to us a table spread from heaven, so that it may become a day of celebration for us – for our former and latter people – and a sign from You; and give us sustenance – and You are the Best Provider Of Sustenance.”
draft: Isa, the son of Maryam, said, "O Allah, our Lord, send down to us a table [spread with food] from the heaven to be for us a festival for the first of us and the last of us and a sign from You. And provide for us.
hil: Isa, son of Maryam, said: 'O Allah, our Lord, send down to us a table spread with food from the heaven, to be for us a celebration, for the first of us and the last of us, as well as a sign from You. And provide for us.'
compare: Isa, the son of Maryam, said, "O Allah, our Lord, send down to us a table [spread with food] from the heaven to be for us a festival for the first of us and the last of us and a sign from You. And provide for us.

src: Diejenigen, denen WIR die Schrift zuteil werden ließen, tragen sie vor, wie es ihr gebührt. Diese verinnerlichen den Iman daran.
ref: Those (who embraced Islam from Bani Israel) to whom We gave the Book [the Taurat (Torah)] [or those (Muhammad's Peace be upon him companions) to whom We have given the Book (the Quran)] recite it (i.e. obey its orders and follow its teachings) as it should be recited (i.e. followed), they are the ones that believe therein.
draft: Those to whom WE have given the scripture recite it with its due right. They are the ones who believe in it.
hil: Those whom We have given the Scripture recite it with its due right. They are the ones who internalize the Iman therein.
compare: Those to whom WE have given the scripture recite it with its due right. They are the ones who believe in it.

src: Hierauf nahm Allah ihre Reue an. Dann aber wurden (wieder) viele von ihnen blind und taub.
ref: Thereafter Allah relented toward them, then they again blinded and deafened themselves.
draft: Then Allah accepted their repentance. But then many of them again became blind and deaf.
hil: Then Allah accepted their repentance. But then many of them became blind and deaf again.
compare: Then Allah accepted their repentance. But then many of them again became blind and deaf.

src: Aber diejenigen, die ungläubig sind, sind es, die der List erliegen.
ref: So the conspiracy will befall only upon the disbelievers.
draft: But it is those who disbelieve who fall for the trickery.
hil: But it is those who disbelieve that succumb to cunning deception.
compare: But it is those who disbelieve that succumb to cunning deception.

src: Also führe den bewaffneten Kampf fi-sabilillah!
ref: So fight on in the way of God (irrespective of the others).
draft: So wage the armed struggle fi-sabilillah!
hil: Fight in the way of God those who fight against you, but do not commit aggression. Indeed, God does not like aggressors.
compare: So wage the armed struggle fi-sabilillah!

src: An jenem Tag waren sie dem Unglauben näher als dem Glauben, sie sagten ja mit ihrem Munde, was nicht in ihrem Herzen war. Und Gott weiß besser, was sie verschweigen.
ref: They that day were nearer to unbelief than to belief, saying with their mouths that which never was in their hearts; and God knows very well the things they hide;
draft: On that day, they were closer to disbelief than to belief. They uttered with their mouths what was not in their hearts. And God knows best what they conceal.
hil: On that day, they were closer to disbelief than to belief. They uttered with their mouths what was not in their hearts. And Allah knows best what they conceal.
compare: On that day, they were closer to disbelief than to belief. They uttered with their mouths what was not in their hearts. And Allah knows best what they conceal.

src: Nehmen sie etwa nicht wahr, daß WIR gewiß Uns der Erde zuwenden und sie von ihren Enden einengen?!
ref: Do they not see Us advancing into the land, reducing its frontiers?
draft: Do they not realize that WE are certainly turning towards the Earth and restricting it from its ends?!
hil: Do they not realize that WE are surely turning to the Earth and narrowing it from its ends?!
compare: Do they not realize that WE are surely turning to the Earth and narrowing it from its ends?!

src: Und erbärmlich ist sie als (ihr) Werden.
ref: What a wretched retreat!
draft: And she is pathetic as (her) becoming.
hil: Pathetic is her becoming.
compare: Pathetic is her becoming.

src: Wenn dann der Tod an einen von ihnen herantritt, sagt er: "Mein Herr, bringe mich zurück
ref: (But the unbelievers will persist) until when death comes to one of them he will say: "O Lord, send me back again
draft: If death then approaches one of them, he says: "My lord, bring me back."
hil: When death comes to one of them, he says, 'My Lord, send me back.'
compare: When death comes to one of them, he says, 'My Lord, send me back.'

src: Auf solche (Sünder) wird ein böses Unheil niederfallen; und Allah ist zornig auf sie; und Er hat sie verflucht und Gahannam für sie bereitet.
ref: They shall be afflicted with misfortune, Allah is wroth with them. He has laid His curse upon them and has prepared for them Hell.
draft: Such (sinners) will suffer a terrible fate, and Allah is angry with them; and He has cursed them and prepared hell for them.
hil: A terrible misfortune will fall upon such (sinners); and Allah is angry with them, and He has cursed them and prepared Gehenna for them.
compare: A terrible misfortune will fall upon such (sinners); and Allah is angry with them, and He has cursed them and prepared Gehenna for them.

src: Sag: Allah hat das überzeugende Beweismittel.
ref: Say: "To God belongs the consummate argument.
draft: Say: Allah has the convincing proof.
hil: Say: Allah has the convincing proof.
compare: Say: Allah has the convincing proof.

src: Das ist ein Warner nach Art der früheren Warner.
ref: He who warns you is one of the warners of old.
draft: This is a warning in the style of the earlier warnings.
hil: "Verily, this is a Warner, in the likeness of previous Warners.",
compare: This is a warning in the style of the earlier warnings.

src: Sie sagen: «Sie sind uns entschwunden. Nein, wir riefen früher nichts an.»
ref: They will say: they have failed us: aye! we have not been calling upon aught afore.
draft: They say, "You have escaped us. No, we didn't used to call anything earlier."
hil: They will say, 'They have vanished and deserted us.' No, we didn't used to call anything earlier.
compare: They say, "You have escaped us. No, we didn't used to call anything earlier."

src: (Sie ist) als Unterkunft von Einem Allvergebenden, Allgnädigen."
ref: As a gift from the forgiving, ever-merciful (God)."
draft: "As an accommodation of an all-forgiving, all-gracious."
hil: "As a dwelling place of an all-forgiving, all-merciful."
compare: "As a dwelling place of an all-forgiving, all-merciful."

src: Und Wir hoben den Berg über sie bei (der Entgegennahme von) ihrem Abkommen empor.
ref: And We raised the Mount over them for their bond.
draft: And we lifted the mountain over them during (the acceptance of) their agreement.
hil: And [remember] when WE raised the mountain over them like an awning during (the acceptance of) their agreement, and they feared it would fall upon them. Take seriously what WE have bestowed upon you, and remember it so that you may act according to Taqwa.
compare: And [remember] when WE raised the mountain over them like an awning during (the acceptance of) their agreement, and they feared it would fall upon them. Take seriously what WE have bestowed upon you, and remember it so that you may act according to Taqwa.

src: Als Freudenbote und Warner.
ref: Announcing happy news and warnings.
draft: As a messenger of joy and warning.
hil: As a bringer of glad tidings and a warner.
compare: As a bringer of glad tidings and a warner.

src: Diejenigen, die glaubten und ausgewandert sind und sich mit ihrem Vermögen und mit ihrer eigenen Person auf dem Weg Gottes eingesetzt haben, und diejenigen, die (jene) untergebracht und unterstützt haben, sind untereinander Freunde. Mit denen aber, die glauben und nicht ausgewandert sind, habt ihr keine Freundschaft zu pflegen, bis sie auswandern. Wenn sie euch jedoch um Unterstützung wegen der (euch gemeinsamen) Religion bitten, so habt ihr die Pflicht zur Unterstützung, außer gegen Leute, zwischen denen und euch eine Vertragspflicht besteht. Und Gott sieht wohl, was ihr tut.
ref: Indeed those who accepted faith and left their homes and belongings for Allah, and fought with their wealth and their lives in Allah's cause, and those who gave shelter and provided help, are the heirs of one another; and those who believed but did not leave their homes – you have no right in their estates until they migrate; and if they seek help from you in the matter of religion then it is your duty to provide help, except against the people between whom and you is a treaty; and Allah sees your deeds.
draft: Those who believed and emigrated and strived in the path of Allah with their wealth and their lives, and those who gave them shelter and supported them, they are allies of one another. But as for those who believe and do not emigrate, you are not responsible for their protection until they emigrate. But if they seek help from you for the sake of religion, then it is incumbent on you to help them, except against people with whom you have a treaty. Allah is all-seeing of what you do.
hil: Those who believed and emigrated and strived in the path of Allah with their wealth and their lives, and those who gave them shelter and supported them, they are allies of one another. But as for those who believe and do not emigrate, you are not responsible for their protection until they emigrate. But if they seek help from you for the sake of religion, then it is incumbent on you to help them, except against people with whom you have a treaty. Allah is all-seeing of what you do.
compare: Those who believed and emigrated and strived in the path of Allah with their wealth and their lives, and those who gave them shelter and supported them, they are allies of one another. But as for those who believe and do not emigrate, you are not responsible for their protection until they emigrate. But if they seek help from you for the sake of religion, then it is incumbent on you to help them, except against people with whom you have a treaty. Allah is all-seeing of what you do.

src: Und Wir gaben bereits Dawud und Sulaiman Wissen. Und sie sagten: "(Alles) Lob gehört Allah, der uns vor vielen Seiner gläubigen Diener bevorzugt hat!"
ref: We gave David and Solomon knowledge; and they said: "All praise be to God who has favoured us over many of His creatures who believe."
draft: And we have already given Dawud and Sulaiman knowledge. And they said: "All praise is due to Allah, who has favored us over many of His believing servants!"
hil: And they said, 'All praise is due to Allah, who has favored us over many of His believing servants!' We have already given Dawud and Sulaiman knowledge.
compare: And we have already given Dawud and Sulaiman knowledge. And they said: "All praise is due to Allah, who has favored us over many of His believing servants!"

src: Dies sind die Ayat der Schrift und des erläuternden Quran.
ref: These are the verses of the Book and the perspicuous oration.
draft: These are the verses of the Scripture and the elucidating Quran.
hil: These are the verses of the Scripture and the explanatory Quran.
compare: These are the verses of the Scripture and the elucidating Quran.

src: Diejenigen, die glaubten und ausgewandert sind und sich mit ihrem Vermögen und mit ihrer eigenen Person auf dem Weg Gottes eingesetzt haben, und diejenigen, die (jene) untergebracht und unterstützt haben, sind untereinander Freunde.
ref: Those who accepted the faith and set out of their homes, and fought in the way of God wealth and soul, and those who gave them shelter and helped them, are friends of one another.
draft: Those who believed and emigrated and put themselves and their possessions on the way of God, and those who accommodated and supported them, are friends among themselves.
hil: Those who believed and emigrated and put themselves and their possessions on the way of God, and those who housed and supported them, are friends among themselves.
compare: Those who believed and emigrated and put themselves and their possessions on the way of God, and those who housed and supported them, are friends among themselves.

src: Jede Trinkzeit soll (dann abwechselnd) wahrgenommen werden.
ref: Each one's right to drink being established (by turns).
draft: Every drinking time should be observed (alternatingly).
hil: Every drinking time should be observed (alternatingly).
compare: Every drinking time should be observed (alternatingly).

src: Und hütet euch vor einem Tag, an dem keine Seele etwas anstelle einer anderen übernehmen kann und von keiner Fürsprache noch Ersatz(leistung) angenommen wird und ihnen keine Hilfe zuteil wird!
ref: Take heed of the day when no man will be useful to man in the least, when no intercession matter nor ransom avail, nor help reach them.
draft: And beware of a day when no soul can take the place of another and no intercession or compensation is accepted, and no help is given to them!
hil: And beware of a day when no soul can substitute for another, and no intercession or compensation is accepted, and no help is given to them!
compare: And beware of a day when no soul can take the place of another and no intercession or compensation is accepted, and no help is given to them!

src: Doch WIR lassen es nur nach einem bekannten Maß nach und nach hinabsenden.
ref: And We send it not down except in a known measure.
draft: But WE only let it gradually sink to a well-known level.
hil: "We only let it gradually descend according to a known measure."
compare: "We only let it gradually descend according to a known measure."

src: Er wollte euch aber in alledem, was Er euch gegeben hat, auf die Probe stellen. Darum sollt ihr um die guten Dinge wetteifern.
ref: If Allah willed, He would have made you one nation, but that (He) may test you in what He has given you; so strive as in a race in good deeds.
draft: He wanted to test you in all that He has given you. Therefore, you should strive for the good things.
hil: But he wanted to test you in all that He has given you. Therefore, you should compete for the good things.
compare: But he wanted to test you in all that He has given you. Therefore, you should compete for the good things.

src: Und Gottes Wille wird durch nichts vereitelt weder in den Himmeln noch auf der Erde. Er weiß Bescheid und ist mächtig.
ref: And Allah is not such that anything in the heavens or in the earth can break away from His control; indeed He is All Knowing, Able.
draft: And God's will is not thwarted by anything, neither in the heavens nor on earth. He knows what's going on and he is powerful.
hil: God's will is not thwarted by anything, neither in the heavens nor on earth. He knows everything and is powerful.
compare: God's will is not thwarted by anything, neither in the heavens nor on earth. He knows everything and is powerful.

src: Er ist ja eine Erinnerung.
ref: Verily this Qur'an is an Admonition.
draft: He is a memory.
hil: He is indeed a reminder.
compare: He is indeed a reminder.

src: DU hast mich aus Feuer geschaffen, aber ihn hast DU aus Lehm geschaffen."
ref: "You created me from fire, and him from clay."
draft: "You have created me from fire, but you created him from clay."
hil: You have created me from fire, but you created him from clay.
compare: "You have created me from fire, but you created him from clay."

src: O die ihr glaubt, zehrt nicht euren Besitz untereinander auf nichtige Weise auf, es sei denn, daß es sich um einen Handel in gegenseitigem Einvernehmen handelt. Und tötet euch nicht selbst (gegenseitig). Allah ist gewiß Barmherzig gegen euch.
ref: O you who believe! do not devour your property among yourselves falsely, except that it be trading by your mutual consent; and do not kill your people; surely Allah is Merciful to you.
draft: O you who believe, do not consume your wealth among yourselves in falsehood, except through trade conducted with mutual consent. And do not kill yourselves [or one another]. Indeed, Allah is to you ever Merciful.
hil: O you who believe, do not consume your wealth among yourselves in falsehood, except through trade conducted with mutual consent. And do not kill yourselves [or one another]. Indeed, Allah is to you ever Merciful.
compare: O you who believe, do not consume your wealth among yourselves in falsehood, except through trade conducted with mutual consent. And do not kill yourselves [or one another]. Indeed, Allah is to you ever Merciful.

src: Diejenigen, die über ihn uneins sind, sind im Zweifel über ihn.
ref: Those who disagree in the matter are only lost in doubt.
draft: Those who disagree about him are in doubt about him.
hil: Those who are divided about him are in doubt about him.
compare: Those who disagree about him are in doubt about him.

src: WIR werden ihnen doch noch Unsere Ayat in allen Bereichen zeigen und an ihnen selber, damit ihnen deutlich wird, daß er (der Quran) gewiß dieWahrheit ist.
ref: We will show Our signs to them in the horizons of the external world and within themselves, until it becomes clear to them that it's the truth.
draft: We will show them Our signs in all the areas and within themselves so that it becomes clear to them that Quran is the truth.
hil: We will still show them Our signs in all areas and even within themselves, so that it becomes clear to them that the Quran is definitely the truth.
compare: We will still show them Our signs in all areas and even within themselves, so that it becomes clear to them that the Quran is definitely the truth.

src: Weshalb, wenn euch gesagt wird: "Brecht auf fi-sabilillah", werdet ihr träge an der Stelle haftend?!
ref: What is the matter with you, that when it is said to you, “Migrate in Allah's cause”, you sit on the ground with heaviness?
draft: Why, when you are told "Go forth in the way of Allah", do you linger motionless on the spot?!
hil: And why, when you are told to set forth for the cause of Allah, do you remain clinging lazily to the ground?!
compare: Why, when you are told "Go forth in the way of Allah", do you linger motionless on the spot?!

src: Und ER machte euch aus euren Partnerwesen Kinder und Enkel und gewährte euch Rizq von den Tay-yibat.
ref: He has created your sons and grandsons from your spouses and has given you pure things for your sustenance.
draft: And HE made for you from your partners, children and grandchildren, and granted you provision from the Tayyibat.
hil: And HE made for you from your partners, children and grandchildren, and granted you provision of the good things that you have earned, and from what We have produced for you from the earth.
compare: And HE made for you from your partners, children and grandchildren, and granted you provision of the good things that you have earned, and from what We have produced for you from the earth.

src: Wenn ihr einander eine Schuld für eine festgesetzte Frist gewährt, dann schreibt sie nieder!
ref: When you contract a debt for a fixed period, write it down.
draft: If you grant each other a debt for a fixed period, then write it down!
hil: If you grant each other a debt for a fixed period, then write it down! And let two just witnesses from among you bear witness to injustice between you.
compare: If you grant each other a debt for a fixed period, then write it down!

src: Sie schwören euch, damit ihr mit ihnen zufrieden seid.
ref: They will plead on oath that you accept them.
draft: They swear to you so that you are satisfied with them.
hil: They swear before you so that you may be pleased with them; Allah will never be pleased with the sinful.
compare: They swear before you so that you may be pleased with them; Allah will never be pleased with the sinful.

src: Dies, weil sie ALLAHs Ayat gegenüber Kufr zu betreiben und die Propheten zu Unrecht zu töten pflegten. Dies war für das, wie sie sich widersetzten und zu übertreten pflegten.
ref: Therefore settle down in Egypt or any city, where you will get what you demand”; and disgrace and misery were destined for them; and they returned towards Allah’s wrath; that was because they disbelieved in Allah’s signs and wrongfully martyred the Prophets; that was for their disobedience and transgression.
draft: This is because they used to commit disbelief towards ALLAH's verses and used to unjustly kill the prophets. This was due to their opposition and transgression.
hil: This is because they disbelieved in the signs of Allah and used to slay the Prophets unjustly. This was due to their opposition and transgression.
compare: This is because they used to commit disbelief towards ALLAH's verses and used to unjustly kill the prophets. This was due to their opposition and transgression.

src: Bereits brachten wir dir eine Aya von deinem HERRN. Und Salam sei auf demjenigen, welcher der Rechtleitung folgt.
ref: We bring you a sign from your Lord, and peace be upon him who follows guidance.
draft: We have already brought you an Aya from your Lord. And peace be upon the one who follows guidance.
hil: "We have already brought you a revelation from your Lord. And peace be upon the one who follows the guidance."
compare: We have already brought you an Aya from your Lord. And peace be upon the one who follows guidance.

src: Und wenn sie darauf nicht reagieren, dann wisset, es ist mit Allahs Wissen offenbart worden; und es gibt keinen Gott außer Ihm.
ref: If they do not answer you, then know it has been revealed with the knowledge of God, and that there is no god but He.
draft: And if they do not respond to it, then know that it has been revealed with Allah's knowledge; and there is no god but Him.
hil: And if they do not respond, know that it has been revealed with Allah's knowledge; and there is no god but Him.
compare: And if they do not respond, know that it has been revealed with Allah's knowledge; and there is no god but Him.

src: Allah hat doch das Wort jener gehört, die mit dir wegen ihres Mannes stritt und sich vor Allah beklagte.
ref: God has heard the words of her that disputes with thee concerning her husband, and makes complaint unto God.
draft: Allah has certainly heard the words of those who argued with you about their husband and complained to Allah.
hil: Allah has indeed heard the speech of the woman who is arguing with you concerning her husband, and is complaining to Allah. And Allah hears the conversation of you both. Indeed Allah is All-Hearing, All-Knowing.
compare: Allah has certainly heard the words of those who argued with you about their husband and complained to Allah.

src: Und (Wir sandten) zu "Ad ihren Bruder Hud.
ref: And We sent Hud, their brother, to the people of 'Ad.
draft: And (we sent) to "Ad, her brother Hud.
hil: And to 'Ad, (people, We sent) their brother Hud.
compare: And to 'Ad, (people, We sent) their brother Hud.

src: Gib mir ein, daß ich mich Deiner Wohltat, die DU mir und meinen Eltern gewährt hast, dankbar erweise, und daß ich gottgefällig Gutes tue, woran DU Wohlgefallen findest.
ref: Help me to be grateful for Your favours which You have bestowed upon me, and upon both my parents, and to do good deeds that will please You.
draft: Please allow me to express my gratitude for the kindness that you have bestowed upon me and my parents, and to perform good deeds that are pleasing to God and to You.
hil: Grant me the ability to show gratitude for the favors You have bestowed upon me and my parents, and to perform acts of good that are pleasing to God and to You.
compare: Grant me the ability to show gratitude for the favors You have bestowed upon me and my parents, and to perform acts of good that are pleasing to God and to You.

src: Gewiß, sie haben sehr viele von den Menschen in die Irre geführt.
ref: They have indeed led astray many among mankind.
draft: Surely, they have misled many of the people.
hil: Certainly, they have misled many people.
compare: Surely, they have misled many of the people.

src: Alhamdulillah: Alles Lob gebührt ALLAH, Der die Himmel und die Erde erschaffen und die Finsternis und das Licht gemacht hat. Dann (trotzdem) stellen diejenigen, die Kufr betrieben haben, ihrem HERRN etwas gleich.
ref: All praise is to Allah, Who has created the heavens and the earth, and has created darkness and light; yet the disbelievers appoint equals (false deities) to their Lord!
draft: Alhamdulillah: All praise is due to Allah, who created the heavens and the earth and made darkness and light. Yet those who committed Kufr (unbelief) set up equals to their Lord.
hil: All praise is due to Allah, who created the heavens and the earth and made darkness and light. Yet those who committed Kufr (unbelief) set up equals to their Lord.
compare: Alhamdulillah: All praise is due to Allah, who created the heavens and the earth and made darkness and light. Yet those who committed Kufr (unbelief) set up equals to their Lord.

src: Aber Gott läßt nicht unbeachtet, was ihr tut.
ref: God is not unaware of all you do.
draft: But God does not leave unnoticed what you do.
hil: But God does not leave unnoticed what you do.
compare: But God does not leave unnoticed what you do.

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Nehmt euch eure Eltern und eure Geschwister nicht als Wali, wenn sie den Kufr dem Iman vorziehen. Und wer von euch sie als Wali nimmt, diese sind die wirklichen Unrecht-Begehenden.
ref: O you who believe, do not hold your fathers and brothers as friends if they hold disbelief more dear than faith; and those of you who do so are iniquitous.
draft: You, who have internalized the iman! Do not take your parents and siblings as protectors if they prefer kufr over iman. And whoever of you takes them as protectors, they are the ones who do wrong.
hil: O believers! Do not take your fathers and brothers as friends if they prefer infidelity over faith. And whoever of you takes them as friends, they are the ones who do wrong.
compare: O believers! Do not take your fathers and brothers as friends if they prefer infidelity over faith. And whoever of you takes them as friends, they are the ones who do wrong.

src: Und ER ist Derjenige, Der aus dem Wasser einen Menschen erschuf, dann machte ER ihn zur Abstammung und Verschwägerung. Und dein HERR ist immer allmächtig.
ref: And it is He Who created man from water, then appointed relatives and in-laws for him; and your Lord is All Able.
draft: And HE is the one who created a human being from water, then made him (into) relations and affines. And your LORD is always omnipotent.
hil: And HE is the One who created a human being from water, then made him into relations and affines. And your LORD is always omnipotent.
compare: And HE is the one who created a human being from water, then made him (into) relations and affines. And your LORD is always omnipotent.

src: Und er betrat die Stadt um eine Zeit, da ihre Bewohner in einem Zustand der Unachtsamkeit waren; und er fand da zwei Männer, die miteinander kämpften.
ref: He came to the city when the people were in a care-free mood, and saw two men quarrelling, one belonging to his community, the other to his enemies.
draft: And he entered the city at a time when its inhabitants were in a state of carelessness; and he found there two men who were fighting with each other.
hil: He entered the city at a time when its inhabitants were in a state of carelessness and found two men fighting each other.
compare: And he entered the city at a time when its inhabitants were in a state of carelessness; and he found there two men who were fighting with each other.

src: Als er dort ankam, wurde ihm vom rechten Ufer des Tales im gesegneten Fleck (Land) aus dem Baum zugerufen: "O Musa, gewiß, Ich bin Allah, der Herr der Weltenbewohner."
ref: When he drew near, a voice called out to him from the tree on the blessed spot on the right side of the valley: "O Moses, I am verily God, the Lord of all the worlds.
draft: When he arrived there, he was called from the blessed spot (land) on the right bank of the valley by a voice from the tree: "O Moses, Verily, I am Allah, the Lord of all the worlds."
hil: When he arrived there, he was called from the blessed spot (land) on the right bank of the valley by a voice from the tree: "O Moses, Verily, I am Allah, the Lord of all the worlds."
compare: When he arrived there, he was called from the blessed spot (land) on the right bank of the valley by a voice from the tree: "O Moses, Verily, I am Allah, the Lord of all the worlds."

src: Bringt sie nicht heraus aus ihren Wohnstätten! Und sie gehen nicht weg, außer wenn sie eine bewiesene Abscheulichkeit begehen.
ref: Do not expel them from their houses, nor should they go away themselves, unless they are openly guilty of adultery.
draft: Do not bring them out of their dwellings! And they do not leave, unless they commit a proven atrocity.
hil: Do not bring them out of their dwellings! And they do not leave, unless they commit a proven atrocity.
compare: Do not bring them out of their dwellings! And they do not leave, unless they commit a proven atrocity.

src: Allah hat Wohlgefallen an ihnen, und sie haben Wohlgefallen an Ihm. Jene sind Allahs Gruppierung.
ref: Allah is pleased with them, and they are pleased with Him - those are the party of Allah.
draft: "Allah is pleased with them, and they are pleased with Him. They are Allah's group."
hil: Allah is pleased with them, and they are pleased with Him. They are Allah's group.
compare: "Allah is pleased with them, and they are pleased with Him. They are Allah's group."

src: Und haltet nicht am Eheband mit den ungläubigen Frauen fest, sondern verlangt das zurück, was ihr (für sie) ausgegeben habt, und lasset (die Ungläubigen) das zurückverlangen, was sie (für sie) ausgegeben haben.
ref: Do not retain your (marriage) ties with unbelieving women. Ask for the return of what you have spent (on them); and the unbelievers should ask for the return of what they have spent.
draft: And do not hold firmly to the marriage bond with unbelieving women, but demand back what you have spent on them and let (the unbelievers) demand what they have spent (on them).
hil: "Do not adhere to the marital bond with unbelieving women, but demand back what you have spent on them and let the unbelievers demand back what they have spent on them."
compare: And do not hold firmly to the marriage bond with unbelieving women, but demand back what you have spent on them and let (the unbelievers) demand what they have spent (on them).

src: Da empfing Adam von seinem Herrn Worte, und darauf nahm Er seine Reue an. Er ist ja der Reue-Annehmende und Barmherzige.
ref: Then his Lord sent commands to Adam and turned towards him: Indeed He is compassionate and kind.
draft: Adam received words from his Lord, and then He accepted his repentance. He is indeed the Accepter of Repentance, the Merciful.
hil: Adam received words from his Lord, and then He accepted his repentance. He is indeed the Accepter of Repentance, the Merciful.
compare: Adam received words from his Lord, and then He accepted his repentance. He is indeed the Accepter of Repentance, the Merciful.

src: Wahrlich, Wir haben dich mit der Wahrheit als Bringer froher Botschaft und als Warner entsandt; und es gibt kein Volk, in dem es nicht einmal schon Warner gegeben hätte.
ref: We have sent you with the truth, to give glad tidings and to warn. Never has there been a community to which an admonisher was not sent.
draft: Truly, We have sent you with the truth as a bringer of glad tidings and as a warner, and there is no people to whom a warner has not been sent before.
hil: Verily, We have sent you with the truth as a bearer of glad tidings and as a warner; and there is no ummah where a warner has not already been sent.
compare: Truly, We have sent you with the truth as a bringer of glad tidings and as a warner, and there is no people to whom a warner has not been sent before.

src: Gott hat sich Abraham ja zum Vertrauten genommen.
ref: And God chose Abraham as friend.
draft: God has taken Abraham as his confidant.
hil: Indeed, God has taken Abraham as His confidant.
compare: God has taken Abraham as his confidant.

src: "Stelle Panzerhemden her und füge die Ringe nach Maß ineinander."
ref: Saying: Make thou long coats of mail and measure the links (thereof).
draft: "Produce armored shirts and custom-fit the rings together."
hil: Make armored shirts and interlock the rings according to size.
compare: "Produce armored shirts and custom-fit the rings together."

src: Wie wog er ab!
ref: How moliciously he devised!
draft: How he weighed it up!
hil: How did he weigh it up!
compare: How he weighed it up!

src: Denen, die ungläubig sind, werden weder ihr Vermögen noch ihre Kinder vor Gott etwas nützen. Das sind die Gefährten des Feuers; sie werden darin ewig weilen.
ref: Indeed those who disbelieve – neither their wealth nor their offspring will help save them in the least, from Allah; and they are the people of fire; remaining in it forever.
draft: Those who are unbelievers, neither their possessions nor their children will be of any use to them before God. They are the companions of the Fire and will abide therein eternally.
hil: "Those who disbelieve will gain no benefit from their wealth or offspring before God. They are the companions of the Fire and will abide therein eternally."
compare: Those who are unbelievers, neither their possessions nor their children will be of any use to them before God. They are the companions of the Fire and will abide therein eternally.

src: Allah hat ein Siegel auf ihre Herzen gelegt, so daß sie kein Wissen haben.
ref: Allah hath sealed up their hearts, so they know not.
draft: "Allah has set a seal on their hearts so that they have no knowledge."
hil: Allah has cast a veil over their hearts lest they understand it and there is a deafness in their ears; and if they see every sign they do not believe in it.
compare: "Allah has set a seal on their hearts so that they have no knowledge."

src: Zeigt mir, was sie von der Erde erschaffen haben.
ref: What have they created of the earth?
draft: Show me what they have created on earth.
hil: Show me what they have created on the earth.
compare: Show me what they have created on the earth.

src: Oder denken sie etwa, daß WIR ihr Geheimnis und ihre heimliche Unterredung nicht hören?! Doch, mit Sicherheit!
ref: Or do they think that We do not hear what they conceal and their secret discourses?
draft: Or do they think that WE do not hear their secret and clandestine conversation?! But we definitely do!
hil: Or do they think that we do not hear their confidential conversation?! However, for sure we do!
compare: Or do they think that WE do not hear their secret and clandestine conversation?! But we definitely do!

src: Und wenn sie den Weg der Besonnenheit sehen, nehmen sie ihn sich nicht zum Weg. Wenn sie aber den Weg der Verirrung sehen, nehmen sie ihn sich zum Weg.
ref: Even if they see every sign, they will not believe in it; and if they see the path of rectitude, they will not adopt it for a path; and if they see the path of error, they will adopt it for a path.
draft: And when they see the path of prudence, they do not take it as their path. But when they see the path of error, they take it as their path.
hil: And when they see the path of prudence, they do not take it as their path. But when they see the path of error, they take it as their path.
compare: And when they see the path of prudence, they do not take it as their path. But when they see the path of error, they take it as their path.

src: Er sagte: «Wenn du gewollt hättest, hättest du dafür einen Lohn nehmen können.»
ref: He said, “If you wanted, you could have obtained a payment for it.”
draft: He said, "If you had wanted to, you could have taken a wage for it."
hil: "He said, 'If you had wanted to, you could have taken a wage for it.'"
compare: He said, "If you had wanted to, you could have taken a wage for it."

src: (Gewähre uns) Deine Vergebung, unser Herr!
ref: Your forgiveness, our Lord.
draft: Grant us Your forgiveness, our Lord!
hil: Grant us Your forgiveness, our Lord!
compare: Grant us Your forgiveness, our Lord!

src: Gewiß, sie widersetzten sich mir und folgten demjenigen, dessen Vermögen und Kinder ihn nur am Verlust mehrten.
ref: They have disobeyed me, and they follow the one whose wealth and children increase nothing for him except ruin.”
draft: Certainly, they opposed me and followed the one whose wealth and children only increased through loss.
hil: They were indeed opposed to me and followed the one whose fortune and offspring only increased through loss.
compare: They were indeed opposed to me and followed the one whose fortune and offspring only increased through loss.

src: So verlasse dich auf Allah, denn du verfährst nach der offenkundigen Wahrheit.
ref: So you place your trust in God. Certainly you stand on positive truth.
draft: So rely on Allah, for you are acting according to the manifest truth.
hil: So rely on Allah, for you are following the manifest truth.
compare: So rely on Allah, for you are following the manifest truth.

src: Gesandter! Verkünde, was dir von deinem HERRN hinabgesandt wurde! Und solltest du dies nicht tun, dann hast du Seine Botschaft nicht verkündet. Und ALLAH schützt dich vor den Menschen. Gewiß, ALLAH leitet die kufrbetreibende Gemeinschaft nicht recht.
ref: O Noble Messenger (Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him)! Convey all what has been sent down upon you from your Lord; and if you do not, then you have not conveyed any of His messages; and Allah will protect you from the people; indeed Allah does not guide the disbelievers.
draft: "O messenger! Proclaim what has been sent down to you from your Lord. And if you do not, then you have not conveyed His message. Allah will protect you from the people. Indeed, Allah does not guide the disbelieving community aright."
hil: O messenger! Proclaim what has been sent down to you from your Lord. And if you do not, then you have not conveyed His message. Allah will protect you from the people. Indeed, Allah does not guide the disbelieving community aright.
compare: "O messenger! Proclaim what has been sent down to you from your Lord. And if you do not, then you have not conveyed His message. Allah will protect you from the people. Indeed, Allah does not guide the disbelieving community aright."

src: Da erhörte sie ihr Herr (und sprach): "Seht, Ich lasse kein Werk der Wirkenden unter euch verlorengehen, sei es von Mann oder Frau; die einen von euch sind von den anderen.
ref: The Lord heard their prayer and answered: "I suffer not the good deeds of any to go waste, be he a man or a woman: The one of you is of the other.
draft: Then her Lord responded to her (and said), "I do not cause to be lost the work of any worker among you, whether male or female; you are of one another.
hil: Then her Lord responded to her (and said), "Indeed, I will not allow to be lost the work of any worker among you, whether male or female. Some of you are from others."
compare: Then her Lord responded to her (and said), "Indeed, I will not allow to be lost the work of any worker among you, whether male or female. Some of you are from others."

src: Wo auch immer ihr seid, der Tod ereilt euch doch, und wäret ihr in hohen Burgen. Und wenn ihnen Gutes begegnet, sagen sie: "Das ist von Allah"; und wenn ihnen Schlimmes begegnet, sagen sie: "Das ist von dir."
ref: Wherever you are, death will overtake you, though you are in lofty towers, and if a benefit comes to them, they say: This is from Allah; and if a misfortune befalls them, they say: This is from you.
draft: Wherever you are, death will overtake you, even if you should be within towers of lofty construction. And if good fortune comes to them, they say, "This is from Allah "; and if a misfortune befalls them, they say, "This is from you."
hil: Wherever ye are, death will find you out, even if ye are in towers built up strong and high! If some good befalls them, they say, "This is from Allah," but if evil, they say, "This is from thee" (O Prophet).
compare: Wherever you are, death will overtake you, even if you should be within towers of lofty construction. And if good fortune comes to them, they say, "This is from Allah "; and if a misfortune befalls them, they say, "This is from you."

src: So waret ihr einst, dann aber hat Allah euch Seine Huld erwiesen; darum stellt erst gehörig Nachforschungen an. Seht, Allah ist eures Tuns wohl kundig.
ref: So you were aforetime; but God has been gracious to you. So be discriminating; surely God is aware of the things you do.
draft: So you were once, but Allah has shown you His grace; therefore investigate properly first. Behold, Allah is well aware of your deeds.
hil: Once you were like that, but then Allah showed you His grace; therefore, conduct thorough investigations first. Look, Allah is well aware of your deeds.
compare: Once you were like that, but then Allah showed you His grace; therefore, conduct thorough investigations first. Look, Allah is well aware of your deeds.

src: Da stritten sie untereinander über ihre Angelegenheit und führten insgeheim vertrauliche Gespräche.
ref: So they discussed their strategy among themselves and conferred privately,
draft: They argued among themselves about their affairs and secretly held confidential conversations.
hil: As they argued among themselves about their affairs and held secret confidential conversations.
compare: They argued among themselves about their affairs and secretly held confidential conversations.

src: Sie sagten: "Bist du etwa zu uns gekommen, damit wir ALLAH alleine dienen und von dem ablassen, dem unsere Ahnen dienten?! Also lasse uns das zuteil werden, wovor du uns warnst, solltest du von den Wahrhaftigen sein."
ref: They said: "Comest thou to us, that we may worship Allah alone, and give up the cult of our fathers? bring us what thou threatenest us with, if so be that thou tellest the truth!"
draft: They said, "Have you come to us to serve Allah alone and to give up what our ancestors served? So bring us what you promise us, if you are truthful."
hil: They said, "Have you come to us to serve Allah alone and to give up what our ancestors served? So bring us what you promise us, if you are truthful."
compare: They said, "Have you come to us to serve Allah alone and to give up what our ancestors served? So bring us what you promise us, if you are truthful."

src: Sie waren einverstanden, mit den Zurückgebliebenen zu sein.
ref: They are content to be with those (the women) who sit behind (at home).
draft: They agreed to be with the remaining ones.
hil: They were agreed, to be with the left behind.
compare: They agreed to be with the remaining ones.

src: Und ich bin dafür einer der Zeugen.
ref: It was He who created them and I testify to this fact".
draft: And I am one of the witnesses for this.
hil: And I am one of the witnesses for this.
compare: And I am one of the witnesses for this.

src: Sprich: Der Kampf in ihm ist schwerwiegend; aber (die Menschen) vom Wege Gottes abweisen, an Ihn nicht glauben, den Zugang zur heiligen Moschee verwehren und deren Anwohner daraus vertreiben, (all das) wiegt bei Gott schwerer. Verführen wiegt schwerer als Töten.
ref: Tell them: "To fight in that month is a great sin. But a greater sin in the eyes of God is to hinder people from the way of God, and not to believe in Him, and to bar access to the Holy Mosque and turn people out of its precincts; and oppression is worse than killing.
draft: Speak: The struggle within him is serious; but to turn the people away from the path of God, not to believe in Him, to deny access to the holy mosque and to expel its inhabitants, all of this weighs heavier with God. To lead astray weighs heavier than to kill.
hil: Say: The struggle within him is serious; but turning people away from the path of God, not believing in Him, denying access to the holy mosque, and expelling its inhabitants, all of this is even more serious in the eyes of Allah. Misleading others weighs heavier than killing.
compare: Speak: The struggle within him is serious; but to turn the people away from the path of God, not to believe in Him, to deny access to the holy mosque and to expel its inhabitants, all of this weighs heavier with God. To lead astray weighs heavier than to kill.

src: Und würden sie die Tora und das Evangelium und das, was zu ihnen von ihrem Herrn herabgesandt wurde, einhalten, sie würden von oben und unter ihren Füßen zu essen bekommen. Unter ihnen gibt es eine Gemeinde mit maßvollem Wandel.
ref: Had the People of the Book observed the Torah and the Gospel, and all that had been revealed to them from their Lord, sustenance would have been showered over them from above and risen from beneath their feet.
draft: And if they were to obey the Torah and the Gospel and what has been revealed to them from their Lord, they would have consumed [provision] from above them and from beneath their feet. Among them are a moderate community [with regard to what they do].
hil: And if they were to obey the Torah and the Gospel and what was revealed to them from their Lord, they would have consumed what was above them and beneath their feet. Among them, there is a community with a moderate way of life.
compare: And if they were to obey the Torah and the Gospel and what has been revealed to them from their Lord, they would have consumed [provision] from above them and from beneath their feet. Among them are a moderate community [with regard to what they do].

src: Für sie ist eine schmerzhafte Pein bestimmt.
ref: For them there is painful punishment.
draft: For her, a painful agony is determined.
hil: A painful punishment is intended for them.
compare: For her, a painful agony is determined.

src: Er ist der beste Versorger.
ref: He is the Best of providers.
draft: He is the best provider.
hil: He is the best provider.
compare: He is the best provider.

src: ER fügt der Schöpfung hinzu, was ER will. Gewiß, ALLAH ist über alles allmächtig.
ref: He addeth in creation what soever He listeth Verily Allah is over everything Potent.
draft: He adds to the creation what He wants. Certainly, Allah is the most powerful of all.
hil: He adds to the creation what He wants. Surely, God is capable of everything.
compare: He adds to the creation what He wants. Certainly, Allah is the most powerful of all.

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Nehmt euch nicht Leute alsWali, über die ALLAH erzürnt ist.
ref: O ye who believe! befriend not a people against whom Allah is Wroth.
draft: Your, who have internalized the imam! Do not take people as guardians over whom Allah is angry.
hil: O you who believe! Do not take as friends those over whom Allah is angry.
compare: O you who believe! Do not take as friends those over whom Allah is angry.

src: Und wenn er ihnen verlesen wird, sagen sie: "Wir glauben an ihn.
ref: And when it is read out to them, say: "We believe in it.
draft: And when it is recited to them, they say: "We believe in it."
hil: And when it is recited to them, they say: "We believe in it."
compare: And when it is recited to them, they say: "We believe in it."

src: Das sind Insassen des (Höllen)feuers.
ref: They are the dwellers of the Fire, therein they will abide.
draft: These are inmates of the (Hell)fire.
hil: Those are the rightful People of the Fire.
compare: These are inmates of the (Hell)fire.

src: Aber diejenigen, die glauben und die guten Werke tun, werden in Gärten geführt, unter denen Bäche fließen; darin werden sie ewig weilen, mit der Erlaubnis ihres Herrn.
ref: And those who believed (in the Oneness of Allah and His Messengers and whatever they brought) and did righteous deeds, will be made to enter Gardens under which rivers flow, - to dwell therein forever (i.e. in Paradise), with the permission of their Lord.
draft: But those who believe and do good deeds will be led to gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide eternally, with the permission of their Lord.
hil: But those who believed and did good deeds, soon We shall admit them into Gardens beneath which rivers flow, abiding in them forever with the permission of their Lord.
compare: But those who believe and do good deeds will be led to gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide eternally, with the permission of their Lord.

src: Wie lasset ihr euch da (von Ihm) abwenden?
ref: How then can you turn away?
draft: How do you (turn away from Him) there?
hil: How can you turn away [from Him] like that?
compare: How can you turn away [from Him] like that?

src: Dabei sind sie demütig gegen Allah und verkaufen Seine Zeichen nicht gegen einen winzigen Preis. Jene haben ihren Lohn bei ihrem Herrn.
ref: They do not sell the Verses of Allah for a little price, for them is a reward with their Lord.
draft: They are humble towards Allah and do not sell His signs for a tiny price. Those will have their reward with their Lord.
hil: They submit humbly to Allah and do not sell His signs for a meager price. Their reward is with their Lord.
compare: They submit humbly to Allah and do not sell His signs for a meager price. Their reward is with their Lord.

src: Sprich: "Mein Herr kennt ihre Zahl am besten.
ref: They will say, 'Seven; and their dog was the eighth of them.'
draft: Speak: "My lord knows their number best."
hil: Say: "Verily my Lord knows best their number. He will grant them provision or restrict it as He wills. And verily He is with all things encompassing.
compare: Say: "Verily my Lord knows best their number. He will grant them provision or restrict it as He wills. And verily He is with all things encompassing.

src: Dann machte Er seine Nachkommenschaft aus dem Erguß eines verächtlichen Wassers.
ref: Then made his offspring from the extract of base fluid,
draft: Then He made his offspring from the discharge of contemptible water.
hil: Then He made His offspring from the discharge of contemptible water.
compare: Then He made his offspring from the discharge of contemptible water.

src: Abweisen werde Ich von meinen Zeichen diejenigen, die sich auf der Erde zu Unrecht hochmütig verhalten. Wenn sie auch jedes Zeichen sehen, glauben sie nicht daran.
ref: I will turn away from My revelations those who behave proudly on earth without justification.
draft: I will reject those who behave unjustifiably haughty on Earth with my signs. Even if they see every sign, they will not believe in it.
hil: I will reject those who behave unjustifiably haughty on Earth with my signs. Even if they see every sign, they will not believe in it.
compare: I will reject those who behave unjustifiably haughty on Earth with my signs. Even if they see every sign, they will not believe in it.

src: Bereits brachten wir dir eine Aya von deinem HERRN.
ref: We have come to you with a token from your Lord.
draft: We have already brought you an Aya from your Lord.
hil: We have already brought you a sign from your Lord.
compare: We have already brought you a sign from your Lord.

src: Euch wird nicht schaden, wer irregeht, wenn ihr der Rechtleitung folgt. Zu ALLAH ist eure Rückkehr allesamt, dann wird ER euch darüber in Kenntnis setzen, was ihr zu tun pflegtet.
ref: Fear for your own souls; he who has strayed cannot harm you in the least if you are on guidance; towards Allah only you will all return – He will then inform you of what you used to do.
draft: "He who goes astray will not harm you if you follow the right path. To Allah all of you shall return, then He will inform you about what you used to do."
hil: "It will not harm you those who go astray as long as you follow the guidance. To Allah all of you shall return, then He will inform you about what you used to do."
compare: "It will not harm you those who go astray as long as you follow the guidance. To Allah all of you shall return, then He will inform you about what you used to do."

src: Behaltet sie aber nicht aus Schadenslust, um Übertretungen zu begehen.
ref: But do not take them back to hurt them, and whoever does that, then he has wronged himself.
draft: Keep them not out of malice to commit transgressions.
hil: Keep them not out of malice to commit transgressions.
compare: Keep them not out of malice to commit transgressions.

src: ER erschuf die Himmel und die Erde in Gesetzmäßigkeit und gestaltete euch, dann machte eure Gestalten schön.
ref: He created the heavens and the earth with Truth and shaped you, giving you excellent shapes.
draft: "HE created the heavens and the earth in order and fashioned you, then made your forms beautiful."
hil: "He created the heavens and the earth with a genuine purpose and formed you, then made your forms beautiful."
compare: "HE created the heavens and the earth in order and fashioned you, then made your forms beautiful."

src: Sag: "Ist dies besser oder die Dschanna der Ewigkeit, die den Muttaqi versprochen wurde?!"
ref: Ask them: "Is this better or a garden for everlasting abode which has been promised the pious and devout?
draft: Say: "Is this better or the Jannah of eternity that was promised to the Muttaqi?!"
hil: Say: "Is this better or the Jannah of eternity that was promised to the Muttaqi?!"
compare: Say: "Is this better or the Jannah of eternity that was promised to the Muttaqi?!"

src: Allah will für euch Erleichterung; Er will für euch nicht Erschwernis, - damit ihr die Anzahl vollendet und Allah als den Größten preist, dafür, daß Er euch rechtgeleitet hat, auf daß ihr dankbar sein möget.
ref: Allah intendeth for you ease, and intendeth not for you hardship; so ye shall fulfil the number and shall magnify Allah for His having guided you, and haply ye may give thanks.
draft: Allah wants to give you relief; He does not want to cause you hardship - so that you may fulfill the number (of fasts), and glorify Allah for guiding you, and that you may be thankful.
hil: Allah wants to give you relief; He does not want to cause you hardship - so that you may complete the number (of fasts), and glorify Allah as the Greatest, for guiding you, and so that you may be thankful.
compare: Allah wants to give you relief; He does not want to cause you hardship - so that you may fulfill the number (of fasts), and glorify Allah for guiding you, and that you may be thankful.

src: Ich habe Dir das gelobt, was ich in meinem Bauch trage - nur für den Gottesdienst (zu weihen), so nimm es von mir an!
ref: I have vowed to You what (the child that) is in my womb to be dedicated for Your services (free from all worldly work; to serve Your Place of worship), so accept this, from me.
draft: I promised you what I carry in my belly - only for the purpose of sanctification, so accept it from me!
hil: I have vowed to you what I carry in my belly, only for the purpose of consecrating it [for service to Allah], so accept it from me.
compare: I have vowed to you what I carry in my belly, only for the purpose of consecrating it [for service to Allah], so accept it from me.

src: Also welche von beiden Gruppen ist mehr berechtigt, sich sicher zu fühlen, solltet ihr es wissen?
ref: Tell me, whose way is the way of peace, if you have the knowledge?
draft: So which of the two groups is more entitled to feel safe, should you know?
hil: So which of the two groups is more entitled to feel safe, should you know?
compare: So which of the two groups is more entitled to feel safe, should you know?

src: Dann bezichtigten sie ihn der Lüge, dann richteten WIR sie zugrunde.
ref: Then they accused him of lies; so We annihilated them.
draft: Then they accused him of lying, then WE destroyed them.
hil: Then they accused him of lying, then WE destroyed them.
compare: Then they accused him of lying, then WE destroyed them.

src: Und sie sagen: "O du, dem (angeblich) die Ermahnung offenbart worden ist, du bist ja fürwahr besessen.
ref: And yet they say: "You, to whom this Exposition has been sent are surely possessed of the Devil.
draft: And they say, "O you, to whom (allegedly) the admonition has been revealed, you are indeed possessed.
hil: And they said, 'O you to whom (allegedly) the admonition has been revealed, you are indeed possessed.'
compare: And they said, 'O you to whom (allegedly) the admonition has been revealed, you are indeed possessed.'

src: Bereits sehen WIR das Schweifen deines Gesichts himmelwärts. So werden WIR dich gewiß eine Gebetsrichtung einnehmen lassen, an der du Wohlgefallen findest. So wende dich mit dem Gesicht in Richtung von Almasdschidil-haram, und allerorts, wo ihr seid, wendet euch mit dem Gesicht in seine Richtung! Auch sicher, diejenigen, denen die Schrift zuteil wurde, wissen zweifellos, daß es doch die Wahrheit von ihrem HERRN ist. Und ALLAH ist gewiß nicht achtlos dem gegenüber, was ihr tut.
ref: We observe you turning your face, several times towards heaven (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him); so We will definitely make you turn (for prayer) towards a qiblah which pleases you; therefore now turn your face towards the Sacred Mosque (in Mecca); and O Muslims, wherever you may be, turn your faces (for prayer) towards it only; and those who have received the Book surely know that this is the truth from their Lord; and Allah is not unaware of their deeds. (Allah seeks to please the Holy Prophet – peace and blessings be upon him.)
draft: Already we see your face turning to the sky. So we will certainly allow you to take a direction of prayer that you find pleasing. So turn your face towards Al-Masjid al-Haram and wherever you are, turn your face towards its direction. And those to whom the Scripture was given know that it is the truth from their Lord. And Allah is not unaware of what you do.
hil: Already we see your face turning to the sky. So we will certainly allow you to take a direction of prayer that you find pleasing. So turn your face towards Al-Masjid al-Haram and wherever you are, turn your face towards its direction! And those to whom the Scripture was given know without doubt that it is the truth from their Lord. And Allah is certainly not unaware of your deeds.
compare: Already we see your face turning to the sky. So we will certainly allow you to take a direction of prayer that you find pleasing. So turn your face towards Al-Masjid al-Haram and wherever you are, turn your face towards its direction. And those to whom the Scripture was given know that it is the truth from their Lord. And Allah is not unaware of what you do.

src: Schreit heute nicht um Hilfe!
ref: Invoke not loudly this day!
draft: Do not scream for help today!
hil: Do not cry for help today!
compare: Do not cry for help today!

src: Es wurde befohlen: "O Noah, geh an Land, (und sei) mit Unserem Frieden begleitet!
ref: It was said, “O Nooh!
draft: It has been commanded: "O Noah, go ashore, (and be) accompanied by Our peace!
hil: And it was said, 'O Noah, disembark, (and be) accompanied by Our peace!'
compare: And it was said, 'O Noah, disembark, (and be) accompanied by Our peace!'

src: Sie sagten: "Al-'aziz! Er hat doch einen Vater, der ein Greis ist, so nimm einen von uns an seiner Stelle fest.
ref: They said: "O Minister, he has an aged father, so keep one of us in his place.
draft: They said, "Al-'aziz! He does have a father who is an old man, so take one of us in his place."
hil: They said, 'O minister, he has an old father, so keep one of us in his place; for we see that you are a virtuous man.'
compare: They said, "Al-'aziz! He does have a father who is an old man, so take one of us in his place."

src: Wenn ihr das nicht tut, wird Verwirrung im Lande und gewaltiges Unheil entstehen.
ref: Unless you do the same there will be discord in the land and anarchy.
draft: If you don't do that, confusion in the country and tremendous disaster will arise.
hil: If you do not do this, there will be confusion in the country and tremendous disaster will arise.
compare: If you don't do that, confusion in the country and tremendous disaster will arise.

src: Das ist die Huld Gottes. Er läßt sie zukommen, wem Er will. Und Gott besitzt große Huld.
ref: This is Allah’s munificence, which He may give to whomever He wills; and Allah is Extremely Munificent.
draft: This is the grace of God. He bestows it upon whom He wills. And God possesses great grace.
hil: This is divine grace; He bestows it upon whom He wills. And God possesses great grace.
compare: This is divine grace; He bestows it upon whom He wills. And God possesses great grace.

src: Ein Wohlgefallen von Gott ist aber größer.
ref: But the greatest bliss is the Good Pleasure of Allah.
draft: A pleasure from God, however, is greater.
hil: A pleasure from God, however, is greater.
compare: A pleasure from God, however, is greater.

src: Begebt euch in einen Schatten mit drei Verzweigungen,
ref: Go to the shadow with three ramifications,
draft: "Go into a shadow with three branches.
hil: Go into a shadow with three branches.
compare: "Go into a shadow with three branches.

src: Sie sagten: "Bist du zu uns gekommen, um uns von unseren Göttern abwendig zu machen? So bring uns doch her, was du uns androhst, wenn du zu den Wahrhaftigen gehörst."
ref: They said: art thou come Unto us that thou mayest turn us aside from our gods? then bring thou upon us that wherewith thou threatenest us, if thou art of the truth-tellers.
draft: They said: "Have you come to turn us away from our gods? So bring to us what you threaten us with, if you belong to the truthful ones."
hil: They said, "Have you come to turn us away from our gods? So bring to us what you threaten us with, if you belong to the truthful ones."
compare: They said: "Have you come to turn us away from our gods? So bring to us what you threaten us with, if you belong to the truthful ones."

src: Das ist der Lohn der Ungläubigen.
ref: This is the recompense of those who do not believe.
draft: "This is the reward of the unbelievers."
hil: This is the recompense of the disbelievers.
compare: "This is the reward of the unbelievers."

src: So zieh mit deinen Angehörigen in einem Teil der Nacht fort, und folge du hinterdrein. Und keiner von euch soll sich umdrehen.
ref: Depart with your family in a part of the night and walk behind them and let none of you turn round.
draft: So depart with your family in a part of the night, and follow along behind. And none of you shall turn around.
hil: So depart with your family in a part of the night, and follow behind. And none of you shall turn around.
compare: So depart with your family in a part of the night, and follow behind. And none of you shall turn around.

src: Und sie kamen vor ALLAH allesamt. Die Schwachen sagten dann zu denjenigen, die sich in Arroganz erhoben haben: "Wir waren doch Gefolgsleute von euch! Könnt ihr von uns (nicht) etwas von ALLAHs Peinigung abwehren?" Sie sagten: "Hätte ALLAH uns rechtleiten lassen, hätten wir euch gewiß rechtgeleitet. Es ist uns gleich, ob wir uns in Ungeduld oder in Geduld üben. Für uns gibt es kein Entrinnen mehr."
