hil: HE is the One Who sent tranquility to the hearts of the believers so that they may increase in faith upon their faith. And to Allah belong the hosts of the heavens and the earth, and Allah is ever Knowing, Wise.
compare: HE is the One Who sent tranquility to the hearts of the believers so that they may increase in faith upon their faith. And to Allah belong the hosts of the heavens and the earth, and Allah is ever Knowing, Wise.

src: Esset von ihren Früchten, wenn sie Früchte tragen, doch gebet davon am Tage der Ernte (dem Armen) seinen Anteil, seid (dabei aber) nicht verschwenderisch! Wahrlich, Er liebt diejenigen nicht, die nicht maßhalten.
ref: So eat of their fruit when they are in fruit, and give on the day of harvesting His due, and do not be extravagant, for God does not love those who are prodigal.
draft: Eat of their fruits when they bear fruit, but give their due alms on the day of their harvest. And do not be wasteful. He does not love the wasteful.
hil: Eat from their fruits when they bear fruit, but give the due share to the poor on the day of harvest, and do not be wasteful. Verily, He does not love those who do not exercise moderation.
compare: Eat from their fruits when they bear fruit, but give the due share to the poor on the day of harvest, and do not be wasteful. Verily, He does not love those who do not exercise moderation.

src: (Alles) Lob gehört Allah, dem Herrn der Weltenbewohner!
ref: All praise be to God, the Lord of all the worlds.
draft: All praise belongs to Allah, the Lord of the worlds inhabitants!
hil: All praise is due to Allah, the Lord of the inhabitants of the worlds!
compare: All praise belongs to Allah, the Lord of the worlds inhabitants!

src: Ihr meintet, daß der Gesandte und die Gläubigen niemals mehr zu ihren Angehörigen zurückkehren würden, und das ist euch in euren Herzen ausgeschmückt worden.
ref: You had imagined that the Messenger and the believers would never return to their families, and this notion was embellished in your hearts.
draft: You meant that the messenger and the believers would never return to their families, and that has been embellished in your hearts.
hil: "You thought that the messenger and the believers would never return to their families, and this has been embellished in your hearts. "
compare: "You thought that the messenger and the believers would never return to their families, and this has been embellished in your hearts. "

src: Und gehorcht ALLAH und gehorcht dem Gesandten!
ref: Obey God and obey His Apostle.
draft: And obey ALLAH and obey the messenger!
hil: And obey God and obey the Apostle!
compare: And obey ALLAH and obey the messenger!

src: Als der Prophet einer seiner Gattinnen eine Mitteilung im geheimen anvertraute.
ref: The Prophet told something in confidence to one of his wives.
draft: When the prophet entrusted one of his wives with a secret message.
hil: When the prophet commanded one of his wives in secret.
compare: When the prophet entrusted one of his wives with a secret message.

src: Sie haben außer Ihm keinen Freund.
ref: How well does He hear!
draft: They have no friend besides him.
hil: They have no friend besides Him.
compare: They have no friend besides him.

src: Demjenigen von beiden, von dem er dachte, daß er doch gerettet wird, sagte er dann: "Erwähne mich vor deinem Gebieter!"
ref: Then he said to the one he deemed should be saved of the two, 'Mention me in thy lord's presence.'
draft: To the one of both, of whom he thought that he will be saved, he then said: "Mention me before your master!"
hil: To the one he knew would be released, he said, 'Remember me to your lord!'.
compare: To the one he knew would be released, he said, 'Remember me to your lord!'.

src: Und (Wir sandten) zu Tamud ihren Bruder Salih. Er sagte: "O mein Volk, dient Allah! Keinen Gott habt ihr außer Ihm. Er hat euch aus der Erde entstehen lassen und sie euch zu besiedeln gegeben. So bittet Ihn um Vergebung, hierauf bereut vor Ihm. Mein Herr ist nahe und erhört (die Gebete)."
ref: And to the Thamud tribe, We sent their fellow man Saleh; he said, “O my people! Worship Allah, there is no other True God except Him; He created you from the earth and established you in it, so seek forgiveness from Him and incline towards Him in repentance; indeed my Lord is Close, Acceptor of Prayer.”
draft: And (We sent) to Thamud their brother Salih. He said: "O my people, worship Allah! You have no god but Him. He has caused you to arise from the earth and has given you a place to live there. So ask Him for forgiveness, then repent before Him. My Lord is near and hears (the prayers)."
hil: And to Thamud We sent their brother Saleh. He said: 'O my people, worship Allah! You have no god but Him. It is He who produced you from the earth and has given you a place to live there. So ask Him for forgiveness, then repent to Him. Surely, my Lord is near, and answers prayer.'
compare: And (We sent) to Thamud their brother Salih. He said: "O my people, worship Allah! You have no god but Him. He has caused you to arise from the earth and has given you a place to live there. So ask Him for forgiveness, then repent before Him. My Lord is near and hears (the prayers)."

src: So macht Allah euch Seine Zeichen klar, auf daß ihr begreifen möget.
ref: So does God pronounce His decrees that you may understand.
draft: So Allah makes His signs clear to you, that you may understand.
hil: Thus does Allah make clear to you His signs that you may understand.
compare: Thus does Allah make clear to you His signs that you may understand.

src: Richte deine Augen nicht auf das, was WIR manchen von ihnen an vergänglichen Verbrauchsgütern zur Verfügung stellten. Und trauere nicht um sie, und behandle die Mumin milde!
ref: So covet not things We have bestowed on a portion of them to enjoy, and do not grieve for them, and protect those who believe;
draft: Do not focus your eyes on what WE provided some of them with as perishable consumer goods. And do not mourn for them, and treat the Mumin kindly!
hil: Do not set your eyes on the perishable consumer goods that WE have provided to some of them. And do not mourn for them, and treat the Mumin kindly!
compare: Do not set your eyes on the perishable consumer goods that WE have provided to some of them. And do not mourn for them, and treat the Mumin kindly!

src: Und diejenigen, die den Iman verinnerlicht und gottgefällig Gutes getan haben, werden WIR in Dschannat eintreten lassen, die von Flüssen durchflossen sind, darin werden sie für immer und ewig bleiben. Dies ist ALLAHs Versprechen, ein Wahrhaftiges.
ref: And those who believed and did good deeds – We shall soon admit them into Gardens beneath which rivers flow, abiding in them for ever and ever; a true promise from Allah; and whose Words are more true than those of Allah?
draft: And those who have internalized the iman and done good deeds pleasing to God, We will admit them to the gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide forever. This is the promise of Allah - a truth He grants.
hil: Allah promised those who have internalized iman and done good deeds that We will admit them into jannat, which is flowing with rivers, and they will abide in there forever and ever. This is Allah's true promise.
compare: And those who have internalized the iman and done good deeds pleasing to God, We will admit them to the gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide forever. This is the promise of Allah - a truth He grants.

src: Auf Gott sollen die Gläubigen vertrauen.
ref: The believers should only place their trust in God.
draft: The believers shall trust in God.
hil: And the believers shall rely on God.
compare: The believers shall trust in God.

src: Alsdann wird jeder Seele nach ihrem Verdienst vergolten werden, und es soll ihnen kein Unrecht geschehen.
ref: Then every person shall be paid in full what he has earned, - and they shall not be dealt with unjustly.
draft: Then every soul will be rewarded according to its merit, and no injustice shall be done to them.
hil: "Then every soul will be repaid according to what it has earned, and no injustice shall be done to them."
compare: "Then every soul will be repaid according to what it has earned, and no injustice shall be done to them."

src: Als Mose zu unserem Termin kam und sein Herr zu ihm sprach, sagte er: «Mein Herr, zeige (Dich) mir, daß ich zu Dir schaue.»
ref: When Moses arrived at the appointed time and his Lord spoke to him, he said: "O Lord, reveal Yourself to me that I may behold You."
draft: When Moses came to our appointment and his master spoke to him, he said: "My Lord, show me that I may look upon you."
hil: "My Lord, show me that I may look upon you," said Moses when he arrived at our appointment and his master spoke to him.
compare: When Moses came to our appointment and his master spoke to him, he said: "My Lord, show me that I may look upon you."

src: Ist die Ermahnung unter uns nur zu ihm allein gekommen?" Nein, sie hegen Zweifel über Meine Er mahnung. Nein, sie haben Meine Strafe nicht gekostet.
ref: What, out of all of us, has the Remembrance been sent down to him (Prophet Muhammad)' No, they are doubtful about My Remembrance, no, they have not yet tasted My punishment.
draft: "Has the admonition only come to him alone among us?" No, they have doubts about My admonition. No, they have not tasted My punishment.
hil: Has the admonishment only come to him alone among us? No, they harbor doubts about My admonishment. No, they have not tasted My punishment.
compare: Has the admonishment only come to him alone among us? No, they harbor doubts about My admonishment. No, they have not tasted My punishment.

src: Dann lächelte er doch wegen ihrer Aussage und sagte: "Mein HERR!
ref: So he [Sulaiman (Solomon)] smiled, amused at her speech and said: "My Lord!
draft: Then he smiled because of her statement and said, "My lord!"
hil: Then he smiled at her statement and said, 'My Lord!'
compare: Then he smiled because of her statement and said, "My lord!"

src: Ihr Menschen! Bereits kam zu euch doch eine Ermahnung von eurem HERRN, eine Heilung von dem, was in den Brüsten (an Zweifel) ist, eine Rechtleitung und eine Gnade für die Mumin.
ref: O men, a warning has come to you from your Lord, a remedy for the (doubts) of the heart, and a guidance and grace for those who believe.
draft: Oh people! Indeed, there has come to you an advice from your Lord, a healing for what is in the hearts (doubts), and a guidance and mercy for the believers.
hil: Oh people! Indeed, there has come to you an advice from your Lord, a healing for what is in the hearts (doubts), and a guidance and mercy for the believers.
compare: Oh people! Indeed, there has come to you an advice from your Lord, a healing for what is in the hearts (doubts), and a guidance and mercy for the believers.

src: Übertreibt nicht in eurem Din (und sagt nichts) außer der Wahrheit und folgt nicht den Neigungen von Leuten, die bereits vorher irregegangen sind, viele in die Irre verleitet haben und vom rechten Weg abgekommen sind."
ref: Do not wrongfully commit injustice in your religion, and do not follow the people who earlier went astray, and led many others astray, and wandered away from the Straight Path.”
draft: Do not exaggerate in your religion (and say nothing) except the truth and do not follow the inclinations of people who have gone astray before, led many astray, and strayed from the right path.
hil: Do not exaggerate in your religion (and say nothing) except for the truth and do not follow the desires of people who have already gone astray, led many astray and strayed from the straight path.
compare: Do not exaggerate in your religion (and say nothing) except the truth and do not follow the inclinations of people who have gone astray before, led many astray, and strayed from the right path.

src: Lasse die Kinder Isra'ils mit uns gehen, und strafe sie nicht.
ref: So let the children of Israel come with us, and do not oppress them.
draft: Let the children of Israel go with us and do not punish them.
hil: Let the Descendants of Israel go with us and do not punish them.
compare: Let the children of Israel go with us and do not punish them.

src: O ihr, die ihr glaubt, kehrt zu Gott um in aufrichtiger Umkehr. Möge Gott euch eure Missetaten sühnen und euch in Gärten eingehen lassen, unter denen Bäche fließen, am Tag, da Gott den Propheten und die, die mit ihm gläubig sind, nicht zuschanden macht!
ref: O ye who believe! Turn to Allah with sincere repentance: In the hope that your Lord will remove from you your ills and admit you to Gardens beneath which Rivers flow,- the Day that Allah will not permit to be humiliated the Prophet and those who believe with him.
draft: O you who believe, turn to God in sincere repentance. May God atone for your misdeeds and admit you to gardens beneath which rivers flow, on the Day when God will not put the Prophet and those who believe with him to shame!
hil: O you who believe, turn to God in sincere repentance; maybe God will forgive you your sins and permit you to enter gardens beneath which rivers flow, on the day when God will not put to shame the Prophet and those who believe with him!
compare: O you who believe, turn to God in sincere repentance. May God atone for your misdeeds and admit you to gardens beneath which rivers flow, on the Day when God will not put the Prophet and those who believe with him to shame!

src: Und die Himmel sind zusammengerollt mit Seiner Allmacht. Gepriesen-erhaben ist ER und immer höher über das, was sie an Schirk betreiben.
ref: Hallowed be He and Exalted above that which they associate.
draft: And the heavens are rolled together with His might. Praised be He and always higher above what they practice in shirk.
hil: And the heavens are rolled together with His might. Praised be He and always higher above what they practice in shirk.
compare: And the heavens are rolled together with His might. Praised be He and always higher above what they practice in shirk.

src: (Erinnere daran), als er zum voll beladenen Schiff floh.
ref: When he fled on the laden ship,
draft: (Remember) when he fled to the fully loaded ship.
hil: Remember when he fled to the fully loaded ship.
compare: (Remember) when he fled to the fully loaded ship.

src: Das bewirkt es eher, daß ihr euch vor Ungerechtigkeit bewahrt.
ref: This is better than being iniquitous.
draft: It rather ensures that you protect yourself from injustice.
hil: It rather ensures that you protect yourself from injustice.
compare: It rather ensures that you protect yourself from injustice.

src: Darum esset davon und speist den Notleidenden, den Bedürftigen.
ref: So eat thereof, and feed the hungry poor.
draft: Therefore eat of it and feed the needy, the destitute.
hil: Therefore, eat of it and feed the needy, the destitute.
compare: Therefore eat of it and feed the needy, the destitute.

src: Und pflegt keinen Verkehr mit ihnen, während ihr euch in die Moscheen zurückgezogen habt.
ref: And do not have sexual relations with them (your wives) while you are in I'tikaf (i.e. confining oneself in a mosque for prayers and invocations leaving the worldly activities) in the mosques.
draft: And do not have any relations with them while you have withdrawn to the mosques.
hil: And do not have any relations with them while you have withdrawn to the mosques.
compare: And do not have any relations with them while you have withdrawn to the mosques.

src: Die bittere Armut und die Krankheit suchten sie heim und sie wurden erschüttert, bis der Gesandte und diejenigen mit ihm, die den Iman verinnerlicht haben, sagten: "Wann kommt ALLAHs Beistand?" Ja!
ref: Hardship and adversity befell them and they were shaken, to the extent that the Noble Messenger and the believers along with him said, “When will the help of Allah come?”; pay heed!
draft: The bitter poverty and illness befell them and they were shaken until the Messenger and those with him who have internalized the faith said, "When will Allah's help come?" Yes!
hil: The bitter poverty and illness befell them and they were shaken until the Messenger and those with him who have embraced the faith said, "When will Allah's help come?" Yes!
compare: The bitter poverty and illness befell them and they were shaken until the Messenger and those with him who have internalized the faith said, "When will Allah's help come?" Yes!

src: Sie werden, wenn sie die Pein sehen, zu wissen bekommen, wer weiter vom Weg abgeirrt ist.
ref: They will know soon who is farther away from the path when they see the punishment!
draft: You will realize, when you see the agony, who has wandered further from the path.
hil: When they see the agony, they will know who has wandered further from the path.
compare: When they see the agony, they will know who has wandered further from the path.

src: Diejenigen, die nicht umkehren, sind die, die Unrecht tun.
ref: Those who do not repent behave wickedly.
draft: Those who do not repent are the ones who do wrongdoing.
hil: Those who do not repent are the ones who do wrong.
compare: Those who do not repent are the ones who do wrongdoing.

src: Bereits ALLAH hat uns von euren Begebenheiten kundgetan. Und ALLAH wird eure Taten sehen sowie Sein Gesandter, dann werdet ihr zum Allwissenden über das Verborgene und das Sichtbare zurückgebracht, dann wird ER euch das kundtun, was ihr zu tun pflegtet.
ref: And God will watch your actions, and so will the Messenger; then you will be returned to the Knower of the Invisible and the Visible, and He will inform you of what you used to do.”
draft: Already Allah has informed us about your incidents. And Allah will see your deeds as well as His Messenger, then you will be returned to the All-Knowing about the hidden and the visible, then He will inform you of what you used to do.
hil: Already God has informed us about your incidents. And God will see your deeds as well as His apostle and then you will be returned to the one who knows the unknown and the known, and He will inform you of what you used to do.
compare: Already God has informed us about your incidents. And God will see your deeds as well as His apostle and then you will be returned to the one who knows the unknown and the known, and He will inform you of what you used to do.

src: Das ist die Rede eines edlen Gesandten,
ref: That this is indeed the word of the noble Messenger,
draft: "This is the speech of a noble envoy,".
hil: "This is the speech of a noble envoy".
compare: "This is the speech of a noble envoy,".

src: Und ihnen wurde kein Aufschub gewährt.
ref: They were granted no respite.
draft: And no reprieve was granted to them.
hil: And no reprieve was granted to them.
compare: And no reprieve was granted to them.

src: Und sie riefen: "Malik! Laß deinen HERRN uns vernichten!" Er sagte: "Gewiß, ihr müsst bleiben."
ref: And they shall call, 'O
draft: And they cried out: "Malik! Let your Lord destroy us!" He said, "Surely, you will remain."
hil: And they will cry: "O Malik (keeper of Hell)!" Let your Lord destroy us!," He said, "Surely, you will remain."
compare: And they cried out: "Malik! Let your Lord destroy us!" He said, "Surely, you will remain."

src: Alif Lam Ra. Dies sind die Zeichen des weisen Buches.
ref: Alif-Lam-Ra*; these are verses of the Book of wisdom. (*alphabets of the Arabic language; Allah and to whomever He reveals, know their precise meanings.)
draft: Alif Lam Ra. These are the signs of the wise book.
hil: Alif Lam Ra. These are the verses of the authoritative Book.
compare: Alif Lam Ra. These are the verses of the authoritative Book.

src: Diese sind unsere Leute, sie nahmen sich anstelle von Ihm Götter. Würden sie doch dafür eine klare Bestätigung vorlegen! Und keiner begeht noch mehr Unrecht als derjenige, der im Namen ALLAHs Lügen erfindet!
ref: These, our people, have taken for themselves gods beside Him - wherefore bring they not for them an authority manifest? --and who doth greater wrong than he who fabricateth against God a lie?
draft: These are our people, they took gods instead of Him. If only they could present a clear proof for it! And no one commits more wrongdoing than the one who invents lies about Allah's name!
hil: These are our people, they took gods instead of Him. If only they could present a clear proof for it! And who is more wicked than he who fabricates a lie against God!
compare: These are our people, they took gods instead of Him. If only they could present a clear proof for it! And no one commits more wrongdoing than the one who invents lies about Allah's name!

src: Da sprach Pharao: "Bringt mir einen jeden kundigen Zauberer herbei."
ref: "Bring the cleverest magicians to me," said the Pharaoh.
draft: Pharaoh said, "Bring me every skilled magician."
hil: Pharaoh said, 'Bring me every skilled magician.'
compare: Pharaoh said, 'Bring me every skilled magician.'

src: Ja! Nieder mit Madyan, wie es nieder mit Thamud war.
ref: Lo! a far removal for Madyan, even as Thamud were removed afar!
draft: Yes! Down with Midian as it was down with Thamud.
hil: Yes! Down with Midian as it was down with Thamud!
compare: Yes! Down with Midian as it was down with Thamud!

src: Verzeihe uns, vergib uns und erbarme Dich unser!
ref: Pardon us and grant us Forgiveness.
draft: Please forgive us, pardon us and have mercy on us!
hil: Forgive us, pardon us, and have mercy on us!
compare: Please forgive us, pardon us and have mercy on us!

src: So war es.
ref: Thus it was.
draft: So it was.
hil: So it was.
compare: So it was.

src: Bring du sie vom Westen.»
ref: You make it come from the West."
draft: "Bring them from the West."
hil: "Bring them from the West."
compare: "Bring them from the West."

src: Erbärmlich ist der Fisq-Name nach dem Iman. Und wer nicht bereut, so sind diese die Unrecht-Begehenden.
ref: And whoever does not repent – then it is they who are unjust.
draft: "Pitiful is the name of Fisq after the Imam. And those who do not repent, they are the wrongdoers."
hil: "Pitiful is the name of Fisq after the Iman. And those who do not repent, they are the wrongdoers."
compare: "Pitiful is the name of Fisq after the Imam. And those who do not repent, they are the wrongdoers."

src: ER ist unser Maula!"
ref: He is our Maula (Lord, Helper and Protector)."
draft: "He is our whipping boy!"
hil: "He is our whipping boy!"
compare: "He is our whipping boy!"

src: Ihr habt doch keine Gottheit außer Ihm und mindert nicht das Maß und das Wiegen. Ich sehe doch, daß es euch gut geht, auch gewiß, ich fürchte um euch die Peinigung eines alles umfassenden Tages.
ref: Worship Allah, you have no other Ilah (God) but Him, and give not short measure or weight, I see you in prosperity; and verily I fear for you the torment of a Day encompassing.
draft: You have no deity except Him, and do not diminish [the measure or weight]. Indeed, I see you well-off and [yet] indeed, I fear for you the punishment of an all-encompassing Day.
hil: You have no deity except Him, and do not diminish [the measure or weight]. Indeed, I see you well-off and [yet] indeed, I fear for you the punishment of an all-encompassing Day.
compare: You have no deity except Him, and do not diminish [the measure or weight]. Indeed, I see you well-off and [yet] indeed, I fear for you the punishment of an all-encompassing Day.

src: Er sagte: "Kann ich ihn euch etwa anders anvertrauen, als ich euch seinen Bruder vorher anvertraut habe? Doch ALLAH ist Der beste Beschützer und ER ist Der Allgnädigste der Gnade-Erweisenden."
ref: He said: I intrust you with him only as I intrusted you with his brother aforetime; Allah is the best Guard, and He is the Most Merciful of the merciful.
draft: He said: "Can I entrust him to you in any other way than I entrusted his brother to you before? But ALLAH is the best protector and HE is the Most Gracious of the Merciful."
hil: He said, "Can I entrust him to you in any other way than I entrusted his brother to you before? But Allah is the best protector, and He is the Most Gracious of the Merciful."
compare: He said, "Can I entrust him to you in any other way than I entrusted his brother to you before? But Allah is the best protector, and He is the Most Gracious of the Merciful."

src: Diejenigen, die ungläubig waren, sagten zu ihren Gesandten: "Wir werden euch ganz gewiß aus unserem Land vertreiben, oder aber ihr kehrt zu unserem Glaubensbekenntnis zurück!"
ref: The unbelievers said to their apostles: "We shall drive you out of our land, or else you come back to our fold."
draft: Those who were unbelievers said to their messengers: "We will certainly drive you out of our land, unless you return to our creed!"
hil: Those who were unbelievers said to their messengers: 'We will certainly drive you out of our land, unless you return to our creed!'
compare: Those who were unbelievers said to their messengers: "We will certainly drive you out of our land, unless you return to our creed!"

src: Als sie kam, da wurde gesprochen: "Ist dein Thron wie dieser?" Sie sagte: "Es ist, als wäre er ein und derselbe." Und uns wurde (davon) Wissen, schon vor ihr, verliehen; und wir hatten uns bereits (Allah) ergeben.
ref: And when she came she was asked: 'Is your throne like this' And she replied: 'It looks like it' And we were given the knowledge before her, and wereMuslims.
draft: When she arrived, it was said: "Is your throne like this?" She said, "It is as if it were the same one." And knowledge was bestowed upon us before her, and we had already surrendered to Allah.
hil: "Is your throne like this?" She said, "It is as if it were the same one." And knowledge was bestowed upon us before her, and we had already surrendered to Allah.
compare: When she arrived, it was said: "Is your throne like this?" She said, "It is as if it were the same one." And knowledge was bestowed upon us before her, and we had already surrendered to Allah.

src: Und wenn ihr Schwierigkeiten miteinander habt, so wird für ihn eine andere stillen.
ref: But if you find this difficult, let some other woman suckle (the child) for her.
draft: And if you have difficulties with each other, another will quieten for him.
hil: And if you have difficulties with each other, let another woman breastfeed for him.
compare: And if you have difficulties with each other, another will quieten for him.

src: Am Tag, an dem Wir den Himmel zusammenfalten, wie das Urkundenbuch die Schriftstücke zusammenfaltet. Wie Wir eine erste Schöpfung am Anfang gemacht haben, wiederholen Wir sie.
ref: The day We shall roll up the heavens like a written scroll, We shall revert it (to nothing) as it was before We first created it.
draft: On the day when we fold the sky together, like the document book folds the documents together. As We made a first creation in the beginning, we repeat it.
hil: On the day when We shall roll up the heavens like a scroll rolled up for books, as We began the first creation, We shall repeat it. This is a promise binding upon Us and We shall certainly fulfill it.
compare: On the day when We shall roll up the heavens like a scroll rolled up for books, as We began the first creation, We shall repeat it. This is a promise binding upon Us and We shall certainly fulfill it.

src: Und den Juden haben Wir alles Getier untersagt, das Krallen hat; und von den Rindern und vom Kleinvieh haben Wir ihnen das Fett verboten, ausgenommen das, was an ihrem Rücken sitzt oder in den Eingeweiden oder mit den Knochen verwachsen ist. Damit haben Wir ihnen ihre Auflehnung vergolten. Und siehe, Wir sind Wahrhaftig.
ref: And for the Jews We forbade all animals with claws; and forbade them the fat of oxen and sheep except which is on their backs or joined to their intestines or to the bone; We awarded this to them for their rebellion; and indeed, surely, We are truthful.
draft: And We have forbidden the Jews from all animals that have claws, and from the cattle and small livestock We have prohibited them from fat, except what is on their backs or entrails or attached to the bone. Thus We have repaid them for their defiance. And indeed, We are Truthful.
hil: We have made unlawful for the Jews every animal that has claws or nails, and have forbidden them from the fat of oxen or sheep except that on their backs, in their intestines, or attached to their bones. Thus, We have repaid them for their defiance. And indeed, We are truthful.
compare: And We have forbidden the Jews from all animals that have claws, and from the cattle and small livestock We have prohibited them from fat, except what is on their backs or entrails or attached to the bone. Thus We have repaid them for their defiance. And indeed, We are Truthful.

src: Sind diese (Mumin) etwa diejenigen, von denen ihr geschworen habt, daß ALLAH ihnen keinerlei Gnade erweisen würde?!
ref: “Are these the people (Muslims) regarding whom you swore that Allah would not have mercy on them at all?
draft: Are these (Moomins) the ones whom you pledged Allah wouldn't show any mercy to?
hil: Are these the ones of whom you had sworn that Allah will not show any mercy to them?
compare: Are these the ones of whom you had sworn that Allah will not show any mercy to them?

src: Und ermahne damit diejenigen, die fürchten, zu ihrem HERRN versammelt zu werden, während es für sie (dabei) anstelle von Ihm weder Wali noch Fürbittenden gibt, damit sie Taqwa gemäß handeln.
ref: Warn those who fear, through this (Qur'an), that they will be gathered before their Lord, and they will have none to protect or intercede for them apart from Him. They may haply take heed for themselves.
draft: And thereby remind those who fear to be gathered to their Lord, while for them there is neither protector nor intercessor besides Him, that they may act with Taqwa.
hil: "Remind those who fear to be gathered to their Lord, while for them there is neither protector nor intercessor besides Him, that they may act with Taqwa."
compare: And thereby remind those who fear to be gathered to their Lord, while for them there is neither protector nor intercessor besides Him, that they may act with Taqwa.

src: Und gewiß, wir sind doch wahrhaftig."
ref: We are verily speaking the truth.'"
draft: And certainly, we are truly."
hil: "And surely, we are truly."
compare: And certainly, we are truly."

src: Wenn euch Gutes trifft, werden sie traurig. Wenn euch jedoch Übel überkommt, freuen sie sich darüber. Doch wenn ihr euch in Geduld übt und Taqwa gemäß handelt, wird ihre Heimtücke euch nicht im Geringsten schaden. Gewiß, ALLAH ist dessen, was sie tun, (mit Seinem Wissen) allumfassend.
ref: If good comes your way, they are vexed; but if evil befalls you they are pleased and rejoice; yet if you are patient and guard yourselves against evil, their cunning will not harm you in the least, for whatsoever they do is well within the reach of God.
draft: When something good happens to you, they feel sad. But when evil overcomes you, they rejoice. However, if you exercise patience and act according to Taqwa, their treachery will not harm you in the slightest. Indeed, Allah encompasses everything they do with His knowledge.
hil: If something good happens to you, they will be sad. But if evil befalls you, they will rejoice. However, if you exercise patience and act according to Taqwa, their treachery will not harm you in the least. Surely, Allah encompasses everything they do with His knowledge.
compare: When something good happens to you, they feel sad. But when evil overcomes you, they rejoice. However, if you exercise patience and act according to Taqwa, their treachery will not harm you in the slightest. Indeed, Allah encompasses everything they do with His knowledge.

src: Darin werden sie auf immer ewig weilen.
ref: Which they will enjoy for ever.
draft: They will dwell there forever and ever.
hil: Therein they will abide forever.
compare: They will dwell there forever and ever.

src: Dies ist für das, was ihr euch erworben habt. Und gewiß ist ALLAH den Dienern in keiner Weise ein Unrecht- Zufügender."
ref: “This is the recompense of what your own hands have sent ahead, and Allah does not oppress His bondmen.”
draft: This is for what you have acquired. And surely, Allah does not wrong his servants in any way.
hil: This is for what you have acquired. And surely, Allah does not wrong his servants in any way.
compare: This is for what you have acquired. And surely, Allah does not wrong his servants in any way.

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Nehmt kein Riba in vervielfacht verdoppelter Höhe ein, und handelt Taqwa gemäß ALLAH gegenüber, damit ihr erfolgreich seid.
ref: O you who believe, do not practice usury, charging doubled and redoubled (interest); but have fear of God: you may well attain your goal.
draft: You who have internalized the imam! Do not take riba in multiplied doubled amounts, and act in accordance with Taqwa towards ALLAH, so that you may be successful.
hil: Those of you who have internalized the faith! Do not take riba in multiplied doubled amounts, and act in accordance with Taqwa towards ALLAH, so that you may be successful.
compare: Those of you who have internalized the faith! Do not take riba in multiplied doubled amounts, and act in accordance with Taqwa towards ALLAH, so that you may be successful.

src: denjenigen, deren Leben die Engel beenden, während sie rein sind. Sie (die Engel) sagen: "Salam sei mit euch, tretet in Dschanna ein wegen dem, was ihr zu tun pflegtet."
ref: When the angels receive the souls of those who are blameless they will say: "Peace on you. Enter Paradise as recompense for what you did."
draft: "To those whose lives the angels end while they are pure. They (the angels) say: "Peace be upon you, enter Jannah because of what you used to do"."
hil: To those whose lives are ended by the angels while they are pure, it will be said, "Enter Paradise for what you were doing."
compare: "To those whose lives the angels end while they are pure. They (the angels) say: "Peace be upon you, enter Jannah because of what you used to do"."

src: Und wenn ihr krank oder auf Reisen seid oder der eine von euch von der Notdurft kommt oder ihr die Frauen (intim) berührt habt und kein Wasser finden könnt, dann sucht reine Erdoberfläche und streicht euch über eure Gesichter und Hände (bis zu den Ellbogen).
ref: And if you are ill, or on a journey, or one of you comes after answering the call of nature, or you have been in contact with women (by sexual relations) and you find no water, perform Tayammum with clean earth and rub therewith your faces and hands (Tayammum).
draft: And if you are ill or on a journey or one of you comes from relieving himself or you have contacted women and cannot find water, then seek clean ground and wipe over your faces and hands (up to the elbows).
hil: And if you are ill or on a journey or one of you comes from relieving himself or you have contacted women and cannot find water, then seek clean ground and wipe over your faces and hands (up to the elbows).
compare: And if you are ill or on a journey or one of you comes from relieving himself or you have contacted women and cannot find water, then seek clean ground and wipe over your faces and hands (up to the elbows).

src: Sag: "Ich suche Schutz bei Dem HERRN des Morgengrauens
ref: SAY: "I SEEK refuge with the Lord of rising day
draft: Say: "I seek refuge in the Lord of the Dawn."
hil: Say, 'I seek refuge in the Lord of the Dawn.'
compare: Say: "I seek refuge in the Lord of the Dawn."

src: Durch sie gewinnt ihr Wärme und (andere) Produkte. Und ihr ernährt euch von ihnen.
ref: He hath created them. For you in them there is warmth and other profits and of them ye eat.
draft: Through them, you gain warmth and (other) products. And you nourish yourselves from them.
hil: Through them, you gain warmth and (other) products. And you nourish yourselves from them.
compare: Through them, you gain warmth and (other) products. And you nourish yourselves from them.

src: Und wenn ihr den Iman und Taqwa verinnerlicht, läßt er euch eure Belohnung zuteil werden und verlangt von euch nicht euer Vermögen.
ref: If you believe and fear God, he will give you your reward, and will not ask for your possessions.
draft: And if you internalize the iman and taqwa, he will grant you your reward and will not demand your property from you.
hil: And when you have internalized the iman and taqwa, he will grant you your reward and will not demand your property from you.
compare: And if you internalize the iman and taqwa, he will grant you your reward and will not demand your property from you.

src: Diejenigen von den Leuten des Buches und von den Polytheisten, die nicht glauben, mögen es nicht gern, daß auf euch etwas Gutes von eurem Herrn herabgesandt wird. Gott aber schenkt seine Barmherzigkeit in besonderer Weise, wem Er will. Und Gott besitzt große Huld.
ref: Those who disbelieve – the People given the Book(s) or the polytheists – do not wish that any good be sent down upon you from your Lord; and Allah chooses whomever He wills by His Mercy; and Allah is the Most Munificent.
draft: Those of the people of the Book and the polytheists who disbelieve, would not like to see good (or any good) sent down to you from your Lord. But God selects for His Mercy whom He wills. And God is the possessor of great bounty.
hil: Those without faith among the people of the Book and those who worship idols do not wish any good to come to you from your Lord. But God chooses whom He likes for His grace, and the bounty of God is infinite.
compare: Those of the people of the Book and the polytheists who disbelieve, would not like to see good (or any good) sent down to you from your Lord. But God selects for His Mercy whom He wills. And God is the possessor of great bounty.

src: Also manche von ihnen sind rechtgeleitet, und viele von ihnen sind Fasiq.
ref: Then of them some are guided ones, and many of them are transgressors.
draft: Some of them are guided, while many of them are disobedient.
hil: So some of them are guided, but most of them are disobedient.
compare: So some of them are guided, but most of them are disobedient.

src: Und gewiß, bereits vor dir wurden Gesandte der Lüge bezichtigt, so haben sie sich in Geduld geübt für das, weswegen sie der Lüge bezichtigt wurden und ihnen Schaden zugefügt wurde, bis Unser Sieg ihnen zuteil wurde. Und es gibt keinen, der ALLAHs Versprechen abändern kann.
ref: Rejected were the messengers before thee: with patience and constancy they bore their rejection and their wrongs, until Our aid did reach them: there is none that can alter the words (and decrees) of Allah.
draft: And certainly, messengers before you were also accused of falsehood, but they were patient in the face of that for which they were accused of falsehood and being harmed until Our victory came to them. And there is none who can alter Allah's promise.
hil: Yet messengers before you were accused of falsehood, and they bore with fortitude the falsehoods and hurt inflicted upon them until Our help arrived. And there is none who can alter Allah's promise.
compare: And certainly, messengers before you were also accused of falsehood, but they were patient in the face of that for which they were accused of falsehood and being harmed until Our victory came to them. And there is none who can alter Allah's promise.

src: So (war es).
ref: Thus (it was)!
draft: So (it was).
hil: So it was.
compare: So (it was).

src: Sprich: Ob ihr das geheimhaltet, was in eurem Inneren ist, oder es offenlegt, Gott weiß es.
ref: Say: 'Whether you hide what is in your breasts or publish it, God knows it.
draft: Speak: Whether you keep secret what is in your innermost being, or reveal it, God knows it.
hil: Say, whether you conceal what is in your heart or reveal it, God knows it.
compare: Say, whether you conceal what is in your heart or reveal it, God knows it.

src: Aber dann, am Tag der Auferstehung verleugnet ihr einander und verflucht ihr einander.
ref: But then, on the Day of Resurrection, you will disown one another, and curse one another.
draft: But then, on the day of resurrection, you deny each other and curse each other.
hil: On the Day of Resurrection, however, you will deny each other and curse each other.
compare: On the Day of Resurrection, however, you will deny each other and curse each other.

src: Und WIR schmückten den untersten Himmel mit Lampen und Bewahrendem.
ref: And We adorned the nearest (lowest) heaven with lamps (stars) to be an adornment as well as to guard (from the devils by using them as missiles against the devils).
draft: And WE adorned the lowest heaven with lamps and guardians.
hil: And We adorned the lowest heaven with lamps (stars) to be an adornment as well as to guard (from the devils using them as missiles against the devils). This is the decree of Him the All-Mighty, the All-Knower.
compare: And We adorned the lowest heaven with lamps (stars) to be an adornment as well as to guard (from the devils using them as missiles against the devils). This is the decree of Him the All-Mighty, the All-Knower.

src: So ertrage geduldig, was sie sagen, und lobpreise deinen Herrn vor dem Aufgang der Sonne und vor dem (Sonnen-)untergang
ref: So you bear with patience what they say, and sing the praises of your Lord before the rising of the sun and its setting,
draft: So endure patiently what they say, and praise your Lord before the rising of the sun and before its setting.
hil: So be patient with what they say, and glorify your Lord before the rise of the sun and before its setting.
compare: So endure patiently what they say, and praise your Lord before the rising of the sun and before its setting.

src: O die ihr glaubt, berauschender Trank, Glücksspiel, Opfersteine und Lospfeile sind nur ein Greuel vom Werk des Satans.
ref: O believers, this wine and gambling, these idols, and these arrows you use for divination, are all acts of Satan; so keep away from them.
draft: O you who believe, intoxicants, gambling, idolatrous practices, and divining arrows are abominations of Satan's work.
hil: O you who believe! Intoxicants, gambling, idolatrous practices, and divining arrows are abominations from Satan's work.
compare: O you who believe, intoxicants, gambling, idolatrous practices, and divining arrows are abominations of Satan's work.

src: Diese jedoch lehrten niemanden, ohne zu sagen: «Wir sind nur eine Versuchung, so werde nicht ungläubig.»
ref: They learnt what led to discord between husband and wife.
draft: However, they did not teach anyone without saying: "We are only a temptation, so do not become an unbeliever."
hil: However, they taught no one without saying: 'We are only temptation, so do not become unbeliever.'
compare: However, they did not teach anyone without saying: "We are only a temptation, so do not become an unbeliever."

src: Und wer dies tut, der fügt sich selbst Unrecht zu.
ref: He who does so will wrong himself.
draft: And whoever does this, does himself wrong.
hil: "And whoever does this, does wrong to himself."
compare: "And whoever does this, does wrong to himself."

src: Sie sagen: «Die Wahrheit.» Und Er ist der Erhabene, der Große.
ref: They say, “All that He has proclaimed is the Truth; and He is the Supreme, the Great.”
draft: They say: "The truth." And He is the Sublime, the Great.
hil: They say: 'The truth.' And He is the Sublime, the Great.
compare: They say: "The truth." And He is the Sublime, the Great.

src: Und WIR prüften sie mit gottgefälligen guten Taten und mit den gottmißfälligen Taten, damit sie umkehren.
ref: And We tried them with good (blessings) and evil (calamities) in order that they might turn (to Allah's Obedience).
draft: And WE tested them with good deeds pleasing to God and with the deeds displeasing to God, in order that they might repent.
hil: And WE tested them with good deeds pleasing to God and with the deeds displeasing to God, so that they might repent.
compare: And WE tested them with good deeds pleasing to God and with the deeds displeasing to God, in order that they might repent.

src: Wenn Er damit die von seinen Dienern, die Er will, trifft, da sind sie froh,
ref: Then, when He makes it fall upon whom He wills of His servants, behold, they rejoice.
draft: If He meets those of His servants whom He chooses, they are glad.
hil: "As long as He meets those of His servants whom He wills, then they are happy."
compare: "As long as He meets those of His servants whom He wills, then they are happy."

src: Für die Ungläubigen nicht leicht.
ref: Dolorous for the unbelievers.
draft: For the unbelievers, not easy.
hil: For the unbelievers, not easy.
compare: For the unbelievers, not easy.

src: Und sie schreien darin laut: "Unser Herr, bringe uns heraus, so werden wir rechtschaffen handeln, anders als das, was wir zu tun pflegten." - "Haben Wir euch nicht ein so langes Leben gewährt, daß jeder, der hätte bedenken wollen, darin hätte bedenken können? Und ist nicht der Warner zu euch gekommen?
ref: And they will cry out therein, "Our Lord, remove us; we will do righteousness - other than what we were doing!" But did We not grant you life enough for whoever would remember therein to remember, and the warner had come to you?
draft: And they cry out loudly therein, "Our Lord, bring us out, and we will act righteously, unlike what we used to do." - "Have We not granted you a long enough life so that whoever was going to be reminded could be reminded therein? And did not a warner come to you?
hil: And they cry out loudly therein, 'Our Lord, bring us out, and we will act righteously, unlike what we used to do.' - 'Have We not granted you a long enough life so that whoever was going to be reminded could be reminded therein? And did not a Warner come to you?'
compare: And they cry out loudly therein, "Our Lord, bring us out, and we will act righteously, unlike what we used to do." - "Have We not granted you a long enough life so that whoever was going to be reminded could be reminded therein? And did not a warner come to you?

src: Bringt mir Eisenstücke!" Als er dann (die Lücke) zwischen den beiden Wallabhängen auf gleicher Höhe zuschütten ließ, sagte er: "Blast!"
ref: Bring me ingots of iron," (which they did) until the space between two mountain sides was filled up.
draft: "Bring me pieces of iron!" When he then had the gap filled in at the same height between the two rampart slopes, he said, "Blow!"
hil: "Bring me pieces of iron!" When he then had the gap filled in at the same height between the two rampart slopes, he said, "That's it!"
compare: "Bring me pieces of iron!" When he then had the gap filled in at the same height between the two rampart slopes, he said, "Blow!"

src: Und verrichtet das Gebet und entrichtet die Abgabe.
ref: Fulfil your devotional obligations and pay the zakat.
draft: And perform the prayer and pay the alms.
hil: And establish prayer and give charity.
compare: And perform the prayer and pay the alms.

src: Also hinsichtlich des Schaums, so wird er beiseite geworfen, doch hinsichtlich dessen, das den Menschen nützt, so verbleibt es in der Erde.
ref: The scum disappears like the foam on the bank, and that which is useful to man remains on the earth.
draft: Regarding the foam, it is discarded, but regarding that which benefits people, it remains in the earth.
hil: Regarding the foam, it is cast away, but as for that which benefits people, it remains in the earth.
compare: Regarding the foam, it is discarded, but regarding that which benefits people, it remains in the earth.

src: Darin hören sie nichts Unnützes - (sie hören) nur den Salam-Gruß! Und ihnen ist ihre Versorgung darin morgens und abends gesichert!
ref: They will hear no vain talk there, but only salutations of peace, and they will have their sustenance morning and evening."
draft: They don't hear anything useless in it - they only hear the Salam greeting! And their supply is secured in it every morning and evening!
hil: "Therein they hear nothing useless - they only hear the Salam greeting! And their supply is secured in it every morning and evening!",
compare: "Therein they hear nothing useless - they only hear the Salam greeting! And their supply is secured in it every morning and evening!",

src: Gewiß, bereits haben WIR Nuh zu seinen Leuten entsandt, dann sagte er: "Meine Leute!
ref: Indeed, We sent Nuh (Noah) to his people and he said: "O my people!
draft: Certainly, WE have already sent Nuh to his people, then he said: "My people!
hil: Certainly, We had sent Noah to his people, then he said, 'My people!'
compare: Certainly, We had sent Noah to his people, then he said, 'My people!'

src: Sie sagten: "Salih! Bereits hast du unter uns Vertrauen vor dieser (Aufforderung) genossen.
ref: They said, 'Salih, thou hast hitherto been a source of hope among us.
draft: They said, "Salih! You have already earned trust among us before this (request).
hil: They said, "Salih! You have already earned trust among us before this (request)."
compare: They said, "Salih! You have already earned trust among us before this (request).

src: Und wer Kufr betreibt ALLAH, Seinen Engeln, Seinen Schriften, Seinen Gesandten und dem Jüngsten Tag gegenüber, der ist bereits weit in die Irre gegangen.
ref: But he who believes not in God and His angels and the Books and the prophets and the Last Day, has wandered far away.
draft: And whoever engages in disbelief, Allah, His angels, His Scriptures, His Messengers, and the Last Day, has indeed gone far astray.
hil: And whoever commits disbelief in Allah, His angels, His scriptures, His messengers, and the Last Day, has already gone far astray.
compare: And whoever engages in disbelief, Allah, His angels, His Scriptures, His Messengers, and the Last Day, has indeed gone far astray.

src: Gewiß, Wir haben um ihre Hälse Fesseln gelegt.
ref: We have enchained their necks up to their chins.
draft: Certainly, we have placed shackles around their necks.
hil: Verily, we have placed shackles around their necks.
compare: Verily, we have placed shackles around their necks.

src: Das sind die, für die es die guten Dinge geben wird, und das sind diejenigen, denen es wohl ergeht.
ref: These are they for whom are goods, and these: they are the blissful.
draft: These are the ones for whom there will be good things, and these are the ones who are doing well.
hil: "These are the ones for whom there will be good things, and these are the ones who are doing well."
compare: These are the ones for whom there will be good things, and these are the ones who are doing well.

src: und ehrerbietig gegen meine Mutter (zu sein); Er hat mich nicht gewalttätig und unselig gemacht.
ref: And be dutiful to my mother. He has not made me haughty or rebellious.
draft: And to be respectful towards my mother; he did not make me violent and unhappy.
hil: "And to be respectful towards my mother; he did not make me violent and miserable."
compare: "And to be respectful towards my mother; he did not make me violent and miserable."

src: Dies ist besser für euch und reiner. Und wenn ihr (es) nicht vermögt, also gewiß, ALLAH ist allvergebend, allgnädig.
ref: Yet if you find not means, God is All-forgiving, All-compassionate.
draft: This is better for you and purer. And if you are not able, then surely Allah is all-forgiving, all-merciful.
hil: This is better and purer for you. And if you are unable, certainly Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
compare: This is better for you and purer. And if you are not able, then surely Allah is all-forgiving, all-merciful.

src: Bei Gott steht ein großartiger Lohn bereit.
ref: Indeed God has greater rewards with Him.
draft: A great reward awaits with God.
hil: With Him is a great reward (Paradise).
compare: With Him is a great reward (Paradise).

src: Dann gaben Wir ihn seiner Mutter zurück, damit ihr Auge mit Freude erfüllt würde und damit sie sich nicht grämte und damit sie wüßte, daß Allahs Verheißung wahr sei. Jedoch die meisten von ihnen wissen es nicht.
ref: Thus We restored him to his mother that she may be tranquil and not grieve, and know that the promise of God is true, though most men do not know.
draft: Then We returned him to his mother, so that her eye would be filled with joy and she would not grieve, and so that she would know that Allah's promise is true. But most of them do not know it.
hil: We then restored him to his mother that she might be comforted and not grieve and that she may know that the promise of Allah is true. However, most of them do not know it.
compare: Then We returned him to his mother, so that her eye would be filled with joy and she would not grieve, and so that she would know that Allah's promise is true. But most of them do not know it.

src: Doch wahrlich, er (Jesus) ist ein Vorzeichen der Stunde.
ref: He is certainly the sign of the Hour (of change).
draft: But truly, he (Jesus) is a sign of the Hour.
hil: "But truly, he is a sign of the Hour."
compare: But truly, he (Jesus) is a sign of the Hour.

src: Aber nein! Ihr werdet es bald erfahren.
ref: But you will come to know soon; --
draft: But no! You will soon find out.
hil: No! You will soon find out.
compare: No! You will soon find out.

src: Und sie haben gesagt: .Verlaßt doch nicht eure Götter; verlaßt doch nicht Wadd, noch Suwa", noch Yagut,Ya'uq und Nasr.'
ref: And said: 'Do not abandon your gods, and do not abandon Wadda or Suwa', or Yaghuth, Ya'uq or Nasr.'
draft: "They said: 'Do not leave your gods; do not leave Wadd, nor Suwa', nor Yagut, Ya'uq and Nasr.'"
hil: And they said, 'Do not abandon your gods; do not abandon Wadd, nor Suwa', nor Yagut, Ya'uq and Nasr.'
compare: And they said, 'Do not abandon your gods; do not abandon Wadd, nor Suwa', nor Yagut, Ya'uq and Nasr.'

src: "Unser Herr, belange uns nicht, wenn wir (etwas) vergessen oder einen Fehler begehen. Unser Herr, lege uns keine Bürde auf, wie Du sie denjenigen vor uns auferlegt hast.
ref: Do not seize us if we forget or are mistaken; our Lord!
draft: "Our Lord, do not blame us if we forget something or make a mistake. Our Lord, do not burden us as you have burdened those before us."
hil: Our Lord, do not charge us when we forget something or make a mistake. Our Lord, do not burden us with the load you placed on those before us.
compare: Our Lord, do not charge us when we forget something or make a mistake. Our Lord, do not burden us with the load you placed on those before us.

src: Und so erweckten Wir sie auf, damit sie sich gegenseitig fragten. Einer von ihnen sagte: "Wie lange habt ihr verweilt?" Sie sagten: "Verweilt haben wir einen Tag oder den Teil eines Tages." Sie sagten: "Euer Herr weiß am besten, wie (lange) ihr verweilt habt. So schickt einen von euch mit diesen euren Silbermünzen in die Stadt; er soll sehen, welche ihre reinste Speise ist, und euch davon eine Versorgung bringen. Er soll behutsam sein und ja niemanden etwas von euch merken lassen.
ref: And similarly We awakened them so that they may enquire about each other; a speaker among them said, “How long have you stayed here?” Some among them said, “We have stayed a day or part of a day”; the others said, “Your Lord well knows how long you have stayed; therefore send one of you to the city with this silver coin – he may then check which food available there is purer, in order to bring some of it for you to eat – and he must be courteous and not inform anyone about you.”
draft: And so We awakened them that they might question one another. One of them said: "How long have you remained?" They said: "We have remained a day, or part of a day." They said: "Your Lord knows best how long you have remained. Now send one of you with these silver coins of yours to the city, and let him see which is the purest food, and let him bring you a supply thereof. Let him behave with care and not make anyone aware of you."
hil: "And so We awakened them to ask each other. One of them asked, 'How long have you stayed?" They said, "We stayed for a day or part of a day." They said, "Your Lord knows best how long you stayed. So send one of you with your silver coins to the city; he should see what the purest food is, and bring you a supply of it. He should be careful and not let anyone notice you.'"
compare: And so We awakened them that they might question one another. One of them said: "How long have you remained?" They said: "We have remained a day, or part of a day." They said: "Your Lord knows best how long you have remained. Now send one of you with these silver coins of yours to the city, and let him see which is the purest food, and let him bring you a supply thereof. Let him behave with care and not make anyone aware of you."

src: An jenem Tag gehört die Königsherrschaft Gott (allein). Er wird zwischen ihnen urteilen. Dann werden diejenigen, die glauben und die guten Werke tun, in den Gärten der Wonne sein.
ref: For Allah only is the kingship on that day; He will judge between them; so those who believed and did good deeds are in Gardens of content.
draft: On that day, the kingship will belong to God (alone). He will judge between them. Then those who believe and do good deeds will be in the gardens of bliss.
hil: On that day, the sovereignty will belong to God alone. He will judge between them. Then those who have believed and done righteous deeds will be in gardens of pleasure.
compare: On that day, the kingship will belong to God (alone). He will judge between them. Then those who believe and do good deeds will be in the gardens of bliss.

src: Und wäre nicht über euch Allahs Huld und Seine Barmherzigkeit, nicht einer von euch wäre rein geworden; doch Allah macht rein, wen Er will.
ref: Were it not for God’s grace towards you, and His mercy, not one of you would have been pure, ever. But God purifies whomever He wills.
draft: And if it were not for Allah's grace and His mercy upon you, none of you would have been pure, but Allah purifies whom He wills.
hil: Allah purifies whom He wills, for if it were not for His grace and mercy, none of you would have become pure.
compare: And if it were not for Allah's grace and His mercy upon you, none of you would have been pure, but Allah purifies whom He wills.

src: Und ALLAH ist immer über alles allmächtig.
ref: God is powerful over everything.
draft: And ALLAH is always almighty over everything.
hil: And if Allah wills, He could have taken away their hearing and their sight. Indeed, Allah is all-powerful over all things.
compare: And ALLAH is always almighty over everything.

src: Auch kennt ER, was auf dem Festland und was im Meer ist.
ref: He knows what is in land and sea; not a leaf falls, but He knows it.
draft: Also, He knows what is on the mainland and what is in the sea.
hil: He knows what is on the land and in the sea.
compare: He knows what is on the land and in the sea.

src: Sagen sie: "Wir teilten Dir mit, keiner von uns ist Zeuge."
ref: They will answer: "We profess to You not one of us can vouch for them."
draft: They say: "We told you, none of us is a witness."
hil: They say: 'We told you, none of us is a witness.'
compare: They say: "We told you, none of us is a witness."

src: Und er sagte: «O meine Söhne, geht nicht durch ein einziges Tor hinein.
ref: And he said: O my sons!
draft: And he said, "O my sons, do not enter through a single gate."
hil: And he said, "O my sons, do not enter through a single gate, but enter through different gates. I cannot be of any benefit to you against Allah."
compare: And he said, "O my sons, do not enter through a single gate, but enter through different gates. I cannot be of any benefit to you against Allah."

src: Auch der Warner kam zu euch. Also erfahrt (die Peinigung)!
ref: To you the warner came; taste you now!
draft: Even the warner came to you. So know (the punishment)!
hil: Even the warner came to you. So taste (the punishment)!
compare: Even the warner came to you. So taste (the punishment)!

src: (Dies ist) eine Offenbarung von Ihm, Der die Erde und die hohen Himmel erschuf.
ref: A revelation from Him who created the earth and the high ascending skies,
draft: This is a revelation from Him who created the earth and the lofty heavens.
hil: This is a revelation from Him who created the earth and the high heavens.
compare: This is a revelation from Him who created the earth and the lofty heavens.

src: Und gebt ihnen etwas vom Vermögen Gottes, das Er euch gegeben hat. Und zwingt nicht eure Sklavinnen, wenn sie sich unter Schutz stellen wollen, zur Hurerei im Trachten nach den Gütern des diesseitigen Lebens.
ref: And constrain not your slave-girls to prostitution, if they desire to live in chastity, that you may seek the chance goods of the present life.
draft: And give them something of the wealth of God, which He has given to you. And do not force your female slaves, if they wish to remain virtuous, into prostitution in order to seek the goods of this world's life.
hil: And give them something of the wealth of God, which He has given to you. And do not coerce your female slaves, if they wish to seek refuge, into sexual immorality in their pursuit of the goods of this worldly life.
compare: And give them something of the wealth of God, which He has given to you. And do not coerce your female slaves, if they wish to seek refuge, into sexual immorality in their pursuit of the goods of this worldly life.

src: Er hört alles und ist nahe.
ref: He is all-hearing and all-too-near."
draft: He hears everything and is near.
hil: "He hears everything and is near."
compare: He hears everything and is near.

src: Und in der Morgendämmerung baten sie um Vergebung,
ref: And every morning asked forgiveness,
draft: And at dawn they asked for forgiveness.
hil: And at dawn they asked for forgiveness.
compare: And at dawn they asked for forgiveness.

src: Weder darf die Sonne den Mond einholen, noch kommt die Nacht dem Tag zuvor.
ref: It is not for the sun to overtake the moon, nor does the night outstrip the day.
draft: Neither may the sun overtake the moon, nor does the night come before the day.
hil: Neither may the sun overtake the moon, nor does the night come before the day.
compare: Neither may the sun overtake the moon, nor does the night come before the day.

src: Ihr dient anstatt Allahs nur Götzen und schafft (dabei nur) ungeheuerliche Lüge.
ref: You worship idols in place of God and invent lies.
draft: You serve idols instead of Allah and create (thereby only) monstrous lies.
hil: You serve only idols instead of Allah, creating only monstrous lies thereby.
compare: You serve idols instead of Allah and create (thereby only) monstrous lies.

src: (Erlaubt sind) auch die unter Schutz gestellten gläubigen Frauen und die unter Schutz gestellten Frauen aus den Reihen derer, denen vor euch das Buch zugekommen ist, wenn ihr ihnen ihren Lohn zukommen laßt und mit ihnen in der Absicht lebt, (sie) unter Schutz zu stellen, nicht Unzucht zu treiben und (sie) nicht als heimliche Konkubinen zu nehmen.
ref: The food (slaughtered cattle, eatable animals, etc.) of the people of the Scripture (Jews and Christians) is lawful to you and yours is lawful to them. (Lawful to you in marriage) are chaste women from the believers and chaste women from those who were given the Scripture (Jews and Christians) before your time, when you have given their due Mahr (bridal money given by the husband to his wife at the time of marriage), desiring chastity (i.e. taking them in legal wedlock) not committing illegal sexual intercourse, nor taking them as girl-friends.
draft: (Allowed are) also the believing women under protection and the women under protection from among those to whom the Book was given before you, if you give them their dowries and live with them in the intention of protecting them, not committing adultery, and not taking them as mistresses.
hil: Also permitted are the protected believing women and the protected women from among those who were given the Book before you, provided that you provide them with their due compensation and live with them in protection, not committing adultery, and not taking them as mistresses.
compare: Also permitted are the protected believing women and the protected women from among those who were given the Book before you, provided that you provide them with their due compensation and live with them in protection, not committing adultery, and not taking them as mistresses.

src: Und Wir ließen ihn all unsere Zeichen schauen, aber er erklärte (sie) für Lüge und weigerte sich.
ref: So We showed him all Our signs, but he denied them and refused,
draft: And We showed him all Our signs, but he denied them and refused.
hil: And We showed him all Our signs, but he deemed them falsehood and refused.
compare: And We showed him all Our signs, but he deemed them falsehood and refused.

src: An jenem Tag trifft (die Stunde) ein, die eintreffen wird,
ref: On that Day will come what is to come.
draft: On that day, the hour will come, which will arrive.
hil: On that day, the hour will come, which will arrive.
compare: On that day, the hour will come, which will arrive.

src: Er (David) sagte: "Wahrlich, er hat ein Unrecht an dir verübt, als er dein Mutterschaf zu seinen eigenen Mutterschafen hinzu verlangte. Und gewiß, viele Teilhaber vergehen sich gegeneinander; nur die (sind davon) ausgenommen, die glauben und gute Werke tun; und das sind wenige." Und David merkte, daß Wir ihn auf die Probe gestellt hatten; also bat er seinen Herrn um Verzeihung und fiel betend nieder und bekehrte sich.
ref: He said: Surely he has been unjust to you in demanding your ewe (to add) to his own ewes; and most surely most of the partners act wrongfully towards one another, save those who believe and do good, and very few are they; and Dawood was sure that We had tried him, so he sought the protection of his Lord and he fell down bowing and turned time after time (to Him).
draft: He (David) said, "Indeed, he has wronged you by demanding your ewe to be added to his ewes. And indeed, many associates oppress one another, except for those who believe and do righteous deeds - and few are they." And David became certain that We had tried him, and he asked forgiveness of his Lord and fell down bowing [in prostration] and turned in repentance [to Allah].
hil: He (David) said, "Indeed, he has wronged you by demanding your ewe to be added to his ewes. And indeed, many associates oppress one another, except for those who believe and do righteous deeds - and few are they." And David became sure that We had tried him, so he asked his Lord for forgiveness and fell down bowing [in prostration] and turned in repentance [to Allah].
compare: He (David) said, "Indeed, he has wronged you by demanding your ewe to be added to his ewes. And indeed, many associates oppress one another, except for those who believe and do righteous deeds - and few are they." And David became certain that We had tried him, and he asked forgiveness of his Lord and fell down bowing [in prostration] and turned in repentance [to Allah].

src: Sag: "Gibt es unter den von euch (ALLAH) beigesellten Partnern einen, der zur Wahrheit rechtleitet?" Sag: "ALLAH leitet zur Wahrheit recht!"
ref: Say: 'Do any of your partners guide you to the truth' Say: 'Allah, He guides to the truth.
draft: Say, "Is there among those associated with you (ALLAH) any who guides to the truth?" Say, "ALLAH guides to the truth!"
hil: Say, 'Is there among those associated with you (ALLAH) any who guides to the truth?' Say, 'ALLAH guides to the truth!'
compare: Say, "Is there among those associated with you (ALLAH) any who guides to the truth?" Say, "ALLAH guides to the truth!"

src: Und wer krank oder auf Reisen war, (fastet) an anderen Tagen die gleiche Anzahl.
ref: Whoever of you witnesses the month, shall fast it.
draft: And whoever was sick or traveling, (fasts) on other days the same number.
hil: And whoever was sick or traveling (fasts) on other days the same number, (this) for those who act according to Taqwa.
compare: And whoever was sick or traveling, (fasts) on other days the same number.

src: ER wird sie doch in einen Eingang eingehen lassen, an dem sie Wohlgefallen finden werden. Und gewiß, ALLAH ist zweifelsohne allwissend, allnachsichtig.
ref: He will certainly admit them to a place they will love; and indeed Allah is All Knowing, Most Forbearing.
draft: HE will allow them to enter an entrance where they will find pleasure. And surely, ALLAH is undoubtedly all-knowing, all-forgiving.
hil: HE will certainly let them enter an entrance in which they will find pleasure. And indeed, ALLAH is undoubtedly all-knowing and All-forgiving.
compare: HE will certainly let them enter an entrance in which they will find pleasure. And indeed, ALLAH is undoubtedly all-knowing and All-forgiving.

src: Da ergriff Ich sie.
ref: Then I seized them.
draft: I grabbed her.
hil: Then I seized her.
compare: I grabbed her.

src: Habt ihr das Was ser betrachtet, das ihr trinkt?
ref: Consider the water that you drink.
draft: Have you considered the water you drink?
hil: Have you considered the water you drink?
compare: Have you considered the water you drink?

src: enn sie so glauben, wie ihr glaubt, dann werden sie rechtgeleitet sein; wenn sie sich aber abwenden, so sind sie nur in Abspaltung geraten.
ref: So if they believe in the like of that which ye believe in, surely they are guided; but if they turn away, then they are but in Cleavage.
draft: If they believe as you believe, then they will be rightly guided; but if they turn away, they have only gone astray in separation.
hil: If they believe as you believe, then they will be rightly guided; but if they turn away, they have only gone astray in separation.
compare: If they believe as you believe, then they will be rightly guided; but if they turn away, they have only gone astray in separation.

src: Sie sagten: "Wir ahnen Böses von dir und von denen, die mit dir sind." Er sagte: "Euer Unheil ist bereits bei Allah. Nein, ihr seid ein Volk, das geprüft wird."
ref: They said, “We consider you an evil omen, and your companions”; he said, “Your evil omen is with Allah – in fact you people have fallen into trial.”
draft: They said: "We suspect evil from you and those who are with you." He said: "Your misfortune is already with Allah. No, you are a people who are being tested."
hil: They said, 'We betoken evil from you and those who are with you.' He said, 'Your evil is already with Allah. No, you are a people who are being tested.'
compare: They said: "We suspect evil from you and those who are with you." He said: "Your misfortune is already with Allah. No, you are a people who are being tested."

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Entsinnt euch der Gabe ALLAHs euch gegenüber, als ein Volk euch Schaden zufügen wollte und ER sie von euch abgehalten hat. Und handelt Taqwa gemäß ALLAH gegenüber. Und ALLAH gegenüber sollen die Mumin Tawakkul üben!
ref: O believers, remember God's blessing upon you, when a certain people purposed to stretch against you their hands, and He restrained their hands from you; and fear God; and in God let the believers put all their trust.
draft: You who have internalized the Imam! Remember the gift of Allah to you, when a people intended to harm you and He prevented it from you. And act in accordance with Taqwa towards Allah. And the believers should have trust in Allah!
hil: Those of you who have internalized the faith! Remember the gift of Allah to you, when a people intended to harm you and He prevented it from you. And act in accordance with Taqwa towards Allah. And the believers should trust in Allah!
compare: You who have internalized the Imam! Remember the gift of Allah to you, when a people intended to harm you and He prevented it from you. And act in accordance with Taqwa towards Allah. And the believers should have trust in Allah!

src: Auch vor dir schickten Wir keine Gesandten, die keine Speise aßen oder nicht auf den Märkten umhergingen. Allein, Wir machen die einen unter euch zur Prüfung für die anderen.
ref: And all the Noble Messengers We sent before you were like this – eating food and walking in the markets; and We have made some of you a test for others; so will you, O people, patiently endure?
draft: Also, before you, We did not send messengers who did not eat food and did not walk around markets. However, We make some of you a test for others.
hil: Even before you, We did not send messengers who did not eat food and did not walk around markets. However, We make some of you a test for others.
compare: Also, before you, We did not send messengers who did not eat food and did not walk around markets. However, We make some of you a test for others.

src: So ließen WIR die 'Alaqa zu einer Mudgha werden, und WIR ließen die Mudgha zu Knochen werden, und die Knochen bedeckten WIR mit Fleisch, dann ließen WIR ihn als eine andere Schöpfung entstehen.
ref: Then We developed the lump into bones. Then We clothed the bones with flesh.
draft: So we made the 'Alaqa a Mudgha, and We made the Mudgha bones, and We covered the bones with flesh, then We made him another creation.
hil: So We made the 'Alaqa a Mudgha, and We made the Mudgha bones, and We covered the bones with flesh, then We made him another creation.
compare: So we made the 'Alaqa a Mudgha, and We made the Mudgha bones, and We covered the bones with flesh, then We made him another creation.

src: Und ALLAH vergibt den Mumin-Männern und den Mumin-Frauen. Und ALLAH ist immer allvergebend, allgnädig.
ref: But Allah pardoneth believing men and believing women, and Allah is ever Forgiving, Merciful.
draft: And Allah forgives the believing men and the believing women. And Allah is always all-forgiving, all-merciful.
hil: And to Allah belong the forgiving of men and the forgiving of women. And Allah is always all-forgiving, all-merciful.
compare: And Allah forgives the believing men and the believing women. And Allah is always all-forgiving, all-merciful.

src: Dann hat er (Schu'aib) sich von ihnen abgewendet und sagte: "Meine Leute! Gewiß, bereits habe ich euch die Botschaft meines HERRN verkündet und euch Ratschläge gemacht, also weshalb soll ich kufr-betreibenden Leuten nachtrauern?!
ref: So he turned his back on them, and said, 'O my people, I have delivered to you the Messages of my Lord, and advised you sincerely; how should I grieve for a people of unbelievers?'
draft: Then he (Shu'aib) turned away from them and said, "My people, I have indeed conveyed to you the messages of my Lord and given you good advice, so why should I grieve for disbelieving people?"
hil: Then he turned away from them and said, 'O my people, I conveyed to you the message of my Lord and offered you sincere advice, so why should I grieve for those who engage in disbelief?'
compare: Then he (Shu'aib) turned away from them and said, "My people, I have indeed conveyed to you the messages of my Lord and given you good advice, so why should I grieve for disbelieving people?"

src: Ihr, die den Iman bekundet habt! Verinnerlicht den Iman an ALLAH, an Seinen Gesandten, an die Schrift, die ER Seinem Gesandten nach und nach hinabsandte und an die Schrift, die ER vorher hinabsandte.
ref: O believers, believe in God and His Messenger and the Book He has revealed to His Apostle, and the Books revealed before.
draft: You who have professed faith! Internalize faith in ALLAH, in His messenger, in the scripture that He sent down to His messenger gradually, and in the scripture that He sent down before it.
hil: O you who have believed, have faith in Allah and His Noble Messenger and the Book He sent down upon this Noble Messenger of His, and the Book He sent down before.
compare: O you who have believed, have faith in Allah and His Noble Messenger and the Book He sent down upon this Noble Messenger of His, and the Book He sent down before.

src: Sie sagten: "Wir sind zu einem Volk von Übeltätern gesandt,
ref: "We have been sent," they said, "to (punish) a sinful people,
draft: They said, "We have been sent to a people of wrongdoers."
hil: They said, 'We have been sent to a people of wrongdoers.'
compare: They said, "We have been sent to a people of wrongdoers."

src: Und was euch an Dingen zuteil wurde, ist nur Verbrauchsgut des Diesseits und dessen Schmuck.
ref: Whatsoever has been given you is the stuff this life is made of, and only its embellishment.
draft: And what happened to you in terms of things, is only a consumable of this world and its decoration.
hil: And what has been granted to you are only the consumables and decorations of this world.
compare: And what has been granted to you are only the consumables and decorations of this world.

src: Aber sie möchten nicht an das glauben, was sie zuvor geleugnet hatten. So versiegelt Allah die Herzen der Ungläubigen.
ref: Thus it is that Allah seals the hearts of those who deny the truth.
draft: But they do not want to believe in what they had previously denied. Thus Allah seals the hearts of the disbelievers.
hil: But they do not want to believe in what they had previously denied. Thus Allah seals the hearts of the disbelievers.
compare: But they do not want to believe in what they had previously denied. Thus Allah seals the hearts of the disbelievers.

src: Gewiß, Wir haben die Tora hinabgesandt, in der Rechtleitung und Licht sind, womit die Propheten, die sich (Allah) ergeben hatten, für diejenigen, die dem Judentum angehören, walten, und so auch die Leute des Herrn und die Gelehrten, nach dem, was ihnen von der Schrift Allahs anvertraut worden war und worüber sie Zeugen waren. So fürchtet nicht die Menschen, sondern fürchtet Mich.
ref: Verily We sent down the Taurat wherein was a guidance and a light. By it the prophets who submitted themselves judged those who were judaised, and so did the divines and the priests by that wherewith they were entrusted of the Book of Allah and they had become witnesses thereof.
draft: Certainly, We have sent down the Torah, in which there is guidance and light, by which the prophets who had submitted to Allah judged for the Jews, as did the Lord's people and the scholars, according to what had been entrusted to them of Allah's Scripture and of which they were witnesses. So do not fear people but fear Me.
hil: Certainly, We have revealed the Torah containing guidance and light, through which the prophets who had surrendered to Allah judged for those who belong to Judaism, as well as the people of the Lord and the scholars, in accordance with what was entrusted to them of Allah's scripture and of which they were witnesses. Therefore, do not fear people, but fear Me.
compare: Certainly, We have sent down the Torah, in which there is guidance and light, by which the prophets who had submitted to Allah judged for the Jews, as did the Lord's people and the scholars, according to what had been entrusted to them of Allah's Scripture and of which they were witnesses. So do not fear people but fear Me.

src: Und diejenigen, denen Wissen und Glauben zugekommen sind, sagen: «Nach dem Buch Gottes habt ihr bis zum Tag der Auferweckung verweilt. Und das ist der Tag der Auferweckung.
ref: Those who have received knowledge and have faith will say, "By the decree of God, you have remained for the exact period which was mentioned in the Book of God about the Day of Resurrection.
draft: And those who have received knowledge and faith say, "According to the Book of God, you have remained until the Day of Resurrection. And this is the Day of Resurrection."
hil: And those who have received knowledge and faith say, 'According to the Book of God, you have remained until the Day of Resurrection. And this is the Day of Resurrection.'
compare: And those who have received knowledge and faith say, "According to the Book of God, you have remained until the Day of Resurrection. And this is the Day of Resurrection."

src: Diejenigen von euch, die sie zu Freunden nehmen, das sind die, die Unrecht tun.
