src: Du siehst dann die, die Unrecht tun, erschrocken vor dem, was sie erworben haben, und es wird über sie hereinbrechen. Diejenigen aber, die glauben und die guten Werke tun, befinden sich in den Gärten des Paradieses.
ref: You will see (on the Day of Resurrection), the Zalimun (polytheists and wrong-doers, etc.) fearful of that which they have earned, and it (Allah's Torment) will surely befall them, while those who believe (in the Oneness of Allah Islamic Monotheism) and do righteous deeds (will be) in the flowering meadows of the Gardens (Paradise), having what they wish from their Lord.
draft: Then you will see those who do wrong, cowering in fear before what they have earned, and it will come down upon them. But those who believe and do good works will be in the Gardens of Paradise.
hil: Then you will see those who do wrong, cowering in fear before what they have earned, and it will come down upon them. But those who believe and do good deeds will be in Gardens of Paradise beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide eternally.
compare: Then you will see those who do wrong, cowering in fear before what they have earned, and it will come down upon them. But those who believe and do good deeds will be in Gardens of Paradise beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide eternally.

src: (Die Folgen) eurer Übertretungen tragt nur ihr selbst.
ref: Your violations are against your own souls.
draft: (The consequences) of your transgressions are only carried by yourselves.
hil: The consequences of your transgressions are borne only by yourselves.
compare: (The consequences) of your transgressions are only carried by yourselves.

src: Ihm gehört, wer in den Himmeln und auf der Erde ist. Alle sind Ihm demütig ergeben.
ref: All those who are in the heavens and the earth are His, and they are all obedient to Him.
draft: He owns whoever is in the heavens and on earth. All are humbly obedient to Him.
hil: To Him belongs whoever is in the heavens and on earth. All are submissive to Him.
compare: He owns whoever is in the heavens and on earth. All are humbly obedient to Him.

src: Diese sind unsere Leute, sie nahmen sich anstelle von Ihm Götter. Würden sie doch dafür eine klare Bestätigung vorlegen!
ref: “These – the people of ours – have set up Gods besides Allah; why do they not bring a clear proof regarding them?
draft: These are our people, they took gods instead of Him. If only they could present a clear confirmation for it!
hil: These are our people, they have taken gods instead of Him. If only they would present a clear confirmation for it!
compare: These are our people, they have taken gods instead of Him. If only they would present a clear confirmation for it!

src: Er ist es, Der euch Gehör, Augenlicht und Herzen hat entstehen lassen.
ref: It is He, Who has created for you (the sense of) hearing (ears), sight (eyes), and hearts (understanding).
draft: He is the one who has made you hear, see, and form hearts.
hil: He is the One who has caused you to exist with hearing, eyesight, and hearts.
compare: He is the One who has caused you to exist with hearing, eyesight, and hearts.

src: "O Moses, tritt vor und fürchte dich nicht; denn du gehörst zu jenen, die in Sicherheit sind.
ref: "O Moses, approach," (said the Voice), "and have no fear. You will be safe.
draft: "O Moses, come forward and do not be afraid; for you belong to those who are in safety."
hil: He said, 'O Moses, come forward and do not be afraid; for you belong to those who are in safety.'
compare: "O Moses, come forward and do not be afraid; for you belong to those who are in safety."

src: Zu ihnen kam ein edler Gesandter:
ref: A respected prophet had come to them (saying):
draft: "A noble messenger came to them."
hil: A noble envoy came to them.
compare: A noble envoy came to them.

src: Ist das (etwa) eine Gunst, die du mir vorhältst, daß du die Kinder lsra'ils geknechtet hast?"
ref: But the favour you oblige me with is that you have enslaved the children of Israel."
draft: Is this (perhaps) a favor that you hold against me, that you have enslaved the children of Israel?
hil: Is this (perhaps) a favor that you are holding against me, that you have enslaved the descendants of Israel?
compare: Is this (perhaps) a favor that you are holding against me, that you have enslaved the descendants of Israel?

src: Und Allah gab ihm die Herrschaft und die Weisheit und lehrte ihn von dem, was Er wollte.
ref: David slew Goliath, and Allah bestowed on him the kingship and wisdom, and taught him from that He willed.
draft: And Allah gave him the sovereignty and wisdom, and taught him of what He wanted.
hil: And Allah gave him sovereignty and wisdom and taught him of what He would.
compare: And Allah gave him the sovereignty and wisdom, and taught him of what He wanted.

src: Und die Engel stehen an seinem Rand.
ref: The angels will stand on all its sides.
draft: And the angels stand at its edge.
hil: "And the angels stand at its edge."
compare: And the angels stand at its edge.

src: Wisset, daß wahrlich das diesseitige Leben nur ein Spiel und ein Zeitvertreib ist und ein Prunk und Geprahle unter euch und ein Wettrennen um Vermehrung von Gut und Kindern. Es gleicht dem reichlichen Regen, dessen Pflanzenwuchs den Säern gefällt. Dann verdorrt er; und du siehst ihn vergilben; hierauf wird er brüchig; und im Jenseits gibt es eine strenge Strafe, aber auch Vergebung von Allah und Wohlgefallen. Und das diesseitige Leben ist nichts anderes als eine Nutznießung, durch die man sich betören läßt.
ref: Know that the life of this world is nothing but play and pastime, and adornment, and boasting amongst yourselves, and the desire to surpass each other in wealth and children; like the rain the produce of which pleased the farmer, then dried so you see it yellow, and then turned into dry trampled hay; and in the Hereafter is a severe punishment, and the forgiveness from Allah and His pleasure; and the life of this world is nothing but counterfeit wealth.
draft: Know that verily, the life of this world is only play and amusement, and a show and boasting among yourselves, and a race for wealth and children. It is like the abundant rain, whose growth pleases the sowers, but then it withers away; you see it turn yellow; then it becomes straw. And in the Hereafter, there is severe punishment, but also forgiveness from Allah and His pleasure. And the life of this world is nothing but temporary enjoyment of delusion.
hil: Know that verily, the life of this world is nothing but a game and a diversion, and a boasting among yourselves, and a race for wealth and children. It is like rain so pleasing to the cultivator for his vegetation which sprouts and swells, then begins to wither, and you see it turn to yellow and reduced to chaff; and in the afterlife there is severe punishment, but also forgiveness from God, and acceptance. The life of this world is nothing but temporary enjoyment of delusion.
compare: Know that verily, the life of this world is nothing but a game and a diversion, and a boasting among yourselves, and a race for wealth and children. It is like rain so pleasing to the cultivator for his vegetation which sprouts and swells, then begins to wither, and you see it turn to yellow and reduced to chaff; and in the afterlife there is severe punishment, but also forgiveness from God, and acceptance. The life of this world is nothing but temporary enjoyment of delusion.

src: Der Mensch lehnt sich wahrlich auf,
ref: Verily, man does transgress all bounds (in disbelief and evil deed, etc.).
draft: The human truly rebels.
hil: Truly, man rebels.
compare: The human truly rebels.

src: Dann werden Wir euch eure Sünden vergeben; wahrlich, Wir werden jenen, die Gutes tun, noch mehr (an Gnade) erweisen."
ref: We shall forgive you your wrong-doings. We shall increase (the reward) for the good-doers."
draft: Then We will forgive you your sins; truly, We will bestow further favor upon those who do good."
hil: Then We will forgive you your sins; verily, We will bestow even more (grace) upon those who do good.
compare: Then We will forgive you your sins; truly, We will bestow further favor upon those who do good."

src: Kein Willkomm (sei) ihnen! Sie sollen im Feuer brennen.
ref: Verily, they shall burn in the Fire!
draft: No welcome to them! They shall burn in the fire.
hil: No welcome to them! They shall burn in the fire.
compare: No welcome to them! They shall burn in the fire.

src: Und erlahmt nicht in der Verfolgung der Leute. Wenn ihr leidet, so leiden sie auch, wie ihr leidet; ihr aber erhofft von Gott, was sie nicht erhoffen. Gott weiß Bescheid und ist weise.
ref: Do not relax in pursuit of the disbelievers; if you are suffering, they also suffer as you do; and you expect from Allah what they do not; and Allah is All Knowing, Wise.
draft: And do not falter in the pursuit of people. If you suffer, they suffer as you suffer; but you hope from God what they do not hope. God is aware and wise.
hil: And do not be faint of heart in pursuing these people: if you happen to suffer harm they too are suffering just as you are, while you may hope from Allah what they cannot hope for. Allah knows best and is wise.
compare: And do not falter in the pursuit of people. If you suffer, they suffer as you suffer; but you hope from God what they do not hope. God is aware and wise.

src: Und wir werden gewiß nicht gepeinigt werden.»
ref: We are not the punished!
draft: And we certainly won't be tormented.
hil: And we certainly won't be tormented.
compare: And we certainly won't be tormented.

src: Diejenigen, die auf ihren Herrn hören, erhalten das Beste. Diejenigen, die nicht auf ihn hören, würden wohl, wenn sie alles, was auf der Erde ist, besäßen und noch einmal soviel dazu, sich damit loskaufen wollen. Sie erwartet eine böse Abrechnung, und ihre Heimstätte ist die Hölle - welch schlimme Lagerstätte!
ref: For those who obeyed the command of Allah is goodness and if those who did not obey Him owned all that is in the earth and in addition a similar one like it, they would give it to redeem their souls; it is they who will have a wretched account, and their destination is hell; and what a wretched resting place!
draft: Those who listen to their Lord receive the best. Those who do not listen to him, would probably want to buy themselves off with everything that is on earth and twice as much. They can expect a bad settlement, and their home is hell - what a terrible place to stay!
hil: Those who listen to their Lord receive the best. Even if those who do not listen to him owned everything on earth and twice as much, they would want to redeem themselves with it. They can expect a bad settlement, and their home is hell - what a terrible place to stay!
compare: Those who listen to their Lord receive the best. Even if those who do not listen to him owned everything on earth and twice as much, they would want to redeem themselves with it. They can expect a bad settlement, and their home is hell - what a terrible place to stay!

src: ALLAH leitet zum Seinem Licht recht, wen ER will.
ref: God guides to His light whom He will.
draft: ALLAH guides to His light whoever He wants.
hil: Allah guides to His light whomsoever He wills to a straight path.
compare: Allah guides to His light whomsoever He wills to a straight path.

src: Diesen wird ALLAH Gnade erweisen.
ref: Allah will have His Mercy on them.
draft: Allah will show grace to him.
hil: Allah will show grace to him.
compare: Allah will show grace to him.

src: Sie sagen: "Pflegten nicht doch eure Gesandten mit den klaren Beweisen zu euch zu kommen?"
ref: They will say: "Did not your apostles come to you with clear proofs?"
draft: They say, "Did not your messengers come to you with clear proofs?"
hil: They say, "Did not your messengers come to you with clear proofs?"
compare: They say, "Did not your messengers come to you with clear proofs?"

src: Meine Söhne! Geht und erkundigt euch nach Yusuf und seinem Bruder und verzweifelt nicht an den Ruhh von ALLAH, denn es zweifeln an den Ruhh von ALLAH nur die Kafir-Leute."
ref: O sons, go in search of Joseph and his brother, and do not despair of the mercy of God. Only they despair of God's mercy who do not believe."
draft: "My sons! Go and inquire about Yusuf and his brother and do not despair of the mercy of Allah, as only the unbelieving people despair of the mercy of Allah."
hil: Say, my sons! Go and inquire about Yusuf and his brother, and do not despair of the mercy of Allah, as only unbelieving people despair of the mercy of Allah.
compare: "My sons! Go and inquire about Yusuf and his brother and do not despair of the mercy of Allah, as only the unbelieving people despair of the mercy of Allah."

src: Sag: "Weshalb habt ihr ALLAHs Propheten vorher getötet, solltet ihr Mumin sein?!"
ref: Say: "Why have you then been slaying God's apostles as of old, if you do believe?"
draft: Say: "Why did you kill Allah's prophets before, if you were believers?!"
hil: Say: 'Why did you kill Allah's prophets before, if you were believers?'
compare: Say: "Why did you kill Allah's prophets before, if you were believers?!"

src: Und unter den Leuten der Schrift gibt es wahrlich manche, die an Allah glauben und (an) das, was zu euch (als Offenbarung) herabgesandt worden ist, und was zu ihnen (selbst) herabgesandt worden ist.
ref: And there are, certainly, among the people of the Scripture (Jews and Christians), those who believe in Allah and in that which has been revealed to you, and in that which has been revealed to them, humbling themselves before Allah.
draft: And among the people of the Scripture are those who truly believe in Allah and (in) what has been revealed to you, and what has been revealed to them.
hil: And among the people given the Book(s), there are indeed some who have faith in God and what has been sent down to you, and what is sent down to them. They submit humbly to God and do not trade for a paltry gain the signs of God. Those who do so will have their reward with their Lord, for God is swift in taking account.
compare: And among the people of the Scripture are those who truly believe in Allah and (in) what has been revealed to you, and what has been revealed to them.

src: Darin ist wahrlich ein Zeichen für euch, wenn ihr gläubig seid.
ref: In this will be a portent for you if you do believe.
draft: Therein is certainly a sign for you, if you are believers.
hil: Therein is certainly a sign for you, if you are believers.
compare: Therein is certainly a sign for you, if you are believers.

src: Und zu Madyan (entsandten WIR) ihren Bruder Schu'aib. So sagte er: "Meine Leute!
ref: And We sent towards Madyan, their fellowman Shuaib – he therefore said, “O my people!
draft: And to Midian (We sent) their brother Shu'aib. So he said: "My people!
hil: And unto Midian (We sent) their brother, Shu'aib. So he said, “O my people!”
compare: And to Midian (We sent) their brother Shu'aib. So he said: "My people!

src: DU bist unser Wali, so vergib uns und erweise uns Gnade! Und DU bist der Beste der Vergebenden.
ref: You are our saviour, so forgive us and have mercy on us, for You are the best of forgivers.
draft: "You are our protector, so forgive us and show us mercy! And you are the best of forgivers."
hil: You are our protector, so forgive us and show us mercy! And you are the best of forgivers.
compare: "You are our protector, so forgive us and show us mercy! And you are the best of forgivers."

src: Und es begreifen sie nur die Wissenden.
ref: But only those endowed with knowledge will comprehend them.
draft: And only the knowledgeable understand them.
hil: "And only the knowledgeable understand them."
compare: And only the knowledgeable understand them.

src: Oder fühlt ihr euch etwa sicher vor Dem, Dessen (Anweisung) im Himmel ist, daß ER über euch Sandsturm schickt?!
ref: Or have you become so unafraid that He who is in Heaven will not send a violent wind to shower stones at you?
draft: Or do you feel safe from Him whose instruction is in the sky and who sends you a sandstorm?
hil: "Or do you feel safe from Him whose instruction is in the sky and who sends you a sandstorm?"
compare: Or do you feel safe from Him whose instruction is in the sky and who sends you a sandstorm?

src: Kann es sein, daß wenn er stirbt oder getötet wird, daß ihr auf euren Fersen (zum Kufr) umkehrt?
ref: So what if he dies or is killed! Will you turn back and go away in haste?
draft: It is possible that if he dies or is killed, you will turn on your heels (towards Kufr)?
hil: Could it be that if he dies or is killed, you will turn back (to Kufr) on your heels?
compare: Could it be that if he dies or is killed, you will turn back (to Kufr) on your heels?

src: Und da die Berge versetzt und zu einer Luftspiegelung werden.
ref: The mountains put in motion turning into a mirage.
draft: And as the mountains are moved and become a mirage.
hil: And as the mountains move and become a mirage.
compare: And as the mountains move and become a mirage.

src: Und gehorcht Allah und Seinem Gesandten, und streitet nicht miteinander, sonst würdet ihr den Mut verlieren, und eure Kraft würde vergehen! Und seid standhaft!
ref: And obey Allah and His apostle, and dispute not, lest ye flag and your predominance depart, and be patient.
draft: And obey Allah and His Messenger, and do not fight with one another, otherwise you would lose courage, and your strength would disappear! And be steadfast!
hil: Obey Allah and His Messenger, and do not fight with one another, otherwise you would lose courage, and your strength would disappear! And be steadfast!
compare: And obey Allah and His Messenger, and do not fight with one another, otherwise you would lose courage, and your strength would disappear! And be steadfast!

src: Das sind die (wahren) Lügner.
ref: These are the liars.
draft: These are the (true) liars.
hil: They are the ones who are the liars.
compare: These are the (true) liars.

src: Doch sollten sie dich verraten wollen, so haben sie ALLAH bereits vorher verraten, dann hat ER sie unterwerfen lassen.
ref: But if they intend to betray you (O Muhammad SAW), they have already betrayed Allah before. So He gave (you) power over them.
draft: But if they want to betray you, they have already betrayed ALLAH before, and HE has made them submissive.
hil: If they try to deceive you, they have already deceived God before. So He gave you mastery over them, for God is all-knowing and all-wise.
compare: If they try to deceive you, they have already deceived God before. So He gave you mastery over them, for God is all-knowing and all-wise.

src: Und wenn die Gräber umgewühlt werden,
ref: When the graves are overturned,
draft: And if the graves are disturbed.
hil: And when the graves are disturbed.
compare: And when the graves are disturbed.

src: Allah wird alles ans Licht bringen, wovor ihr euch fürchtet."
ref: Say: 'Mock on; God will bring forth what you fear.'
draft: "Allah will bring to light everything that you fear."
hil: Say: "Mock all you want, Allah will surely expose what you dread."
compare: "Allah will bring to light everything that you fear."

src: Richte Bittgebete an deinen HERRN mit dem, wozu ER dich verpflichtete, wir sind gewiß rechtgeleitet!"
ref: Pray for us to your Lord, by the means of His covenant which is with you; we will certainly come to guidance.”
draft: "Direct supplications to your LORD with whatever HE obligated you, we are certainly rightly guided!"
hil: Invoke supplications to your Lord with what He has ordained for you, we are certainly rightly guided!
compare: Invoke supplications to your Lord with what He has ordained for you, we are certainly rightly guided!

src: Entweder peinigst du sie, oder du gewährst ihnen Gutes."
ref: Either you punish them, or treat them with kindness."
draft: Either you torment them or you grant them good.
hil: Either you torture them or you do them good.
compare: Either you torture them or you do them good.

src: Dies ist ein von Ihm gemachtes Versprechen, ein Wahrhaftiges - (erwähnt) in At-taurat, Alindschil und im Quran. Und wer hält sein Versprechen besser als ALLAH ein?!
ref: Rejoice wherefore in your bargain which ye have made.
draft: This is a promise made by Him, a truthful one - mentioned in the Torah, the Injil and the Quran. And who is better at keeping their promise than Allah?!
hil: This is a binding promise upon Him in the Torah, the Gospel, and the Koran. And who is there that more truthfully fulfills his covenant than Allah?
compare: This is a promise made by Him, a truthful one - mentioned in the Torah, the Injil and the Quran. And who is better at keeping their promise than Allah?!

src: Die (wahren) Gläubigen sind ja diejenigen, die an Allah und Seinen Gesandten glauben und hierauf nicht zweifeln und sich mit ihrem Besitz und mit ihrer eigenen Person auf Allahs Weg abmühen.
ref: They alone are believers who come to believe in God and His Apostle, then never doubt again, and struggle wealth and soul in the way of God.
draft: The (true) believers are those who believe in Allah and His Messenger and do not doubt thereafter, and strive with their wealth and their lives in the way of Allah.
hil: The (true) believers are those who believe in God and His Messenger and do not doubt thereafter, and strive with their wealth and their lives in the way of God.
compare: The (true) believers are those who believe in Allah and His Messenger and do not doubt thereafter, and strive with their wealth and their lives in the way of Allah.

src: Aber die meisten von ihnen wissen nicht Bescheid.
ref: But most of them do not know.
draft: But most of them do not know.
hil: But many of them do not know.
compare: But many of them do not know.

src: Da kam seine Frau in Aufregung heran, und sie schlug ihre Wange und sagte: "(Ich bin doch) eine unfruchtbare alte Frau!"
ref: His wife came out lamenting, striking her forehead, and said: "I, am old and barren woman?"
draft: "Then his wife came running in excitement, and she slapped her cheek and said, "(I am) an infertile old woman!"
hil: "Then his wife came to him in excitement, and she struck her cheek and said, "I am an infertile old woman!"."
compare: "Then his wife came to him in excitement, and she struck her cheek and said, "I am an infertile old woman!"."

src: Solltest DU sie peinigen, so sind sie doch Deine Diener.
ref: If Thou punish them, lo! they are Thy slaves, and if Thou forgive them (lo! they are Thy slaves).
draft: If you torment them, they are still your servants.
hil: If you torment them, still they are your servants.
compare: If you torment them, still they are your servants.

src: Und wenn diejenigen, die Schirk betrieben, die von ihnen beigesellten Partner gesehen haben, werden sie sagen: "Unser HERR!
ref: And when the polytheists will see their ascribed partners, they will say, “Our Lord!
draft: And if those who practiced sorcery had seen the partners they joined with, they would have certainly known that they have no such power, and they shall (at last) find their place of destination.
hil: And if those who committed shirk see the partners they associated with, they will say: "Our Lord!"
compare: And if those who committed shirk see the partners they associated with, they will say: "Our Lord!"

src: So wurden ihre Häuser dem Erdboden gleichgemacht, auch der Brunnen ist verlassen und das Schloß ist errichtet.
ref: How many a well and fortress reinforced lie abandoned!
draft: So their houses were leveled to the ground, the well is also deserted and the castle has been built.
hil: Thus their houses were leveled to the ground, and the well left deserted, and the castle was erected.
compare: So their houses were leveled to the ground, the well is also deserted and the castle has been built.

src: Dann brachten WIR heraus, wer in ihr von den Mumin war.
ref: So We evacuated everyone who was a believer there,
draft: Then WE figured out who among them was a Moomin.
hil: Then WE revealed who of them was a Moomin.
compare: Then WE revealed who of them was a Moomin.

src: Wollt ihr denn geduldig sein? Und dein Herr ist Allsehend.
ref: And O dear Prophet, your Lord is All Seeing.
draft: Do you want to be patient? And your Lord is All-Seeing.
hil: And do you want to have patience? And your Lord is All-Seeing.
compare: Do you want to be patient? And your Lord is All-Seeing.

src: Sie haben sich ihre Schriftgelehrten und Mönche zu Herren genommen außer Allah; und den Messias, den Sohn der Maria.
ref: They have taken their rabbis and their priests as lords instead of God, as well as the Messiah son of Mary.
draft: They have taken their scholars and monks as lords besides Allah; and [also] the Messiah, the son of Mary.
hil: They have taken their scholars and monks as lords besides Allah; and [also] the Messiah, the son of Mary.
compare: They have taken their scholars and monks as lords besides Allah; and [also] the Messiah, the son of Mary.

src: Sag: "Wie seht ihr das, was ALLAH euch vom Rizq hinabsandte, dann ihr es in Haram und Halal eingeteilt habt?"
ref: Say: "Have you thought of what God has sent you for food, of which you have labelled some as lawful and some forbidden?"
draft: Say: "How do you see what ALLAH sent down to you as Rizq, then you have divided it into Haram and Halal?"
hil: Say: "Have you considered the sustenance that Allah has sent down for you, and some you have made unlawful and some lawful?" Say: "Has Allah given you His permission, or are you inventing falsehood against Allah?"
compare: Say: "Have you considered the sustenance that Allah has sent down for you, and some you have made unlawful and some lawful?" Say: "Has Allah given you His permission, or are you inventing falsehood against Allah?"

src: Ebenso zu Seinen Ayat zählt, daß ER für euch von eurem Wesen Partnerwesen erschuf, damit ihr bei ihnen Geborgenheit findet. Und ER setzte zwischen euch Liebe und Barmherzigkeit. Gewiß, darin sind doch Ayat für Leute, die nachdenken.
ref: And among His signs is that He created spouses for you from yourselves for you to gain rest from them, and kept love and mercy between yourselves; indeed in this are signs for the people who ponder.
draft: Likewise, one of His signs is that He created for you from yourselves mates that you may find tranquility in them; and He placed between you affection and mercy. Indeed in that are signs for a people who give thought.
hil: From yourselves, He created for you mates that you may find tranquility in them; and He placed between you affection and mercy. Indeed, in that are signs for people who reflect.
compare: Likewise, one of His signs is that He created for you from yourselves mates that you may find tranquility in them; and He placed between you affection and mercy. Indeed in that are signs for a people who give thought.

src: Hierauf legte Er sie den Engeln vor und sagte: "Teilt Mir deren Namen mit, wenn ihr wahrhaftig seid!"
ref: After this he taught Adam the names of all things. Then He set these before the angels and asked, "Tell Me the names of these things, if you are right (in thinking that the appointment of a vicegerent will cause disorder)".
draft: "He then presented them to the angels and said, "Tell me their names if you are truly genuine!"".
hil: "Then He presented them to the angels and said, "Tell Me their names if you are truly genuine!""
compare: "Then He presented them to the angels and said, "Tell Me their names if you are truly genuine!""

src: Und ohne die Huld Allahs gegen euch und Seine Barmherzigkeit würde niemand von euch jemals lauter sein.
ref: And whosoever followeth the footsteps of the Satan, then he only urgeth to indecency and abomination.
draft: And without Allah's grace and His mercy towards you, none of you would ever be pure.
hil: And were it not for Allah's grace upon you and His mercy, none of you would ever be pure.
compare: And without Allah's grace and His mercy towards you, none of you would ever be pure.

src: Dann entfernten sie sich. ALLAH möge ihre Herzen (vom Iman) entfernen, weil sie gewiß Leute sind, die nicht begreifen.
ref: Indeed God has turned their hearts away (from the truth), for they cannot discern the law of heaven.
draft: Then they moved away. MAY ALLAH remove their hearts (from faith) because they are certainly people who do not understand.
hil: Then they moved away. MAY ALLAH remove their hearts (from faith) because they are certainly people who do not understand.
compare: Then they moved away. MAY ALLAH remove their hearts (from faith) because they are certainly people who do not understand.

src: Darum, wenn sie sich von euch fernhalten und nicht gegen euch kämpfen, sondern euch Frieden bieten; dann hat Allah euch keinen Grund gegen sie gegeben.
ref: If they keep aloof and do not fight, and offer peace, God has left you no reason to fight them.
draft: Therefore, if they keep away from you and do not fight you, but offer you peace, then Allah has not given you any reason to fight them.
hil: Therefore, if they keep away from you and do not fight you, but offer you peace, then Allah has not given you any reason to fight them.
compare: Therefore, if they keep away from you and do not fight you, but offer you peace, then Allah has not given you any reason to fight them.

src: Wenn wir wollten, könnten auch wir etwas Derartiges sagen. Das sind nichts als Fabeln der Früheren.»
ref: Had we wanted, we could have said the like of this; these are nothing but myths of the ancients.”
draft: If we wanted, we could also say something like that. Those are nothing but tales of the past.
hil: If we wanted, we could also say something like that. Those are nothing but tales of the ancients.
compare: If we wanted, we could also say something like that. Those are nothing but tales of the ancients.

src: Josef, wende dich davon ab. Und (du), bitte um Vergebung für deine Schuld. Du gehörst ja zu denen, die sich versündigt haben.»
ref: Ignore this affair, O Joseph; and you, O woman, ask forgiveness for your sin, for you were surely errant."
draft: "Josef, turn away from it. And (you), ask for forgiveness for your guilt. You belong to those who have sinned."
hil: Joseph, turn away from it. And ask for forgiveness for your guilt, as you belong to those who have sinned.
compare: Joseph, turn away from it. And ask for forgiveness for your guilt, as you belong to those who have sinned.

src: Und gewiß, manch einer von euch zögert. Und wenn ein Unglück euch heimsucht, sagt er: "ALLAH hat mir bereits eine Wohltat erwiesen, daß ich unter ihnen nicht anwesend war."
ref: Someone among you will surely lag behind, and if calamity should befall you, will say: "God was gracious to me that I was not among them."
draft: And certainly, some of you hesitate. And when a misfortune befalls you, he says: "ALLAH has already shown me a favor by not being among them."
hil: And certainly, some of you hesitate. If a misfortune befalls you, he says, "Indeed Allah has favoured me in that I was not present among them."
compare: And certainly, some of you hesitate. And when a misfortune befalls you, he says: "ALLAH has already shown me a favor by not being among them."

src: Und als sie die Peinigung überkam, sagten sie: "Musa!
ref: And whenever the punishment came upon them they said, “O Moosa!
draft: And when the torment came upon them, they said, "Moses!
hil: And when the torment came upon them, they said, 'Moses!'
compare: And when the torment came upon them, they said, "Moses!

src: Sie schwören euch bei ALLAH, damit sie euch zufriedenstellen, während ALLAH und Sein Gesandter doch berechtigter sind, zufriedengestellt zu werden, sollten sie Mumin sein.
ref: They swear by God to please you; but if they are believers it would have been worthier to have pleased God and His Apostle.
draft: They swear to you by Allah that they may please you, while Allah and His Messenger are more deserving that they should please Him, if they are believers.
hil: They swear to you by Allah that they may please you, while Allah and His Messenger are more deserving that they should please Him, if they are believers.
compare: They swear to you by Allah that they may please you, while Allah and His Messenger are more deserving that they should please Him, if they are believers.

src: So wende dein Gesicht in Richtung der geschützten Gebetsstätte!
ref: And wheresoever you people are, turn your faces (in prayer) in that direction.
draft: So turn your face towards the protected place of worship!
hil: "Turn your face towards the protected place of worship, so that people will have no argument against you except for the wrongdoing ones among them. So do not fear them, but fear Me. And [it is] so I may complete My favor upon you and that you may be guided."
compare: So turn your face towards the protected place of worship!

src: Also vergalten Wir es ihnen. Siehe nun, wie das Ende der Leugner war!
ref: So We took revenge from them – therefore see what sort of fate befell those who denied!
draft: We will repay them. See now how the end of the deniers was!
hil: Thus we recompensed them. See now the end of the deniers!
compare: Thus we recompensed them. See now the end of the deniers!

src: Er hat euch aus der Erde entstehen lassen und sie euch zu bebauen und zu bestellen gegeben.
ref: He hath caused you to spring out of the earth, and hath made you dwell therein.
draft: He has caused you to emerge from the earth and given it to you for cultivation and utilization.
hil: He produced you from the earth and gave it to you to cultivate and work.
compare: He produced you from the earth and gave it to you to cultivate and work.

src: Und sie sagen: "Dies sind verwehrtes Vieh und verwehrte (Früchte auf den) Saatfelder(n).
ref: They also say: "These cattle and these crops are consecrated. None may eat of them other than those we permit," -- so they assert.
draft: And they say, "These are forbidden cattle and forbidden (fruits) on the fields."
hil: And they say, 'These are forbidden cattle and forbidden (fruits) on the fields.'
compare: And they say, "These are forbidden cattle and forbidden (fruits) on the fields."

src: Er sagte: "Ihr befindet euch in einer (noch) schlechteren Lage. Und Allah weiß sehr wohl, was ihr beschreibt."
ref: But Joseph kept this secret and did not disclose it to them, and said (to himself): "You are worse in the degree of evil, for God knows better of what you allege."
draft: He said: "You are in an even worse position. And Allah knows very well what you describe."
hil: He said, "You are in an even worse position. And Allah knows very well what you describe."
compare: He said: "You are in an even worse position. And Allah knows very well what you describe."

src: Und er wird froh zu seinen Angehörigen zurückkehren.
ref: And will return to his people full of joy.
draft: And he will return happily to his relatives.
hil: "And he will return happily to his relatives."
compare: And he will return happily to his relatives.

src: Darin sind gehobene Liegen
ref: And within it are couches placed on high,
draft: There are elevated loungers in it.
hil: Therein are elevated loungers.
compare: There are elevated loungers in it.

src: Fir'aun sagte: "Was ist denn der Herr der Weltenbewohner?"
ref: The Pharaoh asked: "And what is the Lord of all the worlds?"
draft: Pharaoh said, "Who then is the Lord of the worlds?"
hil: "Pharaoh asked, \"Who then is the Lord of the worlds?\""
compare: Pharaoh said, "Who then is the Lord of the worlds?"

src: Und wer Kufr gegenüber dem Iman betreibt, dessen Handeln ist zweifellos nichtig, und er gehört im Jenseits zu den Verlierern.
ref: Useless shall be rendered the acts of those who turn back on their faith, and they will be among the losers in the life to come.
draft: And whoever commits disbelief against the Imam, his action is undoubtedly void, and he belongs to the losers in the Hereafter.
hil: And whoever disbelieves in the Imam, their actions are undoubtedly worthless, and in the Hereafter, they will belong to the losers.
compare: And whoever commits disbelief against the Imam, his action is undoubtedly void, and he belongs to the losers in the Hereafter.

src: ER sagte: "Ist dies nicht dieWahrheit?!"
ref: He will say, 'Is not this the truth?'
draft: He said, "Isn't this the truth?!"
hil: He said, "Isn't this the truth?!"
compare: He said, "Isn't this the truth?!"

src: Die Menschen fragen dich nach der Stunde. Sag: Das Wissen darüber ist nur bei Allah.
ref: People ask thee ccncerning the Hour.
draft: The people ask you about the hour. Say: The knowledge about it is only with Allah.
hil: The people ask you about the hour. Say: The knowledge about it is only with Allah.
compare: The people ask you about the hour. Say: The knowledge about it is only with Allah.

src: Und ALLAH erschuf alles sich bewegende Lebewesen aus Wasser. So geht manch einer von ihnen auf seinem Bauch, und manch einer von ihnen geht auf zwei Beinen, und manch einer von ihnen geht auf Vieren. ALLAH erschafft, was ER will! Gewiß, ALLAH ist über alles allmächtig.
ref: And Allah created every animal on earth, from water; so among them is a kind that moves upon its belly; and among them is a kind that moves upon two legs; and among them a kind that moves upon four legs; Allah creates whatever He wills; indeed Allah is Able to do all things.
draft: And Allah created every living creature that moves in water. So, some of them walk on their bellies, while others walk on two legs, and some walk on four. Allah creates whatever He wills. Indeed, Allah is Able to do all things.
hil: And God created every living creature that moves in water. So some of them walk on their bellies, while others walk on two legs, and some walk on four. God creates whatever He wills! Indeed, God is able to do all things.
compare: And Allah created every living creature that moves in water. So, some of them walk on their bellies, while others walk on two legs, and some walk on four. Allah creates whatever He wills. Indeed, Allah is Able to do all things.

src: Die Juden sagen: "Auf nichts fußen die Christen"; und die Christen sagen: "Auf nichts fußen die Juden", obwohl sie doch (beide) die Schrift lesen.
ref: The Jews say, 'The Christians stand not on anything'; the Christians say, 'The Jews stand not on anything'; yet they recite the Book.
draft: The Jews say, "Christians have no foundation," and the Christians say, "Jews have no foundation," even though (both) read the scripture.
hil: The Jews say, "Christians have no foundation," and the Christians say, "Jews have no foundation," even though (both) read the scripture.
compare: The Jews say, "Christians have no foundation," and the Christians say, "Jews have no foundation," even though (both) read the scripture.

src: Das Gleichnis dessen, was sie in diesem diesseitigen Leben spenden, ist wie das Gleichnis vom Wind, der bittere Kälte bringt und die Äcker von Leuten, die Unrecht begangen haben, heimsucht und dann zerstört. Und ALLAH fügte ihnen kein Unrecht zu, sondern sie fügten sich selbst Unrecht zu.
ref: The example of what they spend in this worldly life is similar to the freezing cold wind which struck the fields of a nation who wronged themselves, and destroyed it completely; and Allah did not oppress them, but it is they who wronged themselves.
draft: The parable of what they spend in this worldly life is like the parable of a wind that brings bitter cold and visits the fields of people who have done wrong to themselves, and destroys it. And Allah did not wrong them, but they wronged themselves.
hil: The parable of what they spend in this worldly life is like the parable of a wind that brings bitter cold and visits the fields of people who have done wrong to themselves, and destroys it. And Allah did not wrong them, but they wronged themselves.
compare: The parable of what they spend in this worldly life is like the parable of a wind that brings bitter cold and visits the fields of people who have done wrong to themselves, and destroys it. And Allah did not wrong them, but they wronged themselves.

src: An jenem Tag waren sie dem Unglauben näher als dem Glauben, sie sagten ja mit ihrem Munde, was nicht in ihrem Herzen war.
ref: They were that day, nearer to disbelief than to Faith, saying with their mouths what was not in their hearts.
draft: On that day, they were closer to disbelief than to belief, they spoke with their mouths what was not in their hearts.
hil: On that day they were closer to disbelief than to belief. They spoke with their mouths what was not in their hearts.
compare: On that day, they were closer to disbelief than to belief, they spoke with their mouths what was not in their hearts.

src: (Ich vermag) nur etwas zu übermitteln von Allah und Seinen Botschaften. Und wer sich Allah und Seinem Gesandten widersetzt, gewiß, für ihn wird es das Feuer der Hölle geben, ewig und auf immer darin zu bleiben.
ref: “I only convey the commands from Allah, and His messages; and whoever disobeys the commands of Allah and His Noble Messenger – then indeed for him is the fire of hell, in which they will remain for ever and ever.”
draft: "I am only able to convey something from Allah and His messages. And whoever opposes Allah and His Messenger, indeed, for him is the fire of Hell, to abide therein eternally."
hil: I am only able to convey something from Allah and His messages. And whoever opposes Allah and His Messenger, indeed, for him is the fire of Hell, to abide therein eternally, in which there will be no end, so that they may not die, and their torment will not be lessened.
compare: "I am only able to convey something from Allah and His messages. And whoever opposes Allah and His Messenger, indeed, for him is the fire of Hell, to abide therein eternally."

src: Dann erfaßte Ich jene, die ungläubig waren, und wie war es mit der Verleugnung!
ref: So We seized the unbelievers. How great was the change I wrought in their condition then!
draft: Then I seized those who were unbelievers, and how was the denial!
hil: "Then I seized those who were unbelievers, and how was the denial!"
compare: Then I seized those who were unbelievers, and how was the denial!

src: Und die Soldaten deines HERRN kennt niemand außer Ihm.
ref: And none knoweth the hosts of thy Lord but He.
draft: And no one knows the soldiers of your Lord except Him.
hil: No one knows the soldiers of your Lord except Him.
compare: And no one knows the soldiers of your Lord except Him.

src: Doch sie fügten damit niemandem Schaden zu, es sei denn mit der Ermächtigung Allahs.
ref: Yet they could not harm any one or without the dispensation of God.
draft: But they did not harm anyone with it, except with Allah's permission.
hil: "They did not harm anyone with it, unless with Allah's permission."
compare: But they did not harm anyone with it, except with Allah's permission.

src: Fir'aun sagte: "Laßt mich Musa töten; soll er (doch) seinen Herrn anrufen!
ref: "Let me kill Moses," the Pharaoh said, "and let him call to his Lord.
draft: Pharaoh said, "Let me kill Moses; let him call upon his Lord!"
hil: Pharaoh said, "Let me kill Moses; let him call upon his Lord!"
compare: Pharaoh said, "Let me kill Moses; let him call upon his Lord!"

src: Und wer Allah Götter zur Seite stellt, der hat wahrhaftig eine gewaltige Sünde begangen.
ref: And he who ascribes compeers to God is guilty of the gravest sin.
draft: "And whoever sets up gods beside Allah, he has certainly strayed away from the right path and committed a heinous sin."
hil: And whoever sets up partners with Allah has certainly committed a great sin.
compare: "And whoever sets up gods beside Allah, he has certainly strayed away from the right path and committed a heinous sin."

src: Gewiß, Er weiß über das Innerste der Brüste Bescheid.
ref: Indeed, He knows the secrets of the hearts.
draft: Surely, He knows about the innermost of the breasts.
hil: Surely, He knows the innermost secrets of your hearts.
compare: Surely, He knows the innermost secrets of your hearts.

src: Sie sagten: "Wir brachen das Versprechen dir gegenüber nicht aus eigener Kraft.
ref: They replied: 'We have not failed in our promise to you through our choosing.
draft: They said: "We did not break the promise to you on our own."
hil: They said, 'We did not break the promise to you on our own.'
compare: They said, 'We did not break the promise to you on our own.'

src: Sollte er von ihr dann (zum dritten Mal) die Talaq-Scheidung vollzogen haben, so wird sie für ihn danach nicht mehr halal, bis sie einen anderen Ehemann heiratet.
ref: If a man divorces her again (a third time), she becomes unlawful for him (and he cannot remarry her) until she has married another man.
draft: If he then (for the third time) pronounces the Talaq divorce, she will no longer be halal for him afterwards until she marries another husband.
hil: If he then (for the third time) pronounces the Talaq divorce, she will no longer be halal for him afterwards until she marries another husband.
compare: If he then (for the third time) pronounces the Talaq divorce, she will no longer be halal for him afterwards until she marries another husband.

src: Und es ist für euch kein Vergehen, wenn ihr Heiratsabsichten gegenüber solchen Frauen andeutet oder bei euch innerlich hegt.
ref: You commit no error by announcing your engagement to women, or by keeping it to yourselves.
draft: "And it is not a crime for you if you hint at marriage intentions towards such women or harbor them inwardly."
hil: It is not an offense for you if you indicate or inwardly harbor marriage intentions towards such women.
compare: "And it is not a crime for you if you hint at marriage intentions towards such women or harbor them inwardly."

src: Und WIR erretteten diejenigen, die den Iman verinnerlichten und Taqwa gemäß zu handeln pflegten.
ref: We deliver those who believe and take heed for themselves.
draft: And WE saved those who internalized faith and acted according to Taqwa.
hil: And WE saved those who practiced faith and acted according to Taqwa.
compare: And WE saved those who internalized faith and acted according to Taqwa.

src: Du bist der, der alles hört und weiß.»
ref: Thou art the Hearer, the Knower.
draft: "You are the one who hears and knows everything."
hil: You are the One who hears and knows everything.
compare: You are the One who hears and knows everything.

src: Aber wenn sie sich dessen enthalten, ist das besser für sie.
ref: But to refrain (i.e. not to discard their outer clothing) is better for them.
draft: But if they abstain from it, it is better for them.
hil: But if they refrain from it, it is better for them.
compare: But if they abstain from it, it is better for them.

src: Abziehende der Kopfhäute,
ref: That would skin the scalp.
draft: "removers of the scalp"
hil: Removers of the scalp,
compare: "removers of the scalp"

src: Meine Leute! Handelt euren Standpunkten entsprechend, auch ich handle.
ref: Do on your part what you can, O people, I will do what I will.
draft: My people! Act according to your positions, I also act.
hil: "My people! Act according to your ability and way, I am acting (on my way).".
compare: My people! Act according to your positions, I also act.

src: Waret ihr dabei, als Allah euch dies gebot?" Wer ist also ungerechter als der, welcher eine Lüge gegen Allah ersinnt, um die Leute ohne Wissen irrezuführen?
ref: Then who doth greater wrong than he who deviseth a lie concerning Allah, that he may lead mankind astray without knowledge. Lo!
draft: "Were you present when Allah commanded you this?" Who, then, is more unjust than one who invents a lie about Allah to misguide people without knowledge?
hil: Were you present when Allah commanded you this? Who, then, is more unjust than one who invents a lie about Allah to misguide people without knowledge?
compare: "Were you present when Allah commanded you this?" Who, then, is more unjust than one who invents a lie about Allah to misguide people without knowledge?

src: Den Menschen erschaffen hat aus einem Embryo.
ref: Created man from an embryo;
draft: "Created man from an embryo."
hil: "Created man from an embryo."
compare: "Created man from an embryo."

src: (Dies ist) das Gleichnis des (Paradies)gartens, der den Gottesfürchtigen versprochen ist: Er ist durcheilt von Bächen'; sein Ernteertrag ist immerwährend und (auch) sein Schatten.
ref: The likeness of Paradise promised the pious and devout is (of a garden) with streams of rippling water, everlasting fruits and shade.
draft: "The parable of the garden of paradise promised to the God-fearing: It is traversed by streams; its yield is perpetual and also its shade."
hil: "This is the description of the paradise which is promised to the pious; rivers flow beneath it, its fruits are unending, and its shade is perpetual."
compare: "The parable of the garden of paradise promised to the God-fearing: It is traversed by streams; its yield is perpetual and also its shade."

src: Und die ihr Zeugnis ablegen,
ref: Who uphold their testimonies,
draft: And those who bear witness,
hil: And those who bear witness,
compare: And those who bear witness,

src: Aber Er läßt in seine Barmherzigkeit eingehen, wen Er will.
ref: But He admits whomsoever He pleases into His Mercy.
draft: But He admits into His mercy whom He wills.
hil: He admits into His mercy whom He wills.
compare: He admits into His mercy whom He wills.

src: Und als Unsere Boten zu Lot kamen, war er ihretwegen besorgt und fühlte sich außerstande, ihnen zu helfen. Sie sprachen: "Fürchte dich nicht und sei nicht traurig, wir wollen dich und die Deinen sicher retten, bis auf deine Frau, die zu denen gehört, die zurückbleiben sollen.
ref: And when Our sent angels came to Lut, he was unhappy at their arrival and was depressed – and they said, “Do not fear or grieve; we will surely rescue you and your family, except your wife, who is of those who will stay behind.”
draft: And when our messengers came to Lot, he was worried about them and felt unable to help them. They said, "Do not be afraid and do not be sad, we will save you and your people safely, except for your wife, who belongs to those who should stay behind.
hil: And when our messengers came to Lot, he was worried about them and felt unable to help them. They said, 'Do not be afraid and do not be sad, we will save you and your people safely, except for your wife, who belongs to those who should stay behind.'
compare: And when our messengers came to Lot, he was worried about them and felt unable to help them. They said, "Do not be afraid and do not be sad, we will save you and your people safely, except for your wife, who belongs to those who should stay behind.

src: Und gewiß, bereits erleichterten WIR den Quran zur Ermahnung! Gibt es etwa einen sich Erinnernden?!
ref: Easy have We made the Qur'an to understand: So is there any one who will pay heed?
draft: And certainly, we have made the Quran easy for remembrance. Is there anyone who takes heed?
hil: And indeed, we have already made the Quran easy for remembrance. Is there anyone who remembers?
compare: And indeed, we have already made the Quran easy for remembrance. Is there anyone who remembers?

src: Allah sieht die Menschen wohl,
ref: And under God's eyes are devotees
draft: Allah sees people well.
hil: Indeed, Allah sees people well.
compare: Indeed, Allah sees people well.

src: (Erinnere) an den Tag, wenn er euch zum Tag des Zusammenbringens zusammenbringt. Dies ist der (Anklage-)Tag wegen Übervorteilung.
ref: The day He will gather you together on the Day of Gathering, will be the day of Judgement.
draft: Remember the day when he brings you together for the Day of Gathering. This is the day of indictment for exploitation.
hil: Remember the day when he brings you together for the Day of Gathering. This is the day of indictment for exploitation.
compare: Remember the day when he brings you together for the Day of Gathering. This is the day of indictment for exploitation.

src: Und am Tag, da Er sie versammelt, als hätten sie nur eine Stunde vom Tag verweilt, um einander kennenzulernen. Den Verlust haben diejenigen, die die Begegnung mit Gott für Lüge erklärt haben und der Rechtleitung nicht gefolgt sind.
ref: And on the day when He will raise all of them together, as if they had never stayed on earth except for a moment during the day, they will recognise one another; for completely ruined are those who denied the meeting with Allah and were not on guidance.
draft: And on the day when He gathers them as if they had not stayed but an hour of a day to get to know each other, those who have declared the encounter with God a lie and have not followed the guidance will be the losers.
hil: And on the day when He gathers them as if they had only lingered for an hour of the day to get to know each other, those who have declared encountering with God as a lie and have not followed the guidance will be the losers.
compare: And on the day when He gathers them as if they had not stayed but an hour of a day to get to know each other, those who have declared the encounter with God a lie and have not followed the guidance will be the losers.

src: ALLAH will ihnen keinen Anteil am Jenseits gewähren.
ref: It is Allah's Will to give them no portion in the Hereafter.
draft: ALLAH will not grant them a share in the hereafter.
hil: ALLAH will not grant them a share in the hereafter.
compare: ALLAH will not grant them a share in the hereafter.

src: Sie sagte zu seiner Schwester: "Spüre ihm nach."
ref: She told his sister: "Follow him."
draft: She said to his sister, "Follow his tracks."
hil: She said to his sister, 'Trace him.'
compare: She said to his sister, 'Trace him.'

src: Zakaria! Gewiß, WIR überbringen dir doch frohe Botschaft von einem Jungen Namens Yahya. Dessen Namen haben WIR niemandem zuvor gegeben.
ref: O Zakariyya! verily We give thee the glad tidings of a boy: his name shall be Yahya; We have not afore-time made his namesake.
draft: Zakaria! Certainly, we bring you good tidings of a boy named Yahya. We have never given this name to anyone before.
hil: Zakaria! Certainly, WE bring you good tidings of a boy named Yahya. We have never given this name to anyone before.
compare: Zakaria! Certainly, we bring you good tidings of a boy named Yahya. We have never given this name to anyone before.

src: Und wer an Allah glaubt und das Rechte tut - Er wird seine Übel von ihm nehmen und wird ihn in Gärten führen, durch die Bäche fließen, worin (sie) auf ewig verweilen.
ref: He who believed and did the right, will have his evil deeds expunged by God and admitted to gardens with rivers flowing by, and abide there perpetually.
draft: And whoever believes in Allah and does what is right - He will take away his evil from him and lead him into gardens through which rivers flow, in which they will dwell forever.
hil: Whoever believes in Allah and does what is right, God will admit him to gardens with running streams of water, where they will abide forever and take away their evils from them.
compare: And whoever believes in Allah and does what is right - He will take away his evil from him and lead him into gardens through which rivers flow, in which they will dwell forever.

src: Da könnt ihr weder (etwas) abwenden noch Hilfe erfahren. Und wer von euch Unrecht tut, den lassen Wir große Strafe kosten "
ref: Then you shall neither be able to repel your punishment nor shall get any help from anywhere; and whoso is guilty. of iniquity'' among you, We shall make him taste a severe torment.
draft: There you can neither avert (something) nor receive help. And whoever of you does wrong, We will make him bear a great punishment.
hil: You will not be able to avert anything or receive assistance. And whoever among you does wrong, We will make them bear a great punishment.
compare: You will not be able to avert anything or receive assistance. And whoever among you does wrong, We will make them bear a great punishment.

src: Wer ist dieser, der um ALLAHs willen eine Hasan-Anleihe macht, damit ALLAH sie für ihn um ein Vielfaches vermehrt?!
ref: Who will give a goodly loan to God which He might double many times?
draft: Who is this person who, for the sake of Allah, makes a Hasan loan so that Allah may multiply it for him many times over?!
hil: Who is it that makes a Hasan loan for the sake of Allah, so that Allah may multiply it for him many times over?
compare: Who is this person who, for the sake of Allah, makes a Hasan loan so that Allah may multiply it for him many times over?!

src: So fragt die Leute der Ermahnung, wenn ihr (es) nicht wißt.
ref: If you do not know, then ask the keepers of the oracles of God.
draft: So ask the people for advice if you don't know.
hil: "So ask the people for advice if you don't know."
compare: So ask the people for advice if you don't know.

src: Du Mensch!
ref: O Man!
draft: You human!
hil: You human!
compare: You human!

src: Zu Ihm ist eure Rückkehr, alle zusammen - ein wahrhaftiges Versprechen von ALLAH.
ref: To Him will you all return: God's promise is true.
draft: To Him is your return, all together - a true promise of Allah.
hil: To Him only you all are to return; the promise of Allah; indeed He creates for the first time and then after its extinction creates it again, in order to give those who believe and do good deeds, the reward of justice; and for disbelievers, boiling water to drink and a painful punishment – the recompense of their disbelief.
compare: To Him is your return, all together - a true promise of Allah.

src: Gewiß, denjenigen, die Kufr betrieben haben, werden weder ihre Vermögenswerte noch ihre Kinder vor ALLAH etwas nutzen.
ref: As for those who disbelieve, neither wealth nor children will avail them in the least against God.
draft: Certainly, those who have committed disbelief, neither their assets nor their children will benefit them in front of Allah.
hil: Certainly, those who have committed disbelief, neither their assets nor their children will benefit them in front of Allah.
compare: Certainly, those who have committed disbelief, neither their assets nor their children will benefit them in front of Allah.

src: Sag: "Nennt sie doch!" Oder macht ihr Ihm etwa Mitteilung über das, was ER auf der Erde nicht kennt oder sind dies nur Worthülsen?!
ref: Proclaim, “Just name them – or is it that you inform Him of something which in His knowledge does not exist in the earth – or is it just superficial talk?”
draft: Say: "Name them then!" Or are you informing Him about something that He does not know on Earth, or are these just empty words?!
hil: Tell them, 'Name them then!' Or are you informing Him about something that He does not know on Earth, or are these just empty words?!
compare: Say: "Name them then!" Or are you informing Him about something that He does not know on Earth, or are these just empty words?!

src: Sie sagten: "Wer hat dies mit unseren Göttern getan? Er gehört wahrlich zu den Ungerechten."
ref: They said: who hath wrought this to our gods? verily he is of the wrong-doers.
draft: They said, "Who has done this with our gods? He certainly belongs to the unjust."
hil: They said, "Who has done this with our gods? He certainly belongs to the unjust."
compare: They said, "Who has done this with our gods? He certainly belongs to the unjust."

src: Diese sind diejenigen, die ihrem HERRN gegenüber Kufr betrieben haben. Und diese sind es, um deren Hälse Eisenringe sein werden.
ref: They are the ones who deny their Lord, and they will have collars around their necks.
draft: These are the ones who have committed kufr against their Lord. And these are the ones whose necks will be chained with iron rings.
hil: Those are they who defied their Lord. And those are they whose necks will be encircled with chains.
compare: These are the ones who have committed kufr against their Lord. And these are the ones whose necks will be chained with iron rings.

src: So diene Mir und verrichte das Gebet zu Meinem Gedenken.
ref: So serve Me and establish Prayers to remember Me.
draft: Serve Me and perform the prayer in memory of Me.
hil: Serve Me and perform the prayer in memory of Me.
compare: Serve Me and perform the prayer in memory of Me.

src: Was ist mit diesem Buch, daß es nichts, weder klein noch groß, ausläßt, ohne es zu erfassen?»
ref: What sort of Book is this that leaves neither a small thing nor a big thing, but has recorded it with numbers!"
draft: "What is it about this book that leaves nothing out, neither small nor large, without grasping it?"
hil: "What is it about this book that omits nothing, neither small nor large, without grasping it?"
compare: "What is it about this book that omits nothing, neither small nor large, without grasping it?"

src: Und für sie ist eine andauernde Peinigung bestimmt,
ref: There is perpetual punishment for them,
draft: And an enduring torment is determined for them.
hil: And for them is an enduring torment determined.
compare: And an enduring torment is determined for them.

src: Das ist eine Ermahnung für dich und dein Volk. Und ihr werdet zur Verantwortung gezogen.
ref: And it is undoubtedly an honour for you and your people; and you will soon be questioned.
draft: This is a warning for you and your people. And you will be held responsible.
hil: This is a reminder for you and your people. And you will be held accountable.
compare: This is a reminder for you and your people. And you will be held accountable.

src: Das ist etwas von Allahs Huld gegen uns und gegen die Menschen. Aber die meisten Menschen sind nicht dankbar.
ref: This is among God's favours to us and to all mankind; but most men are not grateful.
draft: This is something from Allah's grace towards us and towards people. But most people are not grateful.
hil: This is something of Allah's grace towards us and towards people. But most people are not grateful.
compare: This is something from Allah's grace towards us and towards people. But most people are not grateful.

src: Und keiner von euch soll sich umdrehen.
ref: Walk behind them and let no one turn around.
draft: "And none of you shall turn around."
hil: And none of you shall turn around.
compare: "And none of you shall turn around."

src: Das ist eine Gemeinschaft, die dahingegangen ist. Sie erhält, was sie erworben hat, und ihr erhaltet, was ihr erworben habt.
ref: Those are a people who have passed away; theirs is that which they earned and yours that which ye earn.
draft: This is a community that has passed away. It receives what it has acquired, and you receive what you have acquired.
hil: This was a nation that has passed away; for them is what they earned, and yours is what you earn; and you will not be questioned about their deeds.
compare: This is a community that has passed away. It receives what it has acquired, and you receive what you have acquired.

src: Aber die bösen Ränke umschließen nur ihre Urheber.
ref: But their evil plots will turn back on the plotters themselves.
draft: But the evil schemes only enclose their perpetrators.
hil: But the wicked machinations only entangle their instigators.
compare: But the evil schemes only enclose their perpetrators.

src: Er ist es, Der in Wahrheit die Himmel und die Erde erschuf; und am Tage, da Er spricht: "Sei!" wird es so sein.
ref: It is He who created the heavens and the earth with a definite purpose. The day He will say "Be, " it will be.
draft: He is the one who truly created the heavens and the earth; and on the day when He says: "Be!" it will be so.
hil: He is the one who created the heavens and the earth in truth. On the day when He says, 'Be!' it will be.
compare: He is the one who truly created the heavens and the earth; and on the day when He says: "Be!" it will be so.

src: Doch wenn sie dich auffordern, Mir das zur Seite zu setzen, wovon du keine Kenntnis hast, dann gehorche ihnen nicht. In weltlichen Dingen aber verkehre mit ihnen auf gütige Weise.
ref: But if they (both) strive with you to make you join in worship with Me others that of which you have no knowledge, then obey them not, but behave with them in the world kindly, and follow the path of him who turns to Me in repentance and in obedience.
draft: But if they ask you to put aside what you have no knowledge of, then do not obey them. In worldly matters, however, interact with them kindly.
hil: But if they ask you to put aside what you have no knowledge of, then do not obey them. However, in worldly matters, interact with them kindly.
compare: But if they ask you to put aside what you have no knowledge of, then do not obey them. In worldly matters, however, interact with them kindly.

src: Das ist es, was Er euch geboten hat, auf daß ihr es begreifen möget.
ref: These things has God enjoined on you. Haply you may understand.
draft: This is what He has commanded you so that you may understand it.
hil: He commanded you with this so that you may understand it.
compare: This is what He has commanded you so that you may understand it.

src: Das geschah, um Schlechtigkeit und Unsittlichkeit von ihm abzuwenden.
ref: Thus it was, that We might turn away from him evil and illegal sexual intercourse.
draft: "That happened to avert wickedness and immorality from him."
hil: This happened to avert wickedness and immorality from him.
compare: This happened to avert wickedness and immorality from him.

src: Diese sind unsere Leute, sie nahmen sich anstelle von Ihm Götter.
ref: As for these our people here, they have taken to other gods apart from Him.
draft: These are our people, they took gods instead of Him.
hil: These are our people, they took gods instead of Him.
compare: These are our people, they took gods instead of Him.

src: Es steht uns nicht zu, eine Ermächtigung zu bringen - außer mit der Erlaubnis Allahs.
ref: It is not in our power to bring a miracle for you without the leave of God.
draft: It is not up to us to bring an authorization - except with the permission of Allah.
hil: It is not for us to bring an authority save by the leave of God; and in God let the believers put all their trust.
compare: It is not for us to bring an authority save by the leave of God; and in God let the believers put all their trust.

src: Er sagte: "Meine Leute! Wie seht ihr es?
ref: He said: "O my people, think.
draft: He said: "My people! What do you think?"
hil: "He said: 'My people! What do you think?'"
compare: He said: "My people! What do you think?"

src: Und die Ungläubigen werden sagen: "Unser Herr, zeige uns jene der Ginn und der Menschen, die uns irreführten, damit wir sie mit unseren Füßen treten, so daß sie zu den Niedrigsten gehören."
ref: Those who disbelieve will say: "O Lord, show us those among the jinns and men who had led us astray that we may trample them underfoot and make them wholly abject."
draft: And the unbelievers will say, "Our Lord, show us those of the jinn and mankind who led us astray, so we may put them under our feet and they will be among the lowest."
hil: And the unbelievers will say: "Our Lord, show us those of the jinn and mankind who led us astray, so we may put them under our feet and they will be among the lowest."
compare: And the unbelievers will say, "Our Lord, show us those of the jinn and mankind who led us astray, so we may put them under our feet and they will be among the lowest."

src: Aber nein, bei deinem Herrn!
ref: But no, by your Lord!
draft: But no, with your Lord!
hil: But no, with your Lord.
compare: But no, with your Lord.

src: So wurde in ihren Herzen (die Zuneigung) zum Kalb wegen ihres Kufr eingeprägt.
ref: (The image of) the calf had sunk deep into their hearts on account of unbelief.
draft: So in their hearts (the affection) for the calf was imprinted due to their kufr.
hil: So in their hearts (the affection) for the calf was imprinted due to their kufr.
compare: So in their hearts (the affection) for the calf was imprinted due to their kufr.

src: Und wir sind Ihm ergeben.
ref: To Him we are submitters (Muslims)'
draft: And we are devoted to Him.
hil: And we are His devotees.
compare: And we are devoted to Him.

src: So siehe wiederholt hin, siehst du irgend etwas an Rissen?!
ref: Turn your eyes again. Do you see any fissures?
draft: So look again and again, do you see anything cracked?!
hil: So take a closer look again and again, do you see anything cracked?!
compare: So take a closer look again and again, do you see anything cracked?!

src: Und gebt den Frauen ihre Brautgabe als Schenkung. Und wenn sie euch gern etwas davon erlassen, so könnt ihr dies unbedenklich zum Wohlsein verbrauchen.
ref: Give to women their dowers willingly, but if they forego part of it themselves, then use it to your advantage.
draft: And give women their bridal gifts as a free gift. And if they like to waive something of it, you can use it for well-being without hesitation.
hil: And give women their bridal gifts as a free gift. And if they like to waive something of it, you can use it for well-being without hesitation.
compare: And give women their bridal gifts as a free gift. And if they like to waive something of it, you can use it for well-being without hesitation.

src: Aber er kann ihnen keinen Schaden zufügen, außer mit Allahs Erlaubnis. Und auf Allah sollen sich die Gläubigen verlassen.
ref: But he cannot harm them in the least, except as Allah permits, and in Allah let the believers put their trust.
draft: But he cannot harm them except by Allah's permission. And upon Allah let the believers rely.
hil: But he cannot harm them except by Allah's leave. And the believers shall put their trust in Allah.
compare: But he cannot harm them except by Allah's permission. And upon Allah let the believers rely.

src: Muhammad ist nicht der Vater eines eurer Männer, sondern der Gesandte Allahs und der letzte aller Propheten, und Allah besitzt die volle Kenntnis aller Dinge.
ref: Muhammad is not the father of any man among you, but a messenger of God, and the seal of the prophets. God has knowledge of everything.
draft: Muhammad is not the father of one of your men, but rather the Messenger of Allah and the last of all prophets, and Allah has full knowledge of all things.
hil: Muhammad is not the father of one of your men, but rather the Messenger of Allah and the last of all prophets, and Allah has full knowledge of all things.
compare: Muhammad is not the father of one of your men, but rather the Messenger of Allah and the last of all prophets, and Allah has full knowledge of all things.

src: Denn ER ist mir gegenüber immer großzügig gewesen.
ref: He has been gracious to me.
draft: Because he has always been generous to me.
hil: For HE has always been generous towards me.
compare: Because he has always been generous to me.

src: "So halte sie fest und befiel deinem Volk, sich an das Schönste in ihnen zu halten!
ref: “Hold fast to them, and exhort your people to adopt the best of them.
draft: "So hold onto them and command your people to stay true to the most beautiful thing within them!"
hil: So hold firmly to them and command your people to hold onto the most beautiful thing within them!
compare: So hold firmly to them and command your people to hold onto the most beautiful thing within them!

src: Und wer darauf verzichtet, wird dies eine Kaffara für ihn sein.
ref: But if anyone remits the retaliation by way of charity, it shall be for him an expiation.
draft: And whoever refrains from it shall be a penance for him.
hil: And whoever refrains from it will be a penance for him.
compare: And whoever refrains from it shall be a penance for him.

src: Und nachdem das Beben sie erfaßt hatte, sagte er: "HERR!
ref: When they arrived they were seized by a tremor.
draft: And after the earthquake had seized them, he said, "LORD!
hil: And after the earthquake had seized them, he said, "LORD!
compare: And after the earthquake had seized them, he said, "LORD!

src: Das sind die Gefährten des Feuers, sie werden darin ewig weilen.
ref: They are the residents of Hell, and will there for ever abide.
draft: These are the companions of the fire, they will dwell in it forever.
hil: Those are the companions of the fire, they will abide therein forever.
compare: These are the companions of the fire, they will dwell in it forever.

src: Dabei lesen sie (alle) das Buch. Auch diejenigen, die unwissend sind, äußern sich in der gleichen Weise.
ref: So too the ignorant say the like of them.
draft: They (all) are reading the book. Even those who are ignorant express themselves in the same way.
hil: They (all) read the book. Even those who are ignorant express themselves in the same way.
compare: They (all) read the book. Even those who are ignorant express themselves in the same way.

src: Und wer sich Satan statt Allah zum Beschützer nimmt, der hat sicherlich einen offenkundigen Verlust erlitten
ref: He who holds Satan as friend in place of God will assuredly be damned to perdition.
draft: "And whoever takes Satan as a protector instead of Allah has certainly suffered a clear loss."
hil: And whoever takes Satan as a protector instead of Allah has certainly suffered a clear loss.
compare: "And whoever takes Satan as a protector instead of Allah has certainly suffered a clear loss."

src: Sie versuchten ihn in bezug auf seine Gäste zu überreden.
ref: And they indeed sought to shame his guest (by asking to commit sodomy with them).
draft: They tried to persuade him regarding his guests.
hil: They tried to persuade him regarding his guests.
compare: They tried to persuade him regarding his guests.

src: Und sagte: «Ich bin krank.»
ref: And said: "I am sick (of what you worship)!"
draft: "I am sick," he said.
hil: "And said, \"I am sick.\""
compare: "I am sick," he said.

src: Gewiß, wir kehren zu unserem HERRN zurück,
ref: We shall return to our Lord.
draft: Certainly, we return to our LORD.
hil: Certainly, we will return to our Lord.
compare: Certainly, we will return to our Lord.

src: Aber sie ziehen ihn der Lüge.
ref: But they denounced him as a liar.
draft: But they accuse him of lying.
hil: They accuse him of lying.
compare: They accuse him of lying.

src: Und sie leisten wissentlich falsche Eide.
ref: And they swear to a lie while they know.
draft: And they knowingly make false oaths.
hil: And they knowingly make false oaths.
compare: And they knowingly make false oaths.

src: Diejenigen aber, die glauben und gute Werke tun, werden die Bewohner des Paradieses sein. Darin werden sie ewig bleiben.
ref: But those who believe and do good deeds are people of Paradise, and shall live there forever.
draft: Those who believe and do good deeds will be the inhabitants of paradise. Therein they will dwell forever.
hil: Those who believe and do good, We shall admit into gardens with streams of running water. They are men of Paradise where they will abide forever.
compare: Those who believe and do good deeds will be the inhabitants of paradise. Therein they will dwell forever.

src: ALLAH ist Derjenige, Der für euch das Meer gratis fügbar machte, damit die Schiffe darauf nach Seiner Anweisung fahren, damit ihr von Seiner Gunst anstrebt und damit ihr euch dankbar erweist.
ref: It is God who subjugated the ocean for you so that ships may ply through it by His command, and you may seek His bounty, and may haply be grateful.
draft: ALLAH is The One who made the sea available to you free of charge, so that ships can sail on it according to His instructions, so that you may strive for His favor and show gratitude.
hil: Allah is the One who made the sea available free of charge so that ships can sail on it according to his instructions, so that you seek his favor and show gratitude.
compare: ALLAH is The One who made the sea available to you free of charge, so that ships can sail on it according to His instructions, so that you may strive for His favor and show gratitude.

src: Aber gegen sie wird Allah dir genügen.
ref: So Allah will suffice you against them.
draft: But Allah will suffice for you against them.
hil: But Allah will suffice for you against them.
compare: But Allah will suffice for you against them.

src: Sag: "Entsinnt ihr euch nicht?!"
ref: Say: "Then why do you not bethink yourselves?"
draft: Say "Don't you remember?!"
hil: Say: "Don't you remember?!"
compare: Say "Don't you remember?!"

src: Außer deinen auserwählten Dienern unter ihnen.»
ref: Except the chosen ones among Your creatures."
draft: "Except for your chosen servants among them."
hil: Except for your chosen servants among them.
compare: "Except for your chosen servants among them."

src: Doch verkünde den Geduldigen eine frohe Botschaft
ref: But give good news to the steadfast.
draft: But proclaim a happy message to the patient.
hil: But announce a joyful message to the patient.
compare: But proclaim a happy message to the patient.

src: ER sagte: "Geh! Wer dir von ihnen folgt, dann ist Dschahannam gewiß eure Vergeltung - eine ausreichende Vergeltung!
ref: He said, “Be gone – therefore whoever among them follows you – so hell is the recompense for you all, a sufficient punishment.”
draft: He said, "Go! Whoever follows you from them, then surely Hell is your recompense - a sufficient recompense!"
hil: He said, "Go! Whoever follows you from them, then surely Hell is your recompense - a sufficient recompense!"
compare: He said, "Go! Whoever follows you from them, then surely Hell is your recompense - a sufficient recompense!"

src: Und sie gesellten ALLAH einen Teil von dem bei, was ER an Äckern und An'am erschuf, und sagten: "Dies gehört ALLAH - ihrer Behauptung nach - und dies gehört den von uns beigesellten Partnern." Und was den von ihnen beigesellten Partnern gehört, erreicht ALLAH nicht, aber was ALLAH gehört, dies erreicht die von ihnen beigesellten Partner.
ref: They allocate a share from God's own created fields and cattle to God, and they say: "This is God's" -- or so they think -- "and that, of the compeers of God," so that what belongs to the compeers does not reach God, but that which is God's may reach the compeers (set up by them).
draft: And they assigned to Allah a share of what He created of fields and livestock, and said, "This is for Allah," by their claim, "and this is for our partners [associated with Him]." But what is for their "partners" does not reach Allah, while what is for Allah - this alone reaches their "partners".
hil: "And they ascribed a share of what Allah has created of crop and cattle to Him, and said, 'This is for Allah,' by their claim, 'and this is for the partners we associate with Him.' And what belongs to their 'partners' does not reach Allah, but what belongs to Allah - that indeed reaches their 'partners'."
compare: "And they ascribed a share of what Allah has created of crop and cattle to Him, and said, 'This is for Allah,' by their claim, 'and this is for the partners we associate with Him.' And what belongs to their 'partners' does not reach Allah, but what belongs to Allah - that indeed reaches their 'partners'."

src: ALLAH ermahnt euch, daß ihr jemals Gleiches wiederholt, solltet ihr Mumin sein.
ref: God counsels you not to do a thing like this, if you are believers.
draft: "ALLAH reminds you that you should never repeat the same mistake, if you are a believer."
hil: ALLAH reminds you not to repeat the same mistake, if you are a Mumin.
compare: ALLAH reminds you not to repeat the same mistake, if you are a Mumin.

src: Tritt ein unter Meine Diener,
ref: "Enter then among My votaries,
draft: "Enter among My servants".
hil: "Enter among My servants."
compare: "Enter among My servants".

src: Und in der Nacht.
ref: Or at night.
draft: And in the night.
hil: And in the night.
compare: And in the night.

src: Den Geduldigen wird ihr Lohn voll erstattet, ohne daß es (viel) gerechnet wird.
ref: Only those who persevere will get their reward measureless."
draft: The patient ones will be fully compensated for their reward, without (much) calculation.
