hil: The patient ones will be fully compensated for their reward, without (much) calculation.
compare: The patient ones will be fully compensated for their reward, without (much) calculation.

src: Gewiß, er ist doch euer Meister, der euch die Magie lehrte, und ihr werdet es doch noch wissen. Ich werde zweifelsohne eure Füße und eure Hände wechselseitig abtrennen und werde euch gewiß noch allesamt kreuzigen!"
ref: He is indeed your leader who taught you magic; so now you will come to know; I swear, I will certainly cut off your hands and your feet from alternate sides, and crucify all of you.”
draft: "Surely, he is still your master, who taught you magic, and you will surely still remember it. Without a doubt, I will cut off your feet and hands in turn, and will surely crucify all of you!"
hil: Surely, he is still your master who taught you magic, and you will surely still remember it. Without a doubt, I will cut off your feet and hands in turn, and will surely crucify all of you!
compare: "Surely, he is still your master, who taught you magic, and you will surely still remember it. Without a doubt, I will cut off your feet and hands in turn, and will surely crucify all of you!"

src: Aber wir werden gewiß, so Gott will, die richtige finden.»
ref: If God wills we shall be guided aright."
draft: But we will surely find the right one, God willing.
hil: But we will certainly find the right one, God willing.
compare: But we will surely find the right one, God willing.

src: Not und Leid berührten sie, und sie wurden hin und her geschüttelt, so daß der Gesandte und diejenigen, die mit ihm gläubig waren, dann sagten: Wann kommt die Unterstützung Gottes? Wahrlich, die Unterstützung Gottes ist nahe.
ref: Affliction and adversity befell them; and they were shaken until the Messenger, and those who believed with him, said: 'When will the victory of Allah come' Is it not so that the victory of Allah is near.
draft: Distress and pain touched them, and they were shaken back and forth, so that the messenger and those who believed with him said: When will the help of God come? Verily, the help of God is near.
hil: Distress and hardship touched them, and they were shaken back and forth, but so that the messenger and those who believed with him said: When will the help of God come? Verily, the help of God is near.
compare: Distress and pain touched them, and they were shaken back and forth, so that the messenger and those who believed with him said: When will the help of God come? Verily, the help of God is near.

src: Sag: Das Wissen darüber ist nur bei Allah. Aber die meisten Menschen wissen nicht.
ref: Say: 'The knowledge of it is only with God, but most men know not.'
draft: Say: The knowledge of it is only with Allah. But most people do not know.
hil: Say: The knowledge of it is only with Allah. But most people are not aware.
compare: Say: The knowledge of it is only with Allah. But most people do not know.

src: Und wenn du zehn (Jahre) vervollständigst, dann ist dies dir überlassen. Und ich will es dir nicht schwer machen.
ref: If thou completest ten, that shall be of thy own accord; I do not desire to' press hard 'upon thee.
draft: And when you complete ten (years), then it's up to you. And I don't want to make it hard for you.
hil: And if you complete ten (years), then it is up to you. And I don't want to make it difficult for you.
compare: And when you complete ten (years), then it's up to you. And I don't want to make it hard for you.

src: Wenn es unter euch auch nur zwanzig gibt, die standhaft sind, werden sie zweihundert besiegen. Und wenn es unter euch hundert gibt, werden sie tausend von denen, die ungläubig sind, besiegen.
ref: Urge the believers to fight; if there are twenty persevering men among you, they shall overcome two hundred; and if there are a hundred among you, they shall overcome a thousand disbelievers because the disbelievers are a people who do not have sense.
draft: If there are only twenty among you who are steadfast, they will defeat two hundred. And if there are a hundred, they will defeat a thousand of the disbelievers among you.
hil: If there are only twenty steadfast among you, they will vanquish two hundred; and if there are one hundred, they will rout a thousand disbelievers, for they are a people who do not understand.
compare: If there are only twenty among you who are steadfast, they will defeat two hundred. And if there are a hundred, they will defeat a thousand of the disbelievers among you.

src: Er sprach: "So ist es; dein Herr aber spricht: "Es ist Mir ein leichtes, und Ich habe dich zuvor geschaffen, als du ein Nichts warst.""
ref: (The angel) answered: "Thus will it be. Your Lord said: 'This is easy for Me; for when I brought you into being you were nothing.'
draft: He said, "So it is; but your Lord says, "It is easy for Me, and I created you before, when you were nothing.""
hil: "He said, \"So it is! But your Lord says, It is easy for Me, and I created you before you were nothing.\""
compare: "He said, \"So it is! But your Lord says, It is easy for Me, and I created you before you were nothing.\""

src: "Gewiß, ihr und das, dem ihr anstatt Allahs dient, seid Brennstoff der Hölle. Ihr werdet dahin hinabgehen."
ref: Verily you and those you worship other than God will be faggots for Hell; and come to it you will.
draft: "Surely, you and the idols that you worship instead of Allah are the fuel of Hell; to it you shall come."
hil: Indeed, you and those you serve instead of Allah are fuel for the Fire. You will descend into it.
compare: "Surely, you and the idols that you worship instead of Allah are the fuel of Hell; to it you shall come."

src: Das ist das, was im Jenseits für die Gottesfürchtigen folgt.
ref: Such is the payment of the righteous.
draft: This is what follows in the afterlife for the God-fearing.
hil: This is (for the God-fearing). However, for those who exceed the limits (of transgression), there will truly be a bad abode.
compare: This is what follows in the afterlife for the God-fearing.

src: Und Pharao und diejenigen, die vor ihm lebten, und die verschwundenen Städte zeigten sündiges Verhallen.
ref: Then came the Pharaoh, and those before him whose habitations were overthrown while they were committing crimes.
draft: And Pharaoh and those who lived before him, and the disappeared cities displayed sinful behavior.
hil: The Pharaoh and those who lived before him, as well as the disappeared cities, displayed sinful behavior.
compare: The Pharaoh and those who lived before him, as well as the disappeared cities, displayed sinful behavior.

src: Besitzer von Kraft und beim Herrn des Thrones in Ansehen,
ref: Full of power, well-established (in position) with the Lord and Master of the Throne,
draft: Owner of power and respected by the Lord of the Thrones,
hil: "Owner of power and respected by the Lord of the Thrones,".
compare: Owner of power and respected by the Lord of the Thrones,

src: Und wenn dem Menschen Unglück zustößt, richtet er an Uns Bittgebete im Liegen, im Sitzen oder im Stehen.
ref: When man is afflicted with adversity he calls to Us, whether lying on his side, or sitting or standing.
draft: And when misfortune befalls man, he directs supplications to Us while lying, sitting or standing.
hil: When misfortune befalls man, he supplicates to Us whether lying, sitting, or standing.
compare: When misfortune befalls man, he supplicates to Us whether lying, sitting, or standing.

src: Für sie gibt es Strafe im diesseitigen Leben; aber die Strafe des Jenseits ist wahrlich härter. Und sie werden vor Allah keinen Behüter haben.
ref: They will be punished in the life of this world, and indeed the punishment of the Hereafter is the most severe; and there is none to save them from Allah.
draft: For them there is punishment in this life; but the punishment of the hereafter is truly harsher. And they will have no protector before Allah.
hil: For them, there is punishment in this world, but the punishment of the hereafter is truly harsher, and they will have no protector before Allah.
compare: For them, there is punishment in this world, but the punishment of the hereafter is truly harsher, and they will have no protector before Allah.

src: Weiß er denn nicht, wenn der Inhalt der Gräber herausgeworfen wird
ref: Does he not know when the contents of the graves are laid bare
draft: He doesn't know that when the contents of the graves are thrown out.
hil: Does he not know that when the contents of the graves are thrown out?
compare: He doesn't know that when the contents of the graves are thrown out.

src: Er vergibt, wem Er will, und Er bestraft, wen Er will.
ref: He forgiveth whomsoever He will and tormenteth whomsoever He will.
draft: He forgives whom He wills and punishes whom He wills.
hil: He leads astray whom He wills and guides aright whom He wills.
compare: He forgives whom He wills and punishes whom He wills.

src: Ausgenommen davon sind jene, derer dein Herr Sich erbarmt hat, und dazu hat Er sie erschaffen. Und das Wort deines Herrn ist in Erfüllung gegangen: "Wahrlich, Ich werde Gahannam mit den Ginn und den Menschen insgesamt füllen."
ref: Except those upon whom your Lord had mercy; and this is why He created them; and the Word of your Lord has been concluded that, “Indeed I will, surely, fill hell with jinns and men combined.”
draft: Excluded from this are those whom your Lord has shown mercy, for which He has created them. And the word of your Lord has been fulfilled: "Certainly, I will fill Hell with jinn and people altogether."
hil: Except those upon whom your Lord has mercy, for He has created them. And the word of your Lord has been fulfilled: 'Surely I will fill Jahannam with jinn and all men.'
compare: Excluded from this are those whom your Lord has shown mercy, for which He has created them. And the word of your Lord has been fulfilled: "Certainly, I will fill Hell with jinn and people altogether."

src: O ihr, die ihr glaubt, wenn ihr Allah fürchtet, wird Er euch Entscheidungskraft gewähren und eure Übel von euch nehmen und euch vergeben; und Allah ist voll großer Huld.
ref: O believers, if you follow the path shown by God, He will give you a standard (of right and wrong), and overlook your sins, and forgive you. God is abounding in benevolence.
draft: O you who believe, if you fear Allah, He will grant you discernment and remove from you your misdeeds and forgive you; and Allah is full of great bounty.
hil: O you who believe, if you fear Allah, He will grant you discernment and remove from you your misdeeds and forgive you; and Allah is full of great bounty.
compare: O you who believe, if you fear Allah, He will grant you discernment and remove from you your misdeeds and forgive you; and Allah is full of great bounty.

src: Und er setzte es ihnen vor.
ref: He set it before them.
draft: And he presented it to them.
hil: And he presented it to them.
compare: And he presented it to them.

src: Und (erinnere daran), als Ibrahim von seinem HERRN mit Worten geprüft wurde, und er sie dann einhielt. ER sagte: "Gewiß, ICH mache dich zum Imam für die Menschen."
ref: Remember, when his Lord tried Abraham by a number of commands which he fulfilled, God said to him: "I will make you a leader among men."
draft: And (remember), when Ibrahim was tested by his Lord with words, and he fulfilled them. He said: "Indeed, I will make you a leader for mankind."
hil: And remember when Ibrahim was tested by his Lord with words, and he fulfilled them. He said, 'Indeed, I will make you a leader for mankind.'
compare: And (remember), when Ibrahim was tested by his Lord with words, and he fulfilled them. He said: "Indeed, I will make you a leader for mankind."

src: Mein HERR schenke mir von den gottgefällig Guttuenden."
ref: (And he prayed:) "O Lord, grant me a righteous son."
draft: "My Lord, give me some of the godly deeds that please you."
hil: O Lord, grant me some of the righteous deeds that please you.
compare: O Lord, grant me some of the righteous deeds that please you.

src: Er sagte: "Gewiß, ich bin der Gesandte des Herrn der Weltenbewohner."
ref: He said: "I have been sent by the Lord of all the worlds."
draft: He said, "Certainly, I am the envoy of the Lord of the inhabitants of the worlds."
hil: He said, 'Certainly, I am the messenger of the Lord of all creation.'
compare: He said, "Certainly, I am the envoy of the Lord of the inhabitants of the worlds."

src: Nun - und beim Schreibrohr und bei dem, was sie nie derschreiben!
ref: NUN. I CALL to witness the pen and what they inscribe,
draft: Now - and with the writing tube and with what they never write!
hil: Now - and with the writing tube and with what they never write!
compare: Now - and with the writing tube and with what they never write!

src: Wir aber sehen sie nahe.
ref: But We see it very near.
draft: We, however, see them close.
hil: But we see them near.
compare: But we see them near.

src: Ich habe doch davor ein Leben lang unter euch verweilt.
ref: (Remember that I am one of you) and have lived a whole life with you before (its revelation).
draft: I have nevertheless dwelled among you all my life before that.
hil: I have indeed dwelt among you all my life before that.
compare: I have indeed dwelt among you all my life before that.

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Zweifelsohne eignen sich viele von den Rabbinern und Priestern Vermögenswerte von Menschen durch das für nichtig Erklärte an und halten vom Weg ALLAHs ab.
ref: O believers, many rabbis and priests devour the possessions of others wrongfully, and keep men away from the path of God.
draft: You, who have internalized the imam! There is no doubt that many of the rabbis and priests appropriate assets of people through the invalidated and prevent them from the way of Allah.
hil: Believers, no doubt many of the rabbis and priests appropriate assets of people through the invalidated and prevent them from the way of Allah.
compare: Believers, no doubt many of the rabbis and priests appropriate assets of people through the invalidated and prevent them from the way of Allah.

src: Und als Unsere Gesandten zu Lut kamen, geriet er ihretwegen in eine böse Lage und war durch ihre Anwesenheit beklommen.
ref: And when Our Messengers came to Lout (Lot), he was grieved on their account and felt himself straitened for them (lest the town people should approach them to commit sodomy with them).
draft: And when our messengers came to Lot, he was troubled on their account and was distressed by their presence.
hil: And when Our messengers came to Lot, he was troubled on their account and was distressed by their presence.
compare: And when our messengers came to Lot, he was troubled on their account and was distressed by their presence.

src: ER war Derjenige, Der dich mit Seinem Sieg und mit den Mumin gestärkt hat.
ref: It is He who has strengthened you with His help and with believers
draft: He was the one who strengthened you with his victory and with the believers.
hil: He was the One who strengthened you with His victory and with the believers.
compare: He was the One who strengthened you with His victory and with the believers.

src: Bestimmt ist für sie eine gewaltige Pein,
ref: For them is great suffering.
draft: Certainly, it is a tremendous pain for them.
hil: Certainly, a tremendous torment is determined for them.
compare: Certainly, a tremendous torment is determined for them.

src: Als Abraham sagte: «Mein Herr, mache dieses Gebiet sicher, und laß mich und meine Söhne es meiden, den Götzen zu dienen.
ref: Remember when Abraham prayed: "O Lord, make this a city of peace, and preserve me and my progeny from worshipping idols:
draft: As Abraham said: "My Lord, make this area safe and let me and my sons avoid serving the idols."
hil: "Our Lord, make this area safe and let me and my sons avoid serving the idols," said Abraham.
compare: As Abraham said: "My Lord, make this area safe and let me and my sons avoid serving the idols."

src: Diese haben eine höhere Rangstufe als die, die erst nachher gespendet und gekämpft haben.
ref: They are higher in position than those who spent after (the victory) and fought.
draft: These have a higher rank than those who only donated and fought afterwards.
hil: They have a higher rank than those who only donated and fought afterwards.
compare: These have a higher rank than those who only donated and fought afterwards.

src: Und wenn gegen euch tatsächlich gekämpft wird, werden wir euch ganz gewiß helfen."
ref: If you are fought against, we will help you.'
draft: "And if there is indeed fighting against you, we will certainly help you."
hil: And if you are actually fought against, we will surely help you.
compare: "And if there is indeed fighting against you, we will certainly help you."

src: Sag: "Seht ihr, woran ihr anstelle von ALLAH Bitt-gebete richtet, sollte ALLAH mir Schädigendes wollen, könnten sie das Schädigende von Ihm wegnehmen? Oder sollte ER mir eine Gnade wollen, könnten diese Seine Gnade zurückhalten?"
ref: Say: "Then just think. Can those whom you worship apart from God remove the distress God is pleased to visit upon me, or withhold a blessing God is pleased to favour me with?'
draft: Say: "Do you see to what instead of Allah you direct supplication? If Allah were to intend harm to me, could they remove the harm He intends? Or if He intends mercy for me, could they withhold His mercy?"
hil: Say: "Do you see to what instead of Allah you direct supplication? If Allah were to intend harm to me, could they remove the harm He intends? Or if He intends mercy for me, could they withhold His mercy?"
compare: Say: "Do you see to what instead of Allah you direct supplication? If Allah were to intend harm to me, could they remove the harm He intends? Or if He intends mercy for me, could they withhold His mercy?"

src: Sie sagen: «Ja doch.
ref: They will say, “Yes indeed, why not?”
draft: They say: "Yes, indeed."
hil: They say, 'Yes, indeed.'
compare: They say, 'Yes, indeed.'

src: ALLAH setzte keinem Mann zwei Herzen in seinem Innern ein. Und ER machte eure Ehefrauen, denen ihr (die Formel von) Zihar aussprecht, nicht zu euren Müttern. Ebenfalls machte ER die nach euch Genannten nicht zu euren Söhnen. Dies ist euer Wort aus euren Mündern. Und ALLAH sagt dasWahre und ER leitet zum wahren Weg recht.
ref: Allah has not kept two hearts in the body of any man; nor has He made them your mothers those wives of yours, whom you declare to be your mothers; nor has He made them your sons, whom you have adopted; this is the statement of your mouths; and Allah proclaims the truth and it is He Who shows the path.
draft: ALLAH did not place two hearts in any man's inner being. And HE did not make your wives, to whom you speak the formula of Zihar, your mothers. Likewise, HE did not make those who are named after you your sons. This is a statement uttered by your mouths. And ALLAH speaks the truth, and HE guides to the right path.
hil: Allah did not place two hearts in any man's inner being, and He did not make your wives, to whom you speak the formula of Zihar, your mothers. Similarly, He did not make those who are named after you your sons. This is a statement uttered by your mouths. And Allah speaks the truth, and He guides to the right path.
compare: Allah did not place two hearts in any man's inner being, and He did not make your wives, to whom you speak the formula of Zihar, your mothers. Similarly, He did not make those who are named after you your sons. This is a statement uttered by your mouths. And Allah speaks the truth, and He guides to the right path.

src: Die vor einem jagenden Löwen fliehen?
ref: Fleeing from a lion?
draft: Fleeing from a hunting lion?
hil: Fleeing from a hunting lion?
compare: Fleeing from a hunting lion?

src: Ich habe ihnen nichts anderes gesagt als das, was Du mir befohlen hast, nämlich: >Dienet Gott, meinem Herrn und eurem Herrn. < Ich war Zeuge über sie, solange ich unter ihnen weilte. Als Du mich abberufen hast, warst Du der Wächter über sie. Und Du bist über alle Dinge Zeuge.
ref: “I have not told them except what You commanded me, that ‘Worship Allah, Who is my Lord and is also your Lord’; I was aware of them till I was among them; and when You raised me, only You watched over them; and all things are present before You.”
draft: I haven't told them anything else but what you ordered me to say, namely: "Serve God, my Lord and your Lord." I was their witness as long as I was among them. But when You took me away, You were the Watcher over them. You are Witness over all things.
hil: I have told them nothing except what you have ordered me to say, namely: "Serve God, my Lord and your Lord." I was a witness over them as long as I remained among them. When you recalled me, You became the Watcher over them. And You are Witness over all things.
compare: I haven't told them anything else but what you ordered me to say, namely: "Serve God, my Lord and your Lord." I was their witness as long as I was among them. But when You took me away, You were the Watcher over them. You are Witness over all things.

src: Immer wieder, wenn eine Umma eingetreten ist, hat sie ihre Vorgängerin verflucht.
ref: Every time a crowd enters, it will curse its sister-crowd.
draft: Again and again, when a new Umma was established, it cursed its predecessor.
hil: Again and again, when a new community has entered, it has cursed its predecessor.
compare: Again and again, when a new Umma was established, it cursed its predecessor.

src: Ihre Herberge wird Gahannam sein, und dies ist ein schlimmes Ende!
ref: Their abode is Hell, an evil destination?
draft: Their abode will be Gahannam, and this is a terrible end!
hil: Their destination will be Gahannam and what a wretched outcome it will be!
compare: Their destination will be Gahannam and what a wretched outcome it will be!

src: Alif Lam Mim Ra'. Das sind die Verse des Buches. Und was dir von deinem Herrn hinabgesandt wurde, ist die Wahrheit. Jedoch die meisten Menschen glauben nicht.
ref: Alif-Lam-Meem-Ra*; these are verses of the Book; and that which has been sent down upon you from your Lord is true, but most men do not believe. (* Alphabets of the Arabic language – Allah and to whomever He reveals, know their precise meanings.)
draft: Alif Lam Mim Ra'. These are the verses of the book. And what was sent down to you from your Lord is the truth. But most people do not believe.
hil: "Alif Lam Mim Ra'. These are the verses of the book. And what has been sent down to you from your Lord is the truth. But most people do not believe."
compare: Alif Lam Mim Ra'. These are the verses of the book. And what was sent down to you from your Lord is the truth. But most people do not believe.

src: Also hinsichtlich des Schaums, so wird er beiseite geworfen, doch hinsichtlich dessen, das den Menschen nützt, so verbleibt es in der Erde. Solcherart prägt ALLAH die Gleichnisse.
ref: Thus Allah sets forth parables (for the truth and falsehood, i.e. Belief and disbelief).
draft: Regarding the foam, it is cast away; but regarding that which benefits mankind, it stays behind in the earth. In this way, Allah presents examples.
hil: As far as foam is concerned, it is cast off, but as for what benefits humanity, it stays in the earth. Thus, Allah presents examples.
compare: Regarding the foam, it is cast away; but regarding that which benefits mankind, it stays behind in the earth. In this way, Allah presents examples.

src: Und die Thamud, das Volk Lots und die Leute des Waldes.
ref: And the Thamud, the people of Lot, as well as the dwellers of the Wood, had denied.
draft: And the Thamud, the people of Lot and the people of the woods.
hil: And the Thamud, the people of Lot, and the people of the woods.
compare: And the Thamud, the people of Lot and the people of the woods.

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Handelt Taqwa gemäß ALLAH gegenüber, und eine Seele soll danach schauen, was sie für morgen vorausschickte!
ref: O ye who believe! fear Allah, and let every soul look to that which it sendeth forward for the morrow.
draft: You who have internalized the Imam! Act with Taqwa towards Allah, and then a soul shall see what it sent ahead for tomorrow!
hil: O you who believe! Act with Taqwa towards Allah, and then a soul shall see what it sent ahead for tomorrow!
compare: O you who believe! Act with Taqwa towards Allah, and then a soul shall see what it sent ahead for tomorrow!

src: Diejenigen, die ihr Vermögen bei Nacht und Tag, geheim oder offen, spenden, haben ihren Lohn bei ihrem Herrn, sie haben nichts zu befürchten, und sie werden nicht traurig sein.
ref: Those who spend of their wealth in the way of God, day and night, in secret or openly, have their reward with their Lord, and have nothing to fear or regret.
draft: Those who donate their fortune at night or day, secretly or openly, will have their reward with their Lord, they have nothing to fear, and they will not be sad.
hil: Those who donate their wealth during night or day, secretly or openly, will have their reward with their Lord; they have nothing to fear, and they will not be saddened.
compare: Those who donate their wealth during night or day, secretly or openly, will have their reward with their Lord; they have nothing to fear, and they will not be saddened.

src: Sag: Die Angelegenheit ist ganz und gar (in) Allahs (Entscheidung). Sie halten in ihrem Innersten verborgen, was sie dir nicht offenlegen; sie sagen: "Wenn wir etwas von der Angelegenheit (zu entscheiden) hätten, würden wir hier nicht getötet."
ref: Slumber overtook a party, while another party cared only for themselves, thinking of Allah thoughts that were not true, the guess of ignorance, saying: 'Have we any say in the affair' Say: 'The entire affair belongs to Allah' They conceal in themselves what they do not disclose to you.
draft: Say: The matter is entirely in Allah's decision. They keep hidden within themselves what they do not reveal to you; they say: "If we had something to decide in this matter, we would not have been killed here."
hil: Say: The matter is entirely in Allah's decision. They keep hidden in their hearts what they do not reveal to you; they say, 'If we had something to decide in this matter, we would not have been killed here.'
compare: Say: The matter is entirely in Allah's decision. They keep hidden within themselves what they do not reveal to you; they say: "If we had something to decide in this matter, we would not have been killed here."

src: Aber Allah hat (euch) bewahrt.
ref: But Allah saved (you).
draft: But Allah has saved (you).
hil: But Allah has saved (you).
compare: But Allah has saved (you).

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Seid nicht wie diejenigen, die Kufr betrieben haben und zu ihren Brüdern sagten, als diese sich auf Handelsreisen oder Feldzügen befanden: "Wären sie bei uns geblieben, wären sie weder gestorben, noch getötet worden." (Sagt es nicht), damit ALLAH dies als Bitterkeit (nur) in ihren Herzen bleiben läßt. Und ALLAH (alleine) macht lebendig und läßt sterben. Und ALLAH ist dessen, was ihr tut, allsehend.
ref: O People who Believe! Do not be like the disbelievers who said regarding their brothers who went on a journey or on holy war, “If they had been here with us they would not have died or been killed” – so that Allah may make it as despair in their hearts; and Allah gives life and causes death; and Allah is seeing your deeds.
draft: You, who have internalized the Imam! Do not be like those who have committed Kufr and said to their brothers when they were on business trips or campaigns: "If they had stayed with us, they would not have died or been killed." (Do not say that) so that ALLAH keeps this bitterness only in their hearts. And ALLAH alone gives life and causes death. And ALLAH sees what you do.
hil: O believers! Do not be like those who have committed Kufr and said to their brothers when they were on business trips or campaigns: 'Had they stayed with us, they would not have died or been killed.' Do not say this, so that Allah may keep this bitterness only in their hearts. Allah alone gives life and causes death. And Allah is all-seeing in what you do.
compare: You, who have internalized the Imam! Do not be like those who have committed Kufr and said to their brothers when they were on business trips or campaigns: "If they had stayed with us, they would not have died or been killed." (Do not say that) so that ALLAH keeps this bitterness only in their hearts. And ALLAH alone gives life and causes death. And ALLAH sees what you do.

src: Und ALLAH kennt das, was ihr verheimlicht und was ihr offenlegt.
ref: God knows what you hide and disclose.
draft: And Allah knows what you conceal and what you reveal.
hil: But God knows what you keep secret and what you reveal.
compare: And Allah knows what you conceal and what you reveal.

src: Und wer krank oder auf Reisen war, (fastet) an anderen Tagen die gleiche Anzahl. ALLAH will für euch Erleichterung, doch ER will für euch keine Erschwernis.
ref: So whosoever of you witnesseth the month, he shall fast it, and whosoever sick or journeying, for him the like number of other days.
draft: And whoever was sick or traveling, (fasts) the same number on other days. ALLAH wants ease for you and does not want hardship for you.
hil: And whoever was sick or traveling, (fasts) the same number on other days. Allah wants ease for you and does not want hardship for you.
compare: And whoever was sick or traveling, (fasts) the same number on other days. ALLAH wants ease for you and does not want hardship for you.

src: Nun hatten Wir ihm zuvor Ammenbrüste verwehrt.
ref: We made (Moses) refuse a wet nurse.
draft: Now we had previously denied him wet nurses.
hil: Previously, we had denied him wet nurses.
compare: Previously, we had denied him wet nurses.

src: Aber diejenigen, die ihren Herrn fürchten, für sie wird es Obergemächer geben, über denen (andere) Obergemächer gebaut sind, unterhalb derer Flüsse strömen. (Das ist) Allahs Versprechen.
ref: But as for those who are wary of their Lord, for them there will be lofty abodes with [other] lofty abodes built above them, with streams running beneath them—a promise of Allah.
draft: But for those who fear their Lord, there will be upper chambers built above them, beneath which rivers flow. That is Allah's promise.
hil: But for those who fear displeasing their Lord, there are lofty mansions built above mansions, with rivers rippling past them: A promise of God; God does not go back on His promise.
compare: But for those who fear their Lord, there will be upper chambers built above them, beneath which rivers flow. That is Allah's promise.

src: Dann sag: "Wollt ihr denn nicht Taqwa gemäß handeln!"
ref: So tell them: "Why do you not fear Him?"
draft: Then say: "Do you not want to act according to Taqwa!"
hil: Then say: "Will you not take heed?"
compare: Then say: "Will you not take heed?"

src: Es ist wie das Gleichnis derjenigen (, die es) nahe vor ihnen (erlebten).
ref: Like those who had tasted the gravity of their actions a little before them.
draft: It is like the parable of those who experienced it near them.
hil: It is like the likeness of those who experienced it near them.
compare: It is like the likeness of those who experienced it near them.

src: Und unterlaßt nicht aus Verdruß, es aufzuschreiben, ob es klein oder groß ist, (um es festzulegen) bis zu seiner Frist. Das ist für euch gerechter bei Gott und richtiger für das Zeugnis und bewirkt eher, daß ihr keine Zweifel hegt.
ref: Unless it be merchandise present that you give and take between you; then it shall be no fault in you if you do not write it down.
draft: And out of vexation, do not fail to write it down, whether it is small or big, (to fix it) until its term. That is more just for you before God and more correct for testimony and it causes you to have no doubts sooner.
hil: Do not fail to write it down out of vexation, whether it is small or big, (to fix it) until its term. That is more just for you before God and more correct for testimony and it causes you to have no doubts sooner.
compare: And out of vexation, do not fail to write it down, whether it is small or big, (to fix it) until its term. That is more just for you before God and more correct for testimony and it causes you to have no doubts sooner.

src: Das (allein schon) genügt als deutliche Sünde.
ref: And this is a sufficient manifest sin.
draft: That (in itself) is already sufficient as a clear sin.
hil: That (in itself) is already sufficient as a clear sin.
compare: That (in itself) is already sufficient as a clear sin.

src: Aber wenn ihr euch von ihnen scheidet, bevor ihr sie berührt und euch ihnen gegenüber schon (zu einer Morgengabe) verpflichtet habt, dann (händigt) die Hälfte dessen (aus), wozu ihr euch verpflichtet habt, es sei denn, daß sie (es) erlassen oder der, in dessen Hand der Ehebund ist. Und wenn ihr (es) erlaßt, kommt das der Gottesfurcht näher. Und versäumt es nicht, gut zueinander zu sein . Was ihr tut, sieht Allah wohl.
ref: If you divorce them before you have touched them and have appointed the bridal money, then payment of half of what is agreed is ordained unless the women forgo some of it, or he in whose hand is the marriage tie, pays more; and O men, your paying more is closer to piety; and do not forget the favours to each other; indeed Allah is seeing what you do.
draft: But if you divorce before you have touched them and you have already obligated yourselves to a marriage gift, then give half of what you have obligated - unless they forego the right or the one in whose hand is the marriage contract does so. And to forego is nearer to righteousness. And do not forget graciousness between each other. Indeed, Allah of whatever you do is Seeing.
hil: But if you divorce before you have touched them and you have already obligated yourselves to a marriage gift, then give half of what you have obligated - unless they forego the right or the one in whose hand is the marriage contract does so. And to forego is nearer to righteousness. And do not forget graciousness between each other. Indeed, Allah of whatever you do is Seeing.
compare: But if you divorce before you have touched them and you have already obligated yourselves to a marriage gift, then give half of what you have obligated - unless they forego the right or the one in whose hand is the marriage contract does so. And to forego is nearer to righteousness. And do not forget graciousness between each other. Indeed, Allah of whatever you do is Seeing.

src: Sag: "Das Schlechte und das Gute sind nicht gleich, selbst dann nicht, solltest du an dem großen Ausmaß des Schlechten Gefallen finden." So handelt Taqwa gemäß ALLAH gegenüber - ihr Verständige! -, damit ihr erfolgreich werdet.
ref: Say, “The impure (evil) and the pure (good) are not equal, even though the abundance of the impure may attract you; therefore keep fearing Allah, O men of intellect, so that you may succeed.”
draft: Say: "The bad and the good are not equal, even if you should find pleasure in the vast amount of bad." This is how Taqwa acts towards ALLAH - you, the intelligent ones! - so that you may be successful.
hil: Say, "The bad and the good are not equal, even if you should find pleasure in the vast amount of bad." This is how to act with Taqwa towards ALLAH - you, the understanding ones! - so that you may be successful.
compare: Say, "The bad and the good are not equal, even if you should find pleasure in the vast amount of bad." This is how to act with Taqwa towards ALLAH - you, the understanding ones! - so that you may be successful.

src: Dann bestimmte ER sie zu sieben Himmeln in zwei Ay-yam, und ließ in jedem Himmel seine Anweisung als Wahy zuteil werden.
ref: Then He completed and finished from their creation (as) seven heavens in two Days and He made in each heaven its affair.
draft: Then HE appointed them to seven heavens in two days, and in each heaven, HE allowed his instruction to reach them as a revelation.
hil: He assigned them to seven heavens in two days, and allowed his instruction to reach them as revelation in each heaven.
compare: He assigned them to seven heavens in two days, and allowed his instruction to reach them as revelation in each heaven.

src: Und dem, der von ihnen sagen wollte: "lch bin ein Gott neben Ihm", würden Wir es mit Gahannam vergelten. Und ebenso vergelten Wir es den Ungerechten.
ref: If any one of them said: "I am God besides Him," We should award him Hell; for this is how We requite the evil-doers.
draft: And to the one who would say of them, "I am a god beside Him", We would make hell the recompense. And thus do We recompense the wrongdoers.
hil: And to those who say, "I am a god besides Him", We will repay them with Hell. And thus do We repay the wrongdoers.
compare: And to those who say, "I am a god besides Him", We will repay them with Hell. And thus do We repay the wrongdoers.

src: Oder haben sie (etwa) Teilhaber?
ref: Or have they any partners?
draft: Or do they have partners (perhaps)?
hil: Do they have partners (perhaps), or have they taken others instead?
compare: Or do they have partners (perhaps)?

src: Das ist Frevel. Heute sind diejenigen, die ungläubig sind, an eurer Religion verzweifelt, so fürchtet sie nicht, sondern fürchtet Mich.
ref: Today the unbelievers have despaired of your religion; therefore fear them not, but fear you Me.
draft: This is blasphemy. Today those who are unbelievers are despairing of your religion, so do not fear them, but fear Me.
hil: It is blasphemy. This day I have perfected for you your religion, and completed My favor upon you and have approved for you Islam as your religion. Therefore, follow the lawful and unlawful bounds enjoined upon you, and fear Me.
compare: This is blasphemy. Today those who are unbelievers are despairing of your religion, so do not fear them, but fear Me.

src: Nur ein wenig erweist ihr euch dankbar.
ref: How little are the thanks you offer!"
draft: Just a little, you prove to be grateful.
hil: Only a little do you prove to be grateful.
compare: Only a little do you prove to be grateful.

src: Sind sie etwa nicht auf Erden umhergezogen, damit sie sehen, wie das Anschließende derjenigen vor ihnen war.
ref: Did they not travel in the land to see what sort of fate befell those before them?
draft: Are they not wandering on Earth so that they can see how the predecessors before them fared?
hil: Have they not wandered on earth so that they may see how the endings of their predecessors before them were?
compare: Are they not wandering on Earth so that they can see how the predecessors before them fared?

src: Da kam Allah über sie, von wo sie nicht (damit) rechneten, und jagte in ihre Herzen Schrecken, so daß sie ihre Häuser mit ihren (eigenen) Händen und den Händen der Gläubigen zerstörten.
ref: But God came upon them from where they did not suspect, and filled their hearts with terror, so that they destroyed their homes with their own hands (or were destroyed) by the hands of believers.
draft: Then Allah came upon them whence they had not expected, and cast terror into their hearts, so that they destroyed their houses with their own hands and the hands of the believers.
hil: Then Allah came upon them from where they did not expect it, and cast terror into their hearts, so that they destroyed their houses with their own hands and the hands of the believers
compare: Then Allah came upon them whence they had not expected, and cast terror into their hearts, so that they destroyed their houses with their own hands and the hands of the believers.

src: Und Wir ließen sie in Unsere Barmherzigkeit eingehen; denn sie gehörten zu den Rechtschaffenen.
ref: And they were admitted to Our grace. Verily they were among the doers of good.
draft: And We caused them to enter into Our mercy, for they were among the righteous.
hil: And We made them enter Our mercy, for they were of the righteous.
compare: And We made them enter Our mercy, for they were of the righteous.

src: Das Urteil ist allein Allahs.
ref: Authority belongs to God alone.
draft: "The judgment is solely Allah's."
hil: "The judgment belongs solely to Allah."
compare: "The judgment is solely Allah's."

src: Und du hattest nicht erwartet, daß das Buch an dich gerichtet würde.
ref: (O Prophet), you never looked forward for the Book to be revealed to you.
draft: And you had not expected that the book would be addressed to you.
hil: And you had not expected that the book would be addressed to you.
compare: And you had not expected that the book would be addressed to you.

src: Das ist ein Versprechen Gottes. Gott bricht sein Versprechen nicht. Aber die meisten Menschen wissen nicht Bescheid.
ref: The promise of Allah; Allah does not renege on His promise, but most people do not know.
draft: This is a promise from God. God does not break his promise. But most people do not know.
hil: This is a promise from God. God does not break His promise. But most people do not understand it.
compare: This is a promise from God. God does not break His promise. But most people do not understand it.

src: Schau, wie Wir die Zeichen verschiedenartig darlegen!
ref: Behold how We turn about the signs!
draft: Look how we present the signs in different ways!
hil: See how we present our signs differently!
compare: See how we present our signs differently!

src: Den Gottesfürchtigen obliegt nicht die Verantwortung für jene, sondern nur das Ermahnen, auf daß jene gottesfürchtig werden mögen.
ref: As for the heedful and devout, they are not accountable for them, but should give advice: They may haply come to fear God.
draft: The God-fearing are not responsible for those, but only for admonishing them so that they may become God-fearing.
hil: The God-fearing are not responsible for those, but only for admonishing them so that they may become God-fearing.
compare: The God-fearing are not responsible for those, but only for admonishing them so that they may become God-fearing.

src: Das ist besser für euch und lauterer. Wenn ihr aber nicht (die Möglichkeit dazu) findet, dann ist Allah wahrlich All verzeihend, Barmherzig.
ref: When you wish to humbly consult with the Noble Messenger, give some charity before you consult; that is much better and much purer for you; so if you do not have the means, then (know that) Allah is Oft Forgiving, Most Merciful.
draft: This is better for you and purer. But if you cannot find (the opportunity for it), then Allah is truly All-Forgiving, Merciful.
hil: This is better and purer for you. But if you do not find the opportunity for it, then Allah is truly All-Forgiving, Merciful.
compare: This is better for you and purer. But if you cannot find (the opportunity for it), then Allah is truly All-Forgiving, Merciful.

src: Die Ungläubigen geben wahrlich ihr Vermögen (dafür) aus, um von Allahs Weg abzuhalten.
ref: Those who disbelieve spend their possessions on turning men away from God.
draft: The unbelievers truly spend their wealth to prevent (others) from the path of Allah.
hil: Verily, the unbelievers spend their wealth to hinder people from the way of Allah.
compare: The unbelievers truly spend their wealth to prevent (others) from the path of Allah.

src: Es gibt keine Gottheit außer Ihm. Gepriesen-erhaben ist ER über das, was sie an Schirk betreiben.
ref: Too holy is He for what they ascribe to Him!
draft: There is no deity except Him. Glorified is He above what they associate with Him.
hil: There is no god but Him. Glorified is He above what they associate with Him.
compare: There is no deity except Him. Glorified is He above what they associate with Him.

src: Ihr macht ja daraus Papyrusblätter, die ihr offen zeigt - und ihr haltet vieles geheim; und euch wurde beigebracht, was ihr nicht wußtet, weder ihr noch eure Väter. Sprich: Gott.
ref: Some of it ye disclose and much thereof ye conceal. And ye were taught that which ye knew not: neither ye nor your fathers.
draft: You make papyrus leaves out of it, which you show openly - and you keep much secret; and you have been taught what you did not know, neither you nor your fathers. Say: God.
hil: You make papyrus leaves out of it, which you show openly - and you keep much secret; and you were taught what you did not know, neither your fathers. Say: God.
compare: You make papyrus leaves out of it, which you show openly - and you keep much secret; and you were taught what you did not know, neither your fathers. Say: God.

src: Und darin sollen die Konkurrierenden konkurrieren,
ref: So for this let the competitors compete.
draft: And therein the competitors should compete.
hil: "And therein should the competitors compete,"
compare: And therein the competitors should compete.

src: Und es gibt nichts, dessen Schatzkammern nicht bei Uns wären.
ref: And there is not a thing, but with Us are the stores thereof.
draft: And there is nothing whose treasure chambers would not be with us.
hil: And there is nothing whose treasure chambers would not be with Us.
compare: And there is nothing whose treasure chambers would not be with Us.

src: Und WIR haben dich über sie nicht als Hüter eingesetzt und du bist über sie kein Wakil.
ref: We have not appointed you their guardian, nor are you their pleader.
draft: And WE have not appointed you as a guardian over them, and you are not a Wakil over them.
hil: And We have not appointed you as a guardian over them, and you are not a Wakil over them.
compare: And WE have not appointed you as a guardian over them, and you are not a Wakil over them.

src: Vergib mir und schenke mir eine Herrschaft, die niemandem nach mir möglich wird. Gewiß, DU bist Der reichlich Schenkende."
ref: Forgive me and bestow upon me a kingdom, which shall not befit anyone after me; indeed only You are the Great Bestower.”
draft: Please forgive me and grant me a dominion that will not be possible for anyone after me. Indeed, YOU are The Most Generous.
hil: Forgive me and grant me sovereignty that will not be possible for anyone after me. Indeed, You are the Most Generous.
compare: Please forgive me and grant me a dominion that will not be possible for anyone after me. Indeed, YOU are The Most Generous.

src: Das Ende von beiden war, daß sie nun im Feuer sind; darin werden sie ewig weilen. Und das ist die Vergeltung für die, die Unrecht tun.
ref: So the fate of them both is that they are both in the fire, to remain in it forever; and this is the proper punishment for the unjust.
draft: The end of both was that they are now in the fire; therein shall they abide forever. And that is the recompense of those who do wrong.
hil: "The end of both was that they are now in the fire; therein shall they abide forever. And that is the recompense of those who do wrong."
compare: The end of both was that they are now in the fire; therein shall they abide forever. And that is the recompense of those who do wrong.

src: Und nachdem sie von da weiterzogen, sagte er seinem Dienstjungen: "Bereite uns unser Mittagessen, gewiß, bereits haben wir auf dieser unserer Reise große Mühe gehabt.
ref: When they had gone past (the confluence), Moses said to his servant: "Give me my breakfast. I am exhausted from this journey."
draft: And after they moved on from there, he said to his servant: "Prepare our lunch for us, surely we have already had great trouble on this journey of ours."
hil: And after they moved from there, he said to his servant: 'Prepare our lunch for us. Surely, we have had great trouble on this journey of ours.'
compare: And after they moved from there, he said to his servant: 'Prepare our lunch for us. Surely, we have had great trouble on this journey of ours.'

src: Den Gläubigen ist dies verboten.
ref: This is forbidden the believers,
draft: "The believers are forbidden from this."
hil: Believers are prohibited from this.
compare: "The believers are forbidden from this."

src: O mein Volk, seht ihr, wie ich euch zur Rettung rufe, ihr mich aber zum (Höllen)feuer ruft?
ref: O my people, what is wrong with me that I am calling you to preservation, while you invite me to the Fire!
draft: O my people, do you see how I am calling you to salvation, but you are calling me to (hell)fire?
hil: "O my people, do you see how I am calling you to salvation, but you are calling me to (hell)fire?"
compare: "O my people, do you see how I am calling you to salvation, but you are calling me to (hell)fire?"

src: Doch schön geduldig sein. Vielleicht wird Allah sie mir alle wiederbringen; denn Er ist der Allwissende, der Allweise."
ref: "You have made up the story; but patience is best; God may bring them back to me. He is all-knowing and all-wise."
draft: But be patient. Perhaps Allah will bring them all back to me; for He is the All-knowing, the All-wise.
hil: But be patient. Maybe Allah will bring them all back to me, for He is the All-knowing, the All-wise.
compare: But be patient. Perhaps Allah will bring them all back to me; for He is the All-knowing, the All-wise.

src: Sollen wir wirklich, wenn wir gestorben und zu Staub geworden sind...? Das ist doch eine Rückkehr von weiter Entfernung.»
ref: When we are dead and turned to dust, this returning (to life) is most far-fetched."
draft: Should we really, when we have died and turned to dust ...? That's a return from far away.
hil: Should we really, when we have died and turned to dust ...? That's a return from a far distance.
compare: Should we really, when we have died and turned to dust ...? That's a return from a far distance.

src: Meine Leute! Handelt euren Standpunkten entsprechend, auch ich handle. Ihr werdet noch wissen, wen Peinigung überkommt, welche ihn erniedrigt, und wer Lügner ist. Wartet nur ab! Ich warte ebenfalls mit euch ab."
ref: “And O my people! Keep on with your works in your positions, I am doing mine; very soon you will come to know – upon whom comes the punishment that will disgrace him, and who is the liar; and wait – I too am waiting with you.”
draft: "My people! Act according to your positions, as do I. You will yet know who is afflicted with pain, who is degraded by it, and who is a liar. Just wait! I'll wait with you too."
hil: Proclaim, "My people! Act according to your positions, as do I. You will soon know who is afflicted with pain, who is degraded by it, and who is a liar. So, wait; I'll wait with you too."
compare: "My people! Act according to your positions, as do I. You will yet know who is afflicted with pain, who is degraded by it, and who is a liar. Just wait! I'll wait with you too."

src: Als sie vorbeigegangen waren, sagte er zu seinem Burschen: "Bringe uns unser Mittagessen. Wir haben ja durch diese unsere Reise (viel) Mühsal erlitten."
ref: So when they had gone beyond that place, Moosa said to his assistant, “Bring our breakfast – we have indeed faced great exertion in this journey of ours.”
draft: After they had passed by, he said to his servant, "Bring us our lunch. We have suffered a lot of hardship on this journey."
hil: "After they had passed by, he said to his servant, \"Bring us our lunch. We have suffered a lot of hardship on this journey.\""
compare: After they had passed by, he said to his servant, "Bring us our lunch. We have suffered a lot of hardship on this journey."

src: Also sag: "Das Verborgene kennt nur ALLAH, so wartet ab!
ref: Tell them: "Unknown things are only known to God.
draft: Also say: "Only ALLAH knows the hidden, so wait!"
hil: Thus say: 'Only ALLAH knows the hidden, so wait!'
compare: Also say: "Only ALLAH knows the hidden, so wait!"

src: Und erinnert euch an das, was in euren Wohnstätten von ALLAHs Ayat und der Weisheit vorgetragen wird. Gewiß, ALLAH ist immer allgütig, allkundig.
ref: And remember that which is recited in your houses of the signs of God and the Wisdom; God is All-subtle, All-aware.
draft: And remember what is recited in your homes of Allah's verses and wisdom. Indeed, Allah is ever Gentle and Acquainted [with all things].
hil: Remember what is recited in your homes of Allah's verses and wisdom. Surely, Allah is always compassionate, all-knowing.
compare: And remember what is recited in your homes of Allah's verses and wisdom. Indeed, Allah is ever Gentle and Acquainted [with all things].

src: Sag: "Mein HERR kennt das Gesagte im Himmel und auf Erden.
ref: He said: "My Lord knows whatever is spoken in the heavens and the earth.
draft: Say: "My Lord knows what is spoken in heaven and on earth.
hil: Say: "Verily, My Lord knows what is said in the heavens and on earth."
compare: Say: "Verily, My Lord knows what is said in the heavens and on earth."

src: Ist es denn Unsere Strafe, die sie beschleunigen wollen?
ref: Do they wish Us then to hasten the punishment?
draft: Is it then our punishment that they want to accelerate?
hil: Is it Our punishment that they want to hasten?
compare: Is it then our punishment that they want to accelerate?

src: Auch wenn sie den Weg der Rechtschaffenheit erkennen, folgen sie ihm nicht als (ihren) Weg, doch wenn sie den Weg des Fehlgehens erkennen, folgen sie ihm als (ihren) Weg, dies weil sie Unsere Ayat verleugnen und ihnen gegenüber achtlos zu sein pflegten.
ref: This is so for they have called Our messages lies, and have been heedless of them."
draft: Even if they recognize the path of righteousness, they do not follow it as their path, but if they recognize the path of wrongdoing, they follow it as their path because they deny Our signs and have been heedless towards them.
hil: They do not follow the path of righteousness as their own, even though they recognize it, but they follow the path of wrongdoing as their own, once they have recognized it. This is because they deny Our signs and have been indifferent to them.
compare: Even if they recognize the path of righteousness, they do not follow it as their path, but if they recognize the path of wrongdoing, they follow it as their path because they deny Our signs and have been heedless towards them.

src: Und er hält nicht aus Geiz das (ihm offenbarte) Verborgene zurück.
ref: He is not chary of making public what is unknown.
draft: And he does not withhold the (revealed) hidden out of greed.
hil: "And he does not withhold the (revealed) hidden out of greed."
compare: And he does not withhold the (revealed) hidden out of greed.

src: Wenn diese dann dicke Regenwolken trugen, lassen WIR ihn (den Regen) zu einer toten Landschaft treiben, dann lassen WIR darauf das Wasser herab. Und damit lassen WIR von den verschiedenen Früchten sprießen.
ref: Then, when they have gathered up heavy clouds, We drive them to a dead land, where We make water come down, and with it We bring out all kinds of fruits.
draft: When they then carried thick rain clouds, WE let it (the rain) drive towards a dead landscape, then WE let the water fall on it. And thus WE let different fruits sprout.
hil: When they carried thick rain clouds, WE drove the rain towards a dead landscape, then WE let the water fall on it. And thus, WE let different fruits sprout.
compare: When they carried thick rain clouds, WE drove the rain towards a dead landscape, then WE let the water fall on it. And thus, WE let different fruits sprout.

src: Und an ALLAH werden die Angelegenheiten gewandt.
ref: To God all matters revert.
draft: And the affairs are turned to Allah.
hil: And to Allah are all affairs referred for decision.
compare: And to Allah are all affairs referred for decision.

src: Und sie folgten dem, was die Satane unter der Herrschaft Salomos vortrugen.
ref: They followed what the Shayatin (devils) gave out (falsely of the magic) in the lifetime of Sulaiman (Solomon).
draft: And they followed what the Satans presented under the rule of Solomon.
hil: And they followed what the Satans presented under the rule of Solomon.
compare: And they followed what the Satans presented under the rule of Solomon.

src: Und Wir werden ihnen ihren Anteil fürwahr unverringert zukommen lassen.
ref: We shall verily give them their meed without diminution.
draft: And we will certainly give them their share undiminished.
hil: We will certainly give them their share undiminished.
compare: And we will certainly give them their share undiminished.

src: Seid nicht wie diejenigen, die Musa verleumdeten, dann erklärte ihn ALLAH von dem, was sie ihm unterstellten, für unschuldig. Und er war bei ALLAH hochgeschätzt.
ref: Do not be like the people who troubled Moosa – so Allah freed him from the allegations they had uttered; and Moosa is honourable in the sight of Allah.
draft: Do not be like those who slandered Musa, then ALLAH declared him innocent of what they accused him. And he was highly esteemed by ALLAH.
hil: Do not be like those who slandered Musa, then ALLAH declared him innocent of what they accused him. And he was highly esteemed by ALLAH.
compare: Do not be like those who slandered Musa, then ALLAH declared him innocent of what they accused him. And he was highly esteemed by ALLAH.

src: Sodann lasse sie mit ihren schweifenden Gesprächen ihr Spiel treiben.
ref: Say: "God," and leave them to the sport of engaging in vain discourse.
draft: Then let them indulge in their rambling conversations.
hil: As a result, let them continue their game with their rambling conversations.
compare: Then let them indulge in their rambling conversations.

src: Die Gänge der Himmel, daß ich zum Gott des Mose emporsteige.
ref: to the heavens and be able to climb up to the Lord of Moses.
draft: The corridors of heaven, that I ascend to the God of Moses.
hil: The passageways of heaven, so that I ascend to the God of Moses.
compare: The corridors of heaven, that I ascend to the God of Moses.

src: Und ich war ihr Zeuge, solange ich unter ihnen weilte, doch nachdem Du mich abberufen hattest, bist Du ihr Wächter gewesen; und Du bist der Zeuge aller Dinge.
ref: And so long as I dwelt with them I was witness over their actions. And after my life had been done, You were their keeper; and You are a witness over all things.
draft: And I was their witness as long as I dwelt among them, but after You recalled me, You became their guardian; and You are the witness of all things.
hil: And I was their witness as long as I lived among them, but after You called me back, You became their guardian, and You are the witness of all things.
compare: And I was their witness as long as I lived among them, but after You called me back, You became their guardian, and You are the witness of all things.

src: Sie sagte: "HERR! Wie kann ich einen Sohn haben, wo kein Mann mich jemals intim berührt hat."
ref: She said: "How can I have a son, O Lord, when no man has touched me?"
draft: She said, "Lord! How can I have a son when no man has ever touched me intimately?"
hil: She said, 'Lord, how can I have a son when no man has ever touched me intimately?'
compare: She said, "Lord! How can I have a son when no man has ever touched me intimately?"

src: Ich folge doch nur dem, was mir an Wahy zuteil wird."
ref: I only follow what is revealed to me.'
draft: I just follow what is revealed to me as Wahy.
hil: Say, 'I only follow what is revealed to me as Wahy.'
compare: I just follow what is revealed to me as Wahy.

src: Ihm gebührt die wahre Anrufung. Diejenigen, die sie an seiner Stelle anrufen, erhören sie in keinem Anliegen.
ref: For Him (Alone) is the Word of Truth (i.e. none has the right to be worshipped but He).
draft: He deserves the true invocation. Those who call upon it in his place will not be heard in any matter.
hil: To Him belongs the true invocation. Those who call upon it instead of Him will not be answered in any matter.
compare: To Him belongs the true invocation. Those who call upon it instead of Him will not be answered in any matter.

src: Die Bitte Abrahams um Vergebung für seinen Vater erfolgte nur aufgrund eines Versprechens, das er ihm gegeben hatte. Als es ihm aber deutlich wurde, daß er ein Feind Gottes war, sagte er sich von ihm los. Abraham war voller Trauer und langmütig.
ref: And the seeking of forgiveness for his father (paternal uncle) by Ibrahim was only because of a promise he had made to him; then when it became clear to him that he was an enemy of Allah, Ibrahim broke off ties with him; indeed Ibrahim is surely very soft-hearted, most forbearing.
draft: The request of Abraham for forgiveness for his father was made only because of a promise he had given him. But when it became clear to him that he was an enemy of God, he disowned him. Abraham was full of sorrow and patient.
hil: Abraham's request for forgiveness for his father was made only because of a promise that he had given him. But when it became clear to him that his father was an enemy of God, he disowned him. Abraham was full of sorrow and patient.
compare: Abraham's request for forgiveness for his father was made only because of a promise that he had given him. But when it became clear to him that his father was an enemy of God, he disowned him. Abraham was full of sorrow and patient.

src: Da erwies Allah uns eine Wohltat und bewahrte uns vor der Strafe des Glutwindes.
ref: But God has been gracious to us, and has saved us from the torment of scorching wind.
draft: Allah bestowed a favor upon us and saved us from the punishment of the scorching wind.
hil: Allah favored us and saved us from the punishment of the scorching wind.
compare: Allah bestowed a favor upon us and saved us from the punishment of the scorching wind.

src: Es entgeht Ihm nicht das Gewicht eines Stäubchens, weder in den Himmeln noch auf der Erde. Und es gibt nichts, was kleiner ist als dies oder größer, das nicht in einem deutlichen Buch (verzeichnet) wäre,
ref: Not even an atom's weight in the heavens and the earth, or something smaller or greater than it, is hidden from Him, and which is not recorded in the all-too-manifest Book,
draft: He does not miss the weight of a speck of dust, neither in the heavens nor on the earth. And there is nothing smaller than this or greater, which would not be recorded in a clear book.
hil: He does not miss the weight of a speck of dust, neither in the heavens nor on the earth. And there is nothing smaller than this or greater, which would not be recorded in a clear book.
compare: He does not miss the weight of a speck of dust, neither in the heavens nor on the earth. And there is nothing smaller than this or greater, which would not be recorded in a clear book.

src: Und sie sagen: "Wenn doch ein Zeichen von seinem Herrn auf ihn herabgesandt würde!" Sag: Das Verborgene ist nur Allahs.
ref: And they say, “Why is not a sign sent down upon him from his Lord?”
draft: And they say, "If only a sign were sent down to him from his Lord!" Say, "The unseen is only for Allah."
hil: And they say, 'If only a sign were sent down to him from his Lord!' Say, 'The unseen is only for Allah.'
compare: And they say, "If only a sign were sent down to him from his Lord!" Say, "The unseen is only for Allah."

src: Dem vergelten WIR mit Dschahannam.
ref: I am a god beside Him, that one We should repay with hell.
draft: We will repay them with Jahannam.
hil: We will repay them with Jahannam.
compare: We will repay them with Jahannam.

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Weshalb sagt ihr, was ihr nicht macht?!
ref: O you who believe, why do you profess what you do not practise?
draft: Your, who have internalized the imam! Why do you say what you don't do?!
hil: O you who believe, why do you say what you do not do, those of you who have internalized the faith?
compare: O you who believe, why do you say what you do not do, those of you who have internalized the faith?

src: Dann entsprangen daraus zwölf Quellen, bereits kennt jede Gruppe ihre Trinkstelle. Esst und trinkt von ALLAHs Rizq und übertreibt nicht auf Erden als Verderben-Anrichtende!
ref: Then there gushed forth thereout twelve springs; every people already knew their drinking-place; eat and drink of the provision of Allah, and commit not evil on the earth as corrupters.
draft: Then twelve springs gushed forth from it;  already each clan knew its watering place. Eat and drink from Allah's provisions and do not go about on the earth spreading corruption.
hil: "Then twelve springs gushed forth from it; each group already knows its drinking place. Eat and drink from God's gifts, and spread no discord on the land."
compare: Then twelve springs gushed forth from it;  already each clan knew its watering place. Eat and drink from Allah's provisions and do not go about on the earth spreading corruption.

src: Und sollte dich eine Versuchung des Satans (vom Wahren) ablenken, so suche Zuflucht bei ALLAH!
ref: And if an evil whisper comes to you from Shaitan (Satan) then seek refuge with Allah.
draft: And if a temptation of Satan (from the Truth) distracts you, seek refuge in Allah!
hil: And if a temptation of Satan (from the Truth) distracts you, seek refuge in Allah!
compare: And if a temptation of Satan (from the Truth) distracts you, seek refuge in Allah!

src: Und sporne die Gläubigen an, vielleicht wird Gott die Schlagkraft derer, die ungläubig sind, zurückhalten. Und Gott besitzt eine noch stärkere Schlagkraft und verhängt eine noch härtere Strafe.
ref: And urge on the believers; haply God will restrain the unbelievers' might; God is stronger in might, more terrible in punishing.
draft: And urge the believers on, perhaps God will hold back the might of those who disbelieve. And God has an even stronger might and imposes an even harsher punishment.
hil: And urge the believers, perhaps God will hold back the might of those who disbelieve. And God has an even stronger might and imposes an even harsher punishment.
compare: And urge the believers, perhaps God will hold back the might of those who disbelieve. And God has an even stronger might and imposes an even harsher punishment.

src: Und gewiß, bereits ließen WIR Musa Wahy zuteil werden: "Brich nachts auf mit Meinen Dienern, dann schlage ihnen einen getrockneten Weg ins Meer! Habe keine Angst vor Verfolgung und fürchte dich nicht!"
ref: And We divinely inspired Moosa that, “Journey with My bondmen in a part of the night and strike a dry path in the sea for them, you shall have no fear of Firaun getting to you, nor any danger.”
draft: And indeed, we have already bestowed upon Musa the revelation: "Set out with My servants during the night and strike for them a dry path through the sea. Do not fear pursuit and have no worry."
hil: And indeed, we said to Moses: 'Set out with My creatures during the night, and make for them a dry path through the sea! Do not fear pursuit and have no worry!'
compare: And indeed, we have already bestowed upon Musa the revelation: "Set out with My servants during the night and strike for them a dry path through the sea. Do not fear pursuit and have no worry."

src: Am Tag, da der Geist und die Engel in einer Reihe stehen. Sie werden nicht sprechen, ausgenommen der, dem der Erbarmer es erlaubt und der das Richtige sagt.
ref: Upon the day when the Spirit and the angels stand in ranks they shall speak not, save him to whom the All-merciful has given leave, and who speaks aright.
draft: On the day when the spirit and the angels stand in a row, they will not speak except for the one to whom the Merciful allows and who speaks the right thing.
hil: "On the day when the spirit and the angels stand in a row, they will not speak except for the one to whom the Merciful allows and who speaks the right thing."
compare: On the day when the spirit and the angels stand in a row, they will not speak except for the one to whom the Merciful allows and who speaks the right thing.

src: Wenn ihr ALLAH (Seiner Sache) eine Hasan-Anleihe gebt, wird ER euch vervielfachen und euch vergeben. Und ALLAH ist reichlich belohnend, allnachsichtig.
ref: If you lend an excellent loan to Allah, He will double it for you and forgive you; and Allah is Most Appreciative, Most Forbearing.
draft: If you give ALLAH (His due) a goodly loan, He will increase it for you and forgive you. And Allah is Most Appreciative and Forbearing.
hil: If you give Allah a goodly loan, He will increase it for you and forgive you. And Allah is abundantly rewarding, all-forgiving.
compare: If you give ALLAH (His due) a goodly loan, He will increase it for you and forgive you. And Allah is Most Appreciative and Forbearing.

src: Alles, was in den Himmeln, und alles, was auf Erden ist, preist Allah; und Er ist der Erhabene, der Allweise.
ref: WHATEVER IS IN the heavens and the earth sings the praises of God. He is all-mighty and all-wise.
draft: "All that is in the heavens and all that is on earth glorifies Allah; and He is the Most High, the All-Wise."
hil: Everything that is in the heavens and on earth glorifies Allah; and He is the Most High, the All-Wise.
compare: "All that is in the heavens and all that is on earth glorifies Allah; and He is the Most High, the All-Wise."

src: Also laß von ihnen und von dem ab, was sie erlügen.
ref: Leave them to their falsehoods.
draft: Also, leave them and what they lie about.
hil: So leave them and what they invent.
compare: So leave them and what they invent.

src: Es gibt welche unter den Juden, die Worte aus ihren Stellungen verdrehen und sagen: "Wir hören und wir gehorchen nicht", und "Höre, ohne gehört zu werden", und "Sei uns nachsichtig", indem sie mit ihren Zungen lügen und den Glauben lästern. Und hätten sie gesagt: "Wir hören und wir gehorchen", und "Höre", und "Schaue gnädig auf uns", wäre es besser für sie gewesen und aufrechter. Aber Allah hat sie zur Strafe für ihren Unglauben verflucht; darum glauben sie nur wenig.
ref: Some of the Jews interchange the words from their places and say, “We hear and disobey” – and they say “Hear- may you not be able to hear” – and they say “Raena (Be considerate towards us)” distorting it with their tongues and in order to slander religion; had they said, “We hear and we obey” and “Kindly listen to us, O dear Prophet,” and “Look mercifully upon us, O dear Prophet”, it would have been much better for them and more just – but Allah has cursed them for their disbelief; so they do not believe except a little.
draft: There are those among the Jews who twist words from their [proper] usages and say, "We hear and disobey" and "Hear but be not heard" and "Ra'ina," twisting their tongues and defaming the religion. And if they had said [instead], "We hear and obey" and "Wait for us [to understand]," it would have been better for them and more suitable. But Allah has cursed them for their disbelief, so they believe not, except for a few.
hil: There are some among the Jews who twist words from their [proper] usages and say, 'We hear and we do not obey,' and 'Listen without being heard,' and 'Be lenient with us,' while lying with their tongues and blaspheming faith. If they had said instead, 'We hear and obey,' 'Wait for us [to understand],' and 'Look upon us with favor,' it would have been better for them and more suitable. But Allah has cursed them for their disbelief, so they believe little.
compare: There are those among the Jews who twist words from their [proper] usages and say, "We hear and disobey" and "Hear but be not heard" and "Ra'ina," twisting their tongues and defaming the religion. And if they had said [instead], "We hear and obey" and "Wait for us [to understand]," it would have been better for them and more suitable. But Allah has cursed them for their disbelief, so they believe not, except for a few.

src: Vielleicht möchtest du einen Teil von dem, was dir (als Offenbarung) eingegeben wird, auslassen und deine Brust ist dadurch beklommen, und dies, weil sie sagen: "Wäre doch ein Schatz auf ihn herabgesandt worden oder ein Engel mit ihm gekommen!" Du aber bist nur ein Warner. Und Allah ist Sachwalter über alles.
ref: Perhaps you are leaving part of what has been sent down to you, and your chest is straitened by it, because they say: 'Why has no treasure been sent down to him, or an angel come with him' You are only a warner, and Allah is a Guardian over everything.
draft: Maybe you want to leave out some of what is revealed to you, and your chest feels tight because of it, and this is because they say, "If only a treasure had been sent down to him, or an angel had come with him!" But you are only a warner. And Allah is the guardian of all things.
hil: You may omit some of what is revealed to you and may be disheartened because they say, 'Why was no treasure sent to him or an angel accompanied him?' But you are only a warner, and Allah is the guardian of all things.
compare: Maybe you want to leave out some of what is revealed to you, and your chest feels tight because of it, and this is because they say, "If only a treasure had been sent down to him, or an angel had come with him!" But you are only a warner. And Allah is the guardian of all things.

src: Abraham war weder Jude noch Christ, sondern er war Anhänger des reinen Glaubens, ein Gottergebener, und er gehörte nicht zu den Polytheisten.
ref: Neither was Abraham a Jew nor a Christian, but upright and obedient, and not an idolater.
draft: Abraham was neither a Jew nor a Christian, but he was a follower of the pure faith, a God-submitter, and he did not belong to the polytheists.
hil: Abraham was not a Jew nor a Christian, but he was a follower of pure faith, a God-submitter, and he did not belong to the polytheists.
compare: Abraham was not a Jew nor a Christian, but he was a follower of pure faith, a God-submitter, and he did not belong to the polytheists.

src: Am Tag, da sie sehen, was ihnen angedroht wird, wird ihnen sein, als hätten sie nur eine Stunde vom Tag verweilt.
ref: The Day when they see what they had been warned against they will feel as though they had remained in the world no more than an hour of a day.
draft: On the day they see what is threatened to them, it will be as if they have only stayed for one hour of the day.
hil: On the day when they see what is threatened to them, it will be as if they have stayed for only one hour of the day.
compare: On the day when they see what is threatened to them, it will be as if they have stayed for only one hour of the day.

src: Oder bis du den Himmel auf uns in Stücken herabfallen läßt, wie du behauptet hast, oder Gott und die Engel vor unsere Augen bringst,
ref: Or, let chunks of sky fall over us, as you assert (you will); or, bring God and the angels as a surety;
draft: Or until you let the sky fall down on us in pieces, as you claimed, or bring god and the angels before our eyes.
hil: Or until you let the sky fall down on us in pieces, as you claimed, or bring God and the angels before our eyes.
compare: Or until you let the sky fall down on us in pieces, as you claimed, or bring God and the angels before our eyes.

src: Und wisst, daß unter euch ALLAHs Gesandter ist. Würde er auf euch in vielen der Angelegenheiten hören, würdet ihr sicherlich unter Unannehmlichkeiten leiden.
ref: Know that the Apostle of God is among you: If he agreed with you in most matters you would surely come to grief.
draft: And know that among you is Allah's messenger. If he were to listen to you in many of the matters, you would certainly suffer from inconvenience.
hil: And know that among you is Allah's messenger. If he were to listen to you in many matters, you would certainly suffer inconvenience.
compare: And know that among you is Allah's messenger. If he were to listen to you in many of the matters, you would certainly suffer from inconvenience.

src: Und ALLAH ist immer über alles allwissend.
ref: God has knowledge of everything.
draft: And ALLAH is always omniscient about everything.
hil: And verily Allah is Knower of everything.
compare: And verily Allah is Knower of everything.

src: Diejenigen, die von den Engeln abberufen werden - da sie gegen sich selber gefrevelt haben und nun unterwürfig geworden sind (sagen): "Wir pflegten ja, nichts Böses zu tun." Nein, wahrlich, Allah weiß wohl, was ihr zu tun pflegtet.
ref: whom the angels take while they were still harming themselves' Then they will offer submission, saying: 'We have done no evil' No, surely Allah knows what you have done.
draft: Those who are called away by the angels - because they have sinned against themselves and now have become submissive (say): "We used to do no wrong." No, indeed, Allah knows well what you used to do.
hil: Those who are called away by the angels - because they have sinned against themselves and now have become submissive - say, "We used to do no wrong." No, indeed, Allah knows well what you used to do.
compare: Those who are called away by the angels - because they have sinned against themselves and now have become submissive (say): "We used to do no wrong." No, indeed, Allah knows well what you used to do.

src: Hätten aber die Bewohner (jener) Städte geglaubt und wären sie gottesfürchtig gewesen, so hätten Wir ihnen ganz gewiß die Segnungen von Himmel und Erde eröffnet. Doch sie leugneten; also erfaßten Wir sie um dessentwillen, was sie begangen hatten.
ref: But if the people of these regions had believed and feared God, We would surely have showered on them blessings of the heavens and the earth; but they only denied, and We punished them for their deeds.
draft: But if the inhabitants of those cities had believed and feared Allah, We would have opened up to them blessings from heaven and earth. But they denied [the messengers], so We seized them for what they were earning [of evil].
hil: But if the inhabitants of those cities had believed and feared Allah, We would have surely opened up to them blessings from heaven and earth. But they denied [the messengers]; thus We seized them for what they had committed.
compare: But if the inhabitants of those cities had believed and feared Allah, We would have surely opened up to them blessings from heaven and earth. But they denied [the messengers]; thus We seized them for what they had committed.

src: (Er ist der) Herr der Himmel und der Erde und all dessen, was zwischen beiden liegt.
ref: Lord of the heavens and the earth and all that lies between them.
draft: He is the Lord of the heavens and the earth and all that is between them.
hil: Lord of the heavens and the earth and all that is between them, so worship Him, be patient in His worship.
compare: He is the Lord of the heavens and the earth and all that is between them.

src: So ziehen sie ihn der Lüge.
ref: So they belied him, and We destroyed them.
draft: So they draw him into the lie.
hil: Thus they accuse him of lying.
compare: Thus they accuse him of lying.

src: Diese sind es, die eine schlimme Abrechnung haben werden, und ihre Herberge ist Gahannam.
ref: They will be subjected to a severe reckoning and Hell shall be their refuge.
draft: These are the ones who will have a bad reckoning, and their dwelling place is Gehenna.
hil: These are the ones who will have a terrible accounting, and their dwelling is Gehenna.
compare: These are the ones who will have a terrible accounting, and their dwelling is Gehenna.

src: Und reinige mein Haus für diejenigen, die den Umlauf vollziehen, und für die, die aufrecht stehen, sich verneigen und niederwerfen.
ref: And do thou purify My House for those that shall go about it and those that stand, for those that bow and prostrate themselves;
draft: And clean my house for those who perform the circumambulation, and for those who stand upright, bow and prostrate themselves.
hil: Clean my house for those who perform the circumambulation, and for those who stand upright, bow and prostrate themselves.
compare: And clean my house for those who perform the circumambulation, and for those who stand upright, bow and prostrate themselves.

src: (Was nun) die älteren Frauen (betrifft), die nicht mehr auf Heirat hoffen können, so trifft sie kein Vorwurf, wenn sie ihre Tücher ablegen, ohne ihre Zierde zur Schau zu stellen. Aber wenn sie sich dessen enthalten, ist das besser für sie. Und Allah ist Allhörend, Allwissend.
