hil: And (remember) when Musa asked for water for his people, then WE said: 'Strike the rock with your staff!' Then twelve springs gushed forth from it, and each group knew its drinking place. Eat and drink from God's gifts and spread no discord in the land.
compare: And (remember) when Musa asked for water for his people, then WE said: "Strike the rock with your staff!" Then twelve springs gushed forth from it, and each group knew its drinking place. Eat and drink from Allah's sustenance and do not act corruptly on the earth as mischief-makers.

src: Und esst und trinkt, bis für euch der weiße Faden (der Dämmerung) vom schwarzen Faden (der Nacht) unterscheidbar wird, dann vollendet das Siyam bis zur Nacht! Und werdet nicht intim mit ihnen, während ihr I'tikaf in den Moscheen vollzieht.
ref: And eat and drink, until the white thread shows clearly to you from the black thread at the dawn; then complete the Fast unto the night, and do not lie with them while you cleave to the mosques.
draft: And eat and drink until the white thread becomes distinct to you from the black thread of the night. Then complete the fast until the night. And do not have relations with them as long as you are staying in the mosques for Itikaf.
hil: And eat and drink until the white thread becomes distinct to you from the black thread of the night. Then complete the fast until the night. And do not have relations with them as long as you are staying in the mosques for Itikaf.
compare: And eat and drink until the white thread becomes distinct to you from the black thread of the night. Then complete the fast until the night. And do not have relations with them as long as you are staying in the mosques for Itikaf.

src: So verinnerlicht den Iman an ALLAH und an Seine Gesandten.
ref: So have faith in Allah and His apostles, and do not say, ‘[God is] a trinity.’
draft: So internalize the faith in Allah and His messengers.
hil: Therefore, internalize the faith in Allah and His messengers.
compare: So internalize the faith in Allah and His messengers.

src: Also esset von dem, was sie für euch fangen, und sprecht Allahs Namen darüber aus.
ref: So eat from what they catch for you, and pronounce God’s name over it.
draft: Also eat from what they catch for you, and mention Allah's name on it.
hil: Eat from what they catch for you, and pronounce Allah's name over it.
compare: Eat from what they catch for you, and pronounce Allah's name over it.

src: Und keine lasttragende (Seele) nimmt die Last einer anderen auf sich.
ref: If you are grateful He will be pleased with you.
draft: And no load-bearing (soul) takes on the burden of another.
hil: And no burden-bearing (soul) shall bear the burden of another.
compare: And no load-bearing (soul) takes on the burden of another.

src: Und sie eilen dann zum Weg um die Wette, aber wie könnten sie da sehen?
ref: Then they would have raced along to cross the Bridge but how could they have seen (their way)?
draft: And then they hurry to the path, racing against each other, but how could they see there?
hil: And they then hurry along the path in a race, but how could they see there?
compare: And they then hurry along the path in a race, but how could they see there?

src: Gewiß, ER ist Seinen Dienern gegenüber allkundig, allsehend.
ref: He is all-aware and all-seeing.
draft: Certainly, He is all-knowing and all-seeing towards His servants.
hil: "Certainly, He is all-knowing and all-seeing towards His servants."
compare: Certainly, He is all-knowing and all-seeing towards His servants.

src: Sie geben einander zum Trug prunkende Rede ein und hätte es dein Herr gewollt, hätten sie es nicht getan; so überlaß sie sich selbst mit dem, was sie erdichten.
ref: But if your Lord had willed they would not have done so. Pay no attention to them and to what they fabricate.
draft: They give each other deceitful and pompous speeches, and if your lord had wanted it, they would not have done so; so let them indulge in what they invent.
hil: They give each other deceitful and pompous speeches, and if your lord had wanted it, they would not have done so; so let them indulge in what they invent.
compare: They give each other deceitful and pompous speeches, and if your lord had wanted it, they would not have done so; so let them indulge in what they invent.

src: Das Gebäude, das sie errichtet haben, wird nicht aufhören, Zweifel in ihren Herzen zu errregen, bis ihre Herzen in Stücke gerissen sind. Und Allah ist Allwissend, Allweise.
ref: The edifice they have built will always fill their minds with perturbation (which will not cease) till their hearts are rent to pieces, for God is all-knowing and all-wise.
draft: The building they have erected will not cease to arouse doubts in their hearts until their hearts are torn to pieces. And Allah is All-Knowing, All-Wise.
hil: The building they have constructed will not cease to cause doubts in their hearts until their hearts are torn apart. And Allah is All-Knowing, All-Wise.
compare: The building they have erected will not cease to arouse doubts in their hearts until their hearts are torn to pieces. And Allah is All-Knowing, All-Wise.

src: Und gehöre nicht zu den Unachtsamen!
ref: Be not thou among the heedless.
draft: And do not belong to the inattentive!
hil: And do not be among the inattentive!
compare: And do not be among the inattentive!

src: Das ist Allahs Anordnung, die Er zu euch (als Offenbarung) herabgesandt hat.
ref: This is the commandment of God that is sent down to you.
draft: This is Allah's command that He has sent down to you (as a revelation).
hil: "This is Allah's command that He has sent down to you (as a revelation)."
compare: This is Allah's command that He has sent down to you (as a revelation).

src: Dann ist es an jenem Tag ein schwerer Tag,
ref: It will be a day of distress,
draft: Then on that day it is a difficult day.
hil: Then on that day it will be a heavy day.
compare: Then on that day it will be a heavy day.

src: So wartet ab! Ich gehöre mit euch zu den Abwartenden."
ref: So wait (for what is to come), I am waiting with you."
draft: So wait and see! I belong with you to the wait-and-see ones.
hil: Just wait; I am waiting; I am with you.
compare: So wait and see! I belong with you to the wait-and-see ones.

src: Um damit Korn und Pflanzen hervorzubringen
ref: That We may produce from it grain and vegetation,
draft: To produce grain and plants with it.
hil: To produce grain and plants with it.
compare: To produce grain and plants with it.

src: Gewiß, das Gebet hält davon ab, das Schändliche und das Verwerfliche (zu tun). Und das Gedenken Allahs ist wahrlich größer.
ref: Surely prayer keeps you away from the obscene and detestable, but the remembrance of God is greater far; and God knows what you do.
draft: Certainly, prayer prevents from doing the shameful and the reprehensible. And the remembrance of Allah is truly greater.
hil: Certainly, prayer prevents from doing the shameful and the reprehensible. And the remembrance of Allah is truly greater.
compare: Certainly, prayer prevents from doing the shameful and the reprehensible. And the remembrance of Allah is truly greater.

src: O die ihr glaubt, nehmt nicht die Ungläubigen anstatt der Gläubigen zu Schutzherren!
ref: O believers, do not hold unbelievers as friends in preference to the faithful.
draft: O you who believe, do not take the unbelievers as protectors instead of the believers!
hil: O believers! Do not take the unbelievers as allies instead of the believers!
compare: O believers! Do not take the unbelievers as allies instead of the believers!

src: Sind beide im Gleichnis etwa gleich?!
ref: Can they be equal?
draft: Are both approximately the same in the parable?!
hil: Are both in the parable about equal?
compare: Are both in the parable about equal?

src: Er aber gab (dir) Macht über sie; und Allah ist Allwissend, Allweise.
ref: So He gave you mastery over them, for God is all-knowing and all-wise.
draft: But He gave you power over them; and Allah is All-Knowing, All-Wise.
hil: He gave you power over them, and Allah is All-Knowing, All-Wise.
compare: But He gave you power over them; and Allah is All-Knowing, All-Wise.

src: Es ist wie mit den Leuten des Pharao und denen, die vor ihnen lebten: Sie erklärten die Zeichen ihres Herrn für Lüge, so ließen Wir sie für ihre Sünden verderben, und Wir ließen die Leute des Pharao ertrinken.
ref: Their case is like that of the people of Pharaoh and those before them: they rejected the signs of their Lord as false and so We destroyed them for their sins, and caused the people of Pharaoh to drown.
draft: It is as with the people of Pharaoh and those who lived before them: they denied the signs of their Lord, so We destroyed them for their sins, and We drowned the people of Pharaoh.
hil: It is like the case of the people of Pharaoh, and those before them, who rejected the signs of their Lord. So We destroyed them for their sins, and We caused the people of Pharaoh to drown.
compare: It is as with the people of Pharaoh and those who lived before them: they denied the signs of their Lord, so We destroyed them for their sins, and We drowned the people of Pharaoh.

src: Der alles gut gemacht hat, was Er erschuf. Und Er begann die Schöpfung des Menschen aus Ton.
ref: Who made all things He created excellent; and first fashioned man from clay,
draft: He who has made everything good, that which He has created. And He began the creation of man from clay.
hil: He who has made all things good that He created. And He began the creation of man from clay.
compare: He who has made all things good that He created. And He began the creation of man from clay.

src: Keineswegs haben sie ALLAH verherrlicht, wie es Ihm gebührt, als sie sagten: "ALLAH hat keinem Menschen irgend etwas hinabgesandt." Sag: "Wer hat denn die Schrift hinabgesandt, mit der Musa als Licht und als Rechtleitung für die Menschen kam?
ref: And they (the Jews) did not realise (or appreciate) the importance of Allah as was required when they said, “Allah has not sent down anything upon any human being”; say, “Who has sent down the Book which Moosa brought, a light and guidance for mankind, which you have divided into different papers, some which you show and hide most of them?
draft: By no means have they glorified ALLAH as He should be glorified when they said, "ALLAH has not revealed anything to any human being." Say, "Who then revealed the Book which Musa brought as a light and guidance for mankind?"
hil: By no means have they glorified Allah as He should be glorified when they said, 'Allah has not revealed anything to any human being.' Say: 'Who then revealed the Book which Musa brought as a light and guidance for mankind?'
compare: By no means have they glorified ALLAH as He should be glorified when they said, "ALLAH has not revealed anything to any human being." Say, "Who then revealed the Book which Musa brought as a light and guidance for mankind?"

src: Dann bringe uns, was du uns androhst, solltest du von den Wahrhaftigen sein."
ref: Then bring upon us what you predict for us, if you are a man of truth."
draft: "Then bring us what you threaten us with, if you are one of the truthful."
hil: Then bring us what you threaten us with, if you are one of the truthful.
compare: "Then bring us what you threaten us with, if you are one of the truthful."

src: Die Zahl der Monate bei Gott ist zwölf Monate, im Buch Gottes festgestellt am Tag, da Er die Himmel und die Erde erschaffen hat. Vier davon sind heilig. Das ist die richtige Religion. So tut euch selbst in ihnen kein Unrecht. Und kämpft gegen die Polytheisten allesamt, wie sie gegen euch allesamt kämpfen. Und wißt, Gott ist mit den Gottesfürchtigen.
ref: Indeed the number of months before Allah is twelve – in the Book of Allah – since the day He created the heavens and the earth, of which four are sacred; this the straight religion; so do not wrong yourselves in those months; and constantly fight against the polytheists as they constantly fight against you; and know well that Allah is with the pious.
draft: The number of months with God is twelve months, established in God's book on the day He created the heavens and the earth. Four of them are sacred. This is the right religion. So do not wrong yourselves during them. And fight against the polytheists all together, as they fight against you all together. And know that God is with the righteous.
hil: The number of months with Allah is twelve months, ordained by Allah on the day He created the heavens and the earth. Four of them are sacred. This is the right religion. Do not commit injustice against your souls during the sacred months, but fight against the pagans altogether as they fight against all of you. And know that Allah is with the righteous.
compare: The number of months with Allah is twelve months, ordained by Allah on the day He created the heavens and the earth. Four of them are sacred. This is the right religion. Do not commit injustice against your souls during the sacred months, but fight against the pagans altogether as they fight against all of you. And know that Allah is with the righteous.

src: Doch ihr seid keineswegs dessen Aufbewahrer.
ref: It is not ye who are the holders of the store thereof.
draft: But you are by no means its keeper.
hil: But you are in no way its keeper.
compare: But you are by no means its keeper.

src: Darin liegen Zeichen für die Leute, die Verstand haben.
ref: Verily there are signs in this for men of understanding.
draft: Therein lie signs for the people who have understanding.
hil: "Therein lie signs for the people who have understanding."
compare: Therein lie signs for the people who have understanding.

src: Und Allah ist wahrlich All verzeihend und Allvergebend.
ref: But God is forbearing and forgiving.
draft: And Allah is truly All Forgiving and All Merciful.
hil: Assuredly God is forgiving and kind.
compare: And Allah is truly All Forgiving and All Merciful.

src: Und niemand kann Uns voraus sein.
ref: And we are not to be outrun.
draft: And no one can be ahead of Us.
hil: And no one can be ahead of Us.
compare: And no one can be ahead of Us.

src: Und ALLAH hat euch erschaffen, dann läßt ER euch sterben. Und manch einer von euch wird in das faselnde Alter zurückgesetzt, damit er nichts mehr weiß, nachdem er über Wissen verfügte.
ref: It is God who creates you, then makes you die; and some reach the age of dotage when they forget what they had known before.
draft: And ALLAH has created you, then He lets you die. And some of you are reset to the babbling age so that they no longer know anything, even though they had knowledge.
hil: And ALLAH created you, then He lets you die. And some of you are reset to the babbling age so that they no longer know anything, even though they possessed knowledge.
compare: And ALLAH created you, then He lets you die. And some of you are reset to the babbling age so that they no longer know anything, even though they possessed knowledge.

src: Und erfüllt die (eingegangene) Verpflichtung. Gewiß, nach der (Erfüllung der) Verpflichtung wird gefragt werden.
ref: And fulfil the covenant; surely the covenant shall be questioned of.
draft: And fulfill the (incurred) obligation. Certainly, there will be a demand for (fulfillment of) the obligation.
hil: And fulfill the (incurred) obligation. Surely, there will be a demand for (fulfillment of) the obligation.
compare: And fulfill the (incurred) obligation. Certainly, there will be a demand for (fulfillment of) the obligation.

src: Und nehmt Zeugen, wenn ihr miteinander Handel treibt. Und weder dem Schreiber noch dem Zeugen soll Schaden zugefügt werden.
ref: Have witnesses to the deal, (and make sure) that the scribe or the witness is not harmed.
draft: And take witnesses when you trade with each other. And neither the scribe nor the witness should be harmed.
hil: "And take witnesses when you conduct trade with each other. And neither the scribe nor the witnesses must be caused any harm. "
compare: "And take witnesses when you conduct trade with each other. And neither the scribe nor the witnesses must be caused any harm. "

src: Dies sind wahrlich die Worte eines edlen Gesandten,
ref: That this is indeed the word of an honoured Messenger,
draft: This is truly the words of a noble envoy.
hil: Verily, these are the words of a noble messenger.
compare: Verily, these are the words of a noble messenger.

src: Haben sie denn nicht auf das geschaut, was vom Himmel und von der Erde vor ihnen und was hinter ihnen ist?
ref: Do they not see what is before them and what is behind them of the heavens and the earth?
draft: Have they not looked at what is above them in the sky and below them on the earth?
hil: Behold they not that which is before them and that which is behind them of the heaven and the earth?
compare: Have they not looked at what is above them in the sky and below them on the earth?

src: Als die Munafiq zu dir kamen, sagten sie: "Wir bezeugen, daß du doch ALLAHs Gesandter bist." Und ALLAH weiß, daß du doch Sein Gesandter bist. Und ALLAH bezeugt: "Gewiß, die Munafiq sind doch Lügner."
ref: When the hypocrites come in your presence (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) they say, “We testify that you surely are Allah’s Noble Messenger”; and Allah knows that you indeed are His Noble Messenger, and Allah testifies that the hypocrites are indeed liars.
draft: When the hypocrites come to you, they say: "We bear witness that you are indeed Allah's Messenger." And Allah knows that you are indeed His Messenger, but Allah bears witness that the hypocrites are indeed liars.
hil: When the hypocrites come to you, they say: "We bear witness that you are indeed Allah's Messenger." And Allah knows that you are indeed His Messenger, but Allah bears witness that the hypocrites are indeed liars.
compare: When the hypocrites come to you, they say: "We bear witness that you are indeed Allah's Messenger." And Allah knows that you are indeed His Messenger, but Allah bears witness that the hypocrites are indeed liars.

src: Bestimme für mich eine Aya!"
ref: Make a sign for me."
draft: "Select a verse for me!"
hil: "Select a sign for me!"
compare: "Select a verse for me!"

src: Darin werden sie auf immer ewig weilen; und sie werden weder Freund noch Helfer finden.
ref: They will live in it for ever, and will find no saviour or helper.
draft: They will dwell there forever and ever; and they will find neither friend nor helper.
hil: Therein they shall abide forever and ever, and they shall find neither a friend nor a helper.
compare: They will dwell there forever and ever; and they will find neither friend nor helper.

src: Und die spenden, was sie spenden, während ihre Herzen sich (davor) ängstigen, daß sie zu ihrem Herrn zurückkehren werden,
ref: Who give whatsoever they give (in His way), and their hearts tremble with fear that they have to go back to their Lord,
draft: And they donate what they donate while their hearts are afraid that they will return to their Lord.
hil: They donate what they donate while their hearts are afraid that they will return to their Lord.
compare: And they donate what they donate while their hearts are afraid that they will return to their Lord.

src: Und sie haben Allah andere als Seinesgleichen zur Seite gestellt, um (die Menschen) von Seinem Weg abirren zu lassen.
ref: They have appointed equals of God to mislead people from His path. Tell them: "Enjoy yourselves (so long as you may).
draft: And they have set up partners to Allah, to lead (people) astray from His path.
hil: And they have appointed equals of Allah to mislead people from His path.
compare: And they have set up partners to Allah, to lead (people) astray from His path.

src: Fürwahr, ungläubig sind diejenigen, die sagen: "Gewiß, Allah ist al-Masih, der Sohn Maryams", wo doch al-Masih (selbst) gesagt hat: "O Kinder Isra'ils, dient Allah, meinem Herrn und eurem Herrn!"
ref: They are surely infidels who say: "God is the Christ, son of Mary." But the Christ had only said: "O children of Israel, worship God who is my Lord and your Lord."
draft: Verily, those who say, "Indeed, Allah is the Messiah, the son of Mary" are unbelievers, for the Messiah himself said, "O Children of Israel, worship Allah, my Lord and your Lord!"
hil: Verily, those who say, "Indeed, Allah is the Messiah, the son of Mary" are unbelievers, for the Messiah himself said, "O Children of Israel, worship Allah, my Lord and your Lord!"
compare: Verily, those who say, "Indeed, Allah is the Messiah, the son of Mary" are unbelievers, for the Messiah himself said, "O Children of Israel, worship Allah, my Lord and your Lord!"

src: Und wenn WIR wollten, hätten WIR sie mit ihresgleichen eingetauscht.
ref: And whenever We list, We can replace them with others like Unto them.
draft: And if we wanted to, we could have exchanged them with their own kind.
hil: And if We wanted, We could have exchanged them with their own kind.
compare: And if We wanted, We could have exchanged them with their own kind.

src: Wir begreifen nicht viel von dem, was du sagst - außerdem gewiß sehen wir, daß du doch unter uns ein Schwacher bist.
ref: We do not understand much of what you say, and we see you a weak (man, it is said that he was a blind man) among us.
draft: We do not understand much of what you say - moreover, we certainly see that you are a weakling among us.
hil: We do not understand much of what you say - and surely we can see that you are weak among us.
compare: We do not understand much of what you say - and surely we can see that you are weak among us.

src: Könnt niemanden gegen Ihn verführen,
ref: Can mislead anyone away from Him,
draft: Can't seduce anyone against him.
hil: He cannot be tempted against anyone
compare: He cannot be tempted against anyone

src: Bestimmt ist für sie bei ihrem Herrn die Wohnstätte des Friedens. Er ist ihr Freund wegen dessen, was sie zu tun pflegten.
ref: For them is the abode of peace with their Lord and He is their Master – the result of their deeds.
draft: Certainly, the place of peace is designated for them with their Lord. He is their friend because of what they used to do.
hil: Certainly, the place of peace is designated for them with their Lord. He is their friend because of what they used to do.
compare: Certainly, the place of peace is designated for them with their Lord. He is their friend because of what they used to do.

src: Und wer dem Gesandten widerspricht - nachdem ihm die Rechtleitung deutlich wurde, und einem anderen als dem Weg der Mumin folgt, den werden WIR das verantworten lassen, wofür er verantwortlich war, und dann werden WIR ihn in Dschahannam hineinwerfen lassen. Und erbärmlich ist dieses Werden.
ref: And he who opposes the Prophet even after the way has become clear to him, and follows a path other than the way of believers, We shall lead him to what he has chosen for himself, and shall take him to Hell: How evil a journey's end.
draft: And whoever opposes the messenger - after guidance has become clear to him and follows other than the way of the believers - We will give him what he has taken responsibility for, and drive him into Hell, and evil it is as a destination.
hil: And whoever opposes the messenger, having received guidance, follows a path other than that of believers; We will make him bear what he bears, and throw him into Hell, and it is an evil destination.
compare: And whoever opposes the messenger - after guidance has become clear to him and follows other than the way of the believers - We will give him what he has taken responsibility for, and drive him into Hell, and evil it is as a destination.

src: Als dein Herr Mose rief: «Geh zum Volk, das Unrecht tut,
ref: When your Lord called upon Moses: "Go to the wicked people,
draft: As your Lord called Moses: "Go to the people who do wrong,
hil: "Then, when your Lord called Moses, "Go to the people who commit injustice,
compare: "Then, when your Lord called Moses, "Go to the people who commit injustice,

src: Dennoch gibt es unter euch welche, die nur auf sie hören. Und Gott weiß über die Bescheid, die Unrecht tun.
ref: They have some spies among you, and Allah knows best the wrongdoers.
draft: Nevertheless, there are some among you who only listen to them. And God knows those who do wrong.
hil: And yet there are some among you who only listen to them. And God knows those who do wrong.
compare: Nevertheless, there are some among you who only listen to them. And God knows those who do wrong.

src: Und damit Staub aufwirbeln,
ref: Raising clouds of dust,
draft: And thus raise dust.
hil: And thus raise dust.
compare: And thus raise dust.

src: Und nehmt zwei gerechte Leute von euch zu Zeugen, und erhaltet das Zeugnis Gottes aufrecht.
ref: And call in to witness two men of equity from among yourselves; and perform the witnessing to God Himself.
draft: And take two righteous people from among yourselves as witnesses, and maintain the testimony of God upright.
hil: And appoint two just persons from among yourselves as witnesses and maintain the testimony of God upright.
compare: And take two righteous people from among yourselves as witnesses, and maintain the testimony of God upright.
